translation_text: Munich 1856: Four maps that change your view of the city
german_text: München 1856: Vier Karten, die Ihren Blick auf die Stadt verändern
actual_translation: Munich 1856: Four maps that will change your view of the city

translation_text: This is a place where young people are to meet today.
german_text: Eine Irren-Anstalt, wo sich heute Jugendliche begegnen sollen.
actual_translation: A mental asylum, where today young people are said to meet.

translation_text: A mining chapel, where it is now buried for the S-Bahn tunnel.
german_text: Eine Gruftkapelle, wo nun für den S-Bahn-Tunnel gegraben wird.
actual_translation: A crypt chapel, where they are now digging tunnels for the S-Bahn.

translation_text: The small gardens rely on the former cause of farmers.
german_text: Kleingärtner bewirtschaften den einstigen Grund von Bauern.
actual_translation: Allotment holders cultivate the soil of former farmers.

translation_text: The oldest official map of Munich promotes exciting stories to days.
german_text: Die älteste offizielle Karte Münchens fördert spannende Geschichten zu Tage.
actual_translation: The oldest official map of Munich brings captivating stories to light.

translation_text: It’s annoying when the maps are not up to date.
german_text: Es nervt, wenn Landkarten nicht aktuell sind.
actual_translation: It is annoying when geographical maps are not up-to-date.

translation_text: Everyone knows this, who had to be excited, because the car navy showed a green veil instead of a surrounding road.
german_text: Das kennt jeder, der sich schon mal aufregen musste, weil das Auto-Navi statt einer Umgehungsstraße eine grüne Wiese anzeigte.
actual_translation: Anyone who has ever got worked up because the car's sat-nav is showing a green field instead of a bypass knows that.

translation_text: The historic maps of the digital Bavarian Atlas, an offer of the Bavarian Geoportal to the state government, are all other than current – but this is why it is very obvious.
german_text: Die historischen Landkarten des digitalen Bayern-Atlases, ein Angebot des Geoportals Bayern der Staatsregierung, sind alles andere als aktuell - doch gerade deshalb sehr aufschlussreich.
actual_translation: The historical maps of the digital BayernAtlas, an offering from the State Government's Geoportal Bayern, are anything but up-to-date – and yet it is precisely for this reason that they are so informative.

translation_text: Especially when you compare them with current online cards.
german_text: Besonders wenn man sie mit aktuellen Online-Karten vergleicht.
actual_translation: Especially when one compares them with current online maps.

translation_text: Then it will be clear how cities and communities in the spread area of the Munich Mercury have changed since the 19th century.
german_text: Dann wird deutlich, wie sich Städte und Gemeinden im Verbreitungsgebiet des Münchner Merkur seit dem 19. Jahrhundert verändert haben.
actual_translation: Then it becomes clear how the towns and municipalities in the distribution area of Munich's Merkur newspaper have changed since the 19th century.

translation_text: The digital Bavarian Atlas is a flick tape that is not recognized as such.
german_text: Der digitale Bayern-Atlas ist ein Flickenteppich, den man als solchen nicht gleich erkennt.
actual_translation: The digital BayernAtlas is a patchwork quilt that one doesn't quite recognise for what it is at first.

translation_text: In the big overview map, more detailed maps for cities and municipalities, so-called Urpositions sheets, were incorporated.
german_text: In die große Übersichtskarte wurden für Städte und Gemeinden detailliertere Karten, sogenannte Urpositionsblätter, eingearbeitet.
actual_translation: Within the large overview map, were worked in detailed maps for towns and municipalities, so-called original-lay-of-the-land sheets.

translation_text: These arose according to the Bavarian measurement administration between 1810 and 1864 and originated from the first measurement of Bavaria.
german_text: Diese entstanden nach Angaben der Bayerischen Vermessungsverwaltung zwischen 1810 und 1864 und entspringen der ersten Vermessung Bayerns.
actual_translation: According to information from the Bavarian Surveying and Mapping Authority, these came into being between 1810 and 1864 and arise out of the first survey of Bavaria.

translation_text: The owner is Napoleon.
german_text: Ihr Auftraggeber: Napoleon.
actual_translation: Their commissioner: Napoleon.

translation_text: The French military leader occupied Bavaria since the spring of 1800 during the Second Coalition War with Austria.
german_text: Der französische Heeresführer besetzte Bayern seit dem Frühjahr 1800 während des Zweiten Koalitionskrieges mit Österreich.
actual_translation: The French army commander had occupied Bavaria since the spring in 1800, during the War of the Second Coalition with Austria.

translation_text: Napoleon desired an overview of the occupied country and ordered a topographic capture of Bavaria - of course for military purposes.
german_text: Napoleon wünschte sich einen Überblick über das besetzte Land und gab eine topographische Aufnahme Bayerns in Auftrag - natürlich zu militärischen Zwecken.
actual_translation: Napoleon wanted to gain an overview of the occupied land and commissioned a topographical survey – naturally for military purposes.

translation_text: Even though the French troops eventually with the peace of Lunéville of February 9, 1801: It was the present neighbors who created the idea of a large-scale Bayern map.
german_text: Auch wenn die französischen Truppen mit dem Frieden von Lunéville vom 9. Februar 1801 schließlich abzogen: Es waren die heutigen Nachbarn, die die Idee einer flächendeckenden Bayern-Karte kreierten.
actual_translation: Even if the French troops finally retreated with the Treaty of Lunéville from 9th February 1801: it was the current neighbours who had the idea to create a comprehensive map of Bavaria.

translation_text: Kurfürst Max IV Joseph advanced the project, founded the "Topographic Bureau" - and thus the Bavarian Measurement Administration.
german_text: Kurfürst Max IV. Joseph trieb das Projekt weiter voran, gründete das "Topographische Bureau" - und damit die Bayerische Vermessungsverwaltung.
actual_translation: Elector Max IV. Joseph propelled the project further forward, founding the "Topographical Bureau" – and with that, the Bavarian Surveying and Mapping Authority.

translation_text: The Urpositionsblatt for Munich comes from 1856 and is, like all others, available on the website of the Bayerische Landesbibliothek.
german_text: Das Urpositionsblatt für München stammt aus dem Jahr 1856 und ist wie sämtliche andere auf der Internetseite der Bayerischen Landesbibliothek zu finden.
actual_translation: The original lay-of-the-land sheet for Munich originates from 1856 and, like all the others, can be found on the website of the Bavarian State Library.

translation_text: The comparison earlier/today is the most impressive in the example of the country’s capital city.
german_text: Der Vergleich Früher/Heute ist am Beispiel der Landeshauptstadt am eindrücklichsten.
actual_translation: The comparison of past/present is most impressive taking the example of the state capital.

translation_text: The city has expanded in all directions and has grown together.
german_text: Die Stadt hat sich in alle Richtungen ausgedehnt und ist zusammengewachsen.
actual_translation: The city has stretched out in all directions and coalesced.

translation_text: An example of this is the Untersendling, which appears relatively isolated in the map of 1856.
german_text: Ein Beispiel dafür ist Untersendling, das in der Karte von 1856 noch relativ isoliert auftaucht.
actual_translation: An example of this is Untersendling, which still appears relatively isolated on the map from 1856.

translation_text: Sendling was united 21 years after the map was created, that is, in 1877, as the Munich district.
german_text: Sendling wurde 21 Jahre nach Erstellung der Karte, also 1877, als Münchner Stadtteil eingemeindet.
actual_translation: Sendling was incorporated as an urban district of Munich 21 years after the map was created.

translation_text: Today, Diffendling lies in the middle of the city.
german_text: Heute liegt Untersendling mitten in der Stadt.
actual_translation: Today, Untersendling lies in the middle of the city.

translation_text: The houses of Untersendlings concentrate around 1856 along the present Plinganser road, which was only named in 1878 by Georg Sebastian Plinganser, a leader of the Bavarian farmers’ uprising against Austria in 1705.
german_text: Die Häuser Untersendlings konzentrieren sich um 1856 entlang der heutigen Plinganserstraße, die erst 1878 nach Georg Sebastian Plinganser benannt wurde, einem Anführer des Aufstands der bayerischen Bauern gegen Österreich 1705.
actual_translation: Around 1856, Untersendling's houses are concentrated along what is today Plinganserstraße, which was first named in 1878 after Georg Sebastian Plinganser, a ringleader of the Bavarian farmers' revolt against Austria in 1705.

translation_text: Where the West Park is today, you can see nothing but fields - at first glance: At the Inzoom, a smaller map appears with dozens of lines and numbers: hand-numbered flow pieces from the so-called "time collection", from which the basic tax was derived.
german_text: Wo heute der Westpark ist, sieht man nichts als Felder - auf den ersten Blick: Beim Hineinzoomen erscheint eine kleinteiligere Karte mit dutzenden Linien und Zahlen: handschriftlich nummerierte Flurstücke aus der sogenannten "Uraufnahme", aus der die Grundsteuer abgeleitet wurde.
actual_translation: Where the West Park is today, one sees nothing but field – at first sight: upon zooming in, a more detailed small-scale map with dozens of lines and numbers appears: hand-numbered plots from the so-called "original record", from which the property tax was derived.

translation_text: Today there are no longer farmers — but small gardens of the “Land in the Sun” plant.
german_text: Kleine Parzellen belegen dort heute keine Landwirte mehr - sondern Kleingärtner der Anlage "Land in Sonne".
actual_translation: Today, it is no longer farmers who occupy small parcels there – rather, it is allotment holders of the "Land in Sonne" facility.

translation_text: A large green area is characterized north by Differential.
german_text: Eine große Grünfläche zeichnet sich nördlich von Untersendling ab.
actual_translation: A large green area is apparent to the north of Untersendling.

translation_text: The Theresienwiese, since 1810 the scene of the October Festival, was in the 19th century actually still a village - and not a concrete desert.
german_text: Die Theresienwiese, seit 1810 Schauplatz des Oktoberfests, war im 19. Jahrhundert tatsächlich noch eine Wiese - und keine Betonwüste.
actual_translation: Theresienwiese, since 1810 the scene of Oktoberfest, was in the 19th century still actually a "Wiese" – a meadow – and not a concrete wasteland.

translation_text: On the other side of the Isar, the historic map gives an insight into the history of psychiatric medicine.
german_text: Auf der anderen Seite der Isar gibt die historische Karte einen Einblick in die Geschichte der psychiatrischen Medizin.
actual_translation: On the other side of the Isar, the historical map gives an insight into the history of psychiatric medicine.

translation_text: In the Urpositionsblatt, in the area of today's district of Au-Haidhausen, you read not only the street names "am Gasteig" or from the height "On the Winds" - but also in large letters "Irren Anstalt".
german_text: Im Urpositionsblatt liest man im Gebiet des heutigen Bezirks Au-Haidhausen nicht nur den Straßennamen "am Gasteig" oder von der Anhöhe "Auf der Lüften" - sondern auch in großen Buchstaben "Irren Anstalt".
actual_translation: In the original lay-of-the-land sheet, in the area where today the borough of Au-Haidhausen is, one can make out not only the street name "am Gasteig" or the elevation "Auf der Lüften" – but can actually read in large letters "mental asylum".

translation_text: Yes, here on Auerfeldstraße you once locked people with foolish ideas.
german_text: Ja, hier an der Auerfeldstraße sperrte man einst Menschen mit Wahnvorstellungen ein.
actual_translation: Yes, here on Auerfeldstraße, they once imprisoned people with delusions.

translation_text: There was 1858/59 the Munich Circle Irrenanstalt "Auf der Auer Lüften" created.
german_text: Dort war 1858/59 die Münchner Kreis-Irrenanstalt "Auf der Auer Lüften" entstanden.
actual_translation: The Munich district mental asylum "Auf der Auer Lüften" had come to life there in 1858/59.

translation_text: From 1872 Dr. Bernhard von Gudden led the institution - the psychiatrist that is brought in connection with the death of King Ludwig II.
german_text: Ab 1872 leitete Dr. Bernhard von Gudden die Einrichtung - jener Psychiater, der in Zusammenhang mit dem Tod von König Ludwigs II. gebracht wird.
actual_translation: From 1872, Dr. Bernhard von Gudden led the institution – the psychiatrist who is associated with the death of King Ludwig II.

translation_text: “He was progressive for his time and ended, for example, the anketing of the so-called errors.
german_text: "Er war fortschrittlich für seine Zeit und beendete zum Beispiel das Anketten der sogenannten Irren.
actual_translation: "He was progressive for his time and ended, for example, the practice of chaining up the so-called mad men.

translation_text: In addition, he has prohibited the staff from applying violence against the inhabitants,” says Hermann Wilhelm, head of the Museum of Haidhausen, who has engaged in an exhibition with the facility.
german_text: Außerdem hat er dem Personal untersagt, Gewalt gegen die Insassen anzuwenden", sagt Hermann Wilhelm, Leiter des Museums Haidhausen, der sich für eine Ausstellung mit der Anstalt beschäftigt hat.
actual_translation: What is more, he forbade the staff from using violence against the inmates," says Hermann Wilhelm, leader of the Haidhausen Museum, which has been busying itself for an exhibition with the establishment.

translation_text: For 280 patients there was first room, later it was extended to 500 seats.
german_text: Für 280 Patienten war zunächst Platz gewesen, später wurde auf 500 Plätze erweitert.
actual_translation: Originally there was place for 280 patients; later this was expanded to 500 places.

translation_text: At some point, this capacity was no longer enough - the reason for the construction of the circular railway facility in Hair in 1905.
german_text: Irgendwann reichte auch diese Kapazität nicht mehr aus - der Grund für den Bau der Kreisirrenanstalt in Haar 1905.
actual_translation: At some point even this capacity was no longer enough – the reason why the district mental asylum in Haar was constructed in 1905.

translation_text: Since 2006 there is the Isar-Amper Clinic Munich-Ost, one of the largest psychiatrics in Germany.
german_text: Dort befindet sich seit 2006 das Isar-Amper-Klinikum München-Ost, eine der größten Psychiatrien Deutschlands.
actual_translation: The Isar Amper Clinic, East Munich, has been located there since 2006, one of the largest psychiatric units in Germany.

translation_text: In the area of the former Auer Anstalt, young people meet in the Munich Salesianum.
german_text: Auf dem Areal der ehemaligen Auer Anstalt begegnen sich nun Jugendliche im Münchner Salesianum.
actual_translation: On the plot of the former Auer institution, young people now meet in the Munich Salesianum.

translation_text: The order acquired the building complex in 1920 and transformed it into a youth house with educational facilities.
german_text: Der Orden erwarb den Gebäudekomplex 1920 und wandelte ihn in ein Jugendheim mit Ausbildungsbetrieben um.
actual_translation: The order acquired the building complex in 1920 and converted it into a youth centre with training programmes.

translation_text: West is the football square of the TSV Munich East, east houses from the 1980s.
german_text: Westlich liegt der Fußballplatz des TSV München Ost, östlich Wohnhäuser aus den 1980er Jahren.
actual_translation: To the west lies the football pitch of TSV München Ost, and to the east, residential houses from the 1980s.

translation_text: In 2015, the children's house "Casa Don Bosco" was built - in architectural reference to the original building of the Irrenanstalt, which was destroyed during World War II in bomb attacks.
german_text: 2015 errichtete man das Kinder-Haus "Casa Don Bosco" - in architektonischer Anlehnung an den Ursprungsbau der Irrenanstalt, der im Zweiten Weltkrieg bei Bombenangriffen zerstört worden war.
actual_translation: In 2015, the "Casa Don Bosco" nursery was built – in the architectural style of the original mental asylum building, which had been destroyed in the Second World War in bomb attacks.

translation_text: The Marienplatz was recorded around 1856 as the " Main Place", the Kaufingerstraße was named "Kaufinger Gasse".
german_text: Der Marienplatz war um 1856 als "Haupt Platz" verzeichnet, die Kaufingerstraße hieß "Kaufinger Gasse".
actual_translation: Marienplatz was recorded as the "main square" in around 1856, and Kaufingerstraße was called "Kaufinger Gasse".

translation_text: A decisive change brought the Second World War to the heart of Munich.
german_text: Eine entscheidende Veränderung brachte der Zweite Weltkrieg auch im Herzen Münchens.
actual_translation: The Second World War also brought a decisive change to the heart of Munich.

translation_text: The Allied bombs crushed many holes into the city center in December 1944.
german_text: Die Bomben der Alliierten rissen im Dezember 1944 viele Löcher in die Innenstadt.
actual_translation: The bombs of the Allies tore many holes in the city centre in December 1944.

translation_text: One great thing remained until today - at the Marienhof.
german_text: Ein großes blieb bis heute - am Marienhof.
actual_translation: One big one remains up to this day – at the Marienhof.

translation_text: The English Institute, small business houses and a medieval mining chapel once stood at the Marienhof, where these days the preparations and on April 5, 2017 the staircase for the second S-Bahn-Stam Trail will take place.
german_text: Das Englische Institut, kleine Geschäftshäuser und eine Gruftkapelle aus dem Mittelalter standen einst am Marienhof, wo dieser Tage die Vorarbeiten und am 5. April 2017 der Spatenstich für die zweite S-Bahn-Stammstrecke erfolgen.
actual_translation: The English Institute, small commercial premises and a crypt chapel from the Middle Ages once stood in the Marienhof, where these days, preparations for the second S-Bahn main line are underway, with first digging to follow on 5th April 2017.

translation_text: With the Schieberegler, you can compare the old Munich map with the air picture of today - and fill the hole at Marienhof.
german_text: Mit dem Schieberegler lässt sich die alte München-Karte mit dem Luftbild von heute vergleichen - und das Loch am Marienhof auffüllen.
actual_translation: You can use the slider control to compare the old Munich map with the aerial view from today – and to fill in the hole at the Marienhof.

translation_text: Civil rights group publishes travel warning for Missouri
german_text: Bürgerrechtsgruppe veröffentlicht Reisewarnung für Missouri
actual_translation: Civil rights group issues travel warning for Missouri

translation_text: The National Association for the Promotion of Colors has issued a warning for colourful people who travel to Missouri due to the discriminatory policy and the state’s racist attacks.
german_text: Die Nationale Vereinigung zur Förderung von Farbigen hat eine Warnung für farbige Menschen ausgestellt, die aufgrund der diskriminierenden Politik und der rassistischen Angriffe des Staates nach Missouri reisen.
actual_translation: The National Association for the Advancement of Colored People has put out an alert for people of color traveling to Missouri because of the state's discriminatory policies and racist attacks.

translation_text: “The NAACP Travel Advisory for the State of Missouri, which is scheduled to enter into force by August 28, 2017, calls on African-American travelers, visitors and Missouri passengers to pay special attention when traveling through the state and to be extremely cautious as a series of doubtful, racial-based incidents have occurred and are noted throughout the state in recent times,” the group said in a statement.
german_text: "Die NAACP Travel Advisory für den Bundesstaat Missouri, die bis zum 28. August 2017 in Kraft treten soll, fordert afro-amerikanische Reisende, Besucher und Missourianer auf, bei Reisen durch den Staat besondere Aufmerksamkeit aufzubringen und äußerste Vorsicht walten zu lassen, da eine Reihe von fragwürdigen, rassenbasierten Vorfällen in letzter Zeit im gesamten Staat vorkommen und hier vermerkt werden", heißt es in der Stellungnahme der Gruppe.
actual_translation: "The NAACP Travel Advisory for the state of Missouri, effective through August 28th, 2017, calls for African American travelers, visitors and Missourians to pay special attention and exercise extreme caution when traveling throughout the state given the series of questionable, race-based incidents occurring statewide recently, and noted therein," the group's statement reads.

translation_text: A newly adopted Missouri law that makes it more difficult for people to win discrimination attacks, as well as the state’s prosecutor’s authorities that disproportionately target minorities, forced the group to issue the travel warning, the NAACP said.
german_text: Ein kürzlich verabschiedetes Gesetz von Missouri, das es Menschen schwerer macht, Diskriminierungsklagen zu gewinnen, sowie die Strafverfolgungsbehörden des Staates, die unverhältnismäßig auf Minderheiten abzielen, veranlassten die Gruppe, die Reisewarnung herauszugeben, sagte die NAACP.
actual_translation: A recent Missouri law making it harder for people to win discrimination lawsuits, as well as the state's law enforcement disproportionately targeting minorities prompted the group to issue the travel alert, the NAACP said.

translation_text: “They have violations of citizens’ rights that people happen.
german_text: "Sie haben Verletzungen der Bürgerrechte, die Menschen passieren.
actual_translation: "You have violations of civil rights that are happening to people.

translation_text: They’ll be arrested because of their skin color, they’ll be broken down or killed,” said President of the Missouri NAACP, Rod Chapel, to Kansas City Star.
german_text: Sie werden wegen ihrer Hautfarbe angehalten, sie werden zusammengeschlagen oder getötet", sagte der Präsident des Missouri NAACP, Rod Chapel, dem Kansas City Star.
actual_translation: They're being pulled over because of their skin color, they're being beaten up or killed," the president of the Missouri NAACP, Rod Chapel, told The Kansas City Star.

translation_text: “We hear complaints in such frequency that we have not heard yet.”
german_text: "Wir hören Beschwerden in einer solchen Häufigkeit, die wir noch nicht gehört haben."
actual_translation: "We are hearing complaints at a rate we haven't heard before."

translation_text: It is the first such warning that the organization has issued for a state in the United States.
german_text: Es ist die erste solche Warnung, die die Organisation für einen Staat in den USA ausgestellt hat.
actual_translation: It is the first such warning that the organization has issued for a state in the US.

translation_text: The group cited incidents such as racist crimes against black students at the University of Missouri and the death of Tory Sanders, 28, a black man from Tennessee.
german_text: Die Gruppe zitierte Vorfälle wie rassistische Vergehen gegen schwarze Studenten an der University of Missouri und den Tod von Tory Sanders, 28, einem schwarzen Mann aus Tennessee.
actual_translation: The group cited incidents such as racial slurs against black students at the University of Missouri and the death of Tory Sanders, 28, a black man from Tennessee.

translation_text: Sanders died under doubtful circumstances at the beginning of the year after he had no more gasoline during his trip through the state and was taken into custody by the Missouri police without being accused of a crime.
german_text: Sanders starb unter fragwürdigen Umständen Anfang des Jahres, nachdem er während der Reise durch den Staat kein Benzin mehr hatte und von der Polizei von Missouri in Gewahrsam genommen wurde, ohne eines Verbrechens beschuldigt zu werden.
actual_translation: Sanders died under questionable circumstances earlier this year after he ran out of gas while traveling through the state, and was taken into custody by Missouri police without being accused of a crime.

translation_text: The Council also reminds of a recent report from the Office of the Missouri Prosecutor General, in which it shows that black drivers in the state are arrested 75% more frequently than white.
german_text: Der Rat weist auch auf einen kürzlich erschienenen Bericht des Büros des Generalstaatsanwaltes von Missouri hin, in dem gezeigt wird, dass schwarze Autofahrer im Staat 75 Prozent häufiger als Weiße angehalten werden.
actual_translation: The advisory also points to a recent report by the Missouri Attorney General's Office showing that black drivers in the state were 75 percent more likely to be pulled over than whites.

translation_text: “The recommendation is that people are aware and inform their families, friends and staff about what could happen in Missouri,” Chapel said.
german_text: "Die Empfehlung ist, dass sich die Menschen bewusst sind und ihre Familien, Freunde und Mitarbeiter darüber informieren, was in Missouri passieren könnte", sagte Chapel.
actual_translation: "The advisory is for people to be aware, and warn their families and friends and co-workers of what could happen in Missouri," Chapel said.

translation_text: “People have to be ready whether it brings deposit money or let the relatives know that they’re traveling through the state.”
german_text: "Die Leute müssen bereit sein, ob es Kautionsgeld mitbringen oder die Verwandten wissen lassen, dass sie durch den Staat reisen."
actual_translation: "People need to be ready, whether it's bringing bail money with them, or letting relatives know they are traveling through the state."

translation_text: Missouri 100 hate crimes in 2015, according to the latest figures from the FBI’s hate crime reporting program, which raised the state to the 16th place in the country in terms of the number of such injuries.
german_text: Missouri verzeichnete im Jahr 2015 100 Hassverbrechen, nach den neuesten Zahlen aus dem Hassverbrechens-Berichtsprogramm des FBI, die den Staat in Bezug auf die Anzahl solcher Verletzungen auf den 16. Rang des Landes einstufen.
actual_translation: Missouri recorded 100 hate crimes in 2015, according to the latest figures from the FBI's hate crime reporting program, ranking the state at 16th in the country in terms of the number of such violations.

translation_text: Travel warning is also a response to a new Missouri law that would make it harder to prosecute a company for housing or employment discrimination.
german_text: Die Reisewarnung ist auch eine Antwort auf ein neues Missouri-Gesetz, das es schwieriger machen würde, ein Unternehmen wegen Wohnungs- oder Beschäftigungs-Diskriminierung zu verklagen.
actual_translation: The travel warning is also a response to a new Missouri law that would make it more difficult to sue a business for housing or employment discrimination.

translation_text: Previously, the American Civil Liberties Union (ACLU) had issued travel warnings for Texas and Arizona after the states had adopted immigration laws, obliging local prosecution authorities to arrest people for immigration violations, which, according to the ACLU, will contribute to further racial profiling.
german_text: Zuvor hatte die American Civil Liberties Union (ACLU) Reisewarnungen für Texas und Arizona herausgegeben, nachdem die Staaten Einwanderungsgesetze verabschiedet hatten, die lokale Strafverfolgungsbehörden dazu verpflichten, Menschen wegen Zuwanderungsverstößen zu verhaften, was nach Ansicht der ACLU zur weiteren Rassenprofilierung beitragen wird.
actual_translation: Previously, the American Civil Liberties Union (ACLU) had issued travel advisories for Texas and Arizona after the states passed immigration enforcement laws requiring local law enforcement to detain people on immigration violations which the ACLU said would increase racial profiling.

translation_text: Travel warnings are usually issued by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs to other countries, but recently stakeholders have used the measure as a response to certain laws and trends within the United States.
german_text: Reisewarnungen werden in der Regel vom Außenministerium für andere Länder ausgestellt, aber in letzter Zeit haben Interessengruppen die Maßnahme als Reaktion auf bestimmte Gesetze und Trends innerhalb der USA eingesetzt.
actual_translation: Travel warnings are usually issued by the State Department for other countries, but lately, advocacy groups have resorted to the measure in response to certain laws and trends inside the US.

translation_text: The project is elementary
german_text: Weidezaunprojekt ist elementar
actual_translation: Pasture fence project is fundamental

translation_text: The Fischerbacher Weidezaun project is a successful project and will continue next year.
german_text: Das Fischerbacher Weidezaun-Projekt ist ein Erfolgsprojekt und wird im kommenden Jahr fortgesetzt.
actual_translation: The Fischerbach pasture fence project is a successful project and will be continued next year.

translation_text: CDU members Peter Weiß and Kordula Kovac have made a picture on the site.
german_text: Die CDU-Bundestagsabgeordneten Peter Weiß und Kordula Kovac haben sich vor Ort ein Bild verschafft.
actual_translation: Members of the Bundestag for the CDU Peter Weiß and Kordula Kovac got a first-hand view.

translation_text: At the Practitioner Court of the Schwendemann family, representatives of the Fischerbacher CDU local association met with Mayor Thomas Schneider and the two members.
german_text: Beim Rechtgrabenhof der Familie Schwendemann trafen sich Vertreter des Fischerbacher CDU-Ortsverbands zusammen mit Bürgermeister Thomas Schneider und den beiden Abgeordneten.
actual_translation: Representatives from the Fischerbach local CDU group met with mayor Thomas Schneider and the two representatives at Rechtgrabenhof farm, belonging to the Schwendemann family.

translation_text: Markus Schwendemann first gave insights into his operation, in which he manages 55 hectares of wiesen and 40 hectares of forest, supplies 40 milk boys and so many young animals, and hosts holiday guests in five apartments.
german_text: Markus Schwendemann gewährte zunächst Einblicke in seinen Betrieb, in dem er 55 Hektar Wiesen und 40 Hektar Wald bewirtschaftet, 40 Milchkühe und ebenso viele Jungtiere versorgt und in fünf Wohnungen Feriengäste beherbergt.
actual_translation: To start with, Markus Schwendemann gave insights into his business, in which he cultivates 55 hectares of pasture and 40 hectares of woodland, keeps 40 milk cows and just as many young stock, and accommodates five apartments of holiday makers.

translation_text: The "Black Forest Milk" is for him the alternative way of marketing for the milk of his cows, Schwendemann said.
german_text: Die "Schwarzwaldmilch" ist für ihn der alternativlose Vermarktungsweg für die Milch seiner Kühe, so Schwendemann.
actual_translation: Schwendemann says that, for him, there is no alternative to the "Black Forest milk" marketing channel he uses for the milk from his cows.

translation_text: On the table of the vacation guests are exclusively regional.
german_text: Auf den Tisch der Feriengäste kommt ausschließlich Regionales.
actual_translation: Only regional produce is served to the holiday-makers.

translation_text: Since he is also the BLHV chairman of Fischerbach, he described the Weidezaun project as "elementarly important".
german_text: Da er auch BLHV-Vorsitzender von Fischerbach ist, bezeichnete er das Weidezaunprojekt als "elementar wichtig".
actual_translation: Since he is also BLHV chairman for Fischerbach, he described the pasture fence project as "fundamentally important".

translation_text: I can't make a profit on such rough areas.
german_text: Ich kann auf derart steilen Flächen nicht gewinnbringend wirtschaften.
actual_translation: I can't make a profit on that kind of steep-sloping ground.

translation_text: The green land area provides a lot of work, many things need to be processed with the engine sensor.
german_text: Die Grünlandfläche sorge für viel Arbeit, vieles müsse mit der Motorsense bearbeitet werden.
actual_translation: Grassland areas make for a lot of work, a lot has to be done with the string trimmer.

translation_text: "We have to fight here with the conditions and with topography," Schwendemann emphasized.
german_text: "Wir haben hier mit den Bedingungen und mit der Topografie zu kämpfen", betonte Schwendemann.
actual_translation: "We have to grapple with the conditions and with the topography here," stressed Schwendemann.

translation_text: In 2003, he took over the parent’s plant and managed it without chemical plant protection and fertilizer, even if it does not conduct biological plant.
german_text: 2003 habe er den elterlichen Betrieb übernommen und bewirtschafte diesen ohne chemischen Pflanzenschutz und Dünger, auch wenn er keinen Biobetrieb führe.
actual_translation: In 2003, he took over his parents' business and he manages this without chemical crop protection and fertilisers, even if it's not an organic farm that he's running.

translation_text: For Mayor Thomas Schneider was clear: "The municipality has recognized the importance of the Weidezaun project and is pleased with the leadership promotion."
german_text: Für Bürgermeister Thomas Schneider war klar: "Die Kommune hat die Bedeutung des Weidezaunprojekts erkannt und ist froh über die Leader-Förderung".
actual_translation: For Mayor Thomas Schneider, it was clear that "the community has recognised the importance of the pasture fence project and is happy to have the Leader funding".

translation_text: With a cost of €3,000 to €4,000 per hectare, farmers should be supported.
german_text: Bei Kosten von 3000 bis 4000 Euro pro Hektar müssten die Landwirte unterstützt werden.
actual_translation: The farmers need support to the tune of 3000 to 4000 euros per hectare.

translation_text: We hope that this could extend the flooding of the land for a long time.
german_text: Man hoffe, dass damit die Aufforstung der Flächen noch eine ganze Weile hinausgezogen werden könnte.
actual_translation: One hopes that with that, afforestation of the area could then be drawn out for a long while.

translation_text: “The greatest treasure we have is the people who work in agriculture and think about how they continue to operate,” the mayor said.
german_text: "Der größte Schatz den wir haben, sind die Leute, die in der Landwirtschaft arbeiten und sich Gedanken darum machen, wie sie ihren Betrieb weiter bringen", betonte der Bürgermeister.
actual_translation: "The biggest asset that we have are the people who work in agriculture and who give thought to how to bring their businesses forward," stressed the mayor.

translation_text: Farmers are often criticized because of the promotion.
german_text: Die Landwirte stehen wegen der Förderung oft in der Kritik
actual_translation: The farmers are often the target of criticism thanks to the funding.

translation_text: In 2013, a total of 25 parcels of 11 participants were received through the wheat promotion.
german_text: Über die Weidezaunförderung wurden im Jahr 2013 insgesamt 25 Parzellen von elf Teilnehmern eingezäunt.
actual_translation: Using the pasture fence funding, a total of 25 plots from eleven participants were fenced off in 2013.

translation_text: The opening area is thus 40 hectares, which may not be flooded by at least 2023.
german_text: Die Offenhaltungsfläche beträgt damit 40 Hektar, die bis mindestens 2023 nicht aufgeforstet werden dürfen.
actual_translation: The areas kept open with these amount to 40 hectares, which may not be afforested until at least 2023.

translation_text: Of the total costs of €71,500, half was funded through leaders, a quarter was borne by the municipality of Fischerbach.
german_text: Von den Gesamtkosten in Höhe von 71 500 Euro wurde die Hälfte über Leader gefördert, ein viertel trug die Gemeinde Fischerbach.
actual_translation: Of the total costs, to the tune of 71,500 euros, half was funded via Leader, and a quarter was borne by the community of Fischerbach.

translation_text: Thus, the farmers remained 12 610 euros, which they had to invest in 16.2 kilometers of wheat.
german_text: Somit verblieben den Landwirten 12 610 Euro, die sie in 16,2 Kilometer Weidezaun investieren mussten.
actual_translation: The farmers were thus left with 12,610 euros, which they had to invest in the 16.2-kilometre pasture fence.

translation_text: “The great advantage is the longevity of the teeth,” Schwendemann explained.
german_text: "Der große Vorteil ist die Langlebigkeit der Zäune", erklärte Schwendemann.
actual_translation: "The great advantage is the longevity of the fences," explained Schwendemann.

translation_text: Kordula Kovac said, “You do a really good job, without farmers and farmers you can’t do it.”
german_text: Kordula Kovac betonte: "Ihr macht einen richtig guten Job, ohne Landwirte und Landfrauen geht es nicht".
actual_translation: Kordula Kovac stressed: "You're doing a really good job. Without farmers we'd not be able to function."

translation_text: Peter Weiß also said, “There are the best foods produced.”
german_text: Auch für Peter Weiß stand fest: "Hier werden beste Lebensmittel produziert".
actual_translation: Peter Weiß is also standing firm: "First-class foodstuffs are produced here."

translation_text: The Landscape Care Directive (LPR) of Baden-Württemberg enables the state promotion of wheat cows.
german_text: Die Landschaftspflegerichtlinie (LPR) Baden-Württemberg ermöglicht die staatliche Förderung von Weidezäunen.
actual_translation: The Baden-Württemberg directive on countryside conservation (LPR) makes the government funding of pasture fences possible.

translation_text: The aim is to open the black forest.
german_text: Ziel ist die Offenhaltung des Schwarzwalds.
actual_translation: Its goal is to keep the Black Forest open.

translation_text: The requirement is the presence of a sponsorship curve called the LPR.
german_text: Voraussetzung ist das Vorhandensein einer von der LPR bezeichneten Förderkulisse.
actual_translation: A prerequisite is the existence of one of the funding scenarios as outlined by the LPR.

translation_text: Furthermore, the landing area should not be scatterable (hunting above 35 percent) and must thus be threatened by flooding.
german_text: Außerdem darf die einzuzäunende Fläche nicht schlepperbewirtschaftbar sein (Hangneigung über 35 Prozent) und muss damit von der Aufforstung bedroht sein.
actual_translation: In addition, the fenced-off area is not allowed to be farmable with a tractor (gradient of over 35 per cent) and must therefore be threatened with afforestation.

translation_text: For the Fischerbacher Weidezaun project 2018, the application is currently running by eight participants with 24 parcels, who want to build about 16 kilometers of garden.
german_text: Für das Fischerbacher Weidezaunprojekt 2018 läuft derzeit der Antrag von acht Teilnehmern mit 24 Parzellen, die knapp 16 Kilometer Zaun bauen möchten.
actual_translation: For the 2018 Fischerbach pasture fence project, an application is currently underway from eight participants with 24 plots who would like to build just shy of 16 kilometres of fence.

translation_text: The opening area corresponds to 35 hectares, the calculated costs are more than 112 000 euros.
german_text: Die Offenhaltungsfläche entspricht 35 Hektar, die kalkulierten Kosten liegen bei mehr als 112 000 Euro.
actual_translation: The areas of land to be kept open equate to 35 hectares; the calculated costs amount to more than 112,000 euros.

translation_text: Is nothing holy anymore?
german_text: Ist nichts mehr heilig?
actual_translation: Is nothing sacred?

translation_text: The White House of Trump is taking the Statue of Freedom.
german_text: Jetzt nimmt sich das Weiße Haus von Trump die Freiheitsstatue vor
actual_translation: Now Trump's White House is targeting the Statue of Liberty

translation_text: The most secure sign of a regime change is when they begin to attack the statues.
german_text: Das sicherste Zeichen eines Regime-Wechsels ist es, wenn sie beginnen, die Statuen zu attackieren.
actual_translation: The surest mark of regime change is when they start attacking the statues.

translation_text: The Americans appreciate this as much as any other – therefore the carefully scored fall of Saddam Hussein on the Firdos Square in Baghdad in 2003.
german_text: Die Amerikaner schätzen diese ebenso wie jede andere - daher der sorgsam inszenierte Sturz Saddam Husseins auf dem Firdos Platz in Bagdad im Jahr 2003.
actual_translation: Americans appreciate this as well as anyone - hence the carefully stage-manged toppling of Saddam Hussein in Firdos square in Baghdad in 2003.

translation_text: Stephen Miller, one of the key ideologists of the Trump regime, knew what he did when he took a symbolic axt in a hot dispute with Jim Acosta from CNN on the president’s proposals to drastically limit legal immigration with the freedom statue.
german_text: Stephen Miller, einer der Schlüssel-Ideologen des Trump-Regimes, wusste sicherlich, was er tat, als er eine symbolische Axt in einem hitzigen Streit mit Jim Acosta von CNN über die Vorschläge des Präsidenten zur drastischen Einschränkung der legalen Einwanderung mit zur Freiheitsstatue nahm.
actual_translation: Stephen Miller, one of the key ideologues of the Trump regime, surely knew what he was doing when he took a symbolic axe to the Statue of Liberty in a heated argument with CNN's Jim Acosta over the president's proposals to drastically limit legal immigration.

translation_text: To remain fair, Miller did not hit the statue itself.
german_text: Um fair zu bleiben, Miller griff nicht die Statue selbst an.
actual_translation: In fairness, Miller did not attack the statue itself.

translation_text: A hole of boat owners and Liberty imitators would have shaken him if he had done it.
german_text: Eine Horde von Bootsbesitzern und Liberty-Imitatoren hätten ihn gelyncht, wenn er es getan hätte.
actual_translation: A horde of boat-trip owners and Liberty impersonators would have lynched him if he did.

translation_text: But he captured their significance, and in particular the significance that was attributed to her when the famous poem of Emma Lazarus was added to its base in 1903, 17 years after the completion of the monument.
german_text: Aber er griff deren Bedeutung an, und insbesondere die Bedeutung, die ihr zugeschrieben wurde, als das berühmte Gedicht von Emma Lazarus 1903, 17 Jahre nach der Fertigstellung des Denkmals, seiner Basis hinzugefügt wurde.
actual_translation: But he did attack its meaning, and in particular the meaning ascribed to it when Emma Lazarus's famous poem was added to its base in 1903, 17 years after the monument itself was completed.

translation_text: As Miller acosta shame: "I don't want to go here on a complete thing about history, but the Statue of Freedom is ... a symbol of American freedom that illuminates the world.
german_text: Als Miller Acosta beschimpfte: "Ich will hier nicht auf ein komplettes Ding über Geschichte eingehen, aber die Freiheitsstatue ist ... ein Symbol amerikanischer Freiheit, das die Welt erleuchtet.
actual_translation: As Miller scolded Acosta: "I don't want to get off into a whole thing about history here, but the Statue of Liberty is ... a symbol of American liberty lighting the world.

translation_text: The poem you refer to was added later and is not part of the original Statue of Freedom.”
german_text: Das Gedicht, auf das Sie sich beziehen, das später hinzugefügt wurde und nicht Teil der ursprünglichen Freiheitsstatue ist."
actual_translation: The poem that you're referring to, that was added later and is not part of the original Statue of Liberty."

translation_text: Miller is actually right, but as he himself formulated it, it is not really about history.
german_text: Miller liegt sachlich richtig, aber wie er es selbst formulierte, geht es nicht wirklich um Geschichte.
actual_translation: Miller is factually correct, but as he put it himself, this is not really about history.

translation_text: It is about the contemporary resonance to Lazarus’ exhilarating words, the only in which a state invites not only any ancient immigrants, but the poorest of the poor: “Your tired, thy poor, thy depressed masses, who desire to breathe freely, thy rich coasts’ poor waste.”
german_text: Es geht um die zeitgenössische Resonanz auf die aufrüttelnden Worte von Lazarus, die einzigen, in denen ein Staat nicht nur irgendwelche alten Einwanderer einlädt, sondern die Ärmsten der Armen: "Deine Müden, deine Armen, / deine bedrängten Massen, die sich danach sehnen, frei zu atmen, / den elenden Abfall deiner reichen Küsten."
actual_translation: It is about the contemporary resonance of Lazarus's startling words, the only ones in which a state has appeared to invite not just any old immigrants, but the poorest of the poor: "Your tired, your poor, / Your huddled masses yearning to breathe free, / The wretched refuse of your teeming shore."

translation_text: There’s never been a time when the “living waste” was better seen on our screens.
german_text: Es gab nie eine Zeit, in der der "elende Abfall" auf unseren Bildschirmen besser zu sehen war.
actual_translation: There has never been a time when the "wretched refuse" has been more visible on our screens.

translation_text: Miller did not engage in literary criticism - he made it clear that these people are not welcome in Trump's USA.
german_text: Miller engagierte sich nicht in literarischer Kritik - er machte deutlich, dass diese Leute in Trumps USA nicht willkommen sind.
actual_translation: Miller was not engaging in literary criticism - he was making it clear that these people are not welcome in Trump's USA.

translation_text: This conflict because of the importance of a statue is part of a wider political and cultural debate: it is in fact a conflict about the importance of America.
german_text: Dieser Konflikt wegen der Bedeutung einer Statue ist Teil einer breiteren politischen und kulturellen Auseinandersetzung: Es ist in der Tat ein Konflikt um die Bedeutung Amerikas.
actual_translation: This conflict about the meaning of a statue is part of a wider political and cultural war: it is really a conflict about the meaning of America.

translation_text: Lazarus - and his friends, who were committed to putting their words on the foundation after their death - knew very well that they were doing a high-political act.
german_text: Lazarus - und ihre Freunde, die sich dafür einsetzten, ihre Worte nach ihrem Tod an der Basis zu platzieren - wussten sehr gut, dass sie eine hochpolitische Handlung vollzogen.
actual_translation: Lazarus - and her friends who campaigned to place her words at the base after her death - knew very well that they were engaging in a highly political act.

translation_text: The sculpture should show the connections between French and American Republicanism by representing the female embodiment of freedom in a used classical image.
german_text: Die Skulptur sollte die Verbindungen zwischen französischem und amerikanischem Republikanismus zeigen, indem sie in einer abgenutzten klassischen bildlichen Darstellung die weibliche Verkörperung der Freiheit darstellte.
actual_translation: The sculpture was intended to mark the connections between French and American republicanism by representing in a well-worn classical trope, the female embodiment of Liberty.

translation_text: Lazarus changed this meaning: In her poem, the female figure is no longer abstract – she has received a voice.
german_text: Lazarus veränderte diese Bedeutung: In ihrem Gedicht ist die weibliche Figur nicht mehr abstrakt - sie hat eine Stimme erhalten.
actual_translation: Lazarus changed that meaning: in her poem the female figure is no longer abstract - she has a voice.

translation_text: And she gives herself a completely different name: Mother of the exiles.
german_text: Und sie gibt sich selbst einen ganz anderen Namen: Mutter der Exilanten.
actual_translation: And she gives herself a very different name: Mother of Exiles.

translation_text: The connection of the poem to the picture is a brilliant feminist coup and a devastating attack on American Nativism.
german_text: Die Verbindung des Gedichts mit dem Bild ist ein brillanter feministischer Coup und ein verheerender Angriff auf den amerikanischen Nativismus.
actual_translation: The marrying of the poem to the image is a brilliant feminist coup and a devastating attack on American nativism.

translation_text: And just as Lazarus changed the meaning of the statue, the people of the right wing wanted to change it back for a long time.
german_text: Und genau wie Lazarus die Bedeutung der Statue änderte, wollten die Leute vom rechten Flügel dies schon lange zurückwechseln.
actual_translation: And just as Lazarus changed the meaning of the statue, rightwingers have long wanted to change it back.

translation_text: Rush Limbaugh, a kind of John of the Cheat for Trump’s arrival, argued in 2010 that the Statue of Freedom does not invite anyone, but rather is a early neoconservative that brings the American flame into the surrounding world: “Lady Liberty is going forward.
german_text: Der große Schreihals Rush Limbaugh, eine Art Johannes des Täufers für das Kommen von Trump, argumentierte 2010, dass die Freiheitsstatue niemanden einlade, sondern eher eine frühe Neokonservative sei, die die amerikanische Flamme in die umnachtete Welt bringe: "Lady Liberty geht voran.
actual_translation: The great loudmouth Rush Limbaugh, a kind of John the Baptist for the coming of Trump, argued in 2010 that Liberty is not inviting anyone in, but is rather an early neocon, taking the American flame out to the benighted world: "Lady Liberty is stepping forward.

translation_text: It is intended to carry the facel of freedom from the United States to the rest of the world.
german_text: Sie soll die Fackel der Freiheit von den Vereinigten Staaten in den Rest der Welt tragen.
actual_translation: She is meant to be carrying the torch of liberty from the United States to the rest of the world.

translation_text: The facel should not illuminate the way to the United States.”
german_text: Die Fackel soll nicht den Weg in die Vereinigten Staaten erleuchten."
actual_translation: The torch is not to light the way to the United States."

translation_text: Very unusual Limbaugh has met something here.
german_text: Ziemlich ungewöhnlich ist Limbaugh hier auf etwas gestoßen.
actual_translation: Rather unusually, Limbaugh actually hit on something.

translation_text: The significance of the statue is entirely a matter of the point of view of perception.
german_text: Die Bedeutung der Statue ist ganz und gar eine Frage des Standpunktes der Wahrnehmung.
actual_translation: The meaning of the statue is entirely a matter of the angle of perception.

translation_text: The great imaginative act of Lazarus consisted in seeing them as they were seen by the exhausted, miserable, but hopeful people after long and often terrible trips on the roofs of ships.
german_text: Die große phantasievolle Tat von Lazarus bestand darin, sie so zu sehen, wie sie von den erschöpften, elenden, aber hoffnungsvollen Menschen nach langen und oft schrecklichen Reisen auf den Decks von Schiffen gesehen wurde.
actual_translation: Lazarus's great imaginative act was to see it as it would be seen by exhausted, wretched but hopeful people on the decks of ships after long and often dreadful journeys.

translation_text: It is in the true sense about seeing the world from the perspective of people seeking refuge and a chance to improve their lives.
german_text: Es geht im wahrsten Sinne darum, die Welt aus der Perspektive von Menschen zu sehen, die Zuflucht suchen und eine Chance, ihr Leben zu verbessern.
actual_translation: It is literally about seeing the world from the perspective of people seeking refuge and a chance to better their lives.

translation_text: Their statue tells them the words of hope and welcome that they have to hear.
german_text: Ihre Statue spricht zu ihnen die Worte der Hoffnung und des Willkommens, die sie hören müssen.
actual_translation: Her statue speaks back to them the words of hope and welcome they need to hear.

translation_text: And that’s, of course, not the perspective that Miller and Trump would ever want to recognize.
german_text: Und das ist natürlich nicht die Perspektive, die Miller und Trump jemals anerkennen möchten.
actual_translation: And of course, this is not the perspective Miller and Trump want ever to recognise.

translation_text: Their faces should not light the way, but light the hatred, which is their only source of power.
german_text: Ihre Fackel soll nicht den Weg erleuchten, sondern den Hass, der ihre einzige Quelle der Macht ist, entzünden.
actual_translation: Their torch is meant not to light the way, but to inflame the hatreds that are their only source of power.

translation_text: World Cup 2017: Neil Black praises Scottish members of the UK team
german_text: Weltmeisterschaft 2017: Neil Black lobt schottische Mitglieder des Teams von Großbritannien
actual_translation: World Championships 2017: Neil Black praises Scottish members of Team GB

translation_text: Eilidh Doyle remembers a time when only two Scots belonged to the UK team.
german_text: Eilidh Doyle erinnert sich an eine Zeit, als nur zwei Schotten zum Team von Großbritannien gehörten
actual_translation: Eilidh Doyle recalls a time when only two Scots made the GB team

translation_text: The performance director of the UK's light athletics, Neil Black, says the 16-hour Scottish contingent in the world championship frame "will make a massive contribution to the team."
german_text: Der Leistungsdirektor der Leichtathletik des Vereinigten Königreichs, Neil Black, sagt, dass das 16-köpfige schottische Kontingent im Weltmeisterschaftskader "einen massiven Beitrag zum Team leisten wird".
actual_translation: UK Athletics' performance director Neil Black says the 16-strong Scottish contingent in the World Championships squad will make "a massive contribution to the team."

translation_text: A record number of Scottish athletes was selected for London 2017, which starts on Friday.
german_text: Eine Rekordzahl von schottischen Athleten wurde für London 2017 ausgewählt, das am Freitag startet.
actual_translation: A record number of Scottish athletes have been selected for London 2017, which starts on Friday.

translation_text: Black believes that "School develops something special in Scotland" and the UK's light athletics must learn something from it.
german_text: Black glaubt, dass "sich in Schottland etwas Spezielles entwickelt" und die Leichtathletik des Vereinigten Königreichs etwas daraus lernen muss.
actual_translation: Black believes "there's something special evolving" in Scotland and UK athletics must learn from that.

translation_text: “We welcome it, and we’re trying to understand it, and we’re going to keep it up until we find out,” Black said.
german_text: "Wir begrüßen es, und wir versuchen es zu verstehen, und wir werden es weiterführen, bis wir es herausfinden," sagte Black.
actual_translation: "We embrace it and we're trying to understand it and we'll push on that until we work it out," Black said.

translation_text: “I’m talking to people at the Scottish Institute of Sport and they think it’s something to do with what they’ve done.
german_text: "Ich spreche mit Leuten im Scottish Institute of Sport und sie denken, dass es etwas mit dem zu tun hat, was sie getan haben.
actual_translation: "I speak to people in the Scottish Institute of Sport and they think it's something to do with what they've done.

translation_text: The Scottish athletes think it has something to do with what they have done.
german_text: Die schottischen Athleten denken, dass es etwas mit dem zu tun hat, was sie getan haben.
actual_translation: Scottish Athletics think it's something to do with what they've done.

translation_text: British light athletics: It has something to do with what they have done.
german_text: Britische Leichtathletik: Es hat etwas mit dem zu tun, was sie getan haben.
actual_translation: British athletics: it's something to do with what they've done.

translation_text: Also with the guy on the street.
german_text: Und auch mit dem Typ an der Straßenecke.
actual_translation: And the guy on the corner street, too.

translation_text: Whatever the combination of the circumstances is, it is absolutely brilliant.”
german_text: Was auch immer die Kombination der Umstände ist, es ist absolut brillant."
actual_translation: Whatever the combination of circumstances, it's absolutely brilliant."

translation_text: Several of the Scottish athletes are medal winners, including Laura Muir and Andrew Butchart - who will play against Sir Mo Farah on the 5,000m track, while Eilidh Doyle was chosen by the team to be team captain.
german_text: Mehrere der schottischen Athleten sind Medaillen-Anwärter, darunter Laura Muir und Andrew Butchart - die gegen Sir Mo Farah auf der 5.000 m Strecke antreten werden, während Eilidh Doyle von der Mannschaft zum Teamkapitän gewählt wurde.
actual_translation: Several of the Scottish athletes are medal contenders, including Laura Muir and Andrew Butchart - who will race against Sir Mo Farah in the 5,000m, while Eilidh Doyle was voted by the squad to be team captain.

translation_text: “Eilidh is quite modest.
german_text: "Eilidh ist ziemlich bescheiden.
actual_translation: "Eilidh is slightly modest.

translation_text: Their Captain's speech was incredible," says Black.
german_text: Ihre Kapitäns-Rede war unglaublich", sagt Black.
actual_translation: Her captain's speech was incredible," says Black.

translation_text: "A number of athletes, whether they were Scottish or wherever they live or train, went out of the room and felt very proud and were very motivated.
german_text: "Eine Reihe von Athleten, egal ob sie schottisch waren oder wo auch immer sie leben oder trainieren, gingen aus dem Raum und fühlten sich sehr stolz und waren sehr motiviert.
actual_translation: "A number of athletes, whether they were Scottish or wherever they live or train, walked out of that room feeling hugely proud and really motivated.

translation_text: The passion and the real feeling that Eilidh naturally brought in were great.”
german_text: Die Leidenschaft und das echte Gefühl, das Eilidh ganz natürlich einbrachte, waren großartig."
actual_translation: The passion and real feeling that Eilidh naturally put into it were great."

translation_text: The Commonwealth Silver Medal Winner, who will play at its fifth World Championship at the 400-m hinder, says it’s “incredible” that 16 Scots are in the British team.
german_text: Die Commonwealth-Silbermedaillengewinnerin, die bei ihren fünften Weltmeisterschaften bei den 400-m-Hürden antreten wird, sagt, dass es "unglaublich" ist, dass 16 Schotten in der britischen Mannschaft sind.
actual_translation: The Commonwealth silver medallist, who will compete in the 400m hurdles at her fifth World Championships, says it's "incredible" 16 Scots are in the British team.

translation_text: Scotland's top total number of athletes at the World Cup was seven, which were achieved in 1983 and 2015.
german_text: Schottlands bisher beste Gesamtzahl an Athleten bei der Weltmeisterschaft war sieben, die 1983 und 2015 erreicht wurden.
actual_translation: Scotland's previous best total of athletes at the worlds was seven, achieved in 1983 and 2015.

translation_text: The middle-range runner Muir leads on this path and has set five British and two European records last year.
german_text: Der Mittelstreckenläufer Muir führt auf diesem Weg und hat im vergangenen Jahr fünf britische und zwei europäische Rekorde aufgestellt.
actual_translation: Middle-distance runner Muir is leading the way, having set five British and two European records in the past year.

translation_text: It will participate in the 1500m and the 5000m runs.
german_text: Sie wird an den 1.500 m und den 5.000 m Läufen teilnehmen.
actual_translation: She will go in the 1500m and the 5,000m.

translation_text: Chris O'Hare, who runs 1,500 meters, is another shooter to be watched after a great season that included victory at the British Team Trials and the Anniversary Games.
german_text: Chris O'Hare, der 1.500 m läuft, ist ein weiterer Schotte, den man nach einer großartigen Saison, die den Sieg bei den British Team Trials und den Anniversary Games beinhaltete, beobachten sollte.
actual_translation: Chris O'Hare, who runs in the 1500m, is another Scot to watch, following a great season that included victory at the British Team trials and the Anniversary Games.

translation_text: Doyle remembers her first world championships when the only other Scott was in the team Lee McConnell.
german_text: Doyle erinnert sich an ihre ersten Weltmeisterschaften, als der einzige andere Schotte im Team Lee McConnell war.
actual_translation: Doyle remembers her first world championships, when the only other Scot in the team was Lee McConnell.

translation_text: The team captain says she’s “enormously proud” of the fact that many of her peoples are not only part of the team, but in some cases will also be involved in the medals and the finals.
german_text: Die Mannschafts-Kapitänin sagt, dass sie "enorm stolz" auf die Tatsache ist, dass viele ihrer Landsleute nicht nur zum Team gehören, sondern in manchen Fällen auch bei den Medaillen und bei den Finals mitmischen werden.
actual_translation: The team captain says she's "hugely proud" of the fact so many of her compatriots have not only made the team, but, in some cases, will be challenging for medals and competing to make finals.

translation_text: "The special thing to be a team captain is that she was chosen by the other members of the team, so it was a great honor anyway, but knowing that my team colleagues voted for me and chosen me makes it something very special for me," she added.
german_text: "Das Besondere daran Team-Kapitänin zu sein, liegt darin, dass sie von den anderen Mitgliedern des Teams gewählt wurde, so dass es sowieso eine große Ehre war, aber zu wissen, dass meine Teamkollegen für mich gestimmt haben und mich gewählt haben, macht es zu etwas ganz Besonderem für mich", fügte sie hinzu.
actual_translation: "The special thing about being team captain is that it was voted for by the other members of the team, so that it was such a huge honour anyway but to know that your teammates have voted for you and chosen you made it extra-special for me," she added.

translation_text: “Obviously, I’m very proud of all the Scots who belong to the team.
german_text: "Offensichtlich bin ich sehr stolz auf all die Schotten, die zum Team gehören.
actual_translation: "Obviously, I'm very proud of all the Scots who've made the team.

translation_text: It only shows how far we have come.
german_text: Es zeigt nur, wie weit wir gekommen sind.
actual_translation: It just shows how far we've come.

translation_text: And they are here as established athletes, athletes who want to climb on podiums.
german_text: Und sie sind hier als etablierte Athleten, Athleten, die auf Podien steigen wollen.
actual_translation: And they're here as well-established athletes, athletes that are going to be looking to get on podiums.

translation_text: What does my speech as a captain mean?
german_text: Was meine Rede als Kapitänin betrifft?
actual_translation: As for my captain's speech?

translation_text: I think she went well.
german_text: Ja, ich denke, sie ging gut.
actual_translation: Yeah, I think it went well.

translation_text: I just pointed out that we are very happy in this situation as we have a home world championship.
german_text: Ich habe nur darauf hingewiesen, dass wir in dieser Situation sehr glücklich sind, da wir eine Heim-Weltmeisterschaft haben.
actual_translation: I just drew on the fact that we're very lucky in this situation in that we've got a home World Championships.

translation_text: So it is really important to rely on this home support and benefit from being back in the Olympic stadium.
german_text: Es ist also wirklich wichtig, auf diese Heimunterstützung zu setzen und davon zu profitieren, dass wir wieder im Olympiastadion sind.
actual_translation: So it's really just the importance of drawing on that home support and thriving on the fact that we're back at the Olympic Stadium.

translation_text: I get a second chance to go out there and compete and there will just be such a great atmosphere out there.”
german_text: Ich bekomme eine zweite Chance, dort hinauszugehen und zu konkurrieren und es wird einfach so eine tolle Atmosphäre da draußen sein."
actual_translation: I'm getting a second chance to go out there and compete and it's just going to be such an amazing atmosphere out there."

translation_text: Blocking critics via Facebook: Don’t appeal for a public office if you can’t tolerate voter heating
german_text: Blockieren von Kritikern über Facebook: Bewirb dich nicht um ein öffentliches Amt, wenn du das Einheizen von Wählern nicht vertragen kannst
actual_translation: Blocking critics from Facebook: Don't run for public office, if you can't take heat from voters

translation_text: The father of our country knew something of bad press.
german_text: Der Vater unseres Landes wusste etwas von schlechter Presse.
actual_translation: The father of our country knew something about bad press.

translation_text: The Americans loved George Washington, but it didn’t take a long time until the newspapers beat him for everything, from internal politics to his political principles.
german_text: Die Amerikaner liebten George Washington, aber es dauerte nicht lange, bis die Zeitungen ihn wegen allem schlugen, von der Innenpolitik bis zu seinen politischen Prinzipien.
actual_translation: Americans loved George Washington, but it didn't take long for newspapers to start slamming him on everything from domestic policy to his political principles.

translation_text: He was foolish in criticism, of course.
german_text: Er schimpfte bei der Kritik, sicher.
actual_translation: He chafed at the criticism, sure.

translation_text: But he did not silence his critics.
german_text: Aber er hat seine Kritiker nicht zum Schweigen gebracht.
actual_translation: But he did not silence his critics.

translation_text: For in 1783, Washington said, "Freedom of speech can be taken away - and, stupid and silent, we will be led to the battle like the sheep."
german_text: Denn im Jahr 1783 sagte Washington: "Die Redefreiheit kann weggenommen werden - und, dumm und stumm werden wir wie die Schafe zum Schlachten geführt."
actual_translation: Because back in 1783, Washington said, "the freedom of Speech may be taken away - and, dumb & silent we may be led, like sheep, to the Slaughter."

translation_text: This brings me to Maryland to Governor Larry Hogan, who has to work to be more like Washington.
german_text: Das bringt mich nach Maryland zu Gouverneur Larry Hogan, der daran arbeiten muss, mehr wie Washington zu sein.
actual_translation: That brings me to Maryland Gov. Larry Hogan, who needs to work on being more like Washington.

translation_text: Hogan’s employees have blocked and deleted the posts of at least 450 people who expressed their opinion on his official Facebook page.
german_text: Hogans Mitarbeiter haben die Beiträge von mindestens 450 Personen blockiert und gelöscht, die ihre Meinung auf seiner offiziellen Facebook-Seite geäußert haben.
actual_translation: Hogan's staff has blocked and deleted the posts of at least 450 people who voiced their opinions on his official Facebook page.

translation_text: And the American Civil Liberties Union prosecuted him for that at the beginning of this week.
german_text: Und die American Civil Liberties Union verklagte ihn deswegen Anfang dieser Woche.
actual_translation: And the American Civil Liberties Union sued him for that earlier this week.

translation_text: The Governor's staff dismissed the complaint as freely, and the online commentary was full of a counterreaction with "Well, and?" .
german_text: Der Stab des Gouverneurs entließ die Klage als frivol, und der Online-Kommentar war voll von einer Gegenreaktion mit "Na, und?" .
actual_translation: The governor's staff dismissed the lawsuit as frivolous, and the online commentary was rich with a "who cares?" backlash.

translation_text: “It’s just Facebook,” many people said.
german_text: "Es ist nur Facebook", sagten viele Leute.
actual_translation: "It's only Facebook," plenty of folks said.

translation_text: But it is important.
german_text: Aber es ist wichtig.
actual_translation: But it matters.

translation_text: And it’s especially important when it’s a guy like Hogan.
german_text: Und es ist besonders wichtig, wenn es ein Typ wie Hogan ist.
actual_translation: And it especially matters when it's a guy like Hogan.

translation_text: This is a Republican governor in a overwhelming democratic state that is surprisingly popular.
german_text: Dies ist ein republikanischer Gouverneur in einem überwältigend demokratischen Staat, der erstaunlich beliebt ist.
actual_translation: This is a Republican governor in an overwhelmingly Democratic state who is astonishingly popular.

translation_text: He has the second highest approval of the 50 governors of the nation.
german_text: Er hat die zweithöchste Zustimmung der 50 Gouverneure der Nation.
actual_translation: He has the second-highest approval rating of the nation's 50 governors.

translation_text: Hogan is not a reactionary heating head.
german_text: Hogan ist kein reaktionärer Hitzkopf.
actual_translation: Hogan is not a reactionary hothead.

translation_text: He has shown a firm hand in the leadership of his state and strict compliance with the principles.
german_text: Er hat eine feste Hand bei der Führung seines Staates und strenge Einhaltung der Prinzipien gezeigt.
actual_translation: He's shown a steady hand in leading his state and a stern adherence to principles.

translation_text: He was also very skilled in using Facebook as a primary means to connect with his voters and playing his hairless head after chemotherapy on his page.
german_text: Er war auch sehr geschickt darin, Facebook als primäres Mittel zu nutzen, um sich mit seinen Wählern zu verbinden und spielend seinen haarlosen Kopf nach Chemotherapie auf seiner Seite zu debütieren.
actual_translation: He's also been pretty deft at using Facebook as a primary means to connect with his constituents, playfully debuting his hairless head after chemo treatments on his page.

translation_text: Therefore, the blocking of people who come to the side of the governor - which is a public forum that is called official and by employees who are paid with public tax dollars - is unnecessary and ultimately dangerous.
german_text: Daher ist die Blockierung von Personen, die auf die Seite des Gouverneurs kommen - die ein öffentliches Forum ist, das als offiziell bezeichnet wird und von Mitarbeitern, die mit öffentlichen Steuer-Dollars bezahlt werden - unnötig und letztendlich gefährlich.
actual_translation: So blocking people who come to the governor's page - which is a public forum, labeled as official and administered by staff members paid public tax dollars - is unnecessary and ultimately dangerous.

translation_text: In an interview with The Washington Post, Hogans spokeswoman Amelia Chasse defended the actions of the governor and argued that blocking the comments is nothing more than a moderation.
german_text: In einem Interview mit The Washington Post verteidigte Hogans Sprecherin Amelia Chasse die Handlungen des Gouverneurs und argumentierte, dass die Blockierung der Kommentare nichts weiter als eine Moderation sei.
actual_translation: In an interview with The Washington Post, Hogan spokeswoman Amelia Chasse defended the governor's actions, arguing that blocking the comments was nothing more than moderating them.

translation_text: But it’s too easy to use the image of trolls or spammers or hated people who swim the peach online.
german_text: Aber es ist zu einfach, das Bild von Trollen oder Spammern oder hasserfüllten Leuten zu benutzen, die online die Peitsche schwingen.
actual_translation: But it's too easy to use the image of trolls or spammers or hateful folks lashing out online.

translation_text: The post spoke with some of the real people who were blocked by Hogan.
german_text: Die Post sprach mit einigen der wirklichen Leute, die von Hogan blockiert wurden.
actual_translation: The Post talked to some of the real people blocked by Hogan.

translation_text: And these are only real people who talk to their chosen leaders: a teacher, an entrepreneur and a priest, not a troll.
german_text: Und das sind nur echte Menschen, die mit ihren gewählten Führern sprechen: ein Lehrer, ein Unternehmer und ein Pfarrer, keine Trolle.
actual_translation: And they're just that - real people talking to their elected leaders: a teacher, a business owner and a pastor, not trolls.

translation_text: They all said that their comments were respectful, thoughtful and not profane.
german_text: Sie alle sagten, dass ihre Kommentare respektvoll, nachdenklich und nicht profan waren.
actual_translation: They all said that their comments were respectful, thoughtful and not profane.

translation_text: The priest cited the Bible in his post and appealed to Hogans Catholic faith.
german_text: Der Pfarrer zitierte die Bibel in seinem Post und appellierte an Hogans katholischen Glauben.
actual_translation: The pastor quoted the Bible in his post, appealing to Hogan's Catholic faith.

translation_text: Lawyer Lakshmi Sarma Ramani of Bowie, Md., was not hated, but she asked for hated crimes.
german_text: Rechtsanwältin Lakshmi Sarma Ramani von Bowie, Md., war nicht hasserfüllt, aber sie fragte nach Hassverbrechen.
actual_translation: Attorney Lakshmi Sarma Ramani of Bowie, Md., wasn't hateful, but she asked about hate crimes.

translation_text: "I commented generosely that I was disappointed that there was no response to hatred crimes and other current news," she wrote in the commentary section of the newspaper 'The Post'.
german_text: "Ich kommentierte höflich, dass ich enttäuscht war, dass es keine Reaktion auf Hassverbrechen und andere aktuelle Nachrichten gab", schrieb sie im Kommentarbereich der Nachrichtensendung "The Post".
actual_translation: "I politely commented that I was disappointed in his lack of response to hate crimes and other recent news items," she wrote in the comment section of The Post's news story.

translation_text: “I don’t appreciate this idea either, when a number of people take a position on the same topic, then some are more likely to ignore it as a so-called collective engagement and not recognize it as a large group of affected citizens.”
german_text: "Ich schätze diese Idee auch nicht, wenn eine Anzahl von Leuten zum selben Thema Stellung nimmt, dann werden sie von manchen eher als ein so genannter kollektiver Einsatz missachtet und nicht als eine große Gruppe von betroffenen Bürgern anerkannt".
actual_translation: "I also do not appreciate that idea that when a number of people comment on the same topic, they are immediately disregarded by some as a so-called collective effort, rather than recognized as a large group of concerned citizens."

translation_text: What the staff of the governor called a “concentrated spam attack” others would probably call “pre-speech”.
german_text: Was die Mitarbeiter des Gouverneurs als "konzentrierten Spam-Angriff" bezeichneten, würden andere wahrscheinlich "Fürsprache" nennen.
actual_translation: What the governor's staff called a "concentrated spam attack" others would probably call "advocacy."

translation_text: The Facebook age makes it easy to cut a message by simply blocking a critic or deleting a negative comment.
german_text: Die Facebook-Ära macht es einfach, eine Nachricht zuzuschneiden, indem man einfach einen Kritiker blockiert oder ein negativer Kommentar gelöscht wird.
actual_translation: The Facebook era makes it easy to tailor a message by simply blocking a critic or deleting a negative comment.

translation_text: It’s much cleaner than in earlier times if one had done the same that employees were sent to collect and burn newspapers with critical guidelines or arrest and silence protesters.
german_text: Es ist viel sauberer als in früherer Zeit, wenn man das gleiche getan hätte, dass Mitarbeiter entsandt wurden, um Zeitungen mit kritischen Leitartikeln zu sammeln und zu verbrennen oder Demonstranten zu verhaften und zum Schweigen zu bringen.
actual_translation: It's a lot cleaner than the old days, when doing the same would have required sending staff out to collect and burn newspapers with critical editorials or arresting and silencing protesters.

translation_text: That’s exactly what is happening digital.
german_text: Aber genau das passiert gerade digital.
actual_translation: But that's exactly what's happening, only digitally.

translation_text: Hogan isn’t the first public official to be criticized for scaming Facebook and other social media.
german_text: Hogan ist nicht der erste öffentliche Beamte, der dafür kritisiert wird, dass er Facebook und andere soziale Medien beschimpft hat.
actual_translation: Hogan isn't the first public official to be criticized for defanging Facebook and other social media.

translation_text: President Trump is prosecuted by Twitter users who were blocked by his Twitter feed.
german_text: Präsident Trump wird von Twitter-Nutzern verklagt, die von seinem Twitter-Feed blockiert wurden.
actual_translation: President Trump is being sued by Twitter users who were blocked from his Twitter feed.

translation_text: One of the first milestones in this question fell last week in Virginia.
german_text: Einer der ersten Meilensteine in dieser Frage fiel letzte Woche in Virginia.
actual_translation: One of the first landmark rulings on this issue came down last week in Virginia.

translation_text: The chairman of the Board of Supervisors of Loudoun County violated the First Amendment, according to U.S. District Judge James Cacheris in Alexandria, when she banned a voter from her Facebook page.
german_text: Der Vorsitzende des Board of Supervisors des Loudoun County verletzte das First Amendment, laut US-Bezirksrichter James C. Cacheris in Alexandria, als sie einen Wähler von ihrer Facebook-Seite verbannte.
actual_translation: The chair of the Loudoun County Board of Supervisors violated the First Amendment, according to U.S. District Judge James C. Cacheris in Alexandria, when she banned a constituent from her Facebook page.

translation_text: And in Kentucky, Governor Matt Bevin (R) also received a visit from the ACLU because of his use of Facebook and Twitter.
