german_text: Und in Kentucky erhielt Gouverneur Matt Bevin (R) auch einen Besuch von der ACLU wegen seiner Verwendung von Facebook und Twitter.
actual_translation: And in Kentucky, Gov. Matt Bevin (R) also got a visit from the ACLU over his use of Facebook and Twitter.

translation_text: This should not be so difficult.
german_text: Das sollte nicht so schwer sein.
actual_translation: This shouldn't be so hard.

translation_text: At the time of Washington, the time of affordable port had a similar effect as the Internet.
german_text: Zur Zeit Washingtons hatte die Zeit des erschwinglichen Portos eine ähnliche Wirkung wie das Internet.
actual_translation: In Washington's time, the era of affordable postage had an impact much like the Internet.

translation_text: The number of newspapers multiplied between 1776 and 1800, and anonymous writers joined his leadership.
german_text: Die Anzahl der Zeitungen vervielfachte sich zwischen 1776 und 1800, und anonyme Briefschreiber schlugen auf seine Führung ein.
actual_translation: The number of newspapers quadrupled between 1776 and 1800, and anonymous letter writers hammered his leadership.

translation_text: And even then Washington had anonymous trolls.
german_text: Und selbst damals hatte Washington anonyme Trolle.
actual_translation: And even back then, Washington had anonymous trolls.

translation_text: The people who used pseudonyms like "Juricola", "Valerius", "Belisarius" and "Portius" wrote all the letters to the newspapers that put down Washington's decisions.
german_text: Die Leute, die Pseudonyme wie "Juricola", "Valerius", "Belisarius" und "Portius" benutzten, schrieben alle Briefe an Zeitungen, die Washingtons Entscheidungen niedermachten.
actual_translation: People using the pseudonyms "Juricola," "Valerius," "Belisarius," and "Portius" all wrote letters to newspapers trashing Washington's decisions.

translation_text: Petitions that criticized his point of view on the Amity Treaty, Trade and Shipping with the UK overwhelmed his office, according to historical documents collected by the online papers of the George Washington Project.
german_text: Petitionen, die seinen Standpunkt über den Vertrag von Amity, den Handel und die Schifffahrt mit Großbritannien kritisierten, überwältigten sein Amt, laut den historischen Dokumenten, die von den Online Papers des George Washington Project gesammelt wurden.
actual_translation: Petitions criticizing his stand on the Treaty of Amity, Commerce, and Navigation with Britain overwhelmed his office, according to the historical documents collected by the online Papers of George Washington Project.

translation_text: But he did not keep her silent.
german_text: Aber er hat sie nicht zum Schweigen gebracht.
actual_translation: But he did not silence them.

translation_text: Freedom of speech, discrepancy and discourse are the foundation of our nation.
german_text: Redefreiheit, Meinungsverschiedenheit und Diskurse gehören zur Grundlage unserer Nation.
actual_translation: Freedom of speech, dissent and discourse lie at the very foundation of our nation.

translation_text: And true leadership means accepting it.
german_text: Und wahre Führung bedeutet, das zu akzeptieren.
actual_translation: And true leadership means accepting that.

translation_text: Ronan Rafferty hopes for home comfort in the Renaissance Club
german_text: Ronan Rafferty hofft auf häuslichen Komfort im Renaissance Club
actual_translation: Ronan Rafferty hopes for home comforts at Renaissance Club

translation_text: Former European No. 1 Ronan Rafferty will hope for domestic comfort in the next three days as the Renaissance Club in East Lothian hosts the 25th edition of the Scottish Senior Open.
german_text: Der ehemalige Europäer Nr. 1 Ronan Rafferty wird in den nächsten drei Tagen auf heimischen Komfort hoffen, da der Renaissance Club in East Lothian die 25. Ausgabe der Scottish Senior Open veranstaltet.
actual_translation: Former European No 1 Ronan Rafferty will be hoping for home comforts over the next three days as the Renaissance Club in East Lothian hosts the 25th edition of the Scottish Senior Open.

translation_text: The Nordire, who last year led next side at Archerfield Links to the final round before losing against Paul Eales, is connected to the new place and serves as the tournament ambassador on behalf of the association founder and CEO Jerry Sarvadi.
german_text: Der Nordire, der im vergangenen Jahr nebenan im Archerfield Links bis zur Endrunde führte, bevor er gegen Paul Eales verlor, ist mit dem neuen Austragungsort verbunden und fungiert als Turnierbotschafter im Namen des Vereinsgründers und CEOs Jerry Sarvadi.
actual_translation: The Northern Irishman, who led next door at Archerfield Links heading into the final round last year before losing out to Paul Eales, is attached to the new venue and is acting as tournament ambassador on behalf of the club's founder and CEO Jerry Sarvadi.

translation_text: “I’ve seen how the Renaissance Club was built, and we’ve seen how it reached its glory with this event,” Rafferty said.
german_text: "Ich habe gesehen, wie der Renaissance-Club gebaut wurde, und wir sehen, wie er mit diesem Ereignis seinen Ruhm erreicht", sagte Rafferty.
actual_translation: "I watched Renaissance Club being built, and we're seeing it come to its glory with this event," said Rafferty.

translation_text: “The players will see this course from his best side, he’s in great condition.
german_text: "Die Spieler werden diesen Kurs von seiner besten Seite sehen, er ist in einem tollen Zustand.
actual_translation: "The players will see this course at its finest, it is in fabulous condition.

translation_text: Jerry did a great job when he set this place.
german_text: Jerry hat einen tollen Job gemacht, als er diesen Ort festlegte.
actual_translation: Jerry has done a fabulous job setting this place up.

translation_text: He is a generous defender of this game and is proud of his performance here.
german_text: Er ist ein eifriger Verfechter dieses Spiels und ist stolz auf seine Leistung hier.
actual_translation: He's a keen advocate of this game and is proud of his achievement here.

translation_text: This is a great window for this course.”
german_text: Dies ist ein großartiges Schaufenster für diesen Kurs."
actual_translation: This is a great showcase for this course."

translation_text: The Englishman Eales is looking forward to defending a championship for the first time, though in his 32-year career he has won both the European Tour and the European Challenge Tour.
german_text: Der Engländer Eales freut sich darauf, zum ersten Mal eine Meisterschaft zu verteidigen, obwohl er in seiner 32-jährigen Karriere sowohl bei der European Tour als auch bei der European Challenge Tour gewonnen hat.
actual_translation: Englishman Eales is looking forward to defending a championship for the first time despite winning on both the European Tour and European Challenge Tour in his 32-year career.

translation_text: “It really feels special,” said the Southport-host player.
german_text: "Das fühlt sich wirklich besonders an", sagte der in Southport beheimatete Spieler.
actual_translation: "This does feel really special," said the Southport-based player.

translation_text: “I couldn’t defend the Extremadura Open because it was taken out of the program in the year after I won it.
german_text: "Ich habe die Extremadura Open nicht verteidigen können, da sie im Jahr, nachdem ich sie gewonnen hatte, aus dem Programm genommen wurde.
actual_translation: "I didn't get to defend the Extremadura Open because that was taken off the schedule the year after I won it.

translation_text: Return to this part of the world is magical.
german_text: Zurück zu diesem Teil der Welt zu kommen ist magisch.
actual_translation: Coming back to this part of the world is magical.

translation_text: It is a wonderful place to play golf.
german_text: Es ist ein wunderbarer Ort zum Golfspielen.
actual_translation: It's a wonderful place to play golf in.

translation_text: The memories from last year come back, and it was something special for me and my wife Sharon to win here last year.
german_text: Die Erinnerungen aus dem letzten Jahr kommen zurück, und es war etwas Besonderes für mich und meine Frau Sharon, letztes Jahr hier zu gewinnen.
actual_translation: The memories from last year are coming back and it was special for me and my wife Sharon to win last year.

translation_text: It was a very special time and one that we will always appreciate.”
german_text: Es war eine wirklich besondere Zeit und eine, die wir immer schätzen werden."
actual_translation: It was a really special time and one we will always cherish."

translation_text: Gary Orr, who came to the European Senior Tour earlier this year after his 50th birthday, returns to the action on home ground.
german_text: Gary Orr, der nach seinem 50. Geburtstag früher in diesem Jahr zur European Senior Tour kam, kehrt zur Aktion auf Heimatboden zurück.
actual_translation: Making his return to action on home soil is Gary Orr, who joined the European Senior Tour after turning 50 earlier this year.

translation_text: This event will be its first Scottish appearance since the Aberdeen Asset Management Scottish Open in 2013.
german_text: Diese Veranstaltung wird sein erster schottischer Auftritt seit der Aberdeen Asset Management Scottish Open im Jahr 2013 sein.
actual_translation: This event will be his first Scottish appearance since the Aberdeen Asset Management Scottish Open in 2013.

translation_text: “It always means a little more when you’re playing at home,” said Orr, the man from Helensburgh.
german_text: "Es bedeutet immer ein bisschen mehr, wenn Sie zu Hause spielen", sagte Orr, der Mann aus Helensburgh.
actual_translation: "It always means a little bit more when you're playing at home," said Helensburgh man Orr.

translation_text: “You want to do it well, but you also feel that additional pressure.
german_text: "Du willst es gut machen, aber du spürst auch diesen zusätzlichen Druck.
actual_translation: "You want to do well; but you do feel that extra pressure.

translation_text: I really playing again and I played a solid golf.
german_text: Ich habe es wirklich genossen wieder zu spielen, und ich habe einen solides Golf gespielt.
actual_translation: I've really enjoyed playing again and I've played some solid golf.

translation_text: I’m glad how it has gone so far.”
german_text: Ich bin froh darüber, wie es soweit gegangen ist."
actual_translation: I'm happy with how it's going so far."

translation_text: With the trio on the field are the former Masters winner Ian Woosnam and the Senior Major Champions Paul Broadhurst, Roger Chapman, Mark James and Mark McNulty.
german_text: Mit dem Trio auf dem Feld sind der ehemalige Masters-Sieger Ian Woosnam und die Senior Major Champions Paul Broadhurst, Roger Chapman, Mark James und Mark McNulty.
actual_translation: Joining the trio in the field are former Masters winner Ian Woosnam and Senior major champions Paul Broadhurst, Roger Chapman, Mark James and Mark McNulty.

translation_text: Orr and former Ryder Cup captain Sam Torrance are among the six Scots on the field, the others are Andrew Oldcorn, Stephen McAllister, Bill Longmuir and Ross Drummond.
german_text: Orr und der ehemalige Ryder Cup-Kapitän Sam Torrance gehören zu den sechs Schotten auf dem Feld, die anderen sind Andrew Oldcorn, Stephen McAllister, Bill Longmuir und Ross Drummond.
actual_translation: Orr and former Ryder Cup captain Sam Torrance are among six Scots in the field, the others being Andrew Oldcorn, Stephen McAllister, Bill Longmuir and Ross Drummond.

translation_text: The entrance is free, the parking space costs £5 per car with one passenger and £10 per car with two or more passengers.
german_text: Der Eintritt ist kostenlos, der Parkplatz kostet £ 5 pro Auto mit einem Insassen und £ 10 pro Auto mit zwei oder mehr Insassen.
actual_translation: Admission is free of charge, with car parking charged at £5 per car with one occupant and £10 per car with two or more occupants.

translation_text: All earnings go to Prostate Cancer UK.
german_text: Alle Erlöse gehen an Prostate Cancer UK.
actual_translation: All proceeds go to Prostate Cancer UK.

translation_text: Less lung cancer due to passive smoking
german_text: Weniger Lungenkrebstote durch Passivrauchen
actual_translation: Fewer lung cancer deaths due to passive smoking

translation_text: Over the past two decades, less and less people have died of lung cancer due to passive smoking.
german_text: In den vergangenen zwei Jahrzehnten sind immer weniger Menschen wegen Passivrauchens an Lungenkrebs gestorben.
actual_translation: In past two decades, an ever decreasing number of people have died from lung cancer due to passive smoking.

translation_text: Scientists from the University Clinic of Hamburg-Eppendorf (UKE) came to this outcome in a study.
german_text: Zu diesem Ergebnis kommen Wissenschaftler des Universitätsklinikums Hamburg-Eppendorf (UKE) in einer Studie.
actual_translation: This is the conclusion drawn by scientists from the University Medical Centre Hamburg-Eppendorf (UKE) in a study.

translation_text: "On our estimates, 167 lung cancer deaths per year are caused by passive smoking," said study leader Heiko Becher.
german_text: "Nach unseren Schätzungen sind pro Jahr 167 Lungenkrebstodesfälle auf Passivrauchen zurückzuführen", sagte Studienleiter Heiko Becher.
actual_translation: "According to our estimations, 167 lung cancer deaths a year can be attributed to passive smoking," said study leader Heiko Becher.

translation_text: As a comparison, he made his own study on this topic from 1994.
german_text: Als Vergleich zog er eine eigene Studie zu diesem Thema von 1994 heran.
actual_translation: For comparison, he referred to one of his own studies on this topic from 1994.

translation_text: At the time, there were 400 deaths of lung cancer due to passive smoking per year in Germany.
german_text: Damals habe es noch 400 Lungenkrebstodesfälle wegen Passivrauchens pro Jahr in Deutschland gegeben.
actual_translation: Back then, there were still 400 lung cancer deaths due to passive smoking every year in Germany.

translation_text: The new study is published in the International Journal of Public Health.
german_text: Die neue Untersuchung ist im "International Journal of Public Health" veröffentlicht.
actual_translation: The new study is published in the "International Journal of Public Health".

translation_text: Household connections are very complex.
german_text: Hausanschlüsse erweisen sich als sehr komplex
actual_translation: Home connections prove to be very complex

translation_text: The construction work on the Villinger Street is ongoing and “is somewhat in time,” said the head of the building, Fred Heinze.
german_text: Die Bauarbeiten in der Villinger Straße sind in vollem Gange und "liegen einigermaßen in der Zeit", so der Leiter des Bauhofs Fred Heinze.
actual_translation: The building works in Villinger Straße are in full throw and "are more or less on schedule," according to the manager of the construction yard, Fred Heinze.

translation_text: In the field of household connections, the situation is more complicated than is supposed, as much is hidden in the underground, which is not mentioned in the plans.
german_text: Im Bereich der Hausanschlüsse sei die Lage komplizierter als vermutet, da sich im Untergrund viel verberge, was nicht in den Plänen vermerkt sei.
actual_translation: In terms of home connections, the situation is more complicated than expected, since lots of things are hidden in the substrate that were not noted in the plans.

translation_text: The traffic, which repeatedly hindered the construction work, is a big problem for the construction group of the company Stumpp.
german_text: Der Verkehr, der immer wieder die Bauarbeiten behindert, stellt für den Bautrupp der Firma Stumpp ein großes Problem dar.
actual_translation: The traffic, which always disrupts building works, poses a big problem for the Stumpp company construction crew.

translation_text: “The car drivers’ ignorance of red lamps and brakes is already enormous,” Heinze reports.
german_text: "Die Ignoranz der Autofahrer vor roten Ampeln und Absperrgittern ist schon enorm", berichtet Heinze.
actual_translation: "The ignorance of car drivers around red lights and barriers is really huge," reports Heinze.

translation_text: The road is closed and only the buses are entitled to pass.
german_text: Die Straße sei gesperrt und nur die Linienbusse seien zur Durchfahrt berechtigt.
actual_translation: The street is closed off and only the public busses are allowed to drive through.

translation_text: Angelo Caruso, Marvin Kostorz and Tim Kostorz from the company Stumpp have been busy working on the bridge for weeks.
german_text: Angelo Caruso, Marvin Kostorz und Tim Kostorz von der Firma Stumpp sind seit Wochen mit den Arbeiten an der Brücke beschäftigt.
actual_translation: Angelo Caruso, Marvin Kostorz and Tim Kostorz from the Stumpp company have been engaged in the works on the bridges for weeks.

translation_text: “The hot days were very hard.
german_text: "Die heißen Tage waren schon ganz schön anstrengend.
actual_translation: "The hot days were pretty exhausting, for sure.

translation_text: But fortunately, our friend Fritz Matt supplied us with cold mineral water,” says Marvin Kostorz.
german_text: Aber zum Glück wurden wir von unserem Freund Fritz Matt mit kühlem Mineralwasser versorgt", erzählt Marvin Kostorz.
actual_translation: But luckily we were supplied with cold mineral water by our friend Fritz Matt," explained Marvin Kostorz.

translation_text: Poverty and death in Indonesian Goldland
german_text: Armut und Tod im indonesischen Goldland
actual_translation: Poverty and Death in Indonesia's Land of Gold

translation_text: When Bardina Degei cookes the dinner, she does not use herd.
german_text: Wenn Bardina Degei das Abendessen kocht, benutzt sie keinen Herd.
actual_translation: When Bardina Degei cooks dinner, she doesn't use a stove.

translation_text: They rarely use a pot.
german_text: Sie benutzt sogar nur selten einen Topf.
actual_translation: She rarely even uses a pot.

translation_text: In her wooden house in Enarotali, the capital of the Paniai Regency in the quiet Indonesian province of Papua, the housewife usually puts a sweet potato - locally called "nota" - directly in the cave.
german_text: In ihrem Holzhaus in Enarotali, der Hauptstadt der Paniai-Regentschaft in der unruhigen indonesischen Provinz Papua, legt die Hausfrau normalerweise eine Süßkartoffel - lokal als "nota" bezeichnet - direkt in den Kamin.
actual_translation: In her wooden home in Enarotali, the capital of Paniai regency in the restive Indonesian province of Papua, the housewife usually just places a sweet potato - known locally as "nota" - directly into the fireplace.

translation_text: After half an hour, the frozen knolle is taken and drunk with jealous, unwashed hands.
german_text: Nach einer halben Stunde wird die verkohlte Knolle mit eifrigen, ungewaschenen Händen entnommen und verschlungen.
actual_translation: After half-an-hour, the charred tuber is retrieved and devoured with eager, unwashed hands.

translation_text: Degei sits on the floor - she has no furniture - where she also performs her daily work, for example, washing clothes with dry water from the nearby pump.
german_text: Degei sitzt auf dem Lehmboden - sie hat keine Möbel - wo sie auch ihre tägliche Arbeit ausführt, z. B. Kleider mit trübem Wasser aus dem nahe gelegenen Sumpf zu waschen.
actual_translation: Degei sits on the mud floor - she has no furniture - which is where she also performs her daily chores, such as washing clothes with murky water from the nearby swamp.

translation_text: A shell in a roofless room serves as a latrine.
german_text: Ein Eimer in einem dachlosen Raum dient als Latrine.
actual_translation: A bucket in a roofless room serves as a latrine.

translation_text: As the youngest of her husband’s four wives, she was not assigned any fields.
german_text: Als jüngste der vier Ehefrauen ihres Mannes wurden ihr keine Felder zugewiesen.
actual_translation: As the youngest of her husband's four wives, she has been assigned no fields to tend.

translation_text: Polygamy is common here.
german_text: Polygamie ist hier üblich.
actual_translation: Polygamy is common here.

translation_text: Of course, late working can be dangerous: Most villagers are unemployed, and many drink hard, and there are the soldiers here.
german_text: Natürlich kann spät zu arbeiten gefährlich sein: Die meisten Dorfmänner sind arbeitslos, und viele trinken schwer, und es gibt hier die Soldaten.
actual_translation: Of course, working late can be dangerous: Most of the village men are unemployed and many drink heavily, plus there are the soldiers.

translation_text: “No one will dare to go around in the village after 17:00,” she says.
german_text: "Niemand wagt es, nach 17 Uhr im Dorf herumzulaufen", sagt sie.
actual_translation: "No one dares to walk around the village after 5 p.m.," she says.

translation_text: It is a rare insight into the daily life in the Highland of Papua, a former Dutch colony, which was adopted in 1969 after a controversial referendum in Indonesia, when only 1,026 elderly should vote by a public climbing in front of the occupation forces.
german_text: Es ist ein seltener Einblick in das tägliche Leben im Hochland von Papua, einer ehemaligen holländischen Kolonie, die 1969 nach einem umstrittenen Referendum in Indonesien aufgenommen wurde, als nur 1.026 Älteste durch eine öffentliche Handerhebung vor den Besatzungstruppen abstimmen sollten.
actual_translation: It's a rare glimpse of daily life in the highlands of Papua, a former Dutch colony that was absorbed into Indonesia in 1969 following a controversial referendum, when just 1,026 elders were forced to vote through a public show of hands before occupying troops.

translation_text: An existing movement for independence against the Dutch rule quickly turned against the government of Jakarta, whichins control over the region and excludes foreign journalists or legal observers from it.
german_text: Eine bestehende Bewegung, die für die Unabhängigkeit gegen die holländische Herrschaft aufrührte, wandte sich schnell gegen die Regierung von Jakarta, die die Kontrolle über die Region unterhält und ausländische Journalisten oder Rechtsbeobachter davon ausschließt.
actual_translation: An existing movement agitating for independence against Dutch rule swiftly turned its ire against the Jakarta government, which maintains tight control over the region, barring foreign journalists or rights monitors.

translation_text: In 2003, the province was officially divided into Papua and West Papua, with the independent part of Papua New Guinea covering the eastern part of the island.
german_text: Im Jahr 2003 wurde die Provinz offiziell in Papua und West Papua aufgeteilt, wobei der unabhängige Teil Papua-Neuguineas den östlichen Teil der Insel umfasste.
actual_translation: In 2003, the province was officially split into Papua and West Papua, with independent Papua New Guinea occupying the eastern part of the island.

translation_text: The trip includes a 90-minute flight from the provincial capital Jayapura to Nabire and then a morning 5-hour car ride with a rental car.
german_text: Enarotali ist so abgelegen wie es öde ist. Die Reise beinhaltet einen 90-minütigen Flug von der Provinzhauptstadt Jayapura nach Nabire und dann eine morgendliche 5-stündige Autofahrt mit dem Mietwagen.
actual_translation: Enarotali is as remote as it is desolate; the journey here involves a 90-minute flight from the provincial capital Jayapura to Nabire, and then a stomach-churning five-hour drive by hire car.

translation_text: There is no public transportation.
german_text: Es gibt keine öffentlichen Verkehrsmittel.
actual_translation: There is no public transport.

translation_text: The city, with about 19,000 inhabitants, consists of wooden houses surrounded by bamboo tubes, and of wheels that have been transformed by roast into various yellow-brain tones.
german_text: Die Stadt mit etwa 19.000 Einwohnern besteht aus Holzhäusern, die von Bambuszäunen umgeben sind, und aus Wellblechdächern, die durch Rost in verschiedene gelbbraune Töne umgewandelt wurden.
actual_translation: The town of some 19,000 people consists of wooden houses ringed by bamboo fencing, corrugated iron roofs transformed by rust into varying tawny shades.

translation_text: Very few Indonesians have made their trip here, but not journalists and practically no foreigners.
german_text: Nur sehr wenige Indonesier haben ihre Reise hierher gemacht, geschweige denn Journalisten und praktisch keine Ausländer.
actual_translation: Very few Indonesians have made the journey here, let alone journalists, and practically no foreigners.

translation_text: Before Christian missionaries arrived, Mee Pago Papuans worshipped a god named Uga Tamee.
german_text: Bevor christliche Missionare ankamen, verehrten Mee Pago Papuans einen Gott namens Uga Tamee.
actual_translation: Before Christian missionaries arrived, Mee Pago Papuans worshiped a God named Uga Tamee.

translation_text: There were also other changes.
german_text: Es gab auch andere Veränderungen.
actual_translation: There were other changes, too.

translation_text: “We were not used to wearing this dress,” says Degei, indicating her vibrant, handwoven turban, her dark shirt and her bright rock.
german_text: "Wir waren nicht daran gewöhnt, diese Kleidung zu tragen", sagt Degei und deutet auf ihren lebhaften, handgewebten Turban, ihr dunkles Hemd und ihren hellen Rock hin.
actual_translation: "We were not used to wearing these clothes," says Degei, indicating her vividly colored, hand-woven turban, dark shirt and a bright skirt.

translation_text: “In the past we had only leaves on our bodies.”
german_text: "Früher hatten wir nur Blätter an unseren Körpern."
actual_translation: "Before, we only wore leaves on our bodies."

translation_text: Papua is the poorest province in Indonesia, where 28% of people live below the poverty limit and some of the worst child mortality and literacy rates in Asia.
german_text: Papua ist Indonesiens ärmste Provinz, wo 28 % der Menschen unter der Armutsgrenze leben und einige der schlimmsten Kindersterblichkeits- und Alphabetisierungsraten in Asien haben.
actual_translation: Papua is Indonesia's poorest province, where 28% of people live below the poverty line and with some of the worst infant mortality and literacy rates in Asia.

translation_text: It is also the gold country of Indonesia.
german_text: Aber es ist auch Indonesiens Goldland.
actual_translation: But it is also Indonesia's land of gold.

translation_text: The world’s largest and most profitable gold mine, Grasberg, owned by the Freeport McMoran in Phoenix, is just 60 miles from Paniai, a high-land province in the size of New Jersey with 153,000 inhabitants.
german_text: Die größte und profitabelste Goldmine der Welt, Grasberg, im Besitz des Freeport McMoran aus Phoenix, liegt nur 60 Meilen von Paniai entfernt, einer Hochlandprovinz in der Größe von New Jersey mit 153.000 Einwohnern.
actual_translation: The world's largest and most profitable gold mine, Grasberg, owned by Phoenix-based Freeport McMoran, lies just 60 miles from Paniai, a highland province around the size of New Jersey and home to 153,000 people.

translation_text: Only in 2015, Freeport decreased $3.1 billion in gold and copper.
german_text: Allein im Jahr 2015 hat Freeport im Wert von 3,1 Milliarden US-Dollar Gold und Kupfer abgebaut.
actual_translation: In 2015 alone, Freeport mined some $3.1 billion worth of gold and copper here.

translation_text: In addition, Papua has wood resources worth an estimated $78 billion.
german_text: Darüber hinaus verfügt Papua über Holzressourcen im Wert von geschätzten 78 Milliarden US-Dollar.
actual_translation: In addition, Papua boasts timber resources worth an estimated $78 billion.

translation_text: However, these wealths are a source of misery for Papua, which ensures that the powerful Indonesian military preserves a stunning presence.
german_text: Diese Reichtümer sind jedoch eine Quelle des Elends für die Papua, die sicherstellen, dass Indonesiens mächtiges Militär eine erstickende Präsenz bewahrt.
actual_translation: These riches are, however, a source of misery for Papuans, ensuring Indonesia's powerful military maintains a suffocating presence.

translation_text: A 2005 study in the New York Times that Freeport paid $20 million to local military personnel and units between 1998 and 2004, including up to $150,000 to a single officer.
german_text: Eine Untersuchung von 2005 in der New York Times berichtete, dass Freeport lokale Militärangehörige und Einheiten zwischen 1998 und 2004 fast 20 Millionen US-Dollar zahlte, darunter bis zu 150.000 US-Dollar an einen einzigen Offizier.
actual_translation: A 2005 investigation in The New York Times reported that Freeport paid local military personnel and units nearly $20 million between 1998 and 2004, including up to $150,000 to a single officer.

translation_text: Papuanese demands for greater autonomy threaten these golden gans and are treated without grace.
german_text: Papuanische Forderungen nach größerer Autonomie bedrohen diese goldene Gans und werden gnadenlos behandelt.
actual_translation: Papuan calls for greater autonomy threaten this golden goose, and are dealt with mercilessly.

translation_text: According to activists, more than 500,000 Papua have been killed and thousands have been raped, tortured and imprisoned by the Indonesian military since 1969.
german_text: Nach Angaben von Aktivisten sind mehr als 500.000 Papua getötet worden und Tausende wurden seit 1969 vom indonesischen Militär vergewaltigt, gefoltert und inhaftiert.
actual_translation: According to rights activists, more than 500,000 Papuans have been killed, and thousands more have been raped, tortured and imprisoned by the Indonesian military since 1969.

translation_text: Mass murders in the 1970s were genocide, according to the Asian Human Rights Commission.
german_text: Massentötungen in Papuas Stammeshochland in den 1970-er Jahren wurden gemäß der Asien-Menschenrechtskommission zum Völkermord.
actual_translation: Mass killings in Papua's tribal highlands during the 1970s amounted to genocide, according to the Asia Human Rights Commission.

translation_text: Only in the region, the Indonesian police arrested more than 3,900 peaceful protesters last year.
german_text: Allein in der Region verhaftete die indonesische Polizei im vergangenen Jahr mehr als 3.900 friedliche Demonstranten.
actual_translation: Indonesian police arrested more than 3,900 peaceful protesters in the region last year alone.

translation_text: "We'll lose everything," it is said in a 2016 report by the Archdiocese of Brisbane, which contains reports of crimes of the previous year, such as illegal executions and torture - rape and electrical strikes are popular according to another report - and the brutal collapse of peaceful demonstrations.
german_text: "Wir Werden Alles Verlieren" heißt es in einem Bericht der Erzdiözese Brisbane aus dem Jahr 2016, in dem Berichte über Gräueltaten des Vorjahres enthalten sind, wie etwa ungesetzliche Hinrichtungen und Folter - Vergewaltigung und Elektroschläge sind nach einem anderen Bericht besonders beliebt - und die brutale Niederschlagung friedlicher Demonstrationen.
actual_translation: We Will Lose Everything, a 2016 report by the Archdiocese of Brisbane, contains testimony of atrocities committed the previous year, such as extrajudicial executions, torture - rape and electrocution are especially popular, according to another report - and the brutal crushing of peaceful demonstrations.

translation_text: “It’s hard to count the number of victims because accidents happen every week,” says Andreas Harsono, Indonesian researcher for Human Rights Watch.
german_text: "Es ist schwierig, die Anzahl der Opfer zu zählen, da jede Woche Vorfälle passieren", sagt Andreas Harsono, Indonesien-Forscher für Human Rights Watch.
actual_translation: "It's difficult to count the number of victims as incidents happen every week," says Andreas Harsono, Indonesia researcher for Human Rights Watch.

translation_text: The scraps have strengthened as Papuas’ resources bring a flow of settlers from other parts of Indonesia.
german_text: Die Schrauben haben sich verstärkt, da Papuas Ressourcen einen Zustrom von Siedlern aus anderen Teilen Indonesiens bringen.
actual_translation: The screws have tightened as Papua's resources bring an influx of settlers from elsewhere in Indonesia.

translation_text: The population of 3.5 million inhabitants of the province is to 83% Christian, but the demographic development changes as Muslim economic migrants come from the populated islands of Java, Borneo, Sumatra and Sulawesi.
german_text: Die Bevölkerung von 3,5 Millionen Einwohner der Provinz ist zu 83 % christlich, aber die demografische Entwicklung verändert sich, da muslimische Wirtschaftsmigranten von den bevölkerungsreichen Inseln Java, Borneo, Sumatra und Sulawesi kommen.
actual_translation: The province's 3.5 million population is 83% Christian, but the demographic is changing as Muslim economic migrants arrive from Indonesia's populous islands of Java, Borneo, Sumatra and Sulawesi.

translation_text: Javanese warning cantins sell baked chicken and Gado-gado, a mixed vegetable served with peanut sauce.
german_text: Javanesische Warung-Kantinen verkaufen gebratenes Huhn und Gado-Gado, ein gemischtes Gemüse mit Erdnusssauce serviert.
actual_translation: Javanese warung canteens sell fried chicken and gado-gado mixed-vegetables served with peanut sauce.

translation_text: Local people are struggling to stay here.
german_text: Lokale Leute kämpfen um hier mitzuhalten.
actual_translation: Local people struggle to compete.

translation_text: “The migrants have begun to sell chicken and vegetables on the traditional market cheaper than the local Papua,” says Abeth You, a 24-year-old Paniai indigenous who moved to the province capital Jayapura for work.
german_text: "Die Migranten haben begonnen, Hühner und Gemüse auf dem traditionellen Markt billiger als die lokalen Papua zu verkaufen", erklärt Abeth You, ein 24-jähriger Paniai-Einheimischer, der in die Provinzhauptstadt Jayapura zur Arbeit zog.
actual_translation: "The migrants started to sell chicken and vegetables in the traditional market cheaper than the local Papuans," explains Abeth You, a 24-year-old Paniai native who moved to the provincial capital Jayapura for work.

translation_text: “It has cost the indigenous Papua – the Mama-Mama of Papua – their market.”
german_text: "Es hat die einheimischen Papua - die Mama-Mama [die Frauen] von Papua - ihren Markt gekostet."
actual_translation: "It made the native Papuans - the mama-mama [the women] of Papua - lose their market."

translation_text: Indonesian President Joko Widodo, known as Jokowi, promised to deal with the inequalities and violations in Papua during his 2014 election campaign.
german_text: Der indonesische Staatspräsident Joko Widodo, im Volksmund als Jokowi bekannt, versprach während seines Wahlkampfes 2014 die Ungleichheiten und die Rechtsverletzungen in Papua anzugehen.
actual_translation: Indonesian President Joko Widodo, popularly known as Jokowi, vowed to address the inequalities and rights abuses in Papua during his election campaign in 2014.

translation_text: The former Zimmermann saved 27 of Papua’s 29 districts – including Paniai – on the way to the Presidential Palace in Jakarta.
german_text: Der ehemalige Zimmermann sicherte 27 der insgesamt 29 Bezirke von Papua - einschließlich Paniai - auf dem Weg zum Präsidentenpalast in Jakarta.
actual_translation: The former carpenter secured 27 of Papua's total 29 districts - including Paniai - on the way to the Presidential Palace in Jakarta.

translation_text: But in Papua little has changed, and today the inhabitants feel deceived.
german_text: Aber in Papua hat sich wenig verändert, und heute fühlen sich die Einheimischen betrogen.
actual_translation: But precious little has changed in Papua, and today local people feel betrayed.

translation_text: "Our hearts are broken because we voted for Jokowi in 2014 with the expectation that he will meet our hopes that justice will be restored," says You.
german_text: "Unsere Herzen sind gebrochen, weil wir 2014 für Jokowi gestimmt haben, mit der Erwartung, dass er unsere Hoffnungen erfüllen wird, dass die Gerechtigkeit wiederhergestellt wird", sagt You.
actual_translation: "Our hearts have been broken because in 2014 we voted for Jokowi, with the expectation that he would fulfill our hopes for justice to be restored," You says.

translation_text: In fact, Paniai only two months after Jokow's introduction in October suffered a deep point.
german_text: Tatsächlich erlitt Paniai nur zwei Monate nach Jokowis Einweihung im Oktober einen Tiefpunkt.
actual_translation: In fact, Paniai suffered a nadir just two months after Jokowi's October inauguration.

translation_text: On 7 December 2014, a group of 11 children was out and sang Christmas songs before a warehouse fire in Enarotali, when two Indonesian soldiers on a motorcycle broke through the dark.
german_text: Am 7. Dezember 2014 war eine Gruppe von 11 Kindern draußen und sang Weihnachtslieder vor einem Lagerfeuer in Enarotali, als zwei indonesische Soldaten auf einem Motorrad durch die Dunkelheit brachen.
actual_translation: On Dec. 7, 2014 a group of 11 children were outside singing Christmas carols in front of a bonfire in Enarotali when two Indonesian soldiers on a motorbike broke through the gloom.

translation_text: The scared children told them that they should turn on their lamps.
german_text: Die erschrockenen Kinder sagten ihnen, dass sie ihre Scheinwerfer einschalten sollten.
actual_translation: The startled children told them that they should turn on their headlights.

translation_text: One of the soldiers took an impulse to their tone and later returned with four soldiers, the local pastor Yavedt Tebai said.
german_text: Einer der Soldaten nahm Anstoß an ihrem Ton und kam später mit vier Soldaten zurück, so der örtliche Pastor Yavedt Tebai.
actual_translation: One of the soldiers took umbrage at their tone and later returned with four soldiers, according to local Pastor Yavedt Tebai.

translation_text: The soldiers who had drunk, hunted and shot the group with their weapons, said victims and witnesses.
german_text: Die Soldaten, die getrunken hatten, jagten und schlugen die Gruppe mit ihren Gewehrkolben, sagten Opfer und Zeugen.
actual_translation: The soldiers, who had been drinking, chased and beat the group with their rifle butts, said victims and witnesses.

translation_text: Then one of the soldiers shot into the group of children.
german_text: Dann feuerte einer der Soldaten in die Gruppe der Kinder.
actual_translation: Then one of the soldiers fired into the group of children.

translation_text: A child, the 16-year-old Yulianus Yeimo, was hit so hard that he fell into a coma.
german_text: Ein Kind, der 16-jährige Yulianus Yeimo, wurde so schwer geschlagen, dass er ins Koma fiel.
actual_translation: One child, 16-year-old Yulianus Yeimo, was beaten so badly he fell into a coma.

translation_text: A few hours later, the building of the nearby government commission was burned and the things escalated the next day.
german_text: Ein paar Stunden später wurde das Gebäude der nahe gelegenen Regierungskommission in Brand gesetzt und die Dinge eskalierten am nächsten Tag.
actual_translation: A couple of hours later, the nearby government Election Commission building was set ablaze, and things escalated the following day.

translation_text: Approximately 1,000 Papua young men, women and children gathered on a football square in front of the local police station and the military command center to demand justice.
german_text: Ungefähr 1.000 junge Papua Männer, Frauen und Kinder versammelten sich auf einem Fußballplatz vor der örtlichen Polizeistation und dem Militärkommandozentrum, um Gerechtigkeit zu fordern.
actual_translation: About 1,000 young Papuan men, women and children gathered on a soccer field in front of the local police station and military command center to demand justice.

translation_text: They wore ceremonial hunting bows and conducted the Waita dance – running in the circle and imitating a bird sing – from the Papuas Mee Pago tribe.
german_text: Sie trugen zeremonielle Jagdbögen und führten den Waita-Tanz - im Kreis laufend und einen Vogelgesang imitierend - von Papuas Mee Pago-Stamm vor.
actual_translation: They carried ceremonial hunting bows and performed the waita dance - running in circles and simulating birdsong - of Papua's Mee Pago tribe.

translation_text: Some protesters began to throw stones on police and military positions.
german_text: Einige Demonstranten begannen Steine auf Polizei- und Militärposten zu schleudern.
actual_translation: Some protesters started hurling stones at police and military posts.

translation_text: When the mood was heated, a command was sent to the soldiers via an internal radio: "If the masses resist more than three times, they shoot them dead," it says in an official TIME document that was not released to the local media.
german_text: Als die Stimmung aufgeheizt war, wurde den Soldaten ein Befehl über ein internen Funk geschickt: "Wenn die Massen mehr als dreimal Widerstand leisten, schießen sie sie tot", heißt es in einem offiziellen Dokument von TIME, das den lokalen Medien nicht freigegeben wurde.
actual_translation: As tempers grew more heated, an order was sent to the soldiers through internal radio: "If the masses offer resistance more than three times, shoot them dead," it said, according to an official document seen by TIME that has not been released to the local media.

translation_text: Yeremias Kayame, 56, the leader of the Kego Koto district of Enarotali, saw the threatening danger and called for rest and urged the crowd to return home.
german_text: Yeremias Kayame, 56, der Leiter des Kego Koto-Viertels von Enarotali, sah die drohende Gefahr und rief nach Ruhe und forderte die Menge auf, nach Hause zurückzukehren.
actual_translation: Yeremias Kayame, 56, the head of the Kego Koto neighborhood of Enarotali, saw the impending danger and appealed for calm, imploring the crowd to go back home.

translation_text: No one was in the mood to listen.
german_text: Niemand war in der Stimmung zuzuhören.
actual_translation: Nobody was in the mood to listen.

translation_text: "When I turned, I was suddenly shot into my left arm," he told TIME on the veranda of his colored wooden house.
german_text: "Als ich mich umdrehte, wurde ich plötzlich in mein linkes Handgelenk geschossen", sagte er TIME auf der Veranda seines bunt bemalten Holzhauses.
actual_translation: "When I turned around I suddenly got shot in my left wrist," he told TIME on the porch of his brightly painted wooden house.

translation_text: Kayame still doesn't know who shot, but says the ball came from the rows of the soldiers gathered here.
german_text: Kayame weiß immer noch nicht, wer gefeuert hat, aber sagt, dass die Kugel aus den Reihen der hier versammelten Soldaten kam.
actual_translation: Kayame still doesn't know who fired but says the bullet came from the ranks of amassed soldiers.

translation_text: “It was overwhelming, a lot of shootings were shot,” he added.
german_text: "Es war überfüllt, viele Schüsse wurden gefeuert", fügt er hinzu.
actual_translation: "It was crowded, many shots were fired," he adds.

translation_text: The local man Alfius Youw was hit three times, so his cousin, who was a witness of the shootings.
german_text: Der einheimische Mann Alfius Youw wurde dreimal getroffen, so sein Cousin, der Zeuge der Erschießungen war.
actual_translation: Local man Alfius Youw was hit three times, according to his cousin who witnessed the shootings.

translation_text: "I ran to him and examined his body to make sure he was it," said Yohanes, who, as many Indonesians, only carries one name, the TIME in dark mood.
german_text: "Ich rannte zu ihm und untersuchte seinen Körper, um sicher zu gehen, dass er es war", sagte Yohanes, der wie viele Indonesier nur einen Namen trägt, der TIME in düsterer Stimmung.
actual_translation: "I ran to him and examined his body to make sure it was him," Yohanes, who like many Indonesians only goes by one name, told TIME somberly.

translation_text: “I saw that he was dead... I kissed him.”
german_text: "Ich sah, dass er tot war ... Ich habe ihn geküsst."
actual_translation: "I saw he was dead ... I kissed him."

translation_text: The chief inspector of the Papua police, Yotje Mende, told reporters that his officers wanted to "secure" their station only because it would be attacked.
german_text: Der Chefinspektor der Papua-Polizei, Yotje Mende, sagte Reportern, dass seine Offiziere ihre Station nur "sichern" wollten, weil sie angegriffen werde.
actual_translation: The Papua Police Chief Inspector General Yotje Mende told reporters that his officers were only "securing" their station because it was under attack.

translation_text: “We have to defend ourselves when people threaten to kill us,” Papua police spokesman Pudjo Sulistiyo said in 2015.
german_text: "Wir müssen uns verteidigen, wenn Menschen drohen, uns zu töten", sagte der Sprecher der Papua-Polizei, Kommissar Pudjo Sulistiyo, im Jahr 2015.
actual_translation: "We have to defend ourselves when people threaten to kill us," Papua Police spokesperson, Commissioner Pudjo Sulistiyo said in 2015.

translation_text: It’s about life and death.”
german_text: "Es geht um Leben und Tod."
actual_translation: "It's a matter of life and death."

translation_text: According to Human Rights Watch, five young protesters were killed and many others were injured.
german_text: Laut Human Rights Watch wurden fünf junge Demonstranten getötet und viele weitere verletzt.
actual_translation: According to Human Rights Watch, five young protesters were killed and many more injured.

translation_text: The news of the murders came only the following day 'filtered' to Jakarta.
german_text: Die Nachrichten über die Tötungen kamen erst am folgenden Tag 'gefiltert' nach Jakarta.
actual_translation: News of the killings only filtered through to Jakarta the following day.

translation_text: Three weeks Jokowi held a passionate speech in Jayapura in which he expressed sympathy to the families of the victims and pledged to deal with the historic misconduct in Papua.
german_text: Drei Wochen hielt Jokowi in Jayapura eine leidenschaftliche Rede, in der er Sympathien für die Familien der Opfer äußerte und schwor, die historischen Missstände in Papua anzugehen.
actual_translation: Three weeks later, Jokowi gave an impassioned speech in Jayapura, where he expressed sympathies with the victims' families and vowed to address the historic abuses in Papua.

translation_text: “I want this case to be resolved immediately so that it won’t happen in the future,” he said.
german_text: "Ich möchte, dass dieser Fall sofort gelöst wird, so dass es in Zukunft nicht mehr passieren wird", sagte er.
actual_translation: "I want this case to be solved immediately so it won't ever happen again in the future," he said.

translation_text: Security Minister Wiranto said in October 2016 that he would establish an extrajudicial mechanism to address historic human rights violations.
german_text: Sicherheitsminister Wiranto sagte im Oktober 2016, dass er einen außergerichtlichen Mechanismus zur Beilegung historischer Menschenrechtsverletzungen einrichte.
actual_translation: Security Minister Wiranto said in October 2016 that he was setting up a non-judicial mechanism to settle historic human-rights violations.

translation_text: The excuses began almost immediately.
german_text: Aber die Ausreden begannen fast sofort.
actual_translation: But the excuses started almost immediately.

translation_text: “Most injuries have occurred a long time ago.
german_text: "Die meisten Verletzungen sind vor langer Zeit aufgetreten.
actual_translation: "Most of the violations occurred a long time ago.

translation_text: Some were in the 1990s and early 2000s.
german_text: Einige waren in den 90-ern und Anfang der 2000-er Jahre.
actual_translation: Some were in the '90s and in early 2000s.

translation_text: The point is that we have committed to coping with these violations, but there are processes that have to go through,” he said.
german_text: Der Punkt ist, dass wir uns verpflichtet haben, diese Verstöße anzugehen, aber es gibt Prozesse, die durchlaufen werden müssen", sagte er.
actual_translation: The point is we are committed to addressing these violations, but there are processes to go through," he said.

translation_text: Then Wiranto made a withdrawal when he spoke to TIME in Jakarta on June 5 and said he had no plans to set up a complaint mechanism in Papua.
german_text: Dann machte Wiranto einen Rückzug, als er am 5. Juni in Jakarta mit TIME sprach und sagte, er habe keine Pläne, in Papua einen Beschwerde-Mechanismus einzurichten.
actual_translation: Then Wiranto backtracked when speaking to TIME in Jakarta on June 5, saying he has no plans to establish a grievance mechanism in Papua.

translation_text: Instead, “all is regulated by law,” he said.
german_text: Stattdessen "wird alles gesetzlich geregelt", sagte er.
actual_translation: Instead, "All will be settled by law," he said.

translation_text: Wiranto, who was accused by the UN for “crimes against humanity” which demanded more than 1,000 deaths in East Timor’s bloody independence referendum of 1999, said that 11 cases of human rights violations in Papua have already been, including the Paniai incident.
german_text: Wiranto, den die UNO wegen "Verbrechen gegen die Menschlichkeit" angeklagt hat, die mehr als 1.000 Todesopfer in Osttimors blutiger Unabhängigkeits-Abstimmung von 1999 forderten, sagte, dass 11 Fälle von Menschenrechtsverletzungen in Papua bereits beigelegt worden seien, einschließlich des Paniai-Vorfalls.
actual_translation: Wiranto, who the U.N. has indicted for "crimes against humanity" relating to more than 1,000 deaths during East Timor's bloody 1999 independence vote, said that 11 cases of human-rights violations in Papua have already been settled, including the Paniai incident.

translation_text: The families of the Paniai victims addressed such claims with cruel unbelief.
german_text: Familien der Paniai-Opfer nahmen solche Behauptungen mit grimmiger Ungläubigkeit entgegen.
actual_translation: Families of the Paniai victims greeted such claims with grim incredulity.

translation_text: “I’ve been interviewed four times in the last three years, but there’s been no progress,” says Yohanes.
german_text: "Ich wurde in den letzten drei Jahren viermal interviewt, aber es gab keinerlei Fortschritte", sagt Yohanes.
actual_translation: "I've been interviewed four times for the past three years, but there has been no progress at all," Yohanes says.

translation_text: “I am tired.”
german_text: "Ich bin müde."
actual_translation: "I'm tired."

translation_text: He says that years later he still lives in fear.
german_text: Er sagt, dass er Jahre später immer noch in Angst lebt.
actual_translation: He says that years later, he still lives in fear.

translation_text: “I’m afraid,” he says.
german_text: "Ich habe Angst", sagt er.
actual_translation: "I'm afraid," he says.

translation_text: "I'm afraid to be arrested by the military, I'm afraid to be shot."
german_text: "Ich habe Angst, vom Militär verhaftet zu werden, habe Angst, erschossen zu werden."
actual_translation: "I'm afraid of being arrested by the military, afraid to be shot."

translation_text: His brother Jacob repeated the view that the people in Paniai are afraid to discuss the incident.
german_text: Sein Bruder Yacobus wiederholte die Ansicht, dass die Menschen in Paniai Angst haben, den Vorfall zu diskutieren.
actual_translation: His brother Yacobus echoed the view that people in Paniai are fearful of discussing the incident.

translation_text: He says he was hit by the military after he helped burial four of the victims.
german_text: Er sagt, dass er vom Militär geschlagen wurde, nachdem er half, vier der Opfer zu begraben.
actual_translation: He says he was beaten by the military after helping to bury four of the victims.

translation_text: “After I had buried the bodies, the military was looking for me,” he says.
german_text: "Nachdem ich die Leichen begraben hatte, suchte das Militär nach mir", sagt er.
actual_translation: "After burying the bodies, the military came looking for me," he says.

translation_text: The shootings did not stop.
german_text: Die Schießereien haben nicht aufgehört.
actual_translation: The shootings haven't stopped.

translation_text: On Tuesday, Indonesian police shoot on village in Paniais neighborhood Deiyai.
german_text: Am Dienstag schoss die indonesische Polizei auf Dorfbewohner in Paniais Nachbarschaft Deiyai.
actual_translation: On Tuesday, Indonesian police shot at villagers in Paniai's neighboring Deiyai regency.

translation_text: During a confrontation between village inhabitants and the manager of a building company who refused to bring an unconscious man to the hospital, one person died and 17 others were injured, including children.
german_text: Während einer Konfrontation zwischen Dorfbewohnern und dem Manager einer Baufirma, die sich weigerte, einen bewusstlosen Mann ins Krankenhaus zu bringen, starb eine Person und 17 andere wurden verletzt, darunter auch Kinder.
actual_translation: One person died and 17 others were wounded, including children, during a confrontation between villagers and the manager of a construction company who refused to help transport an unconscious man to hospital.

translation_text: The man, the 24-year-old Ravianus Douw, who was drowned while fishing in a nearby river, died on the way to the hospital.
german_text: Der Mann, der 24-jährige Ravianus Douw, der ertrunken war, als er in einem nahe gelegenen Fluss fischte, starb auf dem Weg ins Krankenhaus.
actual_translation: The man, 24-year-old Ravianus Douw who drowned while he was fishing in a nearby river, died on the way to hospital.

translation_text: Rebellion inhabitants protested in front of the company’s office.
german_text: Aufgeregte Dorfbewohner protestierten vor dem Standortbüro des Unternehmens.
actual_translation: Incensed villagers protested in front of the company's site office.

translation_text: Police said the village residents threw stones on officers who responded by shooting warning shots.
german_text: Die Polizei sagte, dass die Dorfbewohner Steine auf Offiziere warfen, die darauf reagierten, indem sie Warnschüsse abfeuerten.
actual_translation: Police said the villagers threw rocks at officers, who responded by firing warning shots.

translation_text: But local people say that the mobile brigade (Indonesian paramilitary police) began to shoot on the crowd and killed one.
german_text: Aber Einheimische sagen, dass die mobile Brigade (indonesische paramilitärische Polizei) auf die Menge zu schießen begann und einen tötete.
actual_translation: But locals say the mobile brigade (Indonesian paramilitary police) began shooting at the crowd, killing one.

translation_text: "We were so in panic, we are afraid that there will be revenge," says the 29-year-old Dominggu Badii, who lives near the hospital and witnessed how the injured were quickly delivered here, according to the TIME.
german_text: "Wir waren so in Panik, wir haben Angst, dass es Rache geben wird", sagt der 29-jährige Dominggu Badii, der in der Nähe des Krankenhauses wohnt und Zeuge war, wie die Verletzten hier schnell eingeliefert wurden ist, so die TIME.
actual_translation: "We were so panicked, we are afraid there will be revenge," 29-year-old Dominggu Badii, who lives near the hospital and witnessed the injured being hurried in, tells TIME.

translation_text: “I’ve hid in my house for two days.”
german_text: "Ich habe mich zwei Tage in meinem Haus versteckt."
actual_translation: "I have been hiding in my house for two days."

translation_text: The Deiyai Parliament has called for the involving officers to take responsibility and to withdraw the mobile police brigade from the area.
german_text: Das Deiyai-Parlament hat dazu aufgerufen, die beteiligten Offiziere zur Rechenschaft zu ziehen und die mobile Brigade der Polizei aus dem Gebiet zurückzuziehen.
actual_translation: The Deiyai parliament has called for the officers involved to be held to account and the police mobile brigade to be withdrawn from the area.

translation_text: Paniai has always been a trouble for the Indonesian government.
german_text: Paniai war immer ein Unruheherd für die indonesische Regierung.
actual_translation: Paniai has always been a troublespot for the Indonesian government.

translation_text: The lack of meaningful development strengthens the dissatisfaction of the peoples Mee, Moni, Dani and Damal, who live in the Green Highland of Papua.
german_text: Der Mangel an sinnvoller Entwicklung stärkt die Unzufriedenheit der Stammesangehörigen Mee, Moni, Dani und Damal, die im grünen Hochland von Papua leben.
actual_translation: The lack of meaningful development feeds the discontent of the tribal Mee, Moni, Dani, and Damal peoples, who live sprawled across Papua's verdant central highlands.

translation_text: Many joined the "Free Papua Movement" (OPM), the rebellion army, which claims to defend the rights of Papua by attacking sporadic attacks and kidnappings of Indonesian soldiers.
german_text: Viele schlossen sich der "Freien Papua-Bewegung" (OPM) an, der Rebellenarmee, die behauptet, die Rechte der Papua zu verteidigen, indem sie sporadische Angriffe und Entführungen von indonesischen Soldaten anstoßen.
actual_translation: Many joined the Free Papua Movement (OPM), the rebel army that claims to defend the rights of the Papuans by launching sporadic attacks and kidnapping raids on Indonesian soldiers.

translation_text: Some of the top OPM leaders come from Paniai, including Tadius Yogi and Daniel Yudas Kogoya.
german_text: Einige der Top-OPM-Führer stammen aus Paniai, darunter Tadius Yogi und Daniel Yudas Kogoya.
actual_translation: Some of the top OPM leaders hail from Paniai, including Tadius Yogi and Daniel Yudas Kogoya.

translation_text: As a response to this, thousands of people have been arrested and arbitrarily detained in Paniai in recent years, under the pretext of “assurance of national sovereignty.”
german_text: Als Reaktion darauf wurden in den letzten Jahren Tausende von Menschen in Paniai verhaftet und willkürlich in Gewahrsam genommen, unter dem Vorwand der "Sicherung der nationalen Souveränität".
actual_translation: In response, thousands of people in Paniai have been arrested and arbitrarily detained by the military in recent years, under the guise of "safeguarding national sovereignty."

translation_text: Some people never go up again.
german_text: Manche tauchen nie wieder auf.
actual_translation: Some never reappear.

translation_text: Among the people in Papua, Paniai is known as "a tragic, forgotten place".
german_text: Unter den Menschen in Papua ist Paniai als "ein tragischer, vergessener Ort" bekannt.
actual_translation: Among the people of Papua, Paniai is known as "a tragic, forgotten place."

translation_text: Poverty increases dissatisfaction.
german_text: Armut stärkt die Unzufriedenheit.
actual_translation: Poverty feeds the discontent.

translation_text: The little rice that is sold in Enarotali is too expensive for local people.
german_text: Das bisschen Reis, der in Enarotali verkauft wird, ist für Einheimische zu teuer.
actual_translation: The little rice on sale in Enarotali is too expensive for locals to buy.

translation_text: Bread is also out of scope.
german_text: Brot ist genauso außer Reichweite.
actual_translation: Bread is just as out of reach.

translation_text: The people here build up everything they eat: especially note and fruit and leaf vegetables.
german_text: Die Menschen hier bauen alles an, was sie essen: vor allem Nota und Obst und Blattgemüse.
actual_translation: People here grow everything they eat: mainly nota plus some fruit and leafy vegetables.

translation_text: Agriculture is the task of women who can process four or five fields of sweet potato each.
german_text: Die Landwirtschaft ist die Aufgabe der Frauen, die jeweils vier oder fünf Felder der Süßkartoffel bearbeiten können.
actual_translation: Farming is the job of the women, who each can maintain four or five fields of the sweet potato.

translation_text: They keep the majority of the harvest for the family, while the rest is sold on the local market.
german_text: Sie behalten den Großteil der Ernte für die Familie, während der Rest auf dem lokalen Markt verkauft wird.
actual_translation: They usually keep most of the harvest for the family, with the rest sold in the local market.

translation_text: Ten pieces of note cost only 10,000 Indonesian rupees (75 cents).
german_text: Zehn Stücke Nota kosteten nur 10.000 indonesische Rupien (75 Cents).
actual_translation: Ten pieces of nota cost only 10,000 Indonesian rupiah (75 cents).

translation_text: Over time, economic inequalities have grown between the indigenous Papua and the new migrants who have arrived in greater numbers since the opening of new air routes to Nabire Airport.
german_text: Im Laufe der Zeit sind wirtschaftliche Ungleichheiten zwischen den einheimischen Papua und den neuen Migranten gewachsen, die seit der Eröffnung neuer Flugrouten zum Flughafen Nabire in größerer Zahl angekommen sind.
actual_translation: Over time, economic inequalities have grown between the native Papuans and the new migrants, who have arrived in greater numbers since the opening of a new air routes to Nabire Airport.

translation_text: The few jobs that there are in the region usually go to the better educated and wealthy migrants.
german_text: Die wenigen Arbeitsplätze, die es in der Region gibt, gehen in der Regel an die besser ausgebildeten und wohlhabenderen Migranten.
actual_translation: What few jobs exist typically go to the better-educated and wealthier migrants.

translation_text: Papua rarely has the capital or the skills needed to run their own competitively.
german_text: Papua haben selten das Kapital oder die notwendigen Fähigkeiten, um ihre eigenen Unternehmen wettbewerbsfähig zu führen.
actual_translation: Papuans rarely have the capital or the necessary skills to run their own businesses competitively.

translation_text: “The young people are not interested in staying in the village ... because there’s no jobs or money here,” says John Gobai, the chairman of the Paniai council.
german_text: "Die jungen Leute sind nicht daran interessiert, im Dorf zu bleiben ... denn hier gibt es keine Jobs oder Geld", sagt John Gobai, der Vorsitzende des Stammesrates von Paniai.
actual_translation: "The young people are not interested to stay in the village ... because there's no jobs or money here," says John Gobai, the chairman of the tribal council of Paniai.

translation_text: Isolation keeps the eyes of the world away from Papua.
german_text: Isolation hält die Augen der Welt fern von Papua.
actual_translation: Isolation keeps the world's eyes off Papua.

translation_text: Additionally, restrictions on reporting on international media remain stressed.
german_text: Darüber hinaus bleiben Beschränkungen der Berichterstattung internationale Medien angespannt.
actual_translation: In addition, reporting restrictions for international media remain tight.

translation_text: At the beginning of the year, French journalists Franck Escudie and Basille Longchamp were deported from Papua because of lack of coordination with related institutions, despite the rare permission to film.
german_text: Anfang des Jahres wurden die französischen Journalisten Franck Escudie und Basille Longchamp wegen mangelnder Koordination mit verwandten Institutionen aus Papua deportiert, obwohl ihnen die seltene Erlaubnis zum Filmen gegeben wurde.
actual_translation: Earlier this year, French journalists Franck Escudie and Basille Longchamp were deported from Papua for a "lack of coordination with related institutions" despite having been granted rare permission to film.

translation_text: According to Phelim Kine, the vice-Asian director of Human Rights Watch, the promises of Jokow's election campaign to remove the restrictions on reporting to promote transparency and development were not fulfilled.
german_text: Laut Phelim Kine, dem stellvertretenden Asien-Direktor von Human Rights Watch, wurden die Versprechungen von Jokowis Wahlkampf, die Beschränkungen der Berichterstattung aufzuheben, um Transparenz und Entwicklung zu fördern, nicht realisiert.
actual_translation: According to Phelim Kine, Deputy Asia Director of Human Rights Watch, Jokowi's election campaign pledges to lift reporting restrictions to boost transparency and development have not been realized.

translation_text: “There are new dangers for foreign journalists trying to report Indonesia’s unrestful east provinces of Papua and West Papua: visa refusal and a blacklist,” he said in a statement.
german_text: "Es gibt neue Gefahren für ausländische Journalisten, die versuchen, von Indonesiens unruhigen östlichsten Provinzen von Papua und Westpapua zu berichten versuchen: Visa-Verweigerung und eine schwarze Liste," sagte er in einer Erklärung.
actual_translation: "There are new hazards for foreign journalists attempting to report from Indonesia's restive easternmost provinces of Papua and West Papua: visa denial and blacklisting," he said in a statement.

translation_text: A lack of press control means that the international pressure on the Indonesian government remains largely limited to the immediate neighbors of Papuas.
german_text: Mangelnde Pressekontrolle bedeutet, dass der internationale Druck auf die indonesische Regierung weitgehend auf die unmittelbaren Nachbarn Papuas beschränkt bleibt.
actual_translation: The lack of press scrutiny means international pressure on the Indonesian government has been largely limited to Papua's immediate neighbors.

translation_text: In March, six Pacific states – Tonga, Nauru, Palau, Tuvalu, the Marshall Islands and the Salomon Islands – called for the UN Human Rights Council to investigate the “diverse and widespread injuries” in Papua, including the Paniai shooting.
german_text: Im März forderten sechs pazifische Staaten - Tonga, Nauru, Palau, Tuvalu, die Marshallinseln und die Salomonen-Inseln - den UN-Menschenrechtsrat auf, die "verschiedenen und weit verbreiteten Verletzungen" in Papua einschließlich der Paniai-Schießerei zu untersuchen.
actual_translation: In March, six Pacific nations - Tonga, Nauru, Palau, Tuvalu, the Marshall Islands, and the Solomon Islands - urged the U.N. Human Rights Council to investigate the "various and widespread violations" in Papua, including the Paniai shooting.

translation_text: The same countries have historically seen the OPM support.
german_text: Dieselben Länder haben historisch gesehen das OPM unterstützt.
actual_translation: These same countries have historically backed the OPM.

translation_text: Indonesian Foreign Ministry spokeswoman Arrmanatha Nasir rejected the group’s accusations and said to journalists in Jakarta: “In Indonesia there is still a democratic system, and there are free media, so it’s hard to hide the evidence for human rights cases.”
german_text: Der Sprecher des indonesischen Außenministeriums Arrmanatha Nasir wies die Vorwürfe der Gruppe zurück und sagte Journalisten in Jakarta: "In Indonesien gilt immer noch ein demokratisches System, und es gibt freie Medien, so dass es schwierig ist, die Beweise für Menschenrechtsfälle zu vertuschen."
actual_translation: Indonesian Foreign Ministry spokesperson Arrmanatha Nasir shrugged off the group's allegations, telling journalists in Jakarta, "In Indonesia, a democratic system still applies and there's free media so it's hard for the evidence of human rights cases to be covered up."

translation_text: The local people want more foreign governments to be aware of this.
german_text: Die Menschen vor Ort wollen, dass mehr ausländische Regierungen dies zur Kenntnis nehmen.
actual_translation: Local people want more foreign governments to take note.

translation_text: When an official delegation from the Netherlands, under the leadership of human rights ambassador Kees Van Baar, visited Jayapura on May 4, local people broke their silence and pressed him "We want freedom", according to a source that also attended the meeting but wanted to remain anonymous.
german_text: Als eine offizielle Delegation aus den Niederlanden, unter der Leitung des Menschenrechts-Botschafters Kees Van Baar, Jayapura am 4. Mai besuchte, brachen Einheimische ihr Schweigen und bedrängten ihn "Wir wollen Freiheit", gemäß einer Quelle, die auch an der Sitzung teilnahm, aber anonym bleiben möchte.
actual_translation: When an official delegation from the Netherlands, headed by the nation's human rights ambassador Kees Van Baar, visited Jayapura on May 4, local people broke their silence, beseeching, "We want freedom," according to a source who also attended the meeting but who asked to stay anonymous.

translation_text: Indonesia has another presidential election in 2019, but Papua says it’s not likely to vote for Jokowi again.
german_text: Indonesien hat 2019 eine weitere Präsidentschaftswahl, aber die Papua sagen, dass sie wahrscheinlich nicht wieder für Jokowi stimmen werden.
actual_translation: Indonesia has another presidential election in 2019, but Papuans say they are unlikely to vote again for Jokowi.

translation_text: “Jokowi is a man with good intentions, but he’s surrounded by the people involved in the Paniai shootings,” says Gobai, the chairman of the tribal council.
german_text: "Jokowi ist ein Mensch, der gute Absichten hat, aber er ist von den Leuten umgeben, die an den Paniai-Schüssen beteiligt sind", sagt Gobai, der Vorsitzende des Stammesrates.
actual_translation: "Jokowi is a person who has good intentions, but he is surrounded by the people who are involved in the Paniai shooting," says Gobai, the tribal council chairman.

translation_text: He wants Jokowi to know that the people of Paniai, except that they live under the constant threat of a robbery military, are in poor education and health services.
german_text: Er will, dass Jokowi weiß, dass das Paniai-Volk, abgesehen davon, dass es unter der ständigen Bedrohung eines räuberischen Militärs lebt, sich in armseligen Erziehungs- und Gesundheitsdiensten befindet.
actual_translation: He wants Jokowi to know that the Paniai people, aside from living under the looming threat of a rapacious military, wallow in destitution, with paltry education and health services.

translation_text: Gobai says that the people of Paniai, like other Papua, see their voice for Jokowi as a "cause" he has to pay back.
german_text: Gobai sagt, dass die Paniai-Leute, wie andere Papua, ihre Stimme für Jokowi als eine "Schuld" betrachten, die er zurückzahlen muss.
actual_translation: Gobai says the Paniai people, like other Papuans, consider their vote to Jokowi as a "debt" he must repay.

translation_text: “They don’t need money, they just want justice,” he says.
german_text: "Sie brauchen kein Geld, sie wollen nur Gerechtigkeit", sagt er.
actual_translation: "They don't need money, they just want justice," he says.

translation_text: Despite the threats and intimidations, the families of the Paniai shooters carried out a last symbolic act of disgrace: the body of a victim was buried on a ground right in front of the police and the military station.
german_text: Trotz der Drohungen und Einschüchterungen führten Familien der Paniai-Schussopfer einen letzten symbolischen Akt des Trotzes aus: die Leiche eines Opfers wurde auf einem Gelände genau gegenüber der Polizei und der Militärstation begraben.
actual_translation: Despite the threats and intimidation, families of the Paniai shooting victims carried out one last symbolic act of defiance: burying one victim's body on land just opposite the police and military station.

translation_text: They know that justice may never be given to them, but at least they do not let the responsible forget their crimes.
german_text: Sie wissen, dass ihnen vielleicht niemals Gerechtigkeit zukommen wird, aber zumindest lassen sie die Verantwortlichen ihre Verbrechen nicht vergessen.
actual_translation: Knowing that justice may never be served, at least they won't let those responsible forget their crimes.

translation_text: “A member of our family was killed,” Yacobus says with a headache.
german_text: "Ein Mitglied unserer Familie wurde getötet", sagt Yacobus mit gesenktem Kopf.
actual_translation: "A member of our family has been killed," says Yacobus, head bowed.

translation_text: “What else can we do?”
german_text: "Was können wir sonst noch tun?"
actual_translation: "What else could we do?"

translation_text: Fire captures the 'Torch' cloud crater of Dubai for the second time
german_text: Feuer erfassen den 'Torch' Wolkenkratzer von Dubai zum zweiten Mal
actual_translation: Fire engulfs Dubai's 'Torch' skyscraper for second time

translation_text: A fire broke down on Friday in one of the highest residential towers in Dubai, forcing hundreds of inhabitants to flee from the 337 meters high, 79-storey building.
german_text: Ein Feuer fand am Freitag in einem der höchsten Wohntürme der Welt in Dubai seinen Durchbuch und zwang Hunderte von Bewohnern, aus dem 337 Meter hohen, 79-stöckigen Gebäude zu fliehen.
actual_translation: A fire ripped through one of the world's tallest residential towers in Dubai on Friday, forcing hundreds of occupants to flee the 337 metre-tall, 79-storey structure.

translation_text: It’s the second fire to hit through the high house in just two years, randomly called the Torch Tower (Fackel Tower).
german_text: Es ist der zweite Brand, der in nur zwei Jahren durch das Hochhaus fegt, das man zufälligerweise den Torch-Tower (Fackel-Turm) nennt.
actual_translation: It's the second blaze to sweep through the high-rise - which happens to be called the Torch tower - in just two years.

translation_text: The building was evacuated, no injuries were, and there was no direct word about the cause of the flame.
german_text: Das Gebäude wurde evakuiert, Verletzungen wurden keine gemeldet, und es gab kein direktes Wort über die Ursache der Flamme.
actual_translation: The building was evacuated, no injuries were reported, and there was no immediate word on the cause of the blaze.

translation_text: "We slept and we got up with the fire alarm and the people's screaming.
german_text: "Wir haben geschlafen und wir sind beim Feueralarm und beim Schreien der Leute aufgestanden.
actual_translation: "We were sleeping and we woke up to the fire alarm and people screaming.

translation_text: We ran down the stairs, and it took about 10 minutes to get down from the 50th floor,” a resident who said his name was George told Reuters.
german_text: Wir rannten die Treppe hinunter, und es dauerte etwa 10 Minuten, um von der 50. Etage nach unten zu kommen", erzählte ein Bewohner, der seinen Namen als George angab, Reuters.
actual_translation: We ran down the stairs and it took us about 10 minutes to reach from the 50th floor," a resident who gave his name as George told Reuters.

translation_text: Dubai Civil Protection authorities said that the fire control units at 4.00 local time (00 GMT) dissolved the fire and cooled the building.
german_text: Dubais Zivilschutzbehörden sagten, dass die Einheiten der Brandbekämpfung gegen 4.00 Uhr Ortszeit (00.00 Uhr GMT) das Feuer löschten und das Gebäude abkühlten.
actual_translation: Dubai's civil defence authorities said firefighting squads put out the blaze at around 4.00 am local time (0000 GMT) and were cooling the building.

translation_text: The government said it is working on providing accommodation to the affected.
german_text: Die Regierung sagte, sie arbeite an der Bereitstellung von Unterkünften für die Betroffenen.
actual_translation: The government said it was working on providing shelter for those affected.

translation_text: The incident can revive questions about the safety of materials that are used in the outer areas of high houses around the world.
german_text: Der Vorfall kann Fragen zur Sicherheit von Materialien, die in Außenbereichen von Hochhäusern auf der ganzen Welt verwendet werden, wiederbeleben.
actual_translation: The incident may revive questions about the safety of materials used on the exteriors of tall buildings across the world.

translation_text: A survey by the management of the torch building after its fire in 2015 found that most of the damage came from clothing, outdoor clothing to decoration or isolation.
german_text: Eine Untersuchung durch das Management des Torch-Gebäudes nach dessen Brand im Jahr 2015 ergab, dass der größte Teil der Schäden von der Verkleidung, der Außenverkleidung zur Dekoration oder Isolierung, kam.
actual_translation: An investigation by the management of the Torch after its 2015 fire found that most of the damage was to the cladding, exterior panelling used for decoration or insulation.

translation_text: In the UK, police said they believe that the system of the discs to isolate and clothing at the London Grenfell Tower in June could have contributed to the rapid spread of a fire in which about 80 people were killed.
german_text: In Großbritannien sagte die Polizei, sie glaube, dass das System der Platten zur Isolierung und Verkleidung an dem Londoner Grenfell-Turm im Juni zu der raschen Ausbreitung eines Brandes beigetragen haben könnte, bei dem etwa 80 Menschen starben.
actual_translation: In the UK, police have said they believe the system of insulation and cladding panels on London's Grenfell Tower may have contributed to the rapid spread of a fire there in June in which some 80 people died.

translation_text: No Davis Cup Reform: Next Best-of-Five
german_text: Keine Davis-Cup-Reform: Weiter Best-of-five
actual_translation: No Davis Cup reform: Best-of-five continues

translation_text: The President of the International Tennis Federation (ITF) has passed through with his great Davis Cup in the General Assembly.
german_text: Der Präsident des Internationalen Tennisverbands (ITF) ist mit seinem großen Davis-Cup-Coup bei der Generalversammlung durchgefallen.
actual_translation: The president of the International Tennis Federation has failed with his big Davis Cup coup in the general assembly.

translation_text: At the meeting in Ho Chi Minh City, the revolutionary proposal for this sport to play Davis Cup points only on two wins was not supported by the required two-thirds majority.
german_text: Bei der Sitzung in Ho-Chi-Minh-Stadt wurde der für diesen Sport revolutionäre Vorschlag, Davis-Cup-Einzel nur noch auf zwei Gewinnsätze zu spielen, hauchdünn nicht von der erforderlichen Zwei-Drittel-Mehrheit unterstützt.
actual_translation: At the meeting in Ho Chi Minh City, the (for this sport) revolutionary suggestion to from now on play the Davis Cup singles over only best-of-three sets received just shy – by a whisker – of the necessary two-thirds majority in support.

translation_text: Though often very long, but also very appreciated five-set classics remain therefore preserved to the tradition competition.
