german_text: Die zwar oft sehr langen, aber eben auch deshalb sehr geschätzten Fünf-Satz-Klassiker bleiben dem Traditionsbewerb also erhalten.
actual_translation: The admittedly often very long, but for that reason also greatly treasured, five-set classics are therefore surviving in the traditional competition.

translation_text: 63.54 per cent of the member countries voted for the reform, so the goal of ITF President David Haggerty was barely failed.
german_text: 63,54 Prozent der Mitgliedsländer stimmten für die Reform, das Ziel des ITF-Präsidenten David Haggerty wurde daher nur knapp verfehlt.
actual_translation: 63.54 per cent of the member countries voted in favour of the reform; ITF president David Haggerty's objective was therefore only just missed.

translation_text: “We respect this decision, but are disappointed that our membership nations have not accepted the whole reform package for the Davis Cup and the Fed Cup.
german_text: "Wir respektieren diese Entscheidung, aber sind enttäuscht, dass unsere Mitgliedernationen nicht das gesamte Reformpaket für den Davis Cup und Fed Cup angenommen haben.
actual_translation: "We respect the decision, but are disappointed that our member nations have not accepted the entire reform package for the Davis Cup and Fed Cup.

translation_text: We need a change to ensure the long-term future of this iconic and historic competition,” Haggerty said.
german_text: Wir brauchen eine Änderung, um die langfristige Zukunft dieser ikonischen und historischen Wettbewerbe zu sichern", sagte Haggerty.
actual_translation: We need change in order to secure the long-term future of this iconic and historic competition," said Haggerty.

translation_text: We will continue to work to improve the applications.
german_text: Man werde weiterhin daran arbeiten, die Bewerbe zu verbessern.
actual_translation: There will continue to be work done to improve the competition.

translation_text: Not until the vote, after many disputes, had already come before the proposal to hold the final in a neutral place.
german_text: Gar nicht erst zur Abstimmung war nach vielen Einsprüchen schon davor der Vorschlag gekommen, das Finale an einem neutralen Ort auszutragen.
actual_translation: After many objections beforehand already, the suggestion to hold the final at a neutral location did not even make it to the vote.

translation_text: New from 2018 are only comparatively smaller details: So the finalists in the Davis Cup and Fed Cup will have the host right in the first round next year.
german_text: Neu ab 2018 sind nur vergleichsweise kleinere Details: So werden die Finalisten im Davis Cup und Fed Cup künftig im darauffolgenden Jahr in der ersten Runde das Gastgeber-Recht haben.
actual_translation: New from 2018 are only comparatively small details: so, in future, the finalists of the David Cup and Fed Cup will have the right to host in the first round the following year.

translation_text: To reduce the costs for the organizers, the requirements for training places etc. will be facilitated and players will have to complete less official media dates before the Davis Cup.
german_text: Um die Kosten für die Veranstalter zu verringern, werden die Anforderungen in Sachen Trainingsplätze usw. erleichtert und die Spieler werden vor dem Davis Cup weniger offizielle Medien-Termine absolvieren müssen.
actual_translation: In order to keep costs to a minimum for organisers, the requirements in matters of training courts etc. are being simplified and the players will not have to give so many official media appointments ahead of the Davis Cup.

translation_text: More than 1 out of 5 U.S. passengers bring forbidden items into the aircraft, a survey reveals
german_text: Mehr als 1 von 5 US-Reisenden bringt verbotene Gegenstände ins Flugzeug, findet eine Umfrage heraus
actual_translation: More than 1 in 5 US travellers carry prohibited items onto aircraft, survey finds

translation_text: A survey among flight passengers found that more than 20 percent of consciously or unconsciously banned objects passed through the U.S. Transportation Security Administration checkpoints, including at least 6 percent who entered the aircraft while accidentally wearing banned knives or other objects with sounds.
german_text: Eine Umfrage unter Flugpassagieren ergab, dass mehr als 20 Prozent bewusst oder unbewusst verbotene Gegenstände an den Kontrollpunkten der US Transportation Security Administration vorbei schmuggelten, darunter mindestens 6 Prozent, die das Flugzeug betraten, während sie versehentlich verbotene Messer oder andere Gegenstände mit Klingen trugen.
actual_translation: A survey of airline passengers found that more than 20 per cent had knowingly or unknowingly smuggled prohibited items past the US Transportation Security Administration checkpoints onto the aircraft, including at least 6 per cent who boarded the plane while unintentionally carrying prohibited knives or other bladed objects.

translation_text: Less than 1 percent said they had late discovered that they were mistakenly traveling with firearms, ammunition or explosives.
german_text: Weniger als 1 Prozent behaupteten, sie hätten verspätet entdeckt, dass sie irrtümlich mit Schusswaffen, Munition oder Sprengstoff gereist seien.
actual_translation: Less than 1 per cent claimed that they discovered belatedly that they had mistakenly travelled with firearms, ammunition or explosives.

translation_text: The survey of more than 1,000 people – conducted by a jet charter service, Stratos Jet Charters Inc. – also found that younger travellers were more likely to misunderstand the rules.
german_text: Die Umfrage bei mehr als 1.000 Personen - die von einem Jet-Charterservice, dem Stratos Jet Charters Inc., durchgeführt wurde - stellte auch fest, dass jüngere Reisende eher die Regeln missachten.
actual_translation: The survey of more than 1000 people - which was conducted by a jet-chartering service Stratos Jet Charters Inc. - also found that younger travellers were more likely to flout the rules.

translation_text: Of the respondents who admitted that they were consciously trying to fly with something that was banned by the TSA, 19.7 percent were Millennials, compared to less than 15 percent who were members of the Generation X.
german_text: Von den Befragten, die zugaben, dass sie wissentlich versucht haben, mit etwas zu fliegen, das von der TSA verboten wurde, waren 19,7 Prozent Millennials, verglichen mit weniger als 15 Prozent, die Mitglieder der Generation X waren.
actual_translation: Of the respondents who admitted knowingly trying to fly with something banned by the TSA, 19.7 per cent were millennials, compared with less than 15 per cent who were members of Generation X.

translation_text: The most common items that were deliberately transmitted to TSA agents were food and fluids.
german_text: Die häufigsten Gegenstände, die an TSA-Agenten absichtlich vorbeigeschleust wurden, waren Lebensmittel und Flüssigkeiten.
actual_translation: The most common items whisked past TSA agents on purpose were food and liquids.

translation_text: More than 3 percent acknowledged to have consciously carried items with sounds through security controls, while 2.2 percent of women and 3.7 percent of men also confirmed that they had deliberately brought forbidden drugs into the aircraft.
german_text: Mehr als 3 Prozent gaben zu, wissentlich Gegenstände mit Klingen durch die Sicherheitskontrolle getragen zu haben, während 2,2 Prozent der weiblichen Befragten und 3,7 Prozent der männlichen Befragten auch bestätigten, dass sie absichtlich verbotene Drogen in das Flugzeug gebracht hätten.
actual_translation: More than 3 per cent admitted knowingly carrying bladed items past security, while 2.2 per cent of female respondents and 3.7 per cent of male respondents also acknowledged intentionally carrying prohibited drugs onto the aircraft.

translation_text: The company said it has interviewed passengers across the country to find out how many mistaken smuggles have been brought through the airport security and how many have intentionally done it.
german_text: Das Unternehmen sagte, es habe Reisende im ganzen Land befragt, um herauszufinden, wie viele versehentlich Schmuggelware durch die Flughafensicherheit gebracht hätten und wie viele es absichtlich getan hätten.
actual_translation: The company said it surveyed travellers around the country to find out how many had accidentally brought contraband through airport security and how many had done so on purpose.

translation_text: It’s no surprise that the people who are most likely to carry smuggling – consciously or unconsciously – through security were the ones who are most frequently flying.
german_text: Es ist keine Überraschung, dass die Menschen, die am ehesten Schmuggelware - wissentlich oder unwissentlich - durch die Sicherheit tragen, diejenigen waren, die am häufigsten fliegen.
actual_translation: It's no surprise that the people most likely to haul contraband past security - knowingly or unknowingly - were those who fly the most.

translation_text: However, the company points out that the TSA guidelines are slightly complicated and confusing.
german_text: Das Unternehmen weist jedoch darauf hin, dass die TSA-Richtlinien etwas kompliziert und verwirrend sind.
actual_translation: As the company points out, however, the TSA guidelines are somewhat complicated and confusing.

translation_text: People are often uncertain what liquids they can take or how much of them.
german_text: Die Menschen sind oft unsicher, welche Flüssigkeiten sie mitnehmen dürfen oder wie viel davon.
actual_translation: People are often uncertain of what liquids they can carry or how much of them.

translation_text: Therefore, it is no surprise that the greatest amount of the objects captured by the TSA are prohibited fluids.
german_text: Es ist also keine Überraschung, dass die größte Menge der von der TSA beschlagnahmten Gegenstände verbotene Flüssigkeiten sind.
actual_translation: So it's no surprise that the largest amount of stuff seized by the TSA happens to be forbidden liquids.

translation_text: For a long time, people thought that TSA could see books as a scam.
german_text: Eine Zeit lang dachten die Leute, die TSA könnte Bücher als Schmuggelware ansehen.
actual_translation: For a time, people thought the TSA might be treating books as contraband.

translation_text: Flights are allowed on domestic flights, but not on international flights.
german_text: Flüssigkeiten sind auf Inlandsflügen erlaubt, jedoch nicht auf internationalen Flügen.
actual_translation: Liquids are allowed on domestic flights, but not on international ones.

translation_text: Elon Musk: Thousands of Tesla Customers Cancel Order
german_text: Elon Musk ist es egal: Zehntausende Tesla-Kunden stornieren Order
actual_translation: Elon Musk doesn't care: Tens of thousands of Tesla customers cancel their orders

translation_text: Elon Musk is pleased to announce with the enormous number of pre-order for his new Tesla Model 3.
german_text: Elektro-Tausendsassa Elon Musk gibt gern mit der riesigen Zahl von Vorbestellungen für seinen neuen Tesla "Model 3" an.
actual_translation: Electronics-multi-talent Elon Musk likes to brag about the huge number of pre-orders for his new Tesla "Model 3".

translation_text: It has so far underlined that some of the customers have already withdrawn their non-binding reservation.
german_text: Dabei hat er bisher unterschlagen, dass ein Teil der Kunden ihre unverbindliche Reservierung schon wieder zurückgezogen hat.
actual_translation: Up until now, he has withheld the fact that a portion of these customers have already cancelled their non-binding reservations.

translation_text: In addition to the always triumphant numbers of sales increases and even more giant sales targets, Tesla’s chief executive Elon Musk has announced the latest quarterly balance sheet for the first time a different, less brilliant number: that of the cancellations of the new mass market model 3.
german_text: Neben den stets triumphalen Zahlen zu Umsatzsteigerungen und noch gigantischeren Absatzzielen hat Tesla-Chef Elon Musk bei der Bekanntgabe der jüngsten Quartalsbilanz erstmals eine andere, weniger glanzvolle Zahl verraten: die der Stornierungen beim neuen Massenmarkt-Modell 3.
actual_translation: Alongside the always triumphant figures for sales increases and the even more gigantic sales targets, with the announcement of the most recent quarterly financial statement, Tesla boss Elon Musk has for the first time had to reveal another, less glamorous number: that of the cancellations for the new mass-market Model 3.

translation_text: Musk has often made over the past few months with the more than 500,000 pre-orders for the new car, whose delivery is just starting.
german_text: Musk hatte in den vergangenen Monaten häufig mit den mehr als 500.000 Vorbestellungen für das neue Auto geworben, dessen Auslieferung gerade beginnt.
actual_translation: In recent months, Musk had frequently used those more than 500,000 pre-orders to talk up the new car, for which distribution is just starting.

translation_text: Musk says, of the total 518,000 pre-orders, 63,000 have already been withdrawn.
german_text: Nun räumt Musk ein: Von den insgesamt 518.000 Vorbestellungen sind 63.000 schon wieder zurückgezogen worden.
actual_translation: Musk now concedes that of the 518,000 total pre-orders, 63,000 have already been retracted.

translation_text: Critics have repeatedly pointed out that these are merely non-binding reservations.
german_text: Kritiker hatten immer wieder darauf hingewiesen, dass es sich lediglich um unverbindliche Reservierungen handelt.
actual_translation: Critics had time and again pointed out that they were only non-binding reservations.

translation_text: In case of a cancellation, Tesla will pay the $1000 (in the US $1000 and in the UK £1000) "reservation refund" completely.
german_text: Bei einer Stornierung zahlt Tesla die 1000 Euro (in den USA 1000 US-Dollar und in Großbritannien 1000 Pfund) "Reservierungsanzahlung" vollständig zurück.
actual_translation: In cases of cancellation, Tesla pays the 1000-euro (in the USA, 1000-US-dollar, and in Great Britain, 1000-pound) "reservation deposit" back in its entirety.

translation_text: Currently there are 455,000 such unbinding reservations, Musk spoke in a telephone conference with analysts.
german_text: Derzeit lägen 455.000 solcher unverbindlichen Reservierungen vor, räumte Musk in einer Telefonkonferenz mit Analysten ein.
actual_translation: There are currently 455,000 such non-binding reservations, conceded Musk in a conference call with analysts.

translation_text: However, the CEO of Tesla does not believe that the cancellation of approximately 12 percent of all orders could be a problem.
german_text: Dass die Stornierung von bislang rund zwölf Prozent aller Bestellungen zum Problem werden könnte, glaubt der Tesla-Chef jedoch nicht.
actual_translation: However, the Tesla boss does not believe that the cancellation of as of yet 12 per cent of all orders could become a problem.

translation_text: The challenge to the ambitious growth goals is not on the demand, but on the production side.
german_text: Sein Argument: Die Herausforderung bei den ehrgeizigen Wachstumszielen liegt nicht bei der Nachfrage, sondern auf der Produktionsseite.
actual_translation: His argument: The challenge for ambitious growth targets is not in demand but on the production side.

translation_text: Last year, Tesla delivered 84,000 vehicles.
german_text: Im vergangenen Jahr lieferte Tesla 84.000 Fahrzeuge aus.
actual_translation: Last year, Tesla delivered 84,000 vehicles.

translation_text: In 2018, it is expected - all models together - to be 500,000, in 2020 one million.
german_text: 2018 sollen es - alle Modelle zusammengenommen - 500.000 sein, 2020 eine Million.
actual_translation: In 2018 – all models taken together – it is said to be 500,000, and in 2020, a million.

translation_text: The demand for this is obviously there.
german_text: Die Nachfrage dafür ist offensichtlich da.
actual_translation: The demand is therefore clearly there.

translation_text: According to Musk, there are currently 1,800 reservations per day.
german_text: Laut Musk kommen derzeit pro Tag 1800 Reservierungen dazu.
actual_translation: According to Musk, a further 1800 reservations arrive each day.

translation_text: Whoever orders a "Model 3" today can expect the delivery not earlier than in the second half of 2018 - if Tesla manages to drive its new, never practically tested production routes without greater interruptions with maximum burden.
german_text: Wer heute ein "Model 3" bestellt, darf frühestens in der zweiten Jahreshälfte 2018 mit der Auslieferung rechnen - wenn Tesla es schafft, seine nagelneuen, noch nie in der Praxis getesteten Produktionsstraßen ohne größere Unterbrechungen mit maximaler Auslastung zu fahren.
actual_translation: Anyone who orders a "Model 3" today is looking at delivery in the second half of 2018 at the earliest – that's if Tesla manages to get its brand-spanking new production lines going, as of yet never tested in practice, without any major interruptions and at maximum capacity.

translation_text: Many experts doubt that this is possible.
german_text: Viele Experten zweifeln, dass das möglich ist.
actual_translation: Many experts doubt whether that's possible.

translation_text: But if there are greater delays, then the unbinding of reservations could become a problem for Tesla.
german_text: Kommt es aber zu größeren Verzögerungen, dann könnte die Unverbindlichkeit der Reservierungen zum Problem für Tesla werden.
actual_translation: Should there be major delays, however, the non-binding nature of the reservations could become a problem for Tesla.

translation_text: Because then the company cannot prevent unhappy customers from falling down.
german_text: Denn dann kann das Unternehmen unzufriedene Kunden nicht daran hindern, in Scharen davonzulaufen.
actual_translation: For the company cannot then prevent unsatisfied customers from running away in droves.

translation_text: EPA chief Pruitt resigns due to the delay in Obama’s emissions reduction rules
german_text: EPA-Chef Pruitt zieht sich wegen des Hinauszögerns der Regeln der Obama-Era zur Verringerung der Emissionen zurück
actual_translation: EPA Chief Pruitt Backtracks on Delaying Obama-Era Rules to Reduce Emissions

translation_text: One day after being prosecuted by 15 states, Scott Pruitt, the head of the Environmental Protection Authority, resigned his previous decision to delay the implementation of the Obama era rules to reduce the emissions of smog-powered air pollutants.
german_text: Einen Tag, nachdem er von 15 Staaten verklagt worden war, nahm Scott Pruitt, der Chef der Umweltschutzbehörde, seine frühere Entscheidung zurück, die Umsetzung der Regeln der Obama-Ära zu verzögern, um die Emissionen Smog verursachender Luftschadstoffe zu reduzieren.
actual_translation: One day after getting sued by 15 states, Environmental Protection Agency chief Scott Pruitt reversed his earlier decision to delay implementation of Obama-era rules reducing emissions of smog-causing air pollutants.

translation_text: Pruitt presented the change as his agency proved to respond to the needs of state environmental authorities faster than previous governments.
german_text: Pruitt präsentierte den Wandel, als seine Agentur sich den Bedürfnissen der staatlichen Umweltbehörden gegenüber reaktionsschneller als bisherige Verwaltungen erwies.
actual_translation: Pruitt presented the change as his agency being more responsive than past administrations to the needs of state environmental regulators.

translation_text: He did not mention the complaint that had been filed against his previous position in a Federal Court of Appeal.
german_text: Er erwähnte die Klage nicht, die gegen seine vorherige Stelle in einem Bundesberufungsgericht erhoben worden war.
actual_translation: He made no mention of the legal challenge filed against his prior position in a federal appeals court.

translation_text: It is a deadline that took place on 1 October for states to comply with the 2015 standards for ground-to-ground ozone.
german_text: Es geht um eine Frist, die am 1. Oktober für Staaten ablief, um die Standards von 2015 für bodennahes Ozon einzuhalten.
actual_translation: At issue is an Oct. 1 deadline for states to begin meeting 2015 standards for ground-level ozone.

translation_text: Pruitt announced in June that he would delay compliance by a year to give his authority more time to study the plan and to avoid "inclusion in local decisions or to hinder economic growth."
german_text: Pruitt verkündete im Juni, dass er die Einhaltung um ein Jahr hinauszögern werde, um seiner Behörde mehr Zeit zu geben, den Plan zu studieren und um zu vermeiden, "sich in lokale Entscheidungen einzumischen oder das Wirtschaftswachstum zu behindern".
actual_translation: Pruitt announced in June he would delay compliance by one year to give his agency more time to study the plan and avoid "interfering with local decisions or impeding economic growth."

translation_text: Pruitt, who was Oklahoma’s prosecutor before his appointment by President Donald Trump, has long been a reliable opponent of stricter environmental regulations.
german_text: Pruitt, der vor seiner Ernennung durch Präsident Donald Trump Staatsanwalt von Oklahoma war, war lange Zeit ein zuverlässiger Gegner strengerer Umweltschutzvorschriften.
actual_translation: Pruitt, who was Oklahoma's state attorney general prior to his appointment by President Donald Trump, has long served as a reliable opponent of stricter environmental regulations.

translation_text: Since his arrival in Washington, Pruitt has repeatedly moved to block or delay regulations against which the chemical industry and the fossil fuel industry are opposed.
german_text: Seit seiner Ankunft in Washington ist Pruitt wiederholt dazu übergegangen, Regulierungen zu blockieren oder zu verzögern, denen sich die chemische Industrie und die Industrie der fossilen Brennstoffe widersetzen.
actual_translation: Since arriving in Washington, Pruitt has repeatedly moved to block or delay regulations opposed by the chemical and fossil-fuel industries.

translation_text: The sudden shift on Wednesday is the latest legal shift for the Pruit’s regulatory rollback agenda.
german_text: Die plötzliche Umkehr vom Mittwoch ist der jüngste rechtliche Rückschlag für die Pruitts regulatorische Rollback-Agenda.
actual_translation: Wednesday's sudden reversal is the latest legal setback for Pruitt's regulatory rollback agenda.

translation_text: Last month a federal law court in Washington ruled that the EPA manager had exceeded his authority as he tried to delay the implementation of a rule by the Obama administration, which required oil and gas companies to monitor and reduce methanelecks.
german_text: Letzten Monat hat ein Bundesberufungsgericht in Washington entschieden, dass der EPA-Verwalter seine Autorität überschritten hat, als er versuchte, die Umsetzung einer Regel der Obama-Administration, die Öl- und Gasunternehmen zur Überwachung und Reduzierung von Methanlecks verpflichtete, zu verzögern.
actual_translation: Last month, a federal appeals court in Washington ruled the EPA administrator overstepped his authority in trying to delay implementation of an Obama administration rule requiring oil and gas companies to monitor and reduce methane leaks.

translation_text: In a statement released on Wednesday evening, Pruitt suggested that his turning to ozone standards simply boosted the EPA’s willingness to cooperate with the states through the complex process of timely enforcement of the new standards.
german_text: In einer am Mittwochabend veröffentlichten Stellungnahme schlug Pruitt vor, dass seine Kehrtwende bei Ozonstandards ganz einfach die Bereitschaft der EPA zur Zusammenarbeit mit den Staaten durch den komplexen Prozess der rechtzeitigen Erfüllung der neuen Standards verstärke.
actual_translation: In a statement issued Wednesday evening, Pruitt suggested his about-face on ozone standards simply reinforced the EPA's commitment to working with states through the complex process of meeting the new standards on time.

translation_text: "In previous administrations, the EPA has often failed to comply with the deadlines for execution and then awaits to be charged by activist groups and others, and in an agreement to set the deadline for execution," said Pruitt, who prosecuted the EPA more than a dozen times in his previous job.
german_text: "Unter früheren Verwaltungen hat die EPA oft die Fristen für die Durchführung nicht eingehalten und dann darauf gewartet, von Aktivistengruppen und anderen angeklagt zu werden, und in einer Einigung den Termin für die Durchführung festzulegen", sagte Pruitt, der die EPA mehr als ein Dutzend Mal in seinem vorherigen Job verklagte.
actual_translation: "Under previous administrations, EPA would often fail to meet designation deadlines, and then wait to be sued by activist groups and others, agreeing in a settlement to set schedules for designation," said Pruitt, who sued EPA more than a dozen times in his prior job.

translation_text: “We don’t believe in a regulation through judicial proceedings, and we take deadlines seriously.
german_text: "Wir glauben nicht an eine Regulierung durch Gerichtsverfahren, und wir nehmen Fristen ernst.
actual_translation: "We do not believe in regulation through litigation, and we take deadlines seriously.

translation_text: We also take the law and authority we have seriously."
german_text: Wir nehmen auch das Gesetz und die Autorität, die es uns gibt, ernst."
actual_translation: We also take the statute and the authority it gives us seriously."

translation_text: However, the EPA’s opinion stated that Pruitt will at some point use his “power to delay and all other legal powers” to ensure that the regulations “base on a solid policy and the best available information.”
german_text: Dennoch besagte die Stellungnahme der EPA, dass Pruitt irgendwann seine "Befugnis zur Verspätung und alle anderen rechtlich zur Verfügung stehenden Vollmachten" nutzen wird, um sicherzustellen, dass die Vorschriften "auf einer soliden Politik und den besten verfügbaren Informationen basieren".
actual_translation: Still, the EPA's statement said Pruitt may at some point once again use his "delay authority and all other authority legally available" to ensure regulations "are founded on sound policy and the best available information."

translation_text: The Republicans in Congress call on a more comprehensive renewal of the ozon rules.
german_text: Die Republikaner im Kongress drängen auf eine umfassendere Neufassung der Ozonregeln.
actual_translation: Republicans in Congress are pushing for a broader rewrite of the ozone rules.

translation_text: A bill approved last month intends to delay the implementation of the 2015 rules by at least eight years.
german_text: Ein im letzten Monat genehmigter Gesetzentwurf soll die Umsetzung der Regeln von 2015 um mindestens acht Jahre verzögern.
actual_translation: A House bill approved last month seeks to delay implementation of the 2015 rules at least eight years.

translation_text: The measure has not yet been voted in the Senate.
german_text: Die Maßnahme wurde im Senat noch nicht zur Abstimmung gestellt.
actual_translation: The measure has not yet been brought to a vote in the Senate.

translation_text: New York's Attorney General Eric Schneiderman, who led the coalition of the states that prosecuted the EPA this week, said the group intends to maintain the legal pressure.
german_text: Der New Yorker Generalstaatsanwalt Eric Schneiderman, der die Koalition der Staaten leitete, die die EPA in dieser Woche verklagt hatten, sagte, die Gruppe beabsichtige, den gesetzlichen Druck aufrechtzuerhalten.
actual_translation: New York Attorney General Eric Schneiderman, who led the coalition of states that sued the EPA this week, said the group intends to keep up the legal pressure.

translation_text: “The reversal of the EPA – according to our complaints – is an important benefit for the health and safety of these 6.7 million New Yorkers and the more than 115 million Americans directly affected by the smog that flows into their communities,” Schneiderman said.
german_text: "Die Umkehr der EPA - nach unseren Klagen - ist ein wichtiger Gewinn für die Gesundheit und die Sicherheit von diesen 6,7 Millionen New Yorkern und die über 115 Millionen Amerikaner, die direkt vom Smog betroffen sind, der in ihre Gemeinden strömt", sagte Schneiderman.
actual_translation: "The EPA's reversal - following our lawsuits - is an important win for the health and safety of those 6.7 million New Yorkers, and the over 115 million Americans directly impacted by smog pouring into their communities," Schneiderman said.

translation_text: New York joined in this case California, Connecticut, Delaware, Illinois, Iowa, Maine, Massachusetts, Minnesota, New Mexico, Oregon, Pennsylvania, Rhode Island, Vermont and Washington and the District of Columbia.
german_text: New York schlossen sich in diesem Fall Kalifornien, Connecticut, Delaware, Illinois, Iowa, Maine, Massachusetts, Minnesota, New Mexico, Oregon, Pennsylvanien, Rhode Island, Vermont und Washington und der District of Columbia an.
actual_translation: New York was joined in the case by California, Connecticut, Delaware, Illinois, Iowa, Maine, Massachusetts, Minnesota, New Mexico, Oregon, Pennsylvania, Rhode Island, Vermont and Washington, and the District of Columbia.

translation_text: Soil ozone is created when pollutants from cars, power plants, oil refineries, chemical plants and other sources in the atmosphere react to sunlight.
german_text: Boden-Ozon entsteht, wenn Schadstoffe aus Autos, Kraftwerken, Ölraffinerien, Chemieanlagen und anderen Quellen in der Atmosphäre auf Sonnenlicht reagieren.
actual_translation: Ground-level ozone is created when common pollutants emitted by cars, power plants, oil refineries, chemical plants and other sources react in the atmosphere to sunlight.

translation_text: The emerging smog can cause serious breathing problems in sensitive groups of people and contribute to thousands of premature deaths each year.
german_text: Der entstehende Smog kann bei sensiblen Gruppen von Menschen ernsthafte Atemprobleme verursachen, und jedes Jahr zu Tausenden von vorzeitigen Todesfällen beitragen.
actual_translation: The resulting smog can cause serious breathing problems among sensitive groups of people, contributing to thousands of premature deaths each year.

translation_text: Representatives of public health and the environmental guardians rejoiced Pruit's surprising course change.
german_text: Vertreter des öffentlichen Gesundheitswesens und der Umweltschützer jubelten über Pruitts überraschenden Kurswechsel.
actual_translation: Public health advocates and environmentalists cheered Pruitt's surprising change of course.

translation_text: “It’s worrying how much pressure it takes to keep this reasonable step from the responsible for the protection of the air that we breathe,” said Lori Ann Burd from the Center for Biological Diversity.
german_text: "Es ist beunruhigend, wie viel Druck es braucht, um diesen vernünftigen Schritt von dem Verantwortlichen für den Schutz der Luft, die wir einatmen zu erhalten", sagte Lori Ann Burd vom Center for Biological Diversity.
actual_translation: "It's disturbing how much pressure it took to get this commonsense step from the guy in charge of protecting the air we breathe," said Lori Ann Burd of the Center for Biological Diversity.

translation_text: “We must continue to fight against the ideological crossroads of the Trump administration, to engage in environmental pollutants and their special interests.”
german_text: "Wir müssen weiter gegen den ideologischen Kreuzzug der Trump-Regierung kämpfen, sich an Umweltverschmutzer und deren besondere Interessen anzubiedern".
actual_translation: "We've got to keep fighting the Trump administration's ideological crusade to pander to polluters and special interests."

translation_text: Tumlingen celebrates the 750th anniversary of St. Hilarius Church
german_text: Tumlingen feiert 750 Jahre St. Hilarius-Kirche
actual_translation: Tumlingen is celebrating 750 years of the St. Hilarius Church

translation_text: 750th Anniversary of the Church of St. Hilarius: on the occasion of the anniversary of the Mountain Church is invited to the Old Cemetery-Areal in Tumlingen on Sunday, July 16, at 16.30 a.m. to a ceremony.
german_text: 750 Jahre St. Hilarius-Kirche: Anlässlich des Jubiläums der Bergkirche wird auf das alte Friedhof-Areal in Tumlingen am Sonntag, 16. Juli, um 16.30 Uhr zu einer Serenade eingeladen.
actual_translation: 750 years of the St. Hilarius Church: To mark the anniversary of the mountain church, invitations are being issued to a serenade in the old cemetery grounds in Tumlingen on Sunday 16th July at 4.30pm.

translation_text: Whether its idyllic location and beautiful views of the town, the historic St. Hilarius facility is a popular place to stay.
german_text: Ob seiner idyllischen Lage und schöner Aussicht auf die Ortschaft ist die historische St. Hilarius-Anlage ein beliebter Ort zum Verweilen.
actual_translation: Due to its idyllic setting and beautiful view over the village, the historical site of St. Hilarius is a beloved place to tarry a while.

translation_text: Visitors of the sixth Benefit Serenade can be enchanted by this powerful place.
german_text: Die Besucher der sechsten Benefiz-Serenade können sich von diesem kraftvollen Ort verzaubern lassen.
actual_translation: Visitors to the sixth benefit serenade can let themselves be enchanted by this powerful place.

translation_text: The rescue and preservation of the oldest building on the site have made the friends and sponsors of Tumlingens concern.
german_text: Die Rettung und Erhaltung des ältesten Gebäudes im Ort haben die Freunde und Förderer Tumlingens zu ihrem Anliegen gemacht.
actual_translation: The Friends and Supporters of Tumlingen have made the rescue and preservation of the oldest building in the area their concern.

translation_text: Walter Martini emphasizes: “It’s a unique doorful small death.”
german_text: Walter Martini betont: "Es ist ein einzigartiges dörfliches Kleinod".
actual_translation: Walter Martini stresses: "It is a one-of-a-kind rural jewel".

translation_text: In 1267 the St. Hilariuskapelle was first mentioned in the Württembergische Urkundenbuch: Count Hermann von Sulz sold "the mountain with the parish church on it to Tumlingen as well as the Vogtei" to Magister Eberhard von Horb and to his brother Dietrich for 20 mark of silver.
german_text: Im Jahr 1267 ist die St. Hilariuskapelle erstmals im Württembergischen Urkundenbuch urkundlich erwähnt worden: Graf Hermann von Sulz verkaufte "den Berg mit der darauf befindlichen Pfarrkirche zu Tumlingen samt der Vogtei" an Magister Eberhard von Horb und an seinen Bruder Dietrich für 20 Mark Silber.
actual_translation: The St. Hilarius chapel was first mentioned in records in 1267 in the Württemberg register: Count Hermann von Sulz sold "the mountain with the parish church for Tumlingen on it, together with the Bailiwick" to Master Eberhard von Horb and his brother Dietrich for 20 silver marks.

translation_text: According to the text of the document, on the Tumlinger mountain, in addition to the former parish church, there was also a ruling court, to which the church or patronate law belonged and not vice versa.
german_text: Dem Wortlaut der Urkunde nach stand auf dem Tumlinger Berg außer der einstigen Pfarrkirche auch ein herrschaftlicher Hof, zu dem die Kirche oder das Patronatsrecht gehörte und nicht umgekehrt.
actual_translation: According to the text of the official document, aside from the former parish church, a lordly farm also stood on the Tumlingen mountain, which itself owned the church, or the right of patronage, and not the other way around.

translation_text: There were also people living there.
german_text: Es wohnten also auch Menschen dort.
actual_translation: People therefore also lived there too.

translation_text: As follows from the description of the Oberamt Freudenstadt of 1858, next to the Unterdorf and the Oberdorf, which are still to be recognized today in the town picture of Tumlingen, the "Berg" of the third, the ruling settlement core of the village.
german_text: Wie aus der Beschreibung des Oberamtes Freudenstadt von 1858 hervorgeht, war neben dem Unterdorf und dem Oberdorf, die heute im Ortsbild von Tumlingen gerade noch zu erkennen sind, der "Berg" der dritte, der herrschaftliche Siedlungskern des Dorfes.
actual_translation: As is apparent from the upper administrative office for Freudenstadt's description in 1858, the "mountain" was, alongside the lower village and the upper village that can just about be made out still in the appearance of Tumlingen today, the village's third, grand centre of settlement.

translation_text: Old maps from the time around the year 1600 emphasize these historical circumstances.
german_text: Alte Karten aus der Zeit um das Jahr 1600 untermauern diese geschichtlichen Gegebenheiten.
actual_translation: All maps from the time of around 1600 substantiate this historical reality.

translation_text: The patronate law arose from the early medieval own church law.
german_text: Das Patronatsrecht entstand aus dem frühmittelalterlichen Eigenkirchenrecht.
actual_translation: The right of patronage arose out of the Early Middle-Age proprietary church law.

translation_text: A Lord, who built, equipped and occupied a church with a priest, remained the owner of this church and could inherit this own church.
german_text: Ein Herr, der eine Kirche baute, ausstattete und mit einem Pfarrer besetzte, blieb weiterhin Eigner dieser Kirche und konnte diese Eigenkirche auch vererben.
actual_translation: A lord who built and furnished a church and staffed it with a priest still remained the owner of this church and was also able to bequeath this proprietary church right.

translation_text: This was associated with the right to appoint a priest or to propose a new priest to the bishop.
german_text: Damit verbunden war das Recht, einen Pfarrer einzusetzen oder dem Bischof einen neuen Pfarrer vorzuschlagen.
actual_translation: Associated with this was the right to appoint a priest or nominate a new priest to the bishop.

translation_text: There were three altars in the church and two clocks on the tower.
german_text: Drei Altäre gab es in der Kirche und zwei Glocken auf dem Turm.
actual_translation: There were three altars in the church and two bells in the tower.

translation_text: The largest of the two destroyed on Christmas in 1673.
german_text: Die Größere der beiden zerbarst an Weihnachten 1673.
actual_translation: The larger of the two shattered at Christmas 1673.

translation_text: The newly built clock then sounded for the first time in 1692, but had to be delivered later in the Second World War in 1942.
german_text: Die neu angeschaffte Glocke ertönte dann erstmals 1692, musste aber später im Zweiten Weltkrieg im Jahr 1942 abgegeben werden.
actual_translation: The newly acquired bell then first chimed in 1692, but had to later be surrendered in the Second World War, in 1942.

translation_text: During the Thirty-Year War (1616–1648) the windows were stolen and the clocks were stolen.
german_text: Im 30-jährigen Krieg (1616 bis 1648) wurden die Fensterscheiben eingeschlagen und die Glockenseile gestohlen.
actual_translation: During the 30 Years War (1616 to 1648) the window panes were smashed in and the bell ropes stolen.

translation_text: The roof was untouched.
german_text: Das Dach war undicht.
actual_translation: The roof was leaky.

translation_text: In 1796, French troops stood near the church.
german_text: 1796 lagerten französische Truppen in der Nähe der Kirche.
actual_translation: In 1796, French troops made camp in the vicinity of the church.

translation_text: They broke out the channels and church chairs and used them as firewood.
german_text: Sie brachen die Kanzel und Kirchenstühle heraus und benutzten sie als Brennholz.
actual_translation: They brought out the pulpit and the pews and used them as firewood.

translation_text: The remains of the church threatened to collapse in 1809.
german_text: Überreste der Kirche drohten 1809 einzustürzen.
actual_translation: The remains of the church threatened to collapse in 1809.

translation_text: Until 1869, the Tumlinger Hilarius cemetery also served as the last residence for the dead from hearing whiles.
german_text: Bis 1869 diente der Tumlinger Hilarius-Friedhof auch als letzte Ruhestätte für die Toten aus Hörschweiler.
actual_translation: Up until 1869, the Hilarius cemetery in Tumlingen served as the last place of rest for Hörschweiler's dead.

translation_text: In 1823 the cemetery was extended and the Hilariuskirche was destroyed.
german_text: 1823 wurde der Friedhof erweitert und die Hilariuskirche abgebrochen.
actual_translation: In 1823, the cemetery was expanded and the Hilarius church was demolished.

translation_text: Only the church tower was left.
german_text: Lediglich den Kirchturm ließ man stehen.
actual_translation: Only the church tower was left standing.

translation_text: In the New Year's Eve of 1834, a storm broke down the church tower and half collapsed.
german_text: In der Neujahrsnacht 1834 spaltete ein Sturm den Kirchturm und die Hälfte stürzte ein.
actual_translation: On new year's eve of 1834, a storm cleaved the church tower and half of it collapsed.

translation_text: To prevent a disaster, the tower was broken down.
german_text: Um ein Unglück zu verhindern, wurde der Turm abgebrochen.
actual_translation: In order to prevent an accident, the tower was pulled down.

translation_text: Only the tower, which still exists today, remained witness to the 750-year history of the church.
german_text: Nur der heute noch vorhandene Turmzwerg blieb als Zeuge der 750 Jahre alten Kirchengeschichte erhalten.
actual_translation: Only the dwarf tower that is still present today survived as witness of the church's 750-year-old history.

translation_text: Today, Horst Kallenberger and Rolf-Dieter Wasem take care of the Hilarius plant as the successor of Dieter Dockhorn.
german_text: Heute pflegen Horst Kallenberger und Rolf-Dieter Wasem von den "Schaffigen Rentnern" als Nachfolger von Dieter Dockhorn die Hilarius-Anlage.
actual_translation: Today Horst Kallenberger and Rolf-Dieter Wasem from the "Industrious Pensioners" care for the Hilarius site, as successors of Dieter Dockhorn.

translation_text: As organizers, the friends and sponsors of Tumlingens invite on Sunday, July 16, for the sixth Serenade on the Old Cemetery to the St. Hilariuskapelle.
german_text: Als Veranstalter laden die Freunde und Förderer Tumlingens am Sonntag, 16. Juli, zur sechsten Serenade auf den alten Friedhof zur St. Hilariuskapelle ein.
actual_translation: As event organiser, the Friends and Supporters of Tumlingen are issuing invitations to the sixth serenade in the old cemetery to St. Hilarius Chapel, on Sunday 16th July.

translation_text: This is designed by the Combo of the Kepler Gymnasium Freudenstadt and with words by Kurt Kübler and Reinhold Matteis.
german_text: Gestaltet wird diese von der Combo des Kepler-Gymnasiums Freudenstadt und mit Wortbeiträgen von Kurt Kübler und Reinhold Matteis.
actual_translation: It is being arranged by the Kepler Gymnasium, Freudenstadt, combo, with speeches from Kurt Kübler and Reinhold Matteis.

translation_text: Chairman of the Board of Directors Hartmut Romann says the final word.
german_text: Ortsvorsteher Hartmut Romann spricht das Schlusswort.
actual_translation: Municipal administrator Hartmut Romann gave the closing words.

translation_text: The program begins at 16.30.
german_text: Das Programm beginnt um 16.30 Uhr.
actual_translation: The programme starts at 4.30pm.

translation_text: Entry is from 15.30.
german_text: Einlass ist ab 15.30 Uhr.
actual_translation: Last admission is at 3.30pm.

translation_text: At the outskirts of the Serenade, a rally takes place in front of the cemetery.
german_text: Zum Ausklang der Serenade findet ein Umtrunk vor dem Friedhof statt.
actual_translation: The serenade will be rounded off with drinks in front of the cemetery.

translation_text: "Enjoy a summer night under the shadow of old trees and with the wide view of the wines to the forest," the organizers show the fantastic views.
german_text: "Genießen Sie einen Sommerabend unter dem Schatten alter Bäume und mit dem weiten Blick über Wiesen hin zum Wald", stellen die Veranstalter die fantastische Aussicht heraus.
actual_translation: "Enjoy a summer's evening under the shadows of old trees and with a wide view over the meadows right up to forest," invite the organisers, emphasising the fantastic view.

translation_text: The Serenade takes place only in dry weather.
german_text: Die Serenade findet nur bei trockenem Wetter statt.
actual_translation: The serenade will only take place in the case of dry weather.

translation_text: The organizers hope for many supporters to preserve the historic St. Hilarius facility, which is important for tumlingen and hearing whales.
german_text: Die Veranstalter hoffen auf viele Unterstützer zum Erhalt der historischen St. Hilarius-Anlage, die für Tumlingen und Hörschweiler von Bedeutung ist.
actual_translation: The organisers are hoping for many backers in favour of preserving the historic St. Hilarius site, which is important to Tumlingen and to Hörschweiler.

translation_text: The friends and sponsors of Tumlingens feel especially committed to home care, as Serenade organizer Walter Martini confirms.
german_text: Die Freunde und Förderer Tumlingens fühlen sich der Heimatpflege besonders verpflichtet, wie Serenade-Organisator Walter Martini bekräftigt.
actual_translation: The Friends and Supporters of Tumlingen feel especially bound to take care of their local region, as serenade organiser Walter Martini reinforced.

translation_text: The Association wants to check the approval of wind roads
german_text: Verein will Genehmigung von Windrädern prüfen lassen
actual_translation: Association wants to have wind turbine approval examined

translation_text: "Boisheim defends itself" does not see a legal prerequisite for the construction and has therefore addressed the council.
german_text: "Boisheim wehrt sich" sieht keine rechtliche Voraussetzung für den Bau und hat sich daher an den Landrat gewandt.
actual_translation: "Boisheim wehrt sich", sees no legal basis for the construction and has therefore turned to the District Administrator.

translation_text: The association "Boisheim defends" has called on Landrat Andreas Coenen (CDU) to withdraw its permission for the construction of planned wind power plants in the Boisheimer Nette.
german_text: Der Verein "Boisheim wehrt sich" hat Landrat Andreas Coenen (CDU) aufgefordert, seine Genehmigung für die Errichtung von geplanten Windkraftanlagen in der Boisheimer Nette zurückzunehmen.
actual_translation: The association "Boisheim wehrt sich" has called on District Administrator Andreas Coenen (CDU) to retract his approval for the construction of planned wind turbines in Boisheimer Nette.

translation_text: It is unlawful.
german_text: Sie sei rechtswidrig erfolgt.
actual_translation: They say it was unlawful.

translation_text: The association argues that at the time of approval on 30 December 2016 in Boisheimer Nette no wind power plants could have been approved, since at the time in Viersen only at the city border to Schwalmtal a wind power concentration zone existed.
german_text: Der Verein argumentiert, dass zum Zeitpunkt der Genehmigung am 30. Dezember 2016 in der Boisheimer Nette gar keine Windkraftanlagen hätten genehmigt werden können, da zu dem Zeitpunkt in Viersen lediglich an der Stadtgrenze zu Schwalmtal eine Windkraft-Konzentrationszone existiert habe.
actual_translation: The association argues that at the time the approval was given on 30th December 2016, no wind turbines could have been approved in Bosheimer Nette, since at that time only one wind energy concentration zone existed in Viersen, on the city boundary with Schwalmtal.

translation_text: Within this concentration zone, the construction and operation of wind power plants is essentially possible, but at the same time the concentration zone causes an exclusion of wind energy use for the rest of the city area.
german_text: Innerhalb dieser Konzentrationszone sind Bau und Betrieb von Windenergieanlagen grundsätzlich möglich, zugleich bewirkt die Konzentrationszone aber einen Ausschluss der Windenergienutzung für das übrige Stadtgebiet.
actual_translation: Construction and operation of wind energy plants are in principle possible within this concentration zone, but at the same time, the concentration zone has an exclusion against the use of wind energy for the rest of the city area.

translation_text: Such areas are intended to prevent a “saving” of the landscape.
german_text: Derlei Zonen sollen eine "Verspargelung" der Landschaft verhindern.
actual_translation: Such zones are said to prevent "asparagusisation" of the landscape.

translation_text: The city of Viersen had decreed a second wind power concentration zone in the Boisheimer Nette a few days ago by a change in the surface use plan, but the district government had not approved it due to a form fault.
german_text: Die Stadt Viersen hatte zwar wenige Tage zuvor durch eine Änderung des Flächennutzungsplans eine zweite Windkraftkonzentrationszone in der Boisheimer Nette beschlossen - die aber hatte die Bezirksregierung Düsseldorf nicht genehmigt, wegen eines Formfehlers.
actual_translation: The city of Viersen had in fact passed a resolution for a second wind energy concentration zone in Boisheimer Nette a few days earlier, through an amendment to the local land-use plan – but the Düsseldorf regional government had not approved it due to a formal error.

translation_text: “Because of the lack of planning legal condition, the granted approval order is still unlawful and therefore also to be withdrawn,” said Christoph Erkens, chairman of “Boisheim defends.”
german_text: "Durch die fehlende planungsrechtliche Voraussetzung ist der erteilte Genehmigungsbescheid nach wie vor rechtswidrig und deswegen auch zurückzunehmen", sagte Christoph Erkens, Vorsitzender von "Boisheim wehrt sich".
actual_translation: "Due to the lack of legal planning requirements, the approval decision that was issued is still unlawful, and should therefore be retracted as well," said Christoph Erkens, chairman of "Boisheim wehrt sich".

translation_text: Current state of the things: the City Council has again decided the wind concentration zone in the Boisheimer Nette before the summer break; an approval from the district government is still out.
german_text: Aktueller Stand der Dinge: Der Stadtrat hat vor der Sommerpause erneut die Windkonzentrationszone in der Boisheimer Nette beschlossen; eine Genehmigung der Bezirksregierung steht noch aus.
actual_translation: The current state of affairs: the city council once again passed a resolution for the wind concentration zone in Boisheimer Nette before the summer break; approval from the regional government is still pending.

translation_text: Recognition: "Therefore, at this point, the granting of an authorisation for the construction of wind energy installations is planned by law excluded."
german_text: Erkens: "Damit ist an dieser Stelle die Erteilung einer Genehmigung für die Errichtung von Windenergieanlagen planungsrechtlich ausgeschlossen".
actual_translation: Erkens: "Grant of approval for the construction of wind turbines on this site is therefore precluded by planning law."

translation_text: The Circle confirms the receipt of the invitation.
german_text: Der Kreis bestätigt den Eingang der Aufforderung.
actual_translation: The district confirms receipt of the call for action.

translation_text: "The corresponding letters have been received from the Viersen Circle since last week," a spokesman said.
german_text: "Die entsprechenden Schreiben sind seit vergangener Woche beim Kreis Viersen eingegangen", erklärte ein Sprecher.
actual_translation: "The relevant correspondence was received by the district of Viersen in the last week," declared a spokesperson.

translation_text: The circle takes them the opportunity to review the matter again.
german_text: Der Kreis nimmt sie zum Anlass, die Angelegenheit erneut zu prüfen.
actual_translation: The district is taking it as a reason to investigate the matter afresh.

translation_text: However, they are not expected to cause the procedure to be stopped.
german_text: Sie führen aber voraussichtlich nicht dazu, dass das Verfahren gestoppt wird.
actual_translation: However, it is not expected to lead to a stop in proceedings.

translation_text: In view of the ongoing proceedings at the Administrative Court, the district on Thursday did not want to comment on the argument of the association "Boisheim defends itself".
german_text: Mit Blick auf laufende Verfahren beim Verwaltungsgericht wollte sich der Kreis am Donnerstag nicht inhaltlich zu der Argumentation des Vereins "Boisheim wehrt sich" äußern.
actual_translation: With a view to the proceedings underway at the administrative court, the district did not want to comment on Thursday on the content of the arguments put forward by the association "Boisheim wehrt sich".

translation_text: NEW Re, a subsidiary of NEW, plans to build four wind wheels each 200 meters high on an area at the Boisheimer Nette.
german_text: Die NEW Re, eine Tochtergesellschaft der NEW, plant auf einer Fläche an der Boisheimer Nette den Bau von vier je 200 Meter hohen Windrädern.
actual_translation: NEW Re, a subsidiary of NEW, is planning construction of four wind turbines, each 200 metres high, on a plot by Bosheimer Nette.

translation_text: Already last year, the company, in which the city of Viersen is indirectly involved, had signed package contracts with the owner of the area of approximately 65 hectares.
german_text: Bereits im vergangenen Jahr hatte das Unternehmen, an dem die Stadt Viersen mittelbar beteiligt ist, Pachtverträge mit dem Eigentümer des etwa 65 Hektar großen Geländes geschlossen.
actual_translation: The company, in which the city of Viersen holds indirect participating interests, had concluded lease agreements with the owner of the roughly 65-hectare site last year already.

translation_text: With the establishment of the four wind power plants it is intended to be able to cover the electricity needs of around 11 400 households, which is approximately one-fifth of all four households’ electricity supply.
german_text: Mit Errichtung der vier Windenergieanlagen soll der Strombedarf von rund 11 400 Haushalten gedeckt werden können - das entspricht rund einem Fünftel des Strombedarfs aller Viersener Haushalte.
actual_translation: The construction of the four wind turbines should cover the energy requirements of around 11,400 households – that equates to around a fifth of the energy requirements of all Viersen households.

translation_text: New Re wants to invest about 20 million euros.
german_text: Die NEW Re will rund 20 Millionen Euro investieren.
actual_translation: NEW Re wants to invest around 20 million euros.

translation_text: Last summer, Viersens City Council gave green light for the purchase of three wind power plants in the Linnich Windpark near Aachen as well as a participation in a wind power plant in Übach-Palenberg in the Heinsberg district.
german_text: Im vergangenen Sommer gab Viersens Stadtrat grünes Licht für den Kauf von drei Windkraftanlagen im Windpark Linnich bei Aachen sowie einer Beteiligung an einer Windenergieanlage in Übach-Palenberg im Kreis Heinsberg.
actual_translation: Last summer, Viersen city council gave the green light for the purchase of three wind turbines in the Linnich wind park near Aachen, as well as a share in a wind energy plant in Übachpalenberg in the district of Heinsberg.

translation_text: Car and tractor collapse: a woman dies in a terrible accident
german_text: Auto und Traktor krachen zusammen: Frau stirbt bei schrecklichem Unfall
actual_translation: Car and tractor crash together: woman dies in terrible accident

translation_text: A terrible traffic accident occurred on Friday afternoon at 10 p.m. on the L 333 between Niederwallmenach and Bogel (Rhein-Lahn-Kreis).
german_text: Eins schrecklicher Verkehrsunfall hat sich am Freitagvormittag gegen 10 Uhr auf der L 333 zwischen Niederwallmenach und Bogel (Rhein-Lahn-Kreis) ereignet.
actual_translation: A terrible accident occurred on Friday morning at around 10am on the L 333 between Niederwallmenach and Bogel (Rhein-Lahn district).

translation_text: One woman was deadly injured.
german_text: Eine Frau wurde dabei tödlich verletzt.
actual_translation: In it, a woman was fatally injured.

translation_text: Two more people were slightly injured.
german_text: Zwei weitere Personen wurden leicht verletzt.
actual_translation: Two other people were mildly injured.

translation_text: The road was closed for hours.
german_text: Die Landesstraße blieb über Stunden gesperrt.
actual_translation: The road remained closed for hours.

translation_text: According to the police, a 17-year-old woman from Bornich was driving the L 333 in the direction of Bogel with her 53-year-old mother.
german_text: Nach Polizeiangaben befuhr eine 17-jährige junge Frau aus Bornich mit ihrem Pkw im Rahmen des begleiteten Fahrens mit ihrer 53-jährigen Mutter als Begleitperson die L 333 in Richtung Bogel.
actual_translation: According to police information, a 17-year-old woman from Bornich, practising accompanied driving in her car with her 53-year old mother, the accompanying driver, was using the L 333 in the direction of Bogel.

translation_text: City and dealers plan "home-shops" weekend
german_text: Stadt und Händler planen "Heimat-Shoppen"-Wochenende
actual_translation: Town and dealers plan "hometown shopping" weekend

translation_text: Bad Langensalzaer and people from the region will discover the shopping opportunities in the centre of the city in September.
german_text: Bad Langensalzaer und Menschen aus der Region sollen im September die Einkaufsmöglichkeiten in der Innenstadt neu entdecken.
actual_translation: Bad Langensalzaer and people from the region are to newly discover the shopping opportunities in their town centre in September.

translation_text: The trade union and the city administration will use the weekend on 8 and 9 September to attract the inhabitants to the shopping bump in the city centre.
german_text: Der Gewerbeverein und die Stadtverwaltung wollen das Wochenende am 8. und 9. September nutzen, um die Einwohner zum Einkaufsbummel in die Innenstadt zu locken.
actual_translation: The trade association and town authorities want to use the weekend of the 8th and 9th September to entice residents to a shopping spree in the town centre.

translation_text: As the chairman of the trade union, Christian König, announced, the “home-shops” weekend is intended to raise customers awareness of what offers the city offers away from the usual supermarket goods.
german_text: Wie der Vorsitzende des Gewerbevereins, Christian König, ankündigte, soll das "Heimat-Shoppen"-Wochenende die Kunden dafür sensibilisieren, welche Angebote die eigene Stadt abseits der üblichen Supermarkt-Ware bereithält.
actual_translation: As chairman of the trade association Christian König announced, the "home-town shopping" weekend is meant to make customers aware of what offers their own town has available aside from the usual supermarket goods.

translation_text: Therefore, a market with regional suppliers is planned, similar to the weekly market.
german_text: Geplant ist demnach ein Markt mit regionalen Anbietern, ähnlich dem Wochenmarkt.
actual_translation: A market with local suppliers is thus planned, similar to the weekly market.

translation_text: In addition, local companies will present themselves with their training places.
german_text: Zudem sollen sich heimische Firmen mit ihren Ausbildungsplätzen präsentieren.
actual_translation: In addition, homegrown companies are to give showcases, with their apprenticeship places.

translation_text: In addition, the shops in the centre of the city are to invite to the “Midnight Shop”.
german_text: Darüber hinaus sollen die Geschäfte der Innenstadt zum "Mitternachts-Shoppen" einladen.
actual_translation: Furthermore, the businesses in the town centre are to invite people to come "midnight shopping".

translation_text: The action is not only aimed at the residents of the city and the nearby region.
german_text: Dabei ziele die Aktion nicht nur auf Bewohner der Stadt und der näheren Region.
actual_translation: The campaign is not only for residents of the town and the nearby region.

translation_text: In preparation are advertising spots on the radio, an internet video and printed pockets that point to the action weekend, according to Christian King.
german_text: In Vorbereitung seien Werbespots im Radio, ein Internet-Video und bedruckte Beutel, die auf das Aktions-Wochenende hinweisen, so Christian König.
actual_translation: Adverts on the radio, an online video and printed bags that allude to the campaign weekend are in preparation, Christian König tells us.

translation_text: The City Administration and the Trade Association cooperate with the Chamber of Industry and Commerce.
german_text: Stadtverwaltung und Gewerbeverein kooperieren dabei mit der Industrie- und Handelskammer.
actual_translation: Town authorities and the trade association are cooperating with the Chamber of Industry and Commerce.

translation_text: Thus, the trade union and the city go into a further stage of the project "Attractive Centre".
german_text: Damit gehen der Gewerbeverein und die Stadt in eine weitere Etappe des Projekts "Attraktive Innenstadt".
actual_translation: The trade association and the town are thus entering a further stage of the "attractive town centre" project.

translation_text: These include new offers such as the first "Active Day" for the Fountain Festival as well as the sale-soft Sunday, conversations with all business operators and hosts to move them to active participation.
german_text: Dazu gehören neue Angebote wie der erste "Aktiv-Tag" zum Brunnenfest samt verkaufsoffenem Sonntag, Gespräche mit allen Gewerbetreibenden und Wirten, um sie zur aktiven Teilnahme zu bewegen.
actual_translation: To this belong new offerings such as the first "active day" for the fountain festival along with Sunday trading, talks with all the traders and proprietors to induce people to actively participate.

translation_text: Also attractive offers for Saturday and the dismissal of parking fees on that day are part of the concept.
german_text: Auch attraktive Angebote zum Samstag und der Verzicht auf Parkgebühren an diesem Tag sind Teil des Konzepts.
actual_translation: Attractive offers on the Saturday and waiving of parking fees on this day are also part of the concept.

translation_text: Customer potential needs to be reopened or reopened.
german_text: Zudem sollen Kundenpotenziale neu oder wieder erschlossen werden.
actual_translation: In addition, new and existing customer bases can be developed.

translation_text: This includes tourists and tourists.
german_text: Dazu gehören Kurgäste und Touristen.
actual_translation: This includes spa guests and tourists.

translation_text: But many inhabitants had also lost sight of the centre of the city when shopping.
german_text: Aber auch viele Einheimische hätten die Innenstadt beim Einkaufen aus dem Blick verloren.
actual_translation: But many locals too had lost sight of the town centre for shopping.

translation_text: At the end, everyone had to contribute to the center of the city - up to rents, the enterprises of the whole city and associations.
german_text: Am Ende müssten alle dazu beitragen, die Innenstadt zu beleben - bis hin zu Vermietern, den Betrieben der ganzen Stadt und Vereinen.
actual_translation: Ultimately, it all has to contribute to breathing life into the town centre – right up to landlords, businesses across the whole town and associations.

translation_text: It was worth overcoming the lethargy with a network, which has spread in part, King had said in the spring.
german_text: Es gelte, mit einem Netzwerk die Lethargie zu überwinden, die sich teils breitgemacht habe, hatte König im Frühjahr gesagt.
actual_translation: We have to overcome the lethargy with a network that has partly built up, König had said in the spring.

translation_text: Birgit Streich, head of the IHK Center in Mühlhausen, said that five Thüringer cities will participate for the first time in the country’s third “Home-Shoppen” day.
german_text: Birgit Streich, Leiterin des IHK-Centers in Mühlhausen teilte mit, dass sich am bundesweit dritte "Heimat-Shoppen"-Tag, erstmals fünf Thüringer Städte beteiligen.
actual_translation: Brigit Streich, head of the Chamber of Industry and Commerce centre in Mühlhausen communicated that five Thüringen towns are taking part in the nation's third "hometown shopping" day.

translation_text: In addition to Bad Langensalza, these are Weimar, Sömmerda, Saint Town and Bleicherode.
german_text: Neben Bad Langensalza sind dies Weimar, Sömmerda, Heiligenstadt und Bleicherode.
actual_translation: Alongside Bad Lagensalza, these are Weimar, Sömmerda, Heiligenstadt and Bleicherode.

translation_text: The day should “reclame for the appreciation of local trade and stronger expose its importance for the general well-being of our cities,” Streich said.
german_text: Der Tag solle "für die Wertschätzung des lokalen Handels werben und seine Bedeutung für das Gemeinwohl unserer Städte stärker herausstellen", so Streich.
actual_translation: The day is intended to "promote appreciation for local trade and emphasise more strongly its importance for the common good of our towns," said Streich.

translation_text: The action under the leadership of the IHK and with many partners also makes it clear that each citizen with his purchasing behavior can influence his own direct environment.
german_text: Die Aktion unter Federführung der IHK und mit vielen Partnern mache auch deutlich, dass jeder Bürger mit seinem Kaufverhalten sein direktes Umfeld selbst beeinflussen könne.
actual_translation: The campaign, under the leadership of the Chamber for Industry and Commerce and with many partners, also brings home that all citizens can themselves influence their immediate environment with their shopping behaviour.

translation_text: Two dead and several injured after explosion at a US school
german_text: Zwei Tote und mehrere Verletzte nach Explosion an US-Schule
actual_translation: Two dead and several injured after explosion in US school

translation_text: During construction work, a gas explosion occurred in the school building.
german_text: Während Bauarbeiten kam es zu einer Gasexplosion im Schulgebäude.
actual_translation: During construction works, there was a huge gas explosion in the school building.

translation_text: Other people were injured.
german_text: Neuen weitere Menschen wurden verletzt.
actual_translation: Another nine people were wounded.

translation_text: A gas explosion in the U.S. city of Minneapolis killed two people and injured nine others, some of them seriously.
german_text: Bei einer Gasexplosion in der US-Stadt Minneapolis sind zwei Menschen getötet und neun weitere verletzt worden, einige von ihnen schwer.
actual_translation: At a gas explosion in the US city of Minneapolis, two people have died and nine others have been injured, some of which seriously.

translation_text: According to the firefighters, one injured was in critical condition on Wednesday.
german_text: Nach Angaben der Feuerwehr war am Mittwoch (Ortszeit) noch ein Verletzter in kritischem Zustand.
actual_translation: According to information from the fire department, one injured person was still in a critical condition on Wednesday (local time).

translation_text: One man died when a part of a school building collapsed in the explosion.
german_text: Ein Mensch starb, als ein Teil eines Schulgebäudes bei der Explosion einstürzte.
actual_translation: One person died as a part of the school building collapsed during the explosion.

translation_text: The first missing man was also saved later.
german_text: Ein zunächst Vermisster wurde später ebenfalls tot geborgen.
actual_translation: Someone initially classed as missing was later also recovered dead.

translation_text: The dead were school employees.
german_text: Bei den Toten handelte es sich um Angestellte der Schule.
actual_translation: The dead were employees at the school.

translation_text: As the cause of the accident, the authorities suspected working on a gas pipeline.
german_text: Als Unglücksursache vermuteten die Behörden Arbeiten an einer Gasleitung.
actual_translation: Authorities suspected works on a gas pipe to be the cause of the accident.

translation_text: During the holiday time, few people stayed in the building of the Minnehaha Academy.
german_text: Zur Ferienzeit hielten sich nur wenige Menschen in dem Gebäude der Minnehaha Academy auf.
actual_translation: Being holiday time, only a few people were in the Minnehaha Academy building.

translation_text: Trump put Mexico under pressure after transcripted telephone calls due to paying border walls
german_text: Trump setzte nach durchgesickerten Transkripten von Telefonanrufen Mexiko unter Druck wegen der Zahlung der Grenzmauer
actual_translation: Trump pressured Mexico on border wall payment according to leaked phone call transcripts

translation_text: Transcripts of telephone calls between U.S. President Donald Trump and Mexican and Australian leaders were published by the Washington Post.
german_text: Transkripte von Telefonanrufen zwischen US-Präsident Donald Trump und Führern von Mexiko und Australien wurden von der Washington Post veröffentlicht.
actual_translation: Transcripts of phone calls between US President Donald Trump and leaders of Mexico and Australia have been leaked by the Washington Post.

translation_text: On January 27, Trump called for in a phone call with Mexican President Enrique Pena Nieto to stop saying publicly that he would not pay for a planned border wall.
german_text: Am 27. Januar forderte Trump in einem Telefonat mit dem mexikanischen Präsidenten Enrique Pena Nieto auf, aufzuhören, öffentlich zu sagen, dass er für eine geplante Grenzmauer nicht bezahlen würde.
actual_translation: On 27th January in a phone call to Mexican president, Enrique Pena Nieto, Trump urged him to stop publicly saying he would not pay for a proposed border wall.

translation_text: The U.S. President shameed him because he had openly climbed the wall. according to reports, he said to him, "You can't tell the press."
german_text: Der US-Präsident beschimpfte ihn, weil er die Mauer öffentlich angeprangert hatte. Berichten zufolge sagte er zu ihm: "Das können Sie der Presse nicht sagen."
actual_translation: The US President berated him for publicly denouncing the wall, reportedly saying to him "You cannot say that to the press."

translation_text: Trump started his presidential campaign with the promise to build a wall on the southern border of the United States, and promised to let Mexico pay for the project.
german_text: Trump startete seine Präsidentschaftskampagne mit dem Versprechen, an der südlichen Grenze der USA eine Mauer zu errichten, und schwor, Mexiko für das Projekt zahlen zu lassen.
actual_translation: Trump launched his presidential campaign on a promise to build a wall along the US southern border and vowed to make Mexico pay for the project.

translation_text: Transcripts of his first call with Australian Prime Minister Malcolm Turnbull were also published and revealed a stressful exchange.
german_text: Transkripte seines ersten Anrufs mit dem australischen Premierminister Malcolm Turnbull wurden ebenfalls veröffentlicht und enthüllten einen angespannten Austausch.
actual_translation: Transcripts of his first call with Australian Prime Minister Malcolm Turnbull were also published revealing a tense exchange.

translation_text: Mr. Trump said Mr. Turnbull that a trade for the U.S. refugees who emigrated to Australia is "smiling", "mys" and "dumb" and that the existence on the trade that was communicated by the Obama government would make him look like a "Depp" after he had proposed a ban on the displacement of refugees to the U.S.
german_text: Mr. Trump sagte Mr. Turnbull, dass ein Handel für die USA Flüchtlinge, die nach Australien auswanderten, zu übernehmen "lächerlich", "mies" und "dumm" sei und dass das Bestehen auf dem Handel, der von der Regierung Obama vermittelt wurde, ihn wie ein "Depp" aussehen lassen würde, nachdem er ein Verbot der Umsiedlung von Flüchtlingen in die USA vorgeschlagen hatte.
actual_translation: Mr Trump told Mr Turnbull a deal for the US to take on refugees headed for Australia was "ridiculous," "rotten" and "stupid," insisting the deal, brokered under the Obama administration, would make him look like "a dope" after he had proposed a ban on refugee resettlement in the US.

translation_text: Mr. Trump ended the call after he said Mr. Turnbull, “this is the most unpleasant call for the whole day.”
german_text: Mr. Trump beendete den Anruf, nachdem er Herrn Turnbull gesagt hatte, "das ist der unangenehmste Anruf für den ganzen Tag."
actual_translation: Mr Trump ended the call after telling Mr Turnbull "this is the most unpleasant call all day."

translation_text: Moore's Ford Massacre: Activists Reveal Racist Lynchact as a Call for Justice
german_text: Moores Ford-Massaker: Aktivisten führen rassistischen Lynchakt als Aufruf für Gerechtigkeit wieder auf
actual_translation: Moore's Ford Massacre: Activists Reenact Racist Lynching as a Call for Justice

translation_text: A 1948 Ford Mercury drove through a group of spectators in the rural Monroe, Georgia, and runs to the Ford Bridge of Moore.
german_text: Ein 1948-er Ford Mercury fuhr durch eine Gruppe von Zuschauern im ländlichen Monroe, Georgia, und rumpelte auf die Ford-Brücke von Moore zu.
actual_translation: A 1948 Ford Mercury passed through a group of onlookers in rural Monroe, Georgia, and rumbled toward the small Moore's Ford Bridge.

translation_text: Before the car, which had four black passengers and a white driver, could reach the bridge, a group of white men with weapons came out to block his way.
german_text: Bevor das Auto, das vier schwarze Passagiere und einen weißen Fahrer hatte, die Brücke erreichen konnte, trat eine Gruppe weißer Männer mit Gewehren hervor, um seinen Weg zu blockieren.
actual_translation: Before the car, which had four black passengers and a white driver, could reach the bridge, a group of white men with guns stepped forward to block its path.

translation_text: The Mobs leader - a middle-age man in a needle strip bag - took a long train on his cigarette and looked inspired through the windshield.
german_text: Der Anführer des Mobs - ein Mann mittleren Alters in einem Nadelstreifenanzug - nahm einen langen Zug an seiner Zigarre und blickte prüfend durch die Windschutzscheibe.
actual_translation: The leader of the mob - a middle aged man in a pinstriped suit - took a long drag on his cigar and peered through the windshield.

translation_text: Inside the inhabitants were scared.
german_text: Drinnen schwebten die Insassen in Furcht.
actual_translation: Inside, the occupants reeled in fear.

translation_text: “We want this n ---- r Roger!” the man cried.
german_text: "Wir wollen diesen n ---- r Roger!" brüllte der Mann.
actual_translation: "We want that n----r Roger!" the man barked.

translation_text: “Take him out of the car!”
german_text: "Hol ihn aus dem Auto!"
actual_translation: "Get him out of the car!"

translation_text: Crying broke the silence when a young black man was thrown out of the passenger seat.
german_text: Schreie zerrissen die Stille, als ein junger schwarzer Mann vom Beifahrersitz gezerrt wurde.
actual_translation: Screams ripped through the silence as a young black man was dragged from the front passenger seat.

translation_text: Fortunately, this terrible scene, which was played on 22 July, is just a replay.
german_text: Zum Glück ist diese schreckliche Szene, die am 22. Juli gespielt wurde, nur eine Nachstellung.
actual_translation: Fortunately, this horrific scene, which played out on July 22, is just a reenactment.

translation_text: But then, when a slice is thrown around the neck by "Roger", almost everyone in the audience is throwing out very real seafarers.
german_text: Aber wenn dann eine Schlinge um den Hals von "Roger" geworfen wird, stießen fast alle im Publikum sehr echte Seufzer aus.
actual_translation: But when a noose is thrown around the neck of "Roger," nearly everyone in the audience let out very real gasps.

translation_text: Since 2005, civil lawmakers have returned to Moore's Ford Bridge to take the night in which two black pairs - Roger and Dorothy Malcom and George and Mae Murray Dorsey - were coined by the Ku Klux Klan in 1946.
german_text: Seit 2005 kommen Bürgerrechtler zur Moore's Ford Bridge zurück, um die Nacht nachzuahmen, in der zwei schwarze Paare - Roger und Dorothy Malcom sowie George und Mae Murray Dorsey - vom Ku Klux Klan im Jahr 1946 gelyncht wurden.
actual_translation: Since 2005, civil rights activists have returned to the Moore's Ford Bridge to recreate the night two black couples - Roger and Dorothy Malcom, and George and Mae Murray Dorsey - were lynched by the Ku Klux Klan in 1946.

translation_text: No one has ever been charged with the murder.
german_text: Niemand wurde jemals wegen der Morde angeklagt.
actual_translation: No one has ever been charged with the murders.

translation_text: "It's really unimaginable that in all these years no one person has been arrested - although we see them in our communities, although we know who they are," said Tyrone Brooks, who helps in organizing the investigation.
german_text: "Es ist wirklich unfassbar, dass in all diesen Jahren keine einzige Person verhaftet wurde - obwohl wir sie in unseren Gemeinden sehen, obwohl wir wissen, wer sie sind", sagte Tyrone Brooks, der bei der Organisation der Nachstellung hilft.
actual_translation: "It's mind boggling that all of these years, not a single person has been arrested - even though we see them in our communities; even though we know who they are," said Tyrone Brooks, who helps organize the reenactment.

translation_text: “It’s a dirt on a story, but it’s a burden for our souls.”
german_text: "Es ist ein Schmutzfleck auf einer Geschichte, aber es ist eine Belastung für unsere Seelen."
actual_translation: "It's a stain on a history, but it's a burden on our souls."

translation_text: Brooks is a 71-year-old former Congressman of the State of Georgia and a lifetime civil lawmaker.
german_text: Brooks ist ein 71-jähriger ehemaliger Kongressabgeordneter des Staates Georgia und ein Leben lang Bürgerrechtler.
actual_translation: Brooks is a 71-year-old former Georgia state congressman and lifelong civil rights activist.

translation_text: For him, it serves as a dramatic call to action and represents an annual reminder to the Monroe community that an injustice has never been corrected.
german_text: Für ihn dient die Nachstellung als ein dramatischer Aufruf zum Handeln und stellt eine jährliche Erinnerung an die Monroe-Gemeinschaft dar, dass ein Unrecht nie korrigiert wurde.
