actual_translation: For him, the reenactment serves as a dramatic call to action and an annual reminder to the Monroe community that an injustice has never been corrected.

translation_text: “We want punishment, we want end, we want healing, we want reconciliation, but first we have to obtain justice,” he said.
german_text: "Wir wollen Strafverfolgung, wir wollen die Beendigung, wir wollen Heilung, wir wollen Versöhnung, aber zuerst müssen wir Gerechtigkeit erhalten", sagte er.
actual_translation: "We want prosecution, we want closure, we want healing, we want reconciliation, but we have to have justice first," he said.

translation_text: “We can’t get to healing and reconciliation until we get justice.”
german_text: "Wir können nicht zu Heilung und Versöhnung gelangen, bis wir Gerechtigkeit erhalten."
actual_translation: "We can't get to healing and reconciliation until we get justice."

translation_text: A court doctor puts a bedtake over the body of one of the victims of Moore-Ford Lynch on July 27, 1946.
german_text: Ein Gerichtsmediziner legt ein Betttuch über die Leiche eines der Opfer des Moore-Ford-Lynchens am 27. Juli 1946.
actual_translation: A coroner places a sheet over the body of one of the victims of the Moore's Ford lynching on July 27, 1946.

translation_text: According to the FBI documents received from the NBC News, more than 50 men from Monroe and the surrounding counties were suspected in the Lynch process.
german_text: Laut FBI-Akten, die von den NBC News erhalten wurden, wurden mehr als 50 Männer aus Monroe und den umliegenden Grafschaften in dem Lynchprozess verdächtigt.
actual_translation: According to FBI files obtained by NBC News, more than 50 men from Monroe and the surrounding counties were suspected in the lynching.

translation_text: No one has ever been accused.
german_text: Aber keiner wurde jemals angeklagt.
actual_translation: But not one was ever prosecuted.

translation_text: Although the suspects have remained on foot for decades, civil lawmakers say that the double motivation for Lynch actions has always been known throughout the city: politics and sex.
german_text: Obwohl die Verdächtigen seit Jahrzehnten auf freiem Fuß bleiben, sagen Bürgerrechtler, dass die doppelte Motivation für die Lynch-Aktionen in der ganzen Stadt immer bekannt war: Politik und Sex.
actual_translation: Though the suspects have remained at large for decades, civil rights activists say the twin motivations for the lynchings were always well known throughout town: politics and sex.

translation_text: In April 1946, a decision of the Supreme Court allowed the black citizens in Georgia to vote for the first time in the summer.
german_text: Im April 1946 ermöglichte eine Entscheidung des Obersten Gerichtshofs den schwarzen Bürgern in Georgia es zum ersten Mal, am Vorwahlkampf im Sommer ihre Stimme abzugeben.
actual_translation: In April 1946, a Supreme Court ruling enabled black citizens in Georgia to cast ballots for the first time during the primary race later that summer.

translation_text: Approximately at the same time as the election, according to the FBI, the black farmer Roger Malcom settled a white ground owner, Barnett Hester, during a battle - allegedly because of a woman.
german_text: Ungefähr zur gleichen Zeit wie die Wahl stach nach Angaben des FBI der schwarze Farmpächter Roger Malcom einen weißen Grundbesitzer, Barnett Hester, während eines Kampfes nieder - angeblich wegen einer Frau.
actual_translation: Around the same time of the election, according to the FBI, black sharecropper Roger Malcom stabbed Barnett Hester, a white landowner, during a fight - ostensibly over a woman.

translation_text: Brooks said the rumor in the city had been that the horse had been sleeping with Malcom's wife Dorothy and that the baby she was wearing did not come from her husband.
german_text: Brooks sagte, das Gerücht in der Stadt sei gewesen, dass Hester mit Malcoms Frau Dorothy geschlafen habe und dass das Baby, das sie trug, nicht von ihrem Mann stammte.
actual_translation: Brooks said the town rumor was that Hester had been sleeping with Malcom's wife, Dorothy, and that the baby she was carrying was not her husband's.

translation_text: On July 25, 1946, Loy Harrison, a prominent white land owner, paid $600 to release Malcom from prison, the FBI said.
german_text: Am 25. Juli 1946 zahlte Loy Harrison, ein prominenter weißer Landbesitzer, 600 Dollar, um Malcom aus dem Gefängnis zu befreien, so das FBI.
actual_translation: On July 25, 1946, Loy Harrison, a prominent white landowner, paid $600 to bail Malcom out of jail, according to the FBI.

translation_text: He was accompanied by Dorothy and her cousins Mae Murray and George Dorsey to prison.
german_text: Er wurde von Dorothy und ihren Cousins Mae Murray und George Dorsey zum Gefängnis begleitet.
actual_translation: He was accompanied to the prison by Dorothy, and their cousins, Mae Murray and George Dorsey.

translation_text: But when they then moved away from the prison and approached Moore's Ford Bridge, a Lynchmob surrounded the car.
german_text: Aber als sie sich dann vom Gefängnis entfernten und sich der Moore's Ford Bridge näherten, umringte ein Lynchmob das Auto.
actual_translation: But, driving away from the jail, as they approached Moore's Ford Bridge, a lynch mob surrounded the car.

translation_text: "As it turns out, it was Harrison who prepared and ordered the murder," a FBI report concludes.
german_text: "Wie es sich herausstellt, war es Harrison, der die Morde vorbereitet und angeordnet hat", schließt hieraus ein FBI-Bericht.
actual_translation: "As it turns out it was Harrison who set up and ordered the murders," one FBI report concludes.

translation_text: “It is also obvious that there was a complot between state and local prosecution, which was not only involved in the murders, removed evidence and hidden the identity of witnesses.”
german_text: "Es ist auch offensichtlich, dass es einen Komplott zwischen der staatlichen und lokalen Strafverfolgung gab, die nicht nur an den Morden beteiligt war, Beweise beseitigte und die Identität von Zeugen vertuscht hat".
actual_translation: "It is also apparent that there was a conspiracy among state and local law enforcement, who not only took part in the murders, disposed of evidence and concealed the identity of witnesses."

translation_text: Brooks formulates it even more clearly.
german_text: Brooks formuliert es noch prägnanter.
actual_translation: Brooks put it more succinctly.

translation_text: “It was a electoral law massacre,” he said.
german_text: "Es war ein Wahlrecht-Massaker", sagte er.
actual_translation: "It was a voting rights massacre," he said.

translation_text: They were all killed to send a message to black people in this community: "If you register and if you vote, it will happen to you here."
german_text: "Sie wurden alle getötet, um eine Nachricht an schwarze Menschen in dieser Gemeinschaft zu senden: "Wenn Sie sich registrieren lassen und wenn Sie abstimmen, dann wird Ihnen das hier passieren."
actual_translation: "They were all killed to send a message to black people in this community: 'If you register and if you vote, this is what will happen to you.'"

translation_text: For a decade, Cassandra Greene has led the annual follow-up of the Moore Ford Bridge Lynch murder.
german_text: Fast ein Jahrzehnt lang hat Cassandra Greene die jährliche Nachstellung der Moore Ford Bridge Lynch-Morde geleitet.
actual_translation: For nearly a decade, Cassandra Greene has directed the annual reenactment of the Moore's Ford Bridge lynchings.

translation_text: Their representation is clear, captivating and is based on a kind of deep racism that many want to believe that it no longer exists in America.
german_text: Ihre Darstellung ist anschaulich, ergreifend und ist in einer Art von tiefem Rassismus begründet, von dem viele glauben möchten, dass er in Amerika nicht mehr existiert.
actual_translation: Her performance is graphic, gripping and grounded in a kind of deep racism that many would like to believe no longer exists in America.

translation_text: It’s hard to see, and even harder to look away, but Greene said that’s the point.
german_text: Es ist schwer zuzuschauen, und noch schwieriger wegzuschauen, aber Greene sagte, dass das der Punkt ist.
actual_translation: It's difficult to watch, and even more difficult to look away, but Greene said that's the point.

translation_text: “We don’t want to talk about the linen, because then we’ll face its uglyness in all of us,” she said.
german_text: "Wir wollen nicht über das Lynchen reden, weil wir dann mit dessen Hässlichkeit in uns allen konfrontiert werden", sagte sie.
actual_translation: "We don't want to talk about the lynching because it makes us face the ugliness in all of us," she said.

translation_text: "But I can't build a relationship with you if you don't want to listen to me or don't want to hear what I've gone through."
german_text: "Aber ich kann keine Beziehung zu Ihnen aufbauen, wenn Sie mir nicht zuhören möchten oder nicht hören wollen, was ich durchgemacht habe".
actual_translation: "But I can't build a relationship with you, if you won't hear me, or hear what I've been through."

translation_text: The samples for this year's production began in June, and on the first day almost 30 actors - a dozen white and the rest black - went into one room and heard when Greene started a well-played overview of the piece.
german_text: Die Proben für die diesjährige Produktion begannen im Juni, und am ersten Tag drängten sich fast 30 Schauspieler - ein Dutzend Weiße und der Rest Schwarze - in einen Raum und lauschten, als Greene einen gut eingespielten Überblick über das Stück startete.
actual_translation: Rehearsals for this year's production began in June, and on the first day nearly 30 actors - a dozen white and the rest black - crowded into a room and listened as Greene launched into a well-rehearsed overview of the play.

translation_text: Wade Marbaugh is Green’s co-regisseur.
german_text: Wade Marbaugh ist hier Greenes Co-Regisseur.
actual_translation: Wade Marbaugh serves as Greene's co-director.

translation_text: He has been playing the role of the chief club member for years, but he said the role will never be easier.
german_text: Er hat seit Jahren die Rolle des Chef-Clanmitglieds gespielt, aber er sagte, die Rolle werde nie einfacher.
actual_translation: He's played the part of the head Klansman for years, but he said the role never gets any easier.

translation_text: “I feel dirty because I’m not so,” Marbaugh said.
german_text: "Ich fühle mich schmutzig, weil ich nicht so bin", sagte Marbaugh.
actual_translation: "I feel dirty because this is not who I am," said Marbaugh.

translation_text: “But I think it’s very important to keep this story alive because we don’t want to return to those times.”
german_text: "Aber ich denke, es ist sehr wichtig, diese Geschichte am Leben zu erhalten, weil wir nicht zu diesen Zeiten zurückkehren möchten."
actual_translation: "But I think it's very important to keep this history alive because we don't want to go back to those times."

translation_text: On the other side of the room, the actors Darrius Bradshaw and Nick Rascona, who play Roger Malcom and Barnett Hester, tried their lines.
german_text: Auf der anderen Seite des Raumes probten die Schauspieler Darrius Bradshaw und Nick Rascona, die Roger Malcom und Barnett Hester spielen, ihre Zeilen.
actual_translation: Across the room, actors Darrius Bradshaw and Nick Rascona, who play Roger Malcom and Barnett Hester, rehearsed their lines.

translation_text: The piece begins with Malcom, the horse screams and presses him, angry that he has slept with his wife Dorothy.
german_text: Das Stück beginnt mit Malcom, der Hester anschreit und ihn bedrängt, wütend, dass er mit seiner Frau Dorothy geschlafen hat.
actual_translation: The play begins with Malcom shouting and shoving Hester, livid that he's been sleeping with his wife, Dorothy.

translation_text: “I said, n --- he, disappear from my property!”
german_text: "Ich sagte, n --- er, verschwinde von meinem Eigentum!"
actual_translation: "I said n---a, get off my property!"

translation_text: Rascona responds to the fire.
german_text: Rascona erwidert das Feuer.
actual_translation: Rascona fires back.

translation_text: There is a break.
german_text: Es gibt eine Pause.
actual_translation: There's a beat.

translation_text: And then everyone (at least all black actors) is laughing out.
german_text: Und dann bricht jeder (zumindest alle schwarzen Schauspieler) in Gelächter aus.
actual_translation: And then everyone (at least all the black actors) bursts into laughter.

translation_text: Green laughs most loud.
german_text: Greene lacht am lautesten.
actual_translation: Greene laughs the hardest.

translation_text: “What?” asked Rascona.
german_text: "Was?!", fragte Rascona.
actual_translation: "What?!," Rascona asked.

translation_text: He is alarmed and confused.
german_text: Er ist alarmiert und verwirrt.
actual_translation: He's alarmed, confused.

translation_text: Was I too hard?
german_text: War ich zu hart?
actual_translation: Did I go too hard?

translation_text: “No,” said Greene, still silent.
german_text: "Nein", sagte Greene, immer noch kichernd.
actual_translation: "No," Greene said through chuckles.

translation_text: “I just don’t think that white people said ‘n—he’ at that time.”
german_text: "Ich glaube einfach nicht, dass weiße Leute damals 'n --- er' gesagt haben."
actual_translation: "I just don't think white people back then said 'n---a.'"

translation_text: “But,” laughed one of the other black actors.
german_text: "Doch", witzelte einer der anderen schwarzen Darsteller.
actual_translation: "Yea," one of the other black cast members quipped.

translation_text: “You just have to hit the hard ‘R.’”
german_text: "Du musst nur das harte 'R.' treffen."
actual_translation: "You have to hit the hard 'R.'"

translation_text: And that’s where the energy moves in the room, a feeling of friendship replaces the discomfort.
german_text: Und genau da verschiebt sich die Energie im Raum, ein Gefühl der Kameradschaft ersetzt das Unbehagen.
actual_translation: And just like that the energy in the room shifts; a sense of camaraderie replaces the discomfort.

translation_text: Everyone is busy getting this right, not only because of the game, but also because of the memory of the four killed people.
german_text: Jeder ist damit beschäftigt, dies richtig hinzubekommen, nicht nur wegen des Spiels, sondern auch wegen der Erinnerung an die vier getöteten Menschen.
actual_translation: Everyone is dedicated to getting this right, not only for the sake of the play, but also for the memory of the four people killed.

translation_text: The scene begins again.
german_text: Die Szene beginnt noch einmal.
actual_translation: The scene begins again.

translation_text: This time, when Rascona says the word N, he says it sharply and strongly.
german_text: Dieses Mal, wenn Rascona das N-Wort sagt, sagt er es scharf und mit Nachdruck.
actual_translation: This time, when Rascona says the N-word, it's sharp and emphatic.

translation_text: No one is laughing.
german_text: Absolut niemand lacht.
actual_translation: Absolutely no one laughs.

translation_text: This repeat ends violently and quickly.
german_text: Diese Wiederholung endet gewalttätig und schnell.
actual_translation: The reenactment ends violently and quickly.

translation_text: There are screams, shoots and then silence.
german_text: Es gibt Schreie, Schüsse und dann Stille.
actual_translation: There's screams, gunfire and then, silence.

translation_text: A woman dressed in a sad dress stands over the actress's body and carries out Billie Holidays' sad lobrede "Strange Fruit".
german_text: Eine Frau, mit einem Trauerkleid bekleidet, steht über den Leichen der Schauspieler und führt Billie Holidays trauernde Lobrede "Strange Fruit" aus.
actual_translation: A woman dressed in funeral black, stands over the actors bodies and performs Billie Holiday's mournful eulogy, "Strange Fruit."

translation_text: His voice breaks in every second word.
german_text: Ihre Stimme bricht bei jedem zweiten Wort.
actual_translation: Her voice breaks on every other word.

translation_text: About a hundred meters behind it, a group of about four dozen viewers sweat and tears out of their eyes.
german_text: Ungefähr hundert Meter dahinter wischt sich eine Gruppe von etwa vier Dutzend Zuschauern Schweiß und Tränen aus den Augen.
actual_translation: A hundred yards back, a group of about four dozen spectators wipe sweat and tears away from their eyes.

translation_text: The audience is almost uniformly divided between black and white.
german_text: Das Publikum ist fast gleichmäßig zwischen Schwarz und Weiß aufgeteilt.
actual_translation: The audience is almost evenly split between black and white.

translation_text: A couple from Ithaca, New York, arrived to see the show, many just come down the street.
german_text: Ein Paar ist aus Ithaca, New York, angereist, um die Aufführung zu sehen, viele kommen nur die Straße herunter.
actual_translation: One couple has traveled from Ithaca, New York, to see the performance, many are from just down the road.

translation_text: They’ve all experienced Georgia’s pushing moisture for eight hours when Brooks takes them on a pilgrimage to the tombs of the Malcoms and Dorseys.
german_text: Sie haben alle beinahe acht Stunden lang Georgias drückende Feuchtigkeit erlebt, wenn Brooks sie auf einer Pilgerreise zu den Grabstätten der Malcoms und Dorseys führt.
actual_translation: They've all weathered Georgia's oppressive humidity for the nearly eight hours as Brooks lead them on a pilgrimage to the grave sites of the Malcoms and Dorseys.

translation_text: Until this point, the murder has remained an anecdote, but now, when you stand on the same country where the Lynch murder took place, the air feels ghostful.
german_text: Bis zu diesem Punkt sind die Morde eine Anekdote geblieben, aber jetzt, wenn man auf dem gleichen Land steht, wo die Lynch-Morde stattfanden, fühlt sich die Luft gespenstisch an.
actual_translation: Up until this point, the murders have remained an anecdote, but now, standing on the same land where the lynchings took place, the air feels haunted.

translation_text: When the last notes of the song sound out, Greene invites the crowd to get closer and inspect the body name.
german_text: Wenn die letzten Noten des Songs ausklingen, lädt Greene die Menge ein, näher zu kommen und die Leichname zu inspizieren.
actual_translation: As the final notes of the song fade, Greene invites the crowd to move closer and inspect the bodies.

translation_text: Children hoke on their heads, record the false blood and the silent bodies, and flush to each other.
german_text: Kinder hocken an ihren Köpfen, registrieren das gefälschte Blut und die stillen Körper und flüstern einander zu.
actual_translation: Children crouch by their heads, take in the fake blood and still bodies, and whisper to each other.

translation_text: “They’re not really dead,” a little boy murmured as if he wanted to remember it.
german_text: "Sie sind nicht wirklich tot", murmelt ein kleiner Junge, als wolle er sich daran erinnern.
actual_translation: "They're not really dead," one little boy mutters, as if to remind himself.

translation_text: After a few minutes, Greene thanks the crowd - and suddenly it is over.
german_text: Nach einigen Minuten dankt Greene der Menge - und plötzlich ist es vorbei.
actual_translation: After a few minutes Greene thanks the crowd, and suddenly it's over.

translation_text: The actors throw away the Lynchseil and wash out their tears.
german_text: Die Schauspieler werfen das Lynchseil weg und wischen ihre Tränen ab.
actual_translation: The actors throw off the lynching rope and wipe away tears.

translation_text: Bradshaw embraces Marbaugh, the man in the dress that played the clan member.
german_text: Bradshaw umarmt Marbaugh, den Mann im Anzug, der das Clanmitglied gespielt hat.
actual_translation: Bradshaw hugs Marbaugh, the man in the suit who played the head Klansman.

translation_text: Nick Rascona embraces two of his fellow players and then breaks in their arms crying together, the emotional burden of the performance eventually breaks through with him.
german_text: Nick Rascona umarmt zwei seiner Mitspieler und bricht dann in ihren Armen weinend zusammen, die emotionale Last der Aufführung bricht schließlich bei ihm durch.
actual_translation: Nick Rascona hugs two of his castmates, and then breaks down crying in their arms; the emotional toll of the performance finally getting to him.

translation_text: “It’s okay,” one of the women flirted.
german_text: "Es ist okay", flüstert eine der Frauen.
actual_translation: "It's okay," one of the women whispers.

translation_text: “We know that it is not in your heart.
german_text: "Wir wissen, dass das nicht in deinem Herzen liegt.
actual_translation: "We know that's not what's in your heart.

translation_text: You did it for a reason.”
german_text: Du hast das aus einem Grund getan."
actual_translation: You did this for a reason."

translation_text: The audience later met with the actors for dinner.
german_text: Später setzt sich das Publikum mit den Schauspielern zum Abendessen zusammen.
actual_translation: Later, the audience sits down to dinner with the actors.

translation_text: On one table, a white couple from Atlanta speaks enthusiastically about the follow-up with a black couple they’ve just met.
german_text: An einem Tisch plaudert ein weißes Paar aus Atlanta angeregt über die Nachstellung mit einem schwarzen Paar, das sie gerade kennengelernt haben.
actual_translation: At one table, a white couple from Atlanta chats animatedly about the reenactment with a black couple they just met.

translation_text: Denise Duplinski fought to find words which feelings the performance left.
german_text: Denise Duplinski kämpfte darum, Worte zu finden, welches Gefühl die Aufführung hinterlassen hat.
actual_translation: Denise Duplinski struggled to find words for how the performance made her feel.

translation_text: "It's hard to hear these horrible words and actions ... coming from people who look like you and who do that because they look like you," she said.
german_text: "Es ist schwer, diese schrecklichen Worte und Taten zu hören ... von Leuten zu kommen, die wie Sie selbst aussehen und die das tun, weil sie so aussehen wie du", sagte sie.
actual_translation: "It's hard to hear those horrible awful words, and deeds ... come out of people that look like you and who do it because they look like you," she said.

translation_text: “What this really does with me makes me believe that the linen continues,” she added, “this is now called only police shooting.”
german_text: "Was das wirklich mit mir tut, lässt mich glauben, dass das Lynchen immer noch weitergeht", fügte sie hinzu, "heute wird das nur Polizei-Schießerei genannt."
actual_translation: "What this really does to me is make me think that lynchings are still going on," she added, "they're just called police shootings now."

translation_text: In the same room, Tyrone Brooks holds the court at his table, he eats and reminds of civil rights.
german_text: Im gleichen Raum hält Tyrone Brooks Hof an seinem Tisch, er isst und erinnert an die Bürgerrechte.
actual_translation: Across the room, Tyrone Brooks holds court at his table, eating and reminiscing about civil rights.

translation_text: He said he had already started planning the performance next year.
german_text: Er sagte, er habe schon angefangen, die Aufführung im nächsten Jahr zu planen.
actual_translation: He said he's already begun planning for next year's performance.

translation_text: "The postgraduate is in some way inspiring, because it describes the horror of what we have suffered, but it is also a moment of learning," he said.
german_text: "Die Nachstellung ist in gewisser Weise inspirierend, denn sie beschreibt den Schrecken von dem, was wir ertragen haben, aber es ist auch ein Moment des Lernens", sagte er.
actual_translation: "The reenactment is inspirational in a way because it describes the horror of what we endured, but it also is a teaching moment," he said.

translation_text: "It's so if we don't learn anything from it, then it can happen again.
german_text: "Es ist so, wenn wir nichts daraus lernen, dann kann es wieder passieren.
actual_translation: "It's like, if you don't learn from this, it can happen again.

translation_text: Whoever does not study his own history, whoever does not know his own history, is condemned to repeat it.”
german_text: Wer seine eigene Geschichte nicht studiert, wer seine eigene Geschichte nicht kennt, ist dazu verurteilt, sie zu wiederholen."
actual_translation: Those who don't study their history, those who do not know their history, are doomed to repeat it."

translation_text: "God's Damage" Reconciled the Wagnerian in Bayreuth
german_text: "Götterdämmerung" versöhnte die Wagnerianer in Bayreuth
actual_translation: "Götterdämmerung" propitiates Wagnerians in Bayreuth

translation_text: Also in the fourth part of Richard Wagner's monumental work, director Frank Castorf sets on a colour-frivole inscenation in front of a giant, six-step colis.
german_text: Auch im vierten Teil von Richard Wagners monumentalem Werk setzt Regisseur Frank Castorf auf eine bunt-frivole Inszenierung vor gigantischer, sechsstöckiger Kulisse.
actual_translation: In the fourth part of Richard Wagner's monumental work, director Frank Castorf again focusses on a colourful and frivolous production, set against a giant, six-storey backdrop.

translation_text: The screenplay (designed by Aleksandar Denic) selectively shows a sliding street roof as well as the Wallerest and Dönerbude in Berlin, a "Plast and Elaste" logo from the DDR times or the New York Stock Exchange.
german_text: Die Drehbühne (gestaltet von Aleksandar Denic) zeigt wahlweise eine schäbige Straßenecke samt Mauerrest und Dönerbude in Berlin, ein "Plaste und Elaste"-Logo aus DDR-Zeiten oder die New Yorker Börse.
actual_translation: The revolving stage (designed by Aleksandar Denic) shows either a shabby street corner, complete with remains of the Wall and kebab shop in Berlin, a "Plaste und Elaste" logo from the DDR times, or the New York stock exchange.

translation_text: In front there is an open Mercedes-Old Timer, in which the Rheintöchter poses as Rockergirls, or an alternative Isetta.
german_text: Davor parkt ein offener Mercedes-Oldtimer, in dem die Rheintöchter als Rockergirls posieren, oder alternativ eine Isetta.
actual_translation: In front is parked an open vintage Mercedes car, in which the Rhinemaidens pose like rocker girls, or alternatively, an Isetta.

translation_text: Gestapeled oil pipes remind Castorff’s lead motives – money, power and enthusiasm – that are drawn through his “ring” inscenation.
german_text: Gestapelte Ölfässer erinnern an Castorfs Leitmotiv - Geld, Macht und Gier - das sich durch seine "Ring"-Inszenierung zieht.
actual_translation: Stacked oil barrels are reminiscent of Castorf's leitmotif – gold, power and greed – that runs through his production of the "Ring".

translation_text: The three Rheintöchter - singed by Stephanie Houtzeel, Wiebke Lehmkuhl and Alexandra Steiner - harmonize as well as in the "Rheingold" wonderfully.
german_text: Die drei Rheintöchter - gesungen von Stephanie Houtzeel, Wiebke Lehmkuhl und Alexandra Steiner - harmonieren wie schon im "Rheingold" wunderbar.
actual_translation: The three Rhinemaidens – sung by Stephanie Houtzeel, Wiebke Lehmkuhl and Alexandra Steiner – work wonderfully together, as they did already in "Rheingold".

translation_text: Kess they seduce Siegfried (Stefan Vinke), throw a body into the suitcase in Hollywood style and give the Krawallo clique.
german_text: Kess verführen sie Siegfried (Stefan Vinke), zerren in Hollywood-Manier eine Leiche in den Kofferraum und geben die Krawallo-Clique.
actual_translation: They saucily seduce Siegfried (Stefan Vinke), lug a body in the boot in Hollywood manner, and play the riotous clique.

translation_text: Stephen Milling sings the magnificently fitted hague surrounded by the aura of a heavy weight boxer.
german_text: Stephen Milling singt den herrlich fiesen Hagen, den die Aura eines Schwergewichtsboxers umgibt.
actual_translation: Stephen Milling sings the part of the superbly nasty Hagen, who has the aura of a heavy-weight boxer.

translation_text: Brutal the scene when he kills Siegfried.
german_text: Brutal die Szene, als er Siegfried erschlägt.
actual_translation: The scene where he slays Siegfried is brutal.

translation_text: But later, Gunther (Markus Eiche) has to believe in it.
german_text: Später muss auch noch Gunther (Markus Eiche) dran glauben.
actual_translation: Later, Gunther (Markus Eiche) cops it too.

translation_text: The audience thanked the ensemble with strong applause.
german_text: Das Publikum dankt es dem Ensemble mit kräftigem Applaus.
actual_translation: The audience thanks the ensemble with mighty applause.

translation_text: Stormful celebrations are held by Foster, Milling, Vinke and Director Janowski, who humble and shrinking their hands to the Merkel row.
german_text: Stürmisch gefeiert werden Foster, Milling, Vinke und Dirigent Janowski, der sich bescheiden und die Hände zur Merkel-Raute formend verbeugt.
actual_translation: There is a rapturous reception for Foster, Milling, Vinke and conductor Janowski, who effaces himself and bows his hands, forming a Merkel diamond.

translation_text: There is great pleasure for the festival, which appears on the stage for the first time - in the face of the great heat again in mild recreational clothes.
german_text: Großen Beifall gibt es für das Festspielorchester, das sich erstmals auf der Bühne zeigt - angesichts der großen Hitze wieder in legerer Freizeitkleidung.
actual_translation: There is huge applause for the Festival Orchestra, who appear on stage for the first time – in casual leisurewear in view of the high heat.

translation_text: The performance was expected by Frank Castorf and his team.
german_text: Mit Spannung erwartet worden war der Auftritt von Frank Castorf und seinem Regieteam.
actual_translation: The performance from Frank Castorf and his directing team had been awaited with excitement.

translation_text: If he had to make a current Pfeif concert over himself in 2013, five years later, there was a great joyful in which the isolated “Buh” calls passed.
german_text: Hatte er 2013 noch ein gellendes Pfeifkonzert über sich ergehen lassen müssen, gab es fünf Jahre später großen Jubel, in dem die vereinzelten "Buh"-Rufe untergingen.
actual_translation: Even if in 2013 he had had to endure another hall full of shrill catcalls, five years later there were great cheers, which drowned out the isolated boos.

translation_text: The game manager Katharina Wagner may have been pleased.
german_text: Festspielchefin Katharina Wagner dürfte sich darüber gefreut haben.
actual_translation: Festival head Katharina Wagner will likely have been delighted.

translation_text: "You notice that the audience has grown together with the 'ring' in some way," she said shortly before the performance of the dpa.
german_text: "Man merkt, dass das Publikum mit dem "Ring" in gewisser Weise zusammengewachsen ist", hatte sie kurz vor der Aufführung der dpa gesagt.
actual_translation: "Once can see that the audience has in some way grown into the "Ring"," she had said shortly before the performance from the dpa.

translation_text: The audience has not only made a form of peace with Castorf, but it has also grown an understanding of its viewpoint.
german_text: Das Publikum habe nicht nur eine Form von Frieden mit Castorf gemacht, sondern es sei auch ein Verständnis für dessen Sichtweise gewachsen.
actual_translation: The audience has not only made a kind of peace with Castorf, but on top of that, an understanding for his point of view has grown.

translation_text: I draw a positive resume.
german_text: Ich ziehe ein positives Resümee.
actual_translation: I see positive results.

translation_text: Max Menge works as a volunteer
german_text: Max Menge arbeitet als Freiwilliger
actual_translation: Max Menge works as volunteer

translation_text: They work equally in several places during their volunteer year.
german_text: Sie arbeiten in ihrem Freiwilligenjahr gleich an mehreren Orten.
actual_translation: During your voluntary service year, you're working at many locations simultaneously.

translation_text: Where everywhere?
german_text: Wo überall?
actual_translation: What are all the different places?

translation_text: Quantity: Usually in stone in the furniture pocket, once a week I help here in grefs in the furniture bridge.
german_text: Menge: Normalerweise in Steinfurt in der Möbelbörse, einmal in der Woche helfe ich hier in Greven in der Möbelbrücke aus.
actual_translation: Menge: Normally in Steinfurt in the furniture exchange, and once a week I help out here in Greven in the Möbelbrücke.

translation_text: I also worked at school all day open.
german_text: Und ich habe auch schon im offenen Ganztag an der Schule gearbeitet.
actual_translation: And I have also worked at the full-day school in their supplementary activities.

translation_text: How are your experiences with it?
german_text: Wie sind Ihre Erfahrungen damit?
actual_translation: What are your experiences of that?

translation_text: A lot: It’s a nice, wide spectrum that I see here.
german_text: Menge: Es ist ein schönes, breites Spektrum, das ich hier sehe.
actual_translation: Menge: It is a nice, broad spectrum that I see here.

translation_text: I have to do with different people, with young people, with refugees, with young adults.
german_text: Ich habe mit unterschiedlichen Leuten zu tun, mit Jugendlichen, mit Flüchtlingen, mit jungen Erwachsenen.
actual_translation: I deal with different people: with adolescents, with refugees, with young adults.

translation_text: You are now 26 years old, a late-working volunteer.
german_text: Sie sind jetzt 26 Jahre, also ein spätberufener Freiwilliger.
actual_translation: You are 26 years old now, so a volunteer with a late-calling.

translation_text: How does this come?
german_text: Wie kommt das?
actual_translation: How did that come about?

translation_text: A lot: I have graduated.
german_text: Menge: Ich habe Abitur gemacht.
actual_translation: Menge: I did my Abitur exams.

translation_text: And then a building engineering study, let’s say, successfully broken down.
german_text: Und dann ein Bauingenieurstudium, sagen wir mal, erfolgreich abgebrochen.
actual_translation: And then I successfully abandoned, shall we say, a civil engineering course of studies.

translation_text: I realized for myself that it’s wrong for me and I want to do something different, work with people.
german_text: Ich hab für mich erkannt, dass es für mich das Falsche ist und ich etwas anderes machen will, mit Menschen arbeiten.
actual_translation: I recognised that it is not right for me and that I want to do something else, work with people.

translation_text: Then I wondered what you were doing.
german_text: Und dann habe ich mich gefragt, was machst Du.
actual_translation: And then I asked myself, what do you do?

translation_text: Make a social year, there is an insight, there you can see how it is on the site, in the point of burning, really.
german_text: Mach ein soziales Jahr, da gibt es einen Einblick, da kann man sehen, wie es vor Ort, im Brennpunkt vielleicht auch, wirklich ist.
actual_translation: Do a social year, you can get an insight, can see what it is really like on site, in the thick of things too perhaps.

translation_text: And was it so?
german_text: Und war es so?
actual_translation: And was it like that?

translation_text: I have gathered great impressions.
german_text: Menge: Ich habe tolle Eindrücke gesammelt.
actual_translation: Menge: I gathered great insights.

translation_text: In the winter semester I will start my studies in Social Sciences.
german_text: Ich werde im Wintersemester mein Studium im Sozialwesen starten.
actual_translation: I will start my studies in social affairs in the winter semester.

translation_text: I’m going to study dual, I’m probably doing a social work training at the Herne Youth Office and I’m going to study in Hamm at the high school.
german_text: Ich werde dual studieren, mache wahrscheinlich im Jugendamt Herne eine Sozialarbeiterausbildung und studiere in Hamm an der Fachhochschule.
actual_translation: I will study in dual, probably do an apprenticeship as a welfare worker at the Herne child protective services and study in Hamm at the university of applied sciences.

translation_text: Is it not unusual to have several different places during the volunteer service?
german_text: Ist es nicht etwas ungewöhnlich, während des Freiwilligendienstes mehrere verschiedene Einsatzorte zu haben?
actual_translation: Is it not somewhat unusual to have several different work locations during the voluntary service?

translation_text: Quantity: Yes, it is very variable.
german_text: Menge: Ja, es ist sehr variabel.
actual_translation: Menge: Yes, it is very variable.

translation_text: It always depends on where you make your FSJ.
german_text: Es kommt wohl immer darauf an, wo man sein FSJ macht.
actual_translation: It always depends on where one is doing their voluntary service year.

translation_text: It can be done from age home to youth work – in all possible facets of social work.
german_text: Man kann es vom Altersheim bis hin zur Jugendarbeit machen - in allen möglichen Facetten der sozialen Arbeit.
actual_translation: One can do it from at the old people's home right up to in youth work – in all possible facets of social work.

translation_text: It was very variable to me.
german_text: Bei mir war es sehr abwechslungsreich.
actual_translation: In my case, it was very varied.

translation_text: I was also partly in the OGS, i.e. in the afternoon care.
german_text: Ich war auch teilweise in der OGS, also in der Nachmittagsbetreuung.
actual_translation: I was also sometimes at the open full-day schools, that is, for the afternoon care.

translation_text: For me, that was exactly what irritated me.
german_text: Für mich war das genau das Richtige, was mich gereizt hat.
actual_translation: For me that was exactly the right thing, the thing that got me fired up.

translation_text: I could recognize my own strengths and see how it really goes.
german_text: Ich konnte meine eigenen Stärken erkennen und sehen, wie es wirklich abläuft.
actual_translation: I was able to recognise and see my own strengths, as it was really happening.

translation_text: Unlike the building engineering school?
german_text: Anders als im Bauingenieurstudium?
actual_translation: Differently from when doing the civil engineering studies?

translation_text: Quote: Well, it’s not about calculating statistics.
german_text: Menge: Na klar, hier geht es nicht darum, Statiken auszurechnen.
actual_translation: Menge: Yeah, sure; here it's not about working out statistics.

translation_text: There are many different people who have a different story behind each.
german_text: Man hat immer wieder andere Menschen vorm Kopf, die jeweils eine ganz andere Geschichte hinter sich haben.
actual_translation: One always has other people at the front of their minds, people who all have totally different histories behind them.

translation_text: Whether a refugee or a youth who has been taken out of the family - one must always take care of it individually.
german_text: Ob ein Flüchtling, ob ein Jugendlicher, der aus der Familie rausgeholt worden ist - man muss immer individuell darauf eingehen.
actual_translation: Whether it's a refugee or an adolescent who has been pulled out of their family – you always have to approach it individually.

translation_text: very interesting.
german_text: Sehr interessant.
actual_translation: Very interesting.

translation_text: Do you have no touch fear?
german_text: Und Sie hatten keine Berührungsängste?
actual_translation: And they didn't have any fear of contact?

translation_text: A lot: I am not the guy for that.
german_text: Menge: Dafür bin ich nicht der Typ.
actual_translation: Menge: I'm not the kind of guy for that.

translation_text: It is a place that gives you a lot.
german_text: Es ist ein Bereich, der einem viel gibt.
actual_translation: It is an area that gives one a lot.

translation_text: A lot of love, a lot of kindness.
german_text: Viel Liebe, viel Freundlichkeit.
actual_translation: A lot of love, a lot of friendliness.

translation_text: There are negative moments, but life is like that.
german_text: Es gibt auch mal negative Momente, aber so ist dass Leben eben.
actual_translation: There are negative moments too sometimes, but that's just life.

translation_text: Pearson Cuts More 3,000 Jobs and Cuts Dividend to Restore Business
german_text: Pearson kürzt weitere 3.000 Arbeitsplätze und kürzt die Dividende, um das Geschäft wiederzubeleben
actual_translation: Pearson cuts another 3,000 jobs, slashes dividend to revive business

translation_text: The British educational group Pearson said on Friday it will cut further 3,000 jobs and cut its intermediate numbers by 72 percent as another restructuring program is launched to overcome the pressure the company is facing.
german_text: Die britische Bildungsgruppe Pearson sagte am Freitag, sie werde weitere 3.000 Arbeitsplätze abbauen und ihre Zwischendividende um 72 Prozent kürzen, da ein weiteres Restrukturierungsprogramm gestartet werde, um den Druck zu überwinden, mit dem das Unternehmen konfrontiert sei.
actual_translation: British education group Pearson said on Friday it would cut another 3,000 jobs and slash its interim dividend by 72 per cent as it started another restructuring programme to tackle the pressures facing its business.

translation_text: The decrease, which General Director John Fallon mostly announced for the end of 2018 and early 2019, comes in addition to its previous restructuring, which has already lost 4,000 jobs.
german_text: Der Stellenabbau, den Generaldirektor John Fallon überwiegend für Ende 2018 und Anfang 2019 ankündigte, kommt zusätzlich zu seiner vorherigen Umstrukturierung, bei der bereits 4.000 Stellen verloren gingen.
actual_translation: The job cuts, which Chief Executive John Fallon said will mostly come late in 2018 and in early 2019, are in addition to 4,000 roles lost in its previous restructuring.

translation_text: In a third cost reduction program in May, Pearson announced a cost reduction plan by another £300 million ($394 million) to revive a business taken by the fast step towards digital learning.
german_text: Pearson kündigte im Mai in einem dritten Kostensenkungsprogramm einen Plan zur Kostensenkung um weitere 300 Millionen Pfund (394 Millionen US-Dollar) an, um ein Geschäft wieder zu beleben, das durch den schnellen Schritt zum digitalen Lernen getroffen wurde.
actual_translation: Pearson announced a plan to cut costs by another 300 million pounds ($394-million U.S.) in May in a third cost-cutting programme to try to revive a business hit by the rapid move to digital learning.

translation_text: The company, which had sold its share in Penguin Random House to the partner Bertelsmann last month, said the prospects for the financial year were unchanged after it achieved an increase of 1 percent in the first half of the year to £2.05 billion.
german_text: Das Unternehmen, das im vergangenen Monat seine Beteiligung an Penguin Random House an den Partner Bertelsmann veräußert hatte, sagte, dass der Ausblick für das Geschäftsjahr unverändert sei, nachdem es im ersten Halbjahr einen Zuwachs von 1 Prozent auf 2,05 Milliarden Pfund erzielt habe.
actual_translation: The company, which agreed to sell its stake in Penguin Random House to partner Bertelsmann last month, said its outlook for the year was unchanged after it reported a 1 per cent rise in underlying sales in the first half to 2.05 billion pounds.

translation_text: Kabul Convoy Attack: NATO Soldier Killed in Suicide Attack
german_text: Konvoi-Angriff von Kabul: Nato-Soldat bei Selbstmordanschlag getötet
actual_translation: Kabul convoy attack: Nato soldier killed in suicide blast

translation_text: A suicide attacker attacked a military convoy in the Afghan capital Kabul, killing one NATO soldier and wounding several others, officials say.
german_text: Ein Selbstmordattentäter hat einen Militärkonvoi in der afghanischen Hauptstadt Kabul angegriffen, einen Soldaten der Nato getötet und mehrere andere verletzt, sagen Beamte.
actual_translation: A suicide bomber has attacked a military convoy in the Afghan capital, Kabul, killing a Nato soldier and wounding several others, officials say.

translation_text: Five soldiers and one interpreter were injured, a NATO statement said.
german_text: Fünf Soldaten und ein Dolmetscher seien verletzt worden, teilte eine Erklärung der Nato mit.
actual_translation: Five soldiers and an interpreter were injured, a Nato statement said.

translation_text: Unconfirmed local reports say three civilians were also killed in the incident in the district of Qarabagh.
german_text: Unbestätigten lokalen Berichten zufolge starben bei dem Vorfall im Stadtteil Qarabagh auch drei Zivilisten.
actual_translation: Unconfirmed local reports say three civilians also died in the incident in the city's Qarabagh district.

translation_text: The bombing is the last violence attack that Afghanistan hit this month - more than 30 people were killed on Tuesday in a mosque in Herat.
german_text: Die Bombardierung ist die letzte Gewalttat, die Afghanistan diesen Monat getroffen hat - am Dienstag wurden mehr als 30 Menschen in einer Moschee in Herat getötet.
actual_translation: The bombing is the latest violence to have hit Afghanistan this month - on Tuesday more than 30 people were killed in a mosque blast in Herat.

translation_text: On Monday, a suicide attacker killed two people near the Iraqi embassy in Kabul.
german_text: Am Montag tötete ein Selbstmordattentäter zwei Menschen in der Nähe der irakischen Botschaft in Kabul.
actual_translation: On Monday a suicide bomber killed two people near the Iraqi embassy in Kabul.

translation_text: In a NATO statement it said the explosion had occurred on Thursday night when a joint patrol with the Afghan army was attacked by a "improvised bombardment carried by persons".
german_text: In einer Stellungnahme der Nato heißt es, die Explosion am Donnerstagabend sei geschehen, als eine gemeinsame Patrouille mit der afghanischen Armee von einem "von Personen getragenen improvisierten Sprengsatz" angegriffen wurde".
actual_translation: A Nato statement said that Thursday evening's blast happened when a joint patrol with the Afghan army was attacked by a "personnel-borne improvised explosive device."

translation_text: According to the statement, all the injured are in a stable state and will be treated at the U.S. Military Hospital at Bagram Airport.
german_text: Die Aussage besagt, dass sich alle Verletzten in einem stabilen Zustand befinden und im US-Militärkrankenhaus auf dem Flugplatz Bagram behandelt werden.
actual_translation: The statement said that all those injured are in a stable condition and are being treated at the US military hospital at Bagram airfield.

translation_text: Correspondents say the growing strength of the Taliban and the group, known as the so-called Islamic State (IS) in Qarabagh, is a great concern for the NATO troops in the nearby Bagram.
german_text: Korrespondenten sagen, dass die wachsende Stärke der Taliban und der Gruppe, die als sogenannter Islamischer Staat (IS) in Qarabagh bekannt ist, eine große Sorge für die NATO-Truppen im nahe gelegenen Bagram ist.
actual_translation: Correspondents say the growing strength of the Taliban and the group known as so-called Islamic State (IS) in Qarabagh is a major source of concern to Nato forces based in nearby Bagram.

translation_text: According to the United Nations, there were at least 1,662 civilian deaths in Afghanistan in the first half of 2017, of which about 20% were in the capital.
german_text: Nach Angaben der Vereinten Nationen gab es in Afghanistan im ersten Halbjahr 2017 mindestens 1.662 zivile Todesopfer, davon etwa 20 % in der Hauptstadt.
actual_translation: According to the United Nations, Afghanistan saw at least 1,662 civilian deaths in the first half of 2017, with about 20% of those in the capital.

translation_text: At the end of July, a suicide suicide bomb killed at least 30 people in a mainly Shiite district of Kabul.
german_text: Ende Juli tötete eine Selbstmord-Autobombe mindestens 30 Menschen in einem hauptsächlich schiitischen Distrikt von Kabul.
actual_translation: At the end of July, a suicide car bomb killed at least 30 people in a mainly Shia district of Kabul.

translation_text: The Taliban said they had committed the attack.
german_text: Die Taliban sagten, sie hätten diesen Angriff ausgeführt.
actual_translation: The Taliban said they had carried out that attack.

translation_text: On 31 May, a massive bombing in the city center killed more than 150 people with the country's deadliest militant attack since the U.S.-led troops withdrew the Taliban from power in 2001.
german_text: Am 31. Mai tötete eine gewaltige Bombardierung im Zentrum der Stadt mehr als 150 Menschen mit dem tödlichsten militanten Angriff des Landes, seit die US-geführten Truppen 2001 die Taliban von der Macht verdrängten.
actual_translation: On 31 May, a huge bombing in the centre of the city killed more than 150 people, the deadliest militant attack in the country since US-led forces ousted the Taliban from power in 2001.

translation_text: The violence emphasizes the poor security situation in Afghanistan as U.S. President Donald Trump is considering to increase the number of U.S. troops that support military and police in the country.
german_text: Die Gewalt unterstreicht die prekäre Sicherheitslage in Afghanistan, da US-Präsident Donald Trump abwägt, die Zahl der US-Truppen, die Militär und Polizei im Land unterstützen, zu erhöhen.
actual_translation: The violence underlines the precarious security situation in Afghanistan as US President Donald Trump weighs up whether to increase the number of US troops aiding the military and police in the country.

translation_text: Correspondents say the suicide attacks in Kabul in recent weeks have also caused a crisis of public confidence in the government, its policies and in particular in the call of President Ashraf Ghani.
german_text: Korrespondenten sagen, dass die Selbstmordattentate in Kabul in den letzten Wochen auch eine Krise des öffentlichen Vertrauens in die Regierung, ihre Politik und insbesondere in den Ruf von Präsident Ashraf Ghani verursacht haben.
actual_translation: Correspondents say the suicide bombings in Kabul in recent weeks have also created a crisis of public confidence in the government, its policies and in particular the reputation of President Ashraf Ghani.

translation_text: EPA returns decision to delay the smog rule after complaints
german_text: EPA kehrt Entscheidung zur Verzögerung der Smog-Regel nach Klagen um
actual_translation: EPA reverses decision to delay smog rule after lawsuits

translation_text: The U.S. Environmental Protection Authority has repealed a decision to delay a regulation by the Obama government, according to which the states are obliged to halt the smog-causing emissions. This happened a day after 15 states appealed the agency for the move.
german_text: Die US-amerikanische Umweltschutzbehörde hat eine Entscheidung, eine Regulierung der Regierung von Obama zu verzögern, aufgehoben, wonach die Staaten verpflichtet sind, die Smog-verursachenden Emissionen einzudämmen. Dies erfolgte ein Tag, nachdem 15 Staaten die Agentur wegen des Schrittes verklagten.
actual_translation: The U.S. Environmental Protection Agency reversed a decision to delay an Obama-era rule requiring states to curb smog-causing emissions, one day after 15 states sued the agency over the move.

translation_text: The EPA announced late on Wednesday the decision to advance the so-called "Ozone Regulations 2015" and said it shows the agency's commitment to cooperate with states.
german_text: Die EPA kündigte spät am Mittwoch die Entscheidung an, die so genannten "Ozonbestimmungen 2015" voranzutreiben, und sagte, sie zeige die Verpflichtung der Agentur, mit Staaten zusammenzuarbeiten.
actual_translation: The EPA announced the decision to go ahead with the so-called "2015 Ozone Designations" late on Wednesday, saying it showed the agency's commitment to working with states.

translation_text: "We believe in the dialogue with and that we are responding to our state partners," EPA chief Scott Pruitt said in a statement.
german_text: "Wir glauben an den Dialog mit und daran, dass wir auf unsere staatlichen Partner reagieren", sagte EPA-Chef Scott Pruitt in einer Erklärung.
actual_translation: "We believe in dialogue with, and being responsive to, our state partners," EPA Chief Scott Pruitt said in a statement.

translation_text: Pruitt announced in June the intention of the EPA to delay the ozone regulations - in which emissions will be measured in some parts of the country to determine where cuts need to be made in order to comply with stricter air quality standards - to a year until October 2018.
german_text: Pruitt hatte im Juni die Absicht der EPA angekündigt, die Ozonbestimmungen - in denen in einem Teil des Landes Schadstoff-Emissionen gemessen werden sollen, um festzulegen, wo Einschnitte gemacht werden müssen, um strengere Luftqualitäts-Standards einzuhalten - um ein Jahr bis zum Oktober 2018 zu verzögern.
actual_translation: Pruitt in June had announced the EPA's intention to delay the ozone designations - in which existing smog pollution is measured in parts of the country to determine where cuts must be made to meet tougher air quality standard - by one year to October 2018.

translation_text: A group of 15 mostly democratic states, along with the district of Colombia, filed a complaint on Tuesday and said the effort was illegal.
german_text: Eine Gruppe von 15 größtenteils demokratischen Staaten, zusammen mit dem Bezirk von Kolumbien, reichte am Dienstag Klage ein und sagte, dass die Bemühung illegal sei.
actual_translation: A group of 15 mostly Democratic states, along with the District of Columbia, filed a suit on Tuesday saying the effort was illegal.

translation_text: President Donald Trump’s government has tried to recover a wide range of environmental records imposed by former President Barack Obama as part of a broader agenda that Trump says is intended to boost economic growth.
german_text: Die Regierung von Präsident Donald Trump hat versucht, eine breite Palette von Umweltauflagen, die der ehemalige Präsident Barack Obama auferlegt hat, als Teil einer breiteren Agenda, die laut Trump das Wirtschaftswachstum ankurbeln soll, zurückzufahren.
actual_translation: The administration of President Donald Trump has been seeking to roll back a wide array of environmental regulations imposed by former President Barack Obama, as part of a broader agenda Trump says is aimed at sparking economic growth.

translation_text: However, the efforts have triggered the backdrop of the Democrats and Nature Conservation Groups, which are concerned about the effects of greater emissions on public health.
german_text: Die Bemühungen haben jedoch den Rückschlag der Demokraten und Naturschutzgruppen ausgelöst, die sich Sorgen über die Auswirkungen größerer Emissionen auf die öffentliche Gesundheit machen.
actual_translation: But the efforts have triggered pushback by Democratics and conservation groups who are concerned about the impact of greater emissions on public health.

translation_text: The EPA website says that breathing of the ozon-containing air “can reduce lung function and enhance respiratory symptoms” such as asthma.
german_text: Die Webseite der EPA sagt, dass das Einatmen von Luft, die Ozon enthält "die Lungenfunktion reduzieren und die Atmungssymptome verstärken kann" wie zum Beispiel Asthma.
actual_translation: The EPA's website says breathing air containing ozone "can reduce lung function and increase respiratory symptoms" like asthma.

translation_text: City Council wants community space
german_text: Gemeinderat will Gemeinschaftsraum
actual_translation: Municipal council wants common room

translation_text: At the end, the decision was clear: with two oppositions, the municipality council of Fluorn-Winzeln will decide to establish a community space in the future senior residential facility.
german_text: Am Ende war die Entscheidung deutlich: Bei zwei Gegenstimmen beschließt der Gemeinderat von Fluorn-Winzeln die Einrichtung eines Gemeinschaftsraums in der künftigen Seniorenwohnanlage.
actual_translation: In the end, the decision was clear: with two dissenting votes, the municipal council of Fluorn-Winzeln passed a resolution for a common room in the future retirement home.

translation_text: Before the discussion there is an important information: the purchase agreement for the still missing part of the land is signed, reports mayor Bernhard Tjaden.
german_text: Vor der Diskussion gibt es eine wichtige Information: Der Kaufvertrag für den noch fehlenden Grundstücksteil sei unterschrieben, berichtet Bürgermeister Bernhard Tjaden.
actual_translation: Ahead of the debate, there is an important piece of information to be had: the purchase contract for the as yet still needed plot section has been signed, reports mayor Bernhard Tjaden.

translation_text: Although it will still take time until the area belonging to the church community is in municipal ownership, there is no longer any obstacle in planning for the project that a private investor will support.
german_text: Zwar werde es noch dauern, bis die bislang der Kirchengemeinde gehörende Fläche im Gemeindebesitz ist, doch gibt es jetzt kein Planungshindernis für das von einem privaten Investor zu stemmende Projekt mehr.
actual_translation: Admittedly it will still be a while until the plot, which up until now has belonged to the church parish, comes into the possession of the municipality, but nevertheless, there are now no longer any planning obstacles for the project that has to be materialised by a private investor.

translation_text: There is a discussion about a community space.
german_text: Dafür gibt es eine Diskussion bezüglich eines Gemeinschaftsraums.
actual_translation: That is why there is a debate concerning a common room.

translation_text: One of the two investors who are still on the boat has offered to come up with the municipality.
german_text: Einer der beiden Investoren, die noch im Boot sind, hat angeboten, der Gemeinde entgegen zu kommen.
actual_translation: One of the two investors that are still on board has offered to accommodate the municipality.

translation_text: On the ground floor, he would provide a living area - about 55 square meters - and a boundary terrace with 70 square meters of area for a special price.
german_text: Im Erdgeschoss würde er eine Wohnfläche - rund 55 Quadratmeter - und eine angrenzende Terrasse mit immerhin 70 Quadratmetern Fläche für einen Sonderpreis zur Verfügung stellen.
actual_translation: For a special price, it would provide a living space – of around 55 square metres – and an adjacent terrace with no less than 70 square metres on the ground floor.

translation_text: The administration and the majority of the municipality are hoping that such a community space should not be seen as a meeting point only for the inhabitants of the senior right housing, but openly within the municipality.
german_text: Der Verwaltung und der Mehrheit des Gemeinderats schwebt vor, solch ein Gemeinschaftsraum eben nicht als Treffpunkt nur für die Bewohner des seniorengerechten Wohnens vorzusehen, sondern offen in die Gemeinde hinein.
actual_translation: What the management and the majority of the municipal council have in mind is not simply to set aside such a common room as a meeting place only for the residents of the senior citizens' accommodation, but for it to be open to the community.

translation_text: As an example, the word of "Strickcafé" made the round.
german_text: Als Beispiel machte das Wort vom "Strickcafé" die Runde.
actual_translation: Talk of a "knitting café" was making the rounds, for example.

translation_text: The decision, which was decided by the provision of funds for the current budget already last autumn, will be pushed by funding opportunities.
german_text: Versüßt wird die Entscheidung, die durch die Bereitstellung von Mitteln für den laufenden Haushalt bereits im vergangenen Herbst vorentschieden wurde, durch Fördermöglichkeiten.
actual_translation: The decision, which was already pre-determined last Autumn through the allocation of resources for the current budget, is sweetened by funding opportunities.

translation_text: The building is in the rehabilitation area.
german_text: Der Bau liegt im Sanierungsgebiet.
actual_translation: The building is in an area for redevelopment.

translation_text: The establishment of a community space would be favorable, according to Tjaden, with 60 percent of 30 percent.
german_text: Die Einrichtung eines Gemeinschaftsraums wäre, so berichtet Tjaden, mit 60 Prozent von 30 Prozent förderfähig.
actual_translation: The construction of a common room would be eligible for financial support, reports Tjaden, with 60 per cent of 30 per cent.

translation_text: In order to signal to the investor that it is not to be throwed between his legs in this regard, the decision proposal provides for the establishment that both the seat – which is admitted to the environmental construction – and the plain roof – which reduces the height and makes the construction more economic – would be possible.
german_text: Der Beschlussvorschlag sieht, um dem Investor zu signalisieren, dass man ihm in dieser Hinsicht keine Knüppel zwischen die Beine werfen will, die Feststellung vor, dass sowohl Sattel- - was an die Umgebungsbebauung angelehnt ist - als auch Pultdach - was die Traufhöhe verringert und den Bau wirtschaftlicher macht -­ möglich wären.
actual_translation: So as to signal to the investor that no-one wants to put a spoke in their wheel, the proposed resolution makes allowances for the determination that both a saddled roof – based on the surrounding buildings – and a mono-pitch roof – which reduces the height of the eaves and makes the building more economical – would be possible.

translation_text: Unnecessary, not just Wilfried Sohmer says, is this add-on.
german_text: Unnötig, so meint nicht nur Wilfried Sohmer, sei dieser Zusatz.
actual_translation: An uneccessary addition, thinks not only Wilfried Sohmer.

translation_text: If it helps, it passes the group unanimously.
german_text: Wenn's hilft: Einstimmig passiert er das Gremium.
actual_translation: If it helps: it passes through the committee unanimously.

translation_text: It is not so easy in the community.
german_text: Nicht so einfach geht es beim Gemeinschaftsraum.
actual_translation: It's not so easy with the common room.

translation_text: Daniela Ruf refers to the many own buildings, with which you don’t get so straight forward, for that you now give up the community room out of the window, she says, “I make myself hard with it.”
german_text: Daniela Ruf verweist auf die vielen eigenen Gebäude, mit denen man nicht so recht voran komme, dafür lehne man sich jetzt beim Gemeinschaftsraum aus dem Fenster, sagt sie: "Ich tue mich schwer damit".
actual_translation: Daniela Ruf points to their many owned buildings that are not really being forged ahead, but instead they are going out of their way with the common room: "I have difficulty with that," she says.

translation_text: Yvonne Staiger necessarily speaks for the community space – but absolutely against a municipal participation.
german_text: Yvonne Staiger spricht sich unbedingt für den Gemeinschaftsraum aus - allerdings absolut gegen eine kommunale Beteiligung.
actual_translation: Yvonne Staiger declares herself to be unequivocally in favour of the common room – but absolutely against an investment from the municipality.

translation_text: It sees behind it a hidden subsidy to any wealthy or even foreign investors.
german_text: Sie sieht dahinter eine verdeckte Subvention an ohnehin Vermögende oder gar auswärtige Investoren.
actual_translation: She views that as a hidden subsidy to already wealthy, or even foreign, investors.

translation_text: This is not the case, because with the acquisition of the area you don’t give any subsidy, but you get a real, in the case of doubt marketable counter value.
german_text: Das sei eben nicht so, denn mit dem Erwerb der Fläche gebe man keinen Zuschuss, sondern bekomme einen echten, im Zweifelsfall vermarktbaren Gegenwert, lautet die Gegenrede.
actual_translation: That is simply not true according to the counterargument, for by purchasing the plot they are not giving away any grants, but are rather getting a genuine, when in doubt saleable, equivalent in value.

translation_text: Staiger's request to distribute the decision proposal accordingly will be found by three supporters.
german_text: Staigers Antrag, den Beschlussvorschlag entsprechend aufzusplitten, findet drei Befürworter.
actual_translation: Staiger's proposal, to split up the proposed resolution accordingly, has three supporters.

translation_text: So it remains with two oppositions to the original program, which Stefan Haller summarizes as follows: “When we make the decision this way, we make a huge step towards closing a huge failure in our infrastructure.”
german_text: So bleibt es bei zwei Gegenstimmen beim ursprünglichen Programm, das Stefan Haller so zusammenfasst: "Wenn wir den Beschluss so fassen, machen wir einen Riesenschritt dahin, eine Riesenlücke in unserer Infrastruktur zu schließen".
actual_translation: So, with two dissenting votes, they are sticking with the original programme, which Stefan Haller summed up as follows: "If we pass the resolution as so, we make a huge step towards plugging a huge gap in our infrastructure."

translation_text: Collision with car: Radler is scattered on the road
german_text: Kollision mit Auto: Radler wird auf Straße geschleudert
actual_translation: Collision with a car: Cyclist hurled onto the road

translation_text: During the road, a 82-year-old cyclist was captured and seriously injured by a car on Wednesday in Garath.
german_text: Beim Queren der Straße ist ein 82-jähriger Radfahrer am Mittwoch in Garath von einem Auto erfasst und schwer verletzt worden.
actual_translation: The 82-year-old cyclist was hit by a car whilst crossing the road in Garath on Wednesday and was seriously injured.

translation_text: According to the police, the 82-year-old Langenfelder had been on the road by his bike at 12.20 p.m. on the cycling route of the Black Road from the direction of Hilden.
german_text: Wie die Polizei mitteilte, war der 82-jährie Langenfelder um 12.20 Uhr mit seinem Fahrrad auf dem Radweg der Straße Schwarzer Weg aus Richtung Hilden kommend unterwegs gewesen.
actual_translation: According to police reports, the 82-year-old from Langenfeld was travelling on his bicycle on the Schwarzer Weg cycle lane at around 12.20pm, coming from the direction of Hilden.

translation_text: The senior wanted to cross the trail at the height of the street Am Buchholzer Busch.
german_text: Der Senior wollte die Fahrbahn in Höhe der Straße Am Buchholzer Busch überqueren.
actual_translation: The senior citizen wanted to cross the lane of traffic up where the street Am Buchholzer Busch is.

translation_text: A car driver in the same direction gave him priority.
german_text: Eine in die gleiche Richtung fahrende Pkw-Führerin gewährte ihm Vorrang.
actual_translation: A woman driving a car in the same direction gave way to him.

translation_text: When the long fields walked on the road, he obviously did not pay attention to the opposite.
german_text: Als der Langenfelder auf die Straße fuhr, achtete er aber offenbar nicht auf den Gegenverkehr.
actual_translation: However, as the man from Langenfeld cycled onto the road, he evidently did not pay attention to the oncoming traffic.

translation_text: He collided with a car controlled by a 66-year-old assistant.
german_text: Er stieß mit einem Auto zusammen, das eine 66-jährige Hildenerin steuerte.
actual_translation: He collided with a car being driven by a 66-year-old woman from Hilden.

translation_text: The man was thrown on the street.
german_text: Der Mann wurde auf die Straße geschleudert.
actual_translation: The man was hurled onto the road.

translation_text: He suffered serious injuries and was taken to a hospital with a rescue car.
german_text: Er erlitt schwere Verletzungen und wurde mit einem Rettugnswagen in ein Krankenhaus gebracht.
actual_translation: He suffered serious injuries and was brought to hospital in an ambulance.

translation_text: FC Bayern Munich must give up David Alaba and Thiago in the Super Cup against Borussia Dortmund
german_text: FC Bayern München muss beim Supercup gegen Borussia Dortmund auf David Alaba und Thiago verzichten
actual_translation: FC Bayern Munich have to do without David Alaba and Thiago for the Super Cup against Borussia Dortmund

translation_text: The Super Cup takes place without him: David Alaba has to leave the game against Dortmund.
german_text: Der Supercup findet ohne ihn statt: David Alaba muss das Spiel gegen Dortmund sausen lassen.
actual_translation: The Super Cup is happening without him: David Alaba has to skip the game against Dortmund.

translation_text: With staff care, the FC Bayern travels to Dortmund for the first compulsory game of the new season.
german_text: Mit Personalsorgen reist der FC Bayern zum ersten Pflichtspiel der neuen Saison nach Dortmund.
actual_translation: With squad concerns, FC Bayern are travelling to Dortmund for the first competitive match of the new season.

translation_text: Seven professionals miss the title defense in the Super Cup against the Pokal winner.
german_text: Sieben Profis fehlen dem Titelverteidiger im Supercup gegen den Pokalsieger.
actual_translation: The title-defender is missing seven of its pros in the Super Cup against the cup winners.

translation_text: The staff concerns at the German football record champion Bayern Munich are increasing before the Supercup on Saturday (20:30/ZDF and Eurosport) at the Pokal winner Borussia Dortmund.
german_text: Die Personalsorgen beim deutschen Fußball-Rekordmeister Bayern München werden vor dem Supercup am Samstag (20.30 Uhr/ZDF und Eurosport) bei Pokalsieger Borussia Dortmund immer größer.
actual_translation: The squad concerns are getting even bigger for the German football record champions Bayern Munich ahead of the Super Cup on Saturday (8.30pm/ZDF and Eurosport) at cup winners Borussia Dortmund.

translation_text: Trainer Carlo Ancelotti must give up David Alaba in the duel with the BVB.
german_text: Trainer Carlo Ancelotti muss im Duell mit dem BVB auch auf David Alaba verzichten.
actual_translation: Coach Carlo Ancelotti has to also do without David Alaba in the duel with the BVB.

translation_text: It was confirmed by the Italians on Friday.
german_text: Das bestätigte der Italiener am Freitag.
actual_translation: The Italian confirmed that on Friday.

translation_text: In addition, the Munichers lack Manuel Neuer, James, Thiago, Jerome Boateng, Arjen Robben and Juan Bernat.
german_text: Zudem fehlen den Münchnern Manuel Neuer, James, Thiago, Jerome Boateng, Arjen Robben und Juan Bernat.
actual_translation: In addition, the Munich team is missing Manuel Neuer, James, Thiago, Jerome Boateng, Arjen Robben and Juan Bernat.

translation_text: For the five defeats in the last six test games, Ancelotti has been responsible for the physical condition and the lack of balance in the game of his team.
german_text: Für die fünf Niederlagen in den vergangenen sechs Testspielen hat Ancelotti den körperlichen Zustand und die fehlende Balance im Spiel seiner Mannschaft verantwortlich gemacht.
actual_translation: Ancelotti blamed the physical state of his team and the lack of balance in their game for their five defeats in the past six friendlies.

translation_text: “We know we’re not in the best physical condition,” said Ancelotti, adding, “The most important point is the balance in the team.
german_text: "Wir wissen, dass wir nicht in der besten physischen Verfassung sind", sagte Ancelotti und fügte hinzu: "Der wichtigste Punkt ist die Balance im Team.
actual_translation: "We know that we are not in the best physical condition," said Ancelotti, adding, "The most important point is the balance in the team.

translation_text: It was not good at last.”
german_text: Die war zuletzt nicht gut."
actual_translation: That has not been good recently."

translation_text: The 58-year-old, however, believes in an increase in performance in the first official compulsory game of the season.
german_text: Der 58-Jährige glaubt aber an eine Leistungssteigerung im ersten offiziellen Pflichtspiel der Saison.
actual_translation: However, the 58-year-old believes that they can improve their performance in the first official competitive game of the season.

translation_text: “Football is also tactics, strategy, personality and motivation.
german_text: "Fußball ist auch Taktik, Strategie, Persönlichkeit und Motivation.
actual_translation: "Football is also tactics, strategy, personality and motivation.

translation_text: I am very confident that my team will show these qualities.
german_text: Ich habe großes Vertrauen, dass meine Mannschaft diese Qualitäten zeigt.
actual_translation: I have great confidence that my team exhibits these qualities.

translation_text: The team is ready.
german_text: Die Mannschaft ist bereit.
actual_translation: The team is ready.

translation_text: We want to play intelligently,” said Ancelotti, who is expecting a “hard, intense game.”
german_text: Wir wollen intelligent spielen", sagte Ancelotti, der ein "schwieriges, intensives Spiel" erwartet.
actual_translation: We want to play intelligently," said Ancelotti, who is expecting a "difficult, intense game".

translation_text: The duel of the two German football heavyweights draws the fans into their ban.
german_text: Das Duell der beiden deutschen Fußball-Schwergewichte zieht die Fans in ihren Bann.
actual_translation: The duel between the two German football heavyweights is captivating the fans.

translation_text: The match was sold with 81,360 spectators, the German Football League (DFL) announced on Friday.
german_text: Die Partie ist mit 81.360 Zuschauern ausverkauft, teilte die Deutsche Fußball Liga (DFL) am Freitag mit.
actual_translation: With 81,360 spectators, the game is sold out, shared the German football league (DFL) on Friday.

translation_text: Walking from star to star
german_text: Im Harz von Stern zu Stern wandern
actual_translation: Wandering from star to star in the Harz

translation_text: In Harz, the world’s first “star path” will be created.
german_text: Im Harz soll der bundesweit erste "Sternenpfad" entstehen.
actual_translation: The nation's first "astral path" is to come to life in the Harz.

translation_text: This is planned by the Sternwarte St. Andreasberg.
german_text: Diesen plant der Verein Sternwarte Sankt Andreasberg.
actual_translation: It is being planned by the Sankt Andreasberg Observatory society.

translation_text: There is a planet path in Göttingen - since 2003.
german_text: Einen Planetenweg gibt es in Göttingen - seit 2003.
actual_translation: There has been a planetary trail in Göttingen since 2003.

translation_text: A "Star Path" meets the need for information of many harb visitors, it said.
german_text: Ein "Sternenpfad" komme dem Informationsbedürfnis vieler Harzbesucher entgegen, hieß es.
actual_translation: An "astral path" satisfies many Harz visitors' need for information, it is said.

translation_text: It combines nature, science, exercise and sports performance.
german_text: Er verbinde Natur, Wissenschaft, Bewegung und sportliche Leistung.
actual_translation: It combines nature, science, exercise and athletic performance.

translation_text: Members want to set tables along the scheduled route and inform them about the stars and star images.
german_text: Die Mitglieder wollen entlang der geplanten Route Tafeln aufstellen und darauf über Sterne und Sternbilder informieren.
actual_translation: Members want to set up plaques along the planned route and put information about stars and constellations on them.

translation_text: In a first phase until 2018, the association plans "goodly accessible installations in five to six locations" in Oberharz.
german_text: In einer ersten Phase bis 2018 plant der Verein "gut erreichbare Installationen an fünf bis sechs Orten" im Oberharz.
actual_translation: In a first phase, until 2018, the association is planning "easily accessible installations in five to six locations" in the Upper Harz.

translation_text: Question came St. Andreasberg, Braunlage, Hohegeiß and Sieber.
german_text: Infrage kämen St. Andreasberg, Braunlage, Hohegeiß und Sieber.
actual_translation: In the running are St. Andreasberg, Braunlage, Hohegeiss and Sieber.

translation_text: The information on the tables is to be supplemented through the Internet.
german_text: Die Informationen auf den Tafeln sollen per Internet ergänzt werden.
actual_translation: The information on the plaques is to be expanded upon online.

translation_text: Therefore, a good mobile network receipt plays a role in the location selection.
german_text: Deshalb spielt bei der Standortauswahl ein guter Mobilnetz-Empfang eine Rolle.
actual_translation: So good mobile network reception plays a part in the selection of locations.

translation_text: Accessibility is also a criterion.
german_text: Auch Barrierefreiheit sei ein Kriterium.
actual_translation: Accessibility is also a criterion.

translation_text: The star path will be extended by train.
german_text: Später soll der Sternenpfad Zug um Zug erweitert werden.
actual_translation: The astral path is later to be extended, step by step.

translation_text: “On the Star Trek the spectators learn a lot of information, for example about the physics of each star,” the association said.
german_text: "Auf dem Sternenpfad erfahren die Betrachter viel Wissenswertes, beispielsweise über die Physik der einzelnen Sterne", erklärte der Verein.
actual_translation: "Spectators will gain lots of useful knowledge on the astral path, for example about the physics of the individual stars," explained the society.

translation_text: They also learned why the stars had different colors or why one star glowed stronger than another, although it was much further away.
german_text: Zudem lernten sie, warum Sterne unterschiedliche Farben hätten oder warum ein Stern stärker leuchte als ein anderer, obwohl er wesentlich weiter entfernt liege.
actual_translation: In addition, they will learn why stars have different colours, or why one star shines more brightly than another, although it is significantly further away.

translation_text: It will also be mediated in which star image a selected star is located and when it is best to be seen.
german_text: Vermittelt werde auch, in welchem Sternbild sich ein ausgewählter Stern befinde und wann er am besten zu sehen sei.
actual_translation: It will also teach which constellation a selected star is located in, and when the best time to see it is.
