translation_text: Since 2014, the association has been operating the highest star guard in Northern Germany in the Bergstädtchen St. Andreasberg.
german_text: Der Verein betreibt bereits seit 2014 im Bergstädtchen St. Andreasberg die am höchsten gelegene Sternwarte Norddeutschlands.
actual_translation: The society has been operating the highest observatory in Northern Germany, in the small mountain town of St. Andreasberg, since 2014 already.

translation_text: The site in the middle of the Harz National Park is one of the six darkest regions in Germany, according to the Federal Office for Nature Conservation.
german_text: Der Standort mitten im Nationalpark Harz zählt nach Angaben des Bundesamtes für Naturschutz zu den sechs dunkelsten Regionen in Deutschland.
actual_translation: The location in the middle of the Harz national park is among the six darkest regions in Germany, according to information from the Federal Agency for Nature Conservation.

translation_text: Often from there, the Milky Way and even the Andromeda galaxy are clearly visible.
german_text: Häufig sind von dort aus die Milchstraße und sogar die Andromeda-Galaxie mit bloßem Auge deutlich zu sehen.
actual_translation: One can regularly clearly see the Milky Way, and even the Andromeda Galaxy, from there with naked eyes.

translation_text: In the Uni-City since 2003, on the initiative of the Foster Association Planetarium Göttingen, there is something similar to the planned starlight – the planetary path.
german_text: In der Uni-Stadt gibt es seit 2003 auf Initiative des Fördervereins Planetarium Göttingen etwas Ähnliches wie den geplanten Sternenwerg - den Planetenweg.
actual_translation: The university town, on the initiative of the Göttingen Planetarium friends' association, has had something similar to the astral path since 2013 – the planetary trail.

translation_text: Starting in front of the Gebhards Hotel in the Goetheallee, which forms the interior of our solar system, the planetary path with its stalls leads up to the Hainberg and the Star Wars - as well as a "outland" location in Diemarden (community of the same) with the planet Sedna.
german_text: Beginnend vor Gebhards Hotel in der Goetheallee, die das Innere unseres Sonnensystems bildet, führt der Planetenweg mit seinen Stelen bis hinauf zum Hainberg und zur Sternwarte - sowie einem "außerirdischen" Standort in Diemarden (Gemeinde Gleichen) mit dem Planeten Sedna.
actual_translation: Starting at Gebhards Hotel in Goethealle, which forms the centre of our solar system, the planetary trail leads with its steles up to Hainberg and the observatory – as well as an "extra-terrestrial" location in Diemarden (Municipality of Gleichen) with the planet Sedna.

translation_text: The stalls with the individual planets - including the Pluto degraded to the dragon planet at the end point - are located exactly in the distance and scale of one to two billion.
german_text: Die Stelen mit den einzelnen Planeten - inklusive des zum Zwergplaneten degradierten Pluto am Endpunkt - sind exakt im Abstand und Maßstab von eins zu zwei Milliarden aufgestellt.
actual_translation: The steles with the individual planets – including Pluto, which was downgraded to a dwarf planet, at the end point – are set up at exact intervals and on a scale of one to two billion.

translation_text: The Earth thus shrinks to a ball of 6.5 millimeters in diameter, while the exact 75 meters away sun measures 70 centimeters.
german_text: Die Erde schrumpft so auf eine Kugel von 6,5 Millimeter Durchmesser, während die exakt 75 Meter entfernt stehende Sonne immerhin 70 Zentimeter misst.
actual_translation: The Earth thus shrinks to a ball with a diameter of 6.5 millimetres, while the sun, standing exactly 75 metres away, measures 70 centimetres.

translation_text: The entire distance of the planet is about four kilometers.
german_text: Die gesamte Distanz des Planetenweges beträgt gut vier Kilometer.
actual_translation: The total distance covered by the planetary trail is a good four kilometres.

translation_text: While the light from the sun to Pluto takes about eight hours, pedestrians need a good hour to get to the star with Pluto.
german_text: Während das Licht von Sonne bis zum Pluto etwa acht Stunden benötigt, brauchen Fußgänger eine gute Stunde bis zur Stele mit Pluto.
actual_translation: While the light of the sun needs around eight hours to reach Pluto, pedestrians need a good hour to get to the stele with Pluto.

translation_text: So pedestrians are faster than the light in space.
german_text: Fußgänger sind also schneller als das Licht im Weltall.
actual_translation: So, pedestrians are faster than light in space.

translation_text: But the march to the next fix star would take a half year.
german_text: Der Marsch zum nächsten Fixstern aber würde noch ein halbes Jahr dauern.
actual_translation: The trek to the nearest fixed star would take another half a year though.

translation_text: Mikey Garcia and Vasyl Lomachenko meet for the first time, discussing a possible showdown
german_text: Mikey Garcia und Vasyl Lomachenko treffen sich zum ersten Mal, diskutieren einen möglichen Showdown
actual_translation: Mikey Garcia and Vasyl Lomachenko meet for the first time, discuss a possible showdown

translation_text: Vasyl Lomachenko and Mikey Garcia, who should stand in a collision course to scan the most exciting boxing struggle in the near future under 147 pounds, met for the first time on Thursday.
german_text: Vasyl Lomachenko und Mikey Garcia, die in einem Kollisionskurs stehen sollten, um den spannendsten Boxkampf in naher Zukunft unter 147 Pfund zu inszenieren, trafen sich zum ersten Mal am Donnerstag.
actual_translation: Vasyl Lomachenko and Mikey Garcia, who should be on a collision course to stage the most compelling boxing match under 147 pounds in the near future, met each other for the first time Thursday.

translation_text: They were in separate rooms in ESPN offices in Los Angeles until Garcia, the untouched World Boxing Council lightweight champion, went down to welcome Lomachenko, the World Boxing Organization super-weight champion.
german_text: Sie waren in separaten Räumen in ESPN-Büros in Los Angeles, bis Garcia, der ungeschlagene World Boxing Council Leichtgewicht-Champion, den Flur hinunter ging, um Lomachenko, den World Boxing Organisation Super-Federgewicht-Champion zu begrüßen.
actual_translation: They were in separate rooms at ESPN offices in Los Angeles until Garcia, the unbeaten World Boxing Council lightweight champion, walked down the hallway to greet Lomachenko, the World Boxing Organization super-featherweight champion.

translation_text: After Garcia's victory by unanimous decision on the former four-division world champion Adrien Broner on Saturday on showtime, both fighters are members of the top five pounds for pounds list.
german_text: Nach Garcias Sieg durch einstimmigen Beschluss über den ehemaligen Vier-Divisionen-Weltmeister Adrien Broner am Samstag auf Showtime sind beide Kämpfer Mitglieder der Top-Fünf Pound-for Pound-Liste.
actual_translation: After Garcia's victory by unanimous decision over former four-division world champion Adrien Broner on Saturday on Showtime, both fighters are members of the top-five pound-for-pound list.

translation_text: Garcia stretched out his right hand and said, “How are you, champion?
german_text: Garcia streckte die rechte Hand aus und sagte: "Wie geht es dir, Champion?
actual_translation: Garcia extended his right hand and said, "How you doing, champ?

translation_text: I wish you good luck.”
german_text: Ich wünsche dir viel Glück."
actual_translation: Best of luck to you."

translation_text: Lomachenko defends his belt against Miguel Marriaga on Saturday night at 19:00 on ESPN.
german_text: Lomachenko verteidigt seinen Gürtel gegen Miguel Marriaga am Samstagabend um 19 Uhr auf ESPN.
actual_translation: Lomachenko defends his belt against Miguel Marriaga on Saturday night at 7 on ESPN.

translation_text: When the pair posed for photos, Lomachenko manager Egis Klimas noted that a possible showdown between the fighters would be the "perfect size order".
german_text: Als das Paar für Fotos posierte, bemerkte Lomachenko-Manager Egis Klimas, dass ein möglicher Showdown zwischen den Kämpfern die "perfekte Größenordnung" sein würde.
actual_translation: As the pair posed for photos, Lomachenko manager Egis Klimas noted that a potential showdown between the fighters would be "perfect sizing."

translation_text: “I’m an ex-weight,” Garcia recalled.
german_text: "Ich bin ein ehemaliges Federgewicht", erinnerte Garcia.
actual_translation: "I'm a former featherweight," Garcia reminded.

translation_text: “I’ve risen for Broner, but I’m not so big.
german_text: "Ich bin für Broner [auf 140 Pfund] aufgestiegen, aber ich bin nicht so groß.
actual_translation: "I moved up for Broner [at 140 pounds], but I'm not that big.

translation_text: I am small for 140.
german_text: Ich bin klein für 140.
actual_translation: I'm small for 140.

translation_text: I want to go down to lightweight.
german_text: Ich möchte auf Leichtgewicht herunterkommen.
actual_translation: I want to come down to lightweight.

translation_text: And he has to move on lightweight [135 pounds] and then we fight.
german_text: Und er muss sich auf Leichtgewichtler [135 Pfund] zu bewegen und dann kämpfen wir.
actual_translation: And he's got to move up to lightweight [135 pounds] and then we have a fight.

translation_text: That is what the fans demand.
german_text: Das verlangen die Fans.
actual_translation: That's what the fans are asking for.

translation_text: Let us give them that.”
german_text: Lass uns ihnen das geben."
actual_translation: Let's give them that."

translation_text: Lomachenko agreed.
german_text: Lomachenko stimmte zu.
actual_translation: Lomachenko agreed.

translation_text: “Boxes need this battle.”
german_text: "Boxen braucht diesen Kampf."
actual_translation: "Boxing needs this fight."

translation_text: Climas asked if it should be on Pay-per-View, part of a strategy that Lomachenko has to fight with a 135 pounds debut this year to agree on a date next summer with Garcia (37-0, 30 Knockouts) who also has an interest in fighting against the winner of Jorge Linares-Luke Campbell after their lightweight title struggle in the forum on September 23.
german_text: Klimas fragte, ob es auf Pay-per-View sein sollte, Teil einer Strategie, die Lomachenko mit einem 135-Pfund-Debüt in diesem Jahr kämpfen muss, um im nächsten Sommer mit Garcia ein Datum zu vereinbaren (37-0, 30 Knockouts) der auch Interesse an dem Kampf gegen den Gewinner von Jorge Linares-Luke Campbell nach deren Leichtgewicht-Titelkampf im Forum am 23. September hat.
actual_translation: Klimas asked if it should be on pay-per-view, part of a strategy he has to have Lomachenko fight a 135-pound debut bout later this year to set up a date next summer with Garcia (37-0, 30 knockouts), who also has interest in fighting the Jorge Linares-Luke Campbell winner following their Sept. 23 lightweight title bout at the Forum.

translation_text: “This struggle could take place in Pay-per-View mode because all fans have asked for it,” Garcia said and later openly expressed himself to struggle with the network that offers the best financial package.
german_text: "Dieser Kampf könnte im Pay-per-View-Modus stattfinden, weil alle Fans nach ihm gefragt haben", sagte Garcia und drückte sich später offen aus, bei dem Netzwerk zu kämpfen, das das beste Finanzpaket anbietet.
actual_translation: "This fight could be on pay-per-view because all the fans have been asking about it," Garcia said, later expressing openness to fighting on whatever network offers the best financial package.

translation_text: We are the best.
german_text: Wir sind die Besten.
actual_translation: "We're the main names.

translation_text: No other names can generate this kind of attention.
german_text: Keine anderen Namen können diese Art von Aufmerksamkeit erzeugen.
actual_translation: No other names can generate that kind of attention.

translation_text: Whenever you are ready...”
german_text: Wann immer sie bereit sind ... "
actual_translation: Whenever they're ready ... ."

translation_text: Garcia said he appreciated Lomachenko as a "gigant fighter" and he might be taking part in his Saturday struggle.
german_text: Garcia sagte, er schätze Lomachenko als "einen enormen Kämpfer", und er werde möglicherweise an seinem Samstag-Kampf teilnehmen.
actual_translation: Garcia said he appreciates Lomachenko as "a tremendous fighter," and may attend his Saturday bout.

translation_text: But Lomachenko stopped with the generous praise for Garcia and said he thought the triangle champion from Riverside looks "very slowly out, sorry Mikey ... you wanted the co-out."
german_text: Aber Lomachenko hielt bei dem großzügigem Lob für Garcia an und sagte, dass er denke, der Dreikampf-Champion aus Riverside sehen"sehr langsam aus, tut mir leid Mikey ... du wolltest ja das Ko-Aus".
actual_translation: But Lomachenko paused at lavish praise for Garcia, saying he thought the three-division champion from Riverside looked "very slow, sorry Mikey ... you wanted the knockout."

translation_text: Garcia said the focus is to show the strike strength, then boxes.
german_text: Garcia sagte, der Fokus sei, Schlagstärke zu zeigen, dann Boxen.
actual_translation: Garcia said the focus was to show punching strength, then box.

translation_text: Both said they could feel the moment built for their own struggle.
german_text: Beide sagten, sie könnten das Momentum, das sich für den eigenen Kampf aufbaute, spüren.
actual_translation: They both said they can feel the momentum building for their own bout.

translation_text: “This is the struggle that must be carried out.
german_text: "Dies ist der Kampf, der durchgeführt werden muss.
actual_translation: "This is the fight to be made.

translation_text: No other struggle creates so much attention and enthusiasm.
german_text: Kein anderer Kampf schafft so viel Aufmerksamkeit und Begeisterung.
actual_translation: No other fight creates as much attention and buzz.

translation_text: I’m more than happy to work on it,” Garcia said.
german_text: Ich bin mehr als glücklich, daran zu arbeiten", sagte Garcia.
actual_translation: I'm more than happy to work at it," Garcia said.

translation_text: Lomachenko said, “I’ve been waiting for the top fighters, and that’s Mikey.
german_text: Lomachenko sagte: "Ich habe auf die Top-Kämpfer gewartet, und das ist Mikey.
actual_translation: Said Lomachenko: "I've waited for the top fighters, and this is Mikey.

translation_text: It will be a great battle.”
german_text: Es wird ein toller Kampf sein."
actual_translation: It will be a great fight."

translation_text: Four injured in pneumatic plots
german_text: Vier Verletzte nach Reifenplatzer
actual_translation: Four injured after burst tyre

translation_text: In a crash on the A7 on Thursday afternoon, four people were partially seriously injured.
german_text: Bei einem Unfall auf der A7 wurden am Donnerstag Nachmittag vier Personen zum Teil schwer verletzt.
actual_translation: In an accident on the A7 on Thursday afternoon, four people were injured, some severely.

translation_text: According to the first information, the driver of an Opel Zafira around 16.30 a.m. shortly in front of the connector Marketbreit probably lost control over his vehicle after a tire plate.
german_text: Nach ersten Informationen verlor der Fahrer eines Opel Zafira gegen 16.30 Uhr kurz vor der Anschlussstelle Marktbreit vermutlich nach einem Reifenplatzer die Kontrolle über sein Fahrzeug.
actual_translation: According to initial reports, the driver of an Opel Zaifra lost control of his vehicle at around 4.30pm, shortly before the Marktbreit junction, after a burst tyre.

translation_text: The car slept to the right into the hole, where he broke over and then lie on the roof in the green strip.
german_text: Der Pkw schleuderte nach rechts in die Böschung, wo er sich überschlug und dann auf dem Dach im Grünstreifen liegen blieb.
actual_translation: The car slid right into the embankment, where it overturned and then lay on its roof, on the grass verge.

translation_text: The four inhabitants – two adults and two children – were injured in the accident.
german_text: Die vier Insassen - zwei Erwachsene und zwei Kinder - wurden bei dem Unfall teils schwer verletzt.
actual_translation: The four passengers – two adults and two children – were, in part, severely injured in the accident.

translation_text: During the first delivery of the injured by the rescue service, the A7 was locked to the north for about an hour, after which the traffic on the left trail could be transmitted to the accident point.
german_text: Während der Erstversorgung der Verletzten durch den Rettungsdienst war die A7 in Richtung Norden für etwa eine Stunde gesperrt, anschließend konnte der Verkehr auf dem linken Fahrstreifen an der Unfallstelle vorbeigeleitet werden.
actual_translation: While first aid was being given to the injured by the emergency services, the A7 was closed for around an hour in the northerly direction, before traffic was able to be led round the site of the accident in the left lane.

translation_text: Fortunas Hoffmann: “Three-chain works better”
german_text: Fortunas Hoffmann: "Dreierkette funktioniert besser"
actual_translation: Fortunas Hoffmann: "Three at the back works better"

translation_text: Andre Hoffmann hopes after the 2:2 to the season match against Braunschweig that the optimization of the defense formation will bring points in Aue.
german_text: Andre Hoffmann hofft nach dem 2:2 zum Saisonauftakt gegen Braunschweig, dass die Optimierung der Abwehrformation in Aue Punkte bringt.
actual_translation: Andre Hoffmann hopes after the 2:2 to kick off the season against Braunschweig that the optimisation of the defence formation will bring points in Aue.

translation_text: With the first season, Andre Hoffmann was satisfied, with the result also, if the two opponents were not 2:2 against Braunschweig.
german_text: Mit dem ersten Saisonspiel war Andre Hoffmann zufrieden, mit dem Ergebnis auch, wären da nicht die beiden Gegentore beim 2:2 gegen Braunschweig gewesen.
actual_translation: Andre Hoffmann was content with the first game of the season, and with the result too, were it not for the two own goals in the 2:2 against Braunschweig.

translation_text: “These were two opponents too much, and we have to be more careful in Aue,” said Fortuna’s defense player in Düsseldorf.
german_text: "Das waren zwei Gegentore zu viel, und wir müssen in Aue noch besser aufpassen", sagt der Abwehrspieler von Fortuna Düsseldorf.
actual_translation: "That was two own goals too many, and in Aue, we have to take better care still," says the defender from Fortuna Düsseldorf.

translation_text: In the Arctic Mountains, the three-chain will also be further optimized.
german_text: Im Erzgebirge soll die Dreierkette auch weiter optimiert werden.
actual_translation: The line of three at the back is to be optimised even further in the Ore mountains.

translation_text: And a gate after a freedom will no longer be captured by the fortunes.
german_text: Und ein Tor nach einem Freistoß wollen sich die Fortunen auch nicht mehr einfangen.
actual_translation: And the Fortunas don't want to let in any more goals after free kicks either.

translation_text: “For the future it will be that no one will be on the line next to Michael (Rensing).”
german_text: "Für die Zukunft wird es so sein, dass sich keiner mehr neben Michael (Rensing) auf die Linie stellt."
actual_translation: "In future, no-one will stand on the line next to Michael (Rensing) any more."

translation_text: Hoffmann is convinced that even after his experience in preparation, his team will get better with the three-chain than with the four-chain.
german_text: Hoffmann ist überzeugt, dass seine Mannschaft auch nach den Erfahrungen in der Vorbereitung mit der Dreierkette besser zurechtkommt, als mit der Viererkette.
actual_translation: Hoffmann is convinced that his team manages better with the three-at-the-back formation, even after the experiences in the build-up.

translation_text: “I still don’t know how we’re going to act in Aue,” says his coach Friedhelm Funkel, but Hoffmann is sure of his case, “because we’re just in the third chain on the semi-positions in Kaan Ayhan and Niko Gießelmann players who can build well,” Hoffmann said.
german_text: "Noch weiß ich nicht wie wir in Aue agieren werden", sagt sein Trainer Friedhelm Funkel, doch Hoffmann ist sich seiner Sache sicher, "weil wir gerade in der Dreierkette auf den Halbpositionen in Kaan Ayhan und Niko Gießelmann Spieler haben, die gut aufbauen können", sagte Hoffmann.
actual_translation: "I don't know yet how we will play in Aue," said the coach Friedhelm Funkel, but Hoachmann is sure of himself, "because in Kaan Ayhan and Niko Gießelmann, we particularly have players in the back three in the half positions that can build well," said Hoffmann.

translation_text: “It is a requirement, but that we’re even better harmonizing and we don’t make so many game errors in building.”
german_text: "Voraussetzung ist, aber, dass wir noch besser harmonieren und wir uns im Aufbau nicht so viele Abspielfehler leisten."
actual_translation: "However, a prerequisite is that we harmonise even better together and don't commit so many passing errors in the build up."

translation_text: Of course, Hoffmann also runs to Aue to win the game.
german_text: Natürlich fährt auch Hoffmann nach Aue, um das Spiel zu gewinnen.
actual_translation: Naturally, Hoffmann is also travelling to Aue to win the game.

translation_text: “But if you can talk about a misleading start after a disagreement, I don’t know.
german_text: "Ob man aber nach einem Unentschieden von einem misslungenen Start sprechen kann, weiß nicht.
actual_translation: "Whether after one draw though one can talk of a failed start, I don't know.

translation_text: The performance could be okay,” Hoffmann said.
german_text: Die Leistung könnte ja durchaus okay sein", meinte Hoffmann.
actual_translation: The performance could by all means be okay," said Hoffmann.

translation_text: "But if we stand up with four points on Sunday and can focus on the cup, we will be able to talk about a regular season deal."
german_text: "Falls wir aber am Sonntag mit vier Punkten dastehen und uns auf den Pokal konzentrieren können, werden wir sicherlich von einem ordentlichen Saisonauftakt sprechen können."
actual_translation: "However, if we're standing there on Sunday with four points and can concentrate on the cup, we'll certainly be able to talk of a decent season kick-off."

translation_text: His coach did not know anything about it.
german_text: Davon wollte sein Trainer nichts wissen.
actual_translation: His coach didn't want to hear any of that.

translation_text: “The start of the season I’m judging only after six to eight games,” said Friedhelm Funkel, who doesn’t want to talk about an advantage against Aue, just because the match of the Saxons in Heidenheim had to be interrupted in advance due to an unwinner.
german_text: "Den Start in die Saison beurteile ich erst nach sechs bis acht Spieltagen", sagte Friedhelm Funkel, der nicht von einem Vorteil gegenüber Aue sprechen möchte, nur weil das Spiel der Sachsen in Heidenheim vorzeitig wegen eines Unwetters abgebrochen werden musste.
actual_translation: "I will first judge our start to the season after six to eight matches," said Friedhelm Funkel, who did not wish to talk of an advantage over Aue just because the Saxony team's game in Heidenhelm had to be cut-off early due to a storm.

translation_text: “Now they can almost start the season with a home game,” said Funkel and Hoffmann believing that the players from Aue might even be a little fresh because they don’t have a heavy and complete game like Fortuna against a rise favorit in the bones.
german_text: "Jetzt können sie die Saison quasi mit einem Heimspiel beginnen", sagte Funkel und Hoffmann glaubt, dass die Spieler aus Aue vielleicht sogar etwas frischer sein könnten, da sie kein schweres und komplettes Spiel wie Fortuna gegen einen Aufstiegsfavoriten in den Knochen hätten.
actual_translation: "Now they are effectively able to start the season with a home game," said Funkel, and Hoffman believes that the players from Aue could perhaps even be somewhat fresher, since they don't have any difficult and full games like Fortuna against one of the promotion favourites resting in their bones.

translation_text: “But they don’t know 100% where they’re currently standing,” Fortuna’s internal defense officer says.
german_text: "Aber sie wissen nicht so 100-prozentig wo sie derzeit stehen", sagt der Innenverteidiger der Fortuna.
actual_translation: "But they don't know 100 per cent where they stand at the moment," says the Fortuna central defender.

translation_text: However, the guests from the Rheinland as a light favourite on Sunday go to the meeting at the final (fast) finished stadium of Aue.
german_text: Zwar gehen die Gäste aus dem Rheinland als leichter Favorit am Sonntag in die Begegnung im endlich (fast) fertigen Stadion von Aue.
actual_translation: Admittedly, the guests from the Rhineland go into the encounter on Sunday in the finally (almost) finished Aue stadium as slight favourites.

translation_text: "The fact that we take them away only because we have the claim to get among the first six is foolish," says Funkel, whose balance is quite positive if only one defeat against Aue from nine games.
german_text: "Dass wir sie wegfegen, nur weil wir den Anspruch haben, unter die ersten Sechs zu kommen, ist Blödsinn", sagt Funkel, dessen Bilanz bei nur einer Niederlage gegen Aue aus neun Spielen durchaus positiv ist.
actual_translation: "That we are going to sweep them away just because we can claim a place amongst the top six is ridiculous," says Funkel, whose balance sheet against Aue, with only one defeat in nine games, is thoroughly positive.

translation_text: "There's no team in the 2nd Bundesliga that you have to beat from the forefront," Fortunas Chefcoach said.
german_text: "Es gibt keine Mannschaft in der 2. Bundesliga, die man von vornherein schlagen muss", erklärt Fortunas Chefcoach.
actual_translation: "There is no team in the second Bundesliga that one has to beat from the outset," explains Fortuna's head coach.

translation_text: “To make such a statement would be arrogant and overwhelming.”
german_text: "Eine solche Aussage zu treffen wäre arrogant und überheblich".
actual_translation: "To give such a statement would be arrogant and presumptuous."

translation_text: And so Funkel does not want to experience his players on Sunday.
german_text: Und so will Funkel seine Spieler am Sonntag auf keinen Fall erleben.
actual_translation: And Funkel does not under any circumstances want to see his players like that on Sunday.

translation_text: New results of the Swedish Asylum Age Assessment Test
german_text: Neue Ergebnisse der schwedischen Asylalter-Bewertungstests veröffentlicht
actual_translation: New results of Sweden's asylum age assessment tests released

translation_text: The latest results of tests for asylum seekers in Sweden who have been subjected to a new method for medical assessment of their age show that more than 80 percent of the people tested are older than 18 years old.
german_text: Die jüngsten Ergebnisse von Tests für Asylsuchende in Schweden, die einer neuen Methode zur medizinischen Beurteilung ihres Alters unterzogen wurden, zeigen, dass mehr als 80 Prozent der getesteten Personen älter als 18 Jahre sind. Aber nicht jeder glaubt an die Genauigkeit dieser Ergebnisse.
actual_translation: The latest results of tests on asylum seekers in Sweden subjected to a new method of medically assessing their age show that over 80 percent tested were judged to be older than 18, but not everyone has faith in their accuracy.

translation_text: The Swedish Authority for Forensic Medicine (Rättsmedicinalverket) began testing last year.
german_text: Die schwedische Behörde für Forensische Medizin (Rättsmedicinalverket) hat mit der Durchführung der Tests im vergangenen Jahr begonnen.
actual_translation: Sweden's national Forensic Medicine Agency (Rättsmedicinalverket) started carrying out the tests earlier year.

translation_text: They are intended to make the assessment of age more accurate during the asylum procedure after the Swedish Migration Authority (Migrationsverket) was criticized for mistakes in assessing the correct age of some of the refugees who were minors.
german_text: Sie sollen während des Asylverfahrens die Einschätzung des Alters genauer machen, nachdem die schwedische Migrationsbehörde (Migrationsverket) wegen Fehlern bei der Beurteilung des korrekten Alters einiger Flüchtlinge kritisiert wurde, die minderjährig waren.
actual_translation: They are designed to make age assessment during the asylum process more accurate after the Swedish Migration Agency (Migrationsverket) was criticized for failings in assessing the correct age of some refugees claiming to be underage.

translation_text: To date, Migrationsverket has sent 6,880 cases to be tested and the Forensic Medicine Agency has now published the results of a total of 2,481 tests from the time from the middle of March to 31 July 2017.
german_text: Bis heute hat Migrationsverket 6.880 zu testende Fälle verschickt und die Forensic Medicine Agency hat nun die Ergebnisse von insgesamt 2.481 Tests aus der Zeit von Mitte März bis zum 31. Juli 2017 veröffentlicht.
actual_translation: To date Migrationsverket has sent 6,880 cases to be tested, and the Forensic Medicine Agency has now released the results of a total of 2,481 tests from the period between mid March until July 31st, 2017.

translation_text: Eighty percent (2002) were assessed as 18 or older, while in another 25 cases the Forensic Medicine Agency assessed that the person was "possibly 18 years or older".
german_text: Achtzig Prozent (2002) wurden als 18 oder älter beurteilt, während in weiteren 25 Fällen die Forensic Medicine Agency beurteilte, dass die Person "möglicherweise 18 Jahre oder älter" war.
actual_translation: Eighty percent (2002) were judged to be 18 or over, while in a further 25 cases the Forensic Medicine Agency judged that the subject was "possibly 18 or over."

translation_text: In 432 cases, the conclusion was that the person was "possibly under 18 years of age".
german_text: In 432 Fällen war die Schlussfolgerung, dass die Person "möglicherweise unter 18 Jahre alt ist".
actual_translation: In 432 cases the conclusion was that the person is "possibly under 18."

translation_text: The tests are only performed in cases where the age of the person is questioned.
german_text: Die Tests werden nur in Fällen durchgeführt, in denen das Alter der Person in Frage gestellt wird.
actual_translation: The tests are only carried out in cases where the person's age is in question.

translation_text: According to Johan Göransson of the Forensic Medicine Agency, the results have been stable over the past months.
german_text: Laut Johan Göransson von der Forensic Medicine Agency, sind die Ergebnisse bei den vergangenen Monaten beständig.
actual_translation: According to Johan Göransson from the Forensic Medicine Agency, the results are consistent with previous months.

translation_text: "We see no big difference in the statistics of the past months, the numbers are quite constant," he told The Local magazine.
german_text: "Wir sehen keinen großen Unterschied in der Statistik der vergangenen Monate, die Zahlen sind ziemlich konstant", sagte er der Zeitschrift The Local.
actual_translation: "We see no big difference in the statistics from previous months, the numbers are quite consistent," he told The Local.

translation_text: The high percentage of cases in which the person was judged as over 18 years of age does not necessarily mean that the asylum applicant has lied about his age.
german_text: Der hohe Anteil von Fällen, in der die Person als über 18 Jahre beurteilt wurde, bedeutet nicht unbedingt, dass der Asylbewerber über sein Alter gelogen hat.
actual_translation: The high proportion of cases judged to be over 18 does not necessarily mean that the asylum seeker lied about their age.

translation_text: In May, the agency published the results of 581 tests and said there were 442 cases that "proposed that the person examined was 18 years or older."
german_text: Im Mai veröffentlichte die Agentur die Ergebnisse von 581 Tests und sagte, dass es 442 Fälle gebe, die "vorschlagen, dass die untersuchte Person 18 Jahre oder älter sei".
actual_translation: In May, the agency released the results of 581 tests and said that there were 442 instances that "suggest the person examined is 18 years or older."

translation_text: When the newspaper Svenska Dagbladet examined the 581 results published, it found that in 243 of these cases the person had openly said that he would be 18 years old this year.
german_text: Als die Zeitung Svenska Dagbladet die 581 veröffentlichten Ergebnisse untersuchte, stellte sie fest, dass in 243 dieser Fälle die Person offen gesagt hatte, dass sie in diesem Jahr 18 Jahre alt werde.
actual_translation: When newspaper Svenska Dagbladet investigated the 581 results released however it found that in 243 of the cases the person had openly stated that they turn 18 this year.

translation_text: The method of medical age assessment, in which röntgen screens of wisdom teeth and MRI screens of knee joints are then analyzed by dentists and radiologists, has also been criticized in some areas.
german_text: Die Methode der medizinischen Altersbeurteilung, bei der Röntgenaufnahmen von Weisheitszähnen und MRT-Aufnahmen von Kniegelenken gemacht werden, die dann von Zahnärzten und Radiologen analysiert werden, wurde auch in einigen Bereichen kritisiert.
actual_translation: The method of medical age assessment, which consists of taking X-rays of wisdom teeth and MRI scans of knee joints, then having dentists and radiologists analyse them, has also been criticised in some quarters.

translation_text: A skeptic is the endocrinologist Claude Marcus of the Karolinska Institute, whose work includes evaluating the biological maturity of people to see if they went through puberty sooner or later as usual.
german_text: Ein Skeptiker ist der Endokrinologe Claude Marcus des Karolinska-Instituts, dessen Arbeit die Beurteilung der biologischen Reife von Menschen umfasst, um zu sehen, ob sie früher oder später als gewöhnlich durch die Pubertät gingen.
actual_translation: One sceptic is Karolinska Institute endocrinologist Claude Marcus, whose work includes assessing the biological maturity of people to see if they went through puberty earlier or later than usual.

translation_text: "I had reason to think about it, and I don't think the type of measurement should be used.
german_text: "Ich hatte Grund, darüber nachzudenken, und ich glaube nicht, dass die Art der Messung verwendet werden sollte.
actual_translation: "I've had reason to think about this, and I don't think the type of measurement being used should be.

translation_text: To assess the biological age in this way is very uncertain.
german_text: Das biologische Alter auf diese Weise zu beurteilen, ist sehr unsicher.
actual_translation: Judging biological age in this way is very uncertain.

translation_text: If we can’t say it with certainty, we shouldn’t do as if we could,” he told Metro.
german_text: Wenn wir es nicht sicher sagen können, sollten wir nicht so tun, als ob wir es könnten", sagte er der Zeitung Metro.
actual_translation: If we can't say it for sure we shouldn't pretend that we can," he told newspaper Metro.

translation_text: Göransson of the Forensic Medicine Agency, however, defended the accuracy of the tests: "In general, you can say that the risk of wrongly assessing a child as an adult is low.
german_text: Göransson von der Forensic Medicine Agency verteidigte jedoch die Genauigkeit der Tests: "Im Allgemeinen können Sie sagen, dass das Risiko, ein Kind als Erwachsenen unrichtig zu beurteilen, gering ist.
actual_translation: The Forensic Medicine Agency's Göransson defended the accuracy of the tests however: "In general you can say that the risk of inaccurately judging a child to be an adult is small.

translation_text: The greatest risk is when the person is less than 18, in this case it is about 10 percent.”
german_text: Das größte Risiko liegt darin, wenn die Person knapp unter 18 ist, in diesem Fall sind dies ungefähr 10 Prozent."
actual_translation: The biggest risk is if the person is just under 18, in which case it's around 10 percent."

translation_text: Full in plan
german_text: Voll im Plan
actual_translation: Right on target

translation_text: The work on the three bridges of Landstraße 108 between Lauterbach and Schramberg is going well forward.
german_text: Die Arbeiten an den drei Brücken der Landstraße 108 zwischen Lauterbach und Schramberg kommen gut voran.
actual_translation: The works on the three bridges of the L 108 road, between Lauterbach and Schramberg, are progressing well.

translation_text: On Wednesday, a seven-ton heavy concrete was installed on the bridge at the east entrance of Lauterbach.
german_text: Am Mittwoch wurde ein sieben Tonnen schweres Betonteil an der Brücke am östlichen Ortseingang von Lauterbach installiert.
actual_translation: On Wednesday, a seven-tonne piece of concrete was installed at the bridge at the East entrance to the town of Lauterbach.

translation_text: “We’re very good in time, it’s going super,” says Reinhold Leicht, head of construction at the department of road and transport at the government presidency of Freiburg.
german_text: "Wir sind sehr gut in der Zeit, es läuft super", sagt Reinhold Leicht, Bauleiter bei der Abteilung Straßenwesen und Verkehr im Regierungspräsidium Freiburg.
actual_translation: "We're doing very well for time – it's going great," says Reinhold Leicht, site manager at the department of road engineering and transport in the Freiburg local government.

translation_text: In April, the work began at the same time on all three recovery-need bridges between Schramberg and Lauterbach.
german_text: Im April begannen die Arbeiten gleichzeitig an allen drei sanierungsbedürftigen Brücken zwischen Schramberg und Lauterbach.
actual_translation: In April, works began on all three bridges in need of refurbishment between Schramberg and Lauterbach at the same time.

translation_text: The construction end is scheduled for October and it is easy to be sure that the schedule will be followed.
german_text: Das Bauende ist für Oktober vorgesehen und Leicht ist sich sicher, dass der Zeitplan eingehalten wird.
actual_translation: The works are scheduled to be completed in October, and Leicht is certain that the timetable will be stuck to.

translation_text: The first bridge, coming from Schramberg, leads through the Trombach.
german_text: Die erste Brücke, von Schramberg kommend, führt über den Trombach.
actual_translation: The first bridge, coming from Schramberg, leads over the Trombach.

translation_text: It is a cylinder bridge made of concrete, dressed with red sandstone and has a total length of 4.80 meters.
german_text: Sie ist eine Gewölbebogenbrücke aus Beton, der mit rotem Buntsandstein verkleidet ist und hat eine Gesamtlänge von 4,80 Meter.
actual_translation: It is a vaulted arch bridge made of concrete that is covered in red variegated sandstone and has a total length of 4.80 metres.

translation_text: It was built in 1900.
german_text: Gebaut wurde sie im Jahr 1900.
actual_translation: It was built in 1900.

translation_text: Like the other two bridges, it has now come into the years.
german_text: Wie die beiden anderen Brücken auch, ist sie mittlerweile in die Jahre gekommen.
actual_translation: Like the other two bridges, it is old by now.

translation_text: In order to ensure stability and traffic safety, the three buildings are now being thoroughly renovated.
german_text: Um die Standfestigkeit und die Verkehrssicherheit zu gewährleisten, werden die drei Bauwerke nun gründlich saniert.
actual_translation: In order to ensure their stability and road safety, the three structures now have to be thoroughly renovated.

translation_text: The other two bridges lead over the Lauterbach.
german_text: Die beiden anderen Brücken führen über den Lauterbach.
actual_translation: The two other bridges lead over the Lauterbach.

translation_text: They are made of red sandstone.
german_text: Sie sind aus rotem Buntsandstein gebaut.
actual_translation: They are made of variegated sandstone.

translation_text: Both were built in 1939 and are twelve, or 10.60 meters long.
german_text: Beide wurden im Jahr 1939 errichtet und sind zwölf, beziehungsweise 10,60 Meter lang.
actual_translation: Both were erected in 1939 and they are twelve and 10.60 metres high, respectively.

translation_text: The bridge at the local entrance of Lauterbach has now received a 1.30 meters wide and seven tons heavy so-called bridge cap on the north side on Wednesday morning.
german_text: Die Brücke am Ortseingang von Lauterbach hat nun am Mittwochmorgen auf der Nordseite eine 1,30 Meter breite und sieben Tonnen schwere so genannte Brückenkappe erhalten.
actual_translation: The bridge at the East entrance to the town of Lauterbach has now – as of Wednesday morning – been given a 1.30-metre-wide and seven-tonne-heavy so-called bridge parapet on its north side.

translation_text: This is a border fixation, which is also used as an operating path.
german_text: Das ist eine Randbefestigung, die auch als Betriebsweg benutzt wird.
actual_translation: This fixes the boundary and is also used as a passenger path.

translation_text: On the southern part of the bridge, a 2.20 meters wide bridge will be deployed on Friday.
german_text: Am südlichen Teil der Brücke soll am Freitag eine 2,20 Meter breite Brückenkappe eingesetzt werden.
actual_translation: A 2.20-metre-wide bridge parapet is to be put in place on the south part of the bridge on Friday.

translation_text: Then the pedestrian path will go through.
german_text: Darauf soll dann der Fußgängerweg verlaufen.
actual_translation: The pedestrian walkway is intended to then to run over that.

translation_text: The special thing is that these are finished parts, a patent of the Schramberger company Dizwo.
german_text: Das besondere daran ist, dass es sich dabei um Fertigteile handelt, ein Patent der Schramberger Firma Dizwo.
actual_translation: What is special about this is that is uses finished parts, a patent of the Schramberg company Dizwo.

translation_text: The other two bridges are already equipped with the patented bridges.
german_text: Die anderen beiden Brücken sind bereits mit den patentierten Brückenkappen versehen.
actual_translation: The other two bridges are already kitted out with the patented bridge parapets.

translation_text: A special feeling of fingerprints requires the shift of lines through the building in Lauterbach.
german_text: Besonderes Fingerspitzengefühl hat das Verlegen von Leitungen durch das Bauwerk in Lauterbach erfordert.
actual_translation: Laying cables through the structure in Lauterbach required particular flair.

translation_text: Because there is also a glass fiber cable, to which many companies are connected.
german_text: Denn dort verläuft auch ein Glasfaserkabel, an das viele Firmen angeschlossen sind.
actual_translation: For a fibreglass cable also runs there, which many companies are connected to.

translation_text: Residents were informed by handcards about the project in advance of the work.
german_text: Die Anwohner wurden im Vorfeld der Arbeiten durch Handzettel über das Vorhaben informiert.
actual_translation: In the run-up to the works, residents were informed about the project via a leaflet.

translation_text: In addition, fish and cancers had to be detached.
german_text: Außerdem mussten zunächst Fische und Krebse abgefischt werden.
actual_translation: Fish and crabs must also be fished out first.

translation_text: For the bridges between the building and the collective floor in the direction of Schramberg, the traffic is uniformly regulated by a lamp.
german_text: Für die Brücken zwischen dem Bauhofgebäude und dem Sammelweiher in Richtung Schramberg ist der Verkehr einspurig durch eine Ampel geregelt.
actual_translation: For the bridges between the construction yard building and the lake reservoir in the direction of Schramberg, traffic is single-lane and regulated by lights.

translation_text: For the construction work on the bridge at Lauterbacher Ortseingang, the road in the bridge area at the height of the hotels "Tannenhof" and "Seven Linden" is completely locked.
german_text: Für die Bauarbeiten an der Brücke am Lauterbacher Ortseingang ist die Straße im Bereich der Brücke auf Höhe der Hotels "Tannenhof" und "Sieben Linden" voll gesperrt.
actual_translation: For the construction works on the bridge at the East entrance to the town of Lauterbach, the road in the area of the bridge, where the "Tannenhof" and "Sieben Linden" hotels are, is fully closed.

translation_text: The cost of the three bridges is 700,000 euros.
german_text: Die Kosten für die drei Brückensanierungen betragen zusammen 700 000 Euro.
actual_translation: Altogether, the costs for the three bridge renovations total 700 000 euros.

translation_text: It is all financed by the country.
german_text: Finanziert wird das Ganze durch das Land.
actual_translation: The entire project is being funded by the state.

translation_text: AfD in Gerolstein: Protest at German potato salad
german_text: AfD in Gerolstein: Bunter Protest bei deutschem Kartoffelsalat
actual_translation: AfD in Gerolstein: Colourful protest with German potato salad

translation_text: It does not happen so often that parties pull on a string, but when it comes to the Alternative for Germany (AfD) comes together, which otherwise is hard to put under a hat.
german_text: Es kommt ja nicht so häufig vor, dass Parteien an einem Strang ziehen, aber wenn es um die Alternative für Deutschland (AfD) geht, kommt zusammen, was sonst nur schwer unter einen Hut zu bringen ist.
actual_translation: It doesn't happen that often that parties pull together, but when it concerns the Alternative for Germany (AfD), people come together who would otherwise be difficult to reconcile.

translation_text: The parties (CDU, SPD, Green, FDP, FWG, Left) are part of a broad alliance that peacefully shares flag on that day because the AfD in the Gerolstein City Hall of Rondell invites to the so-called poster "Great Electoral Campaign Act".
german_text: Die im Kreistag Vulkaneifel vertretenen Parteien (CDU, SPD, Grüne, FDP, FWG, Linke) gehören zu einem breiten Bündnis, das an diesem Tag friedlich Flagge zeigt, weil die AfD in der Gerolsteiner Stadthalle Rondell zum laut Plakat "großen Wahlkampfauftakt" einlädt.
actual_translation: The parties who represent in the Vulkan Eifel district council (CDU, SPD, the Greens, FDP, FWG, die Linke) belong to a broad alliance that is peacefully nailing its colours to the mast on this day because the AfD are holding a "big kick-off to the election campaign" in Gerolstein Town Hall plaza.

translation_text: And it brings known names to the start - like Alice Weidel, who together with Alexander Gauland forms the top duo for the Bundestag elections on 24 September, and the deputy federal chairman Beatrix von Storch.
german_text: Und bekannte Namen an den Start bringt - wie Alice Weidel, die zusammen mit Alexander Gauland das Spitzenduo für die Bundestagswahl am 24. September bildet, und die stellvertretende Bundesvorsitzende Beatrix von Storch.
actual_translation: And are launching famous names – like Alice Weidel, who together with Alexander Gauland makes up the leading duo for the Bundestag elections on 24th September, and the federal deputy chairwoman, Beatrix von Storch.

translation_text: But those who are on the site hours before the event begins don’t want to listen to the AfD teachers, but to demonstrate.
german_text: Aber die, die schon Stunden vor Beginn der Veranstaltung vor Ort sind, wollen nicht den AfD-lern zuhören, sondern demonstrieren.
actual_translation: But those who have been on site for hours already before the start of the event don't want to listen to the AfD, but rather, demonstrate.

translation_text: The motto is “The Eifel remains colourful.”
german_text: Das Motto "Die Eifel bleibt bunt".
actual_translation: The motto: "Eifel is staying colourful."

translation_text: Originally, the city picnic was planned under the motto "all on a table" on the fountain square, but now takes place on the parking lot below the ronde - and thus directly in front of the eyes of those who come to the AfD event in the city hall.
german_text: Ursprünglich war das Stadt-Picknick unter dem Motto "Alle an einem Tisch" auf dem Brunnenplatz geplant, findet aber nun auf dem Parkplatz unterhalb des Rondells statt - und damit direkt vor den Augen derer, die zur AfD-Veranstaltung in der Stadthalle kommen.
actual_translation: Originally the town picnic was planned for Brunnenplatz square under the motto "everyone at one table", but now is taking place in the carpark beneath the shopping plaza – and therefore directly in sight of those coming to the AfD event in the Town Hall.

translation_text: A colorful picture that is presented.
german_text: Ein buntes Bild, das sich da bietet.
actual_translation: A colourful picture on show there.

translation_text: And what Christa Karoli, the chairman of the Forum One World and one of the important organizers, really pleased: “That’s great how many people have gathered here.”
german_text: Und was Christa Karoli, Vorsitzende der Forums Eine Welt und eine der maßgeblichen Organisatoren, richtig freut: "Toll, wie viele Leute hier zusammengekommen sind".
actual_translation: And what really delighted Christa Karoli, chairperson of the Eine Welt (One World) Forum and one of the leading organisers: "It's great how many people have come together here."

translation_text: There’s music and a lot of food, including a “German potato salad that the AfD could easily eat,” says the woman who brought him.
german_text: Es gibt Musik und jede Menge Essen, darunter ein "urdeutscher Kartoffelsalat, den auch die AfD problemlos essen könnte", sagt die Frau, die ihn mitgebracht hat.
actual_translation: There's music and all sorts of food, including a "typical German potato salad" that even the AfD would have no problem eating," said the woman who had brought it.

translation_text: Police have ordered many officers to Gerolstein, showing their presence especially at the railway station, which is just a few meters away from the events.
german_text: Die Polizei hat viele Beamte nach Gerolstein beordert, sie zeigt Präsenz vor allem auch am Bahnhof, der nur wenige Meter von den Veranstaltungsorten entfernt ist.
actual_translation: The police had summoned lots of officials to Gerolstein and were above all also present at the train station, which is only a few metres away from the event locations.

translation_text: How did the AfD actually come to Gerolstein?
german_text: Wie ist die AfD eigentlich auf Gerolstein gekommen?
actual_translation: How did the AfD make it to Gerolstein, actually?

translation_text: Mario Hompes from the AfD Vulkaneifel reports that he has strived for such an event and received the supplement.
german_text: Mario Hompes von der AfD Vulkaneifel berichtet, er habe sich um eine solche Veranstaltung bemüht und den Zuschlag bekommen.
actual_translation: Mario Hompe from the Vulkan Eifel AfD reports that he strove hard to get such an event and that he won the contract.

translation_text: The 45-year-old from Gönnersdorf had initially requested in Daun, but there he received a refusal because due to the already built Laurentiuskirmes there were not enough parking spaces.
german_text: Der 45-Jährige aus Gönnersdorf hatte zunächst in Daun nachgefragt, dort aber eine Absage bekommen, weil wegen der bereits aufgebauten Laurentiuskirmes nicht genug Parkplätze vorhanden seien.
actual_translation: The 45-year-old from Gönndersdorf had originally inquired in Daun, but had got a no there because there were not enough parking places available due to the St. Lawrence funfair already being set up.

translation_text: So now the Rondell, Hompes is glad that "we can have such a nice event here."
german_text: Nun also das Rondell, Hompes freut sich, dass "wir so eine schöne Veranstaltung hier haben können".
actual_translation: So now, the shopping plaza; Hompes is delighted that "we are able to hold such a wonderful event here".

translation_text: Looking at the event on the Rondell Square, he says: "This is the right of the people, the main thing, it remains peaceful."
german_text: Mit Blick auf die Veranstaltung auf dem Rondellvorplatz sagt er: "Das ist das gute Recht der Leute, Hauptsache, es bleibt friedlich".
actual_translation: With a view to the event on the plaza forecourt he says: "It's the people's right. The main this is that it stays peaceful".

translation_text: It also does that: Around 20 a.m. on the Rondellvorplatz a band for entertainment, in the city hall several speakers, including the Rhine-Palestine AfD chairman Uwe Junge.
german_text: Das tut es auch: Gegen 20 Uhr sorgt auf dem Rondellvorplatz eine Band für Unterhaltung, in der Stadthalle diverse Redner, darunter der rheinland-pfälzische AfD-Vorsitzende Uwe Junge.
actual_translation: And it does: at around 8pm some entertainment is provided, by a band on the plaza forecourt, and in the town hall, by various speakers, including Rhineland-Palatinate AfD chairman Uwe Junge.

translation_text: There are approximately 200 listeners in the hall waiting for the top candidate for the Bundestag election, Alice Weidel, and Deputy Federal President Beatrix von Storch to hold their speeches.
german_text: Im Saal sind etwa 200 Zuhörer, die darauf warten, dass die Spitzenkandidatin für die Bundestagswahl, Alice Weidel, und die stellvertretende Bundesvorsitzende Beatrix von Storch ihre Reden halten.
actual_translation: In the hall there are about 200 in attendance, waiting for the leading candidate for the Bundestag elections, Alice Weidel, and the federal deputy chairwoman, Beatrix von Storch, to give their speeches.

translation_text: Police's presence is unchanged, but so far the officers had a quiet evening.
german_text: Unverändert ist die Polizeipräsenz, aber bislang hatten die Beamten einen ruhigen Abend.
actual_translation: The police presence is unchanged, but until now the officials have had a quiet evening.

translation_text: The AfD event takes a little more than an hour, the guests on the front square have a longer breath, but also there it is necessary to clean up shortly after 21:00.
german_text: Etwas mehr als eine Stunde dauert die AfD-Veranstaltung, die Gäste auf dem Vorplatz haben einen längeren Atem, aber auch dort ist kurz nach 21 Uhr aufräumen angesagt.
actual_translation: The AfD event lasts a little more than an hour; the guests in the forecourt have a long wind, but even there it is time to clear up shortly after 9pm.

translation_text: Police can shut down - no special incidents.
german_text: Die Polizei kann abrücken - keine besonderen Vorkommnisse.
actual_translation: The police can go away – no specific incidents.

translation_text: Posaune met with Trompete
german_text: Posaune trifft Trompete
actual_translation: Trombone meets trumpet

translation_text: A repetition with the Wolfacher Posaunist Frederic Belli is present in the series of Haslacher Monastery concerts tomorrow, Sunday, at 20:00 in the Monastery Church.
german_text: Ein Wiederhören mit dem Wolfacher Posaunisten Frederic Belli gibt es in der Reihe Haslacher Klosterkonzerte morgen, Sonntag, um 20 Uhr in der Klosterkirche.
actual_translation: There is another chance to hear Wolfach trombonist Frederic Belli in the series of Haslach cloister concerts tomorrow, Sunday, at 8pm in the monastery church.

translation_text: Together with the Bulgarian trompetist Miroslav Petkov, he gives a concert under the motto "Black Sea encounters Black Forest", or just "Balkan Folklore" encounters a classic German training with roots in blues music.
german_text: Zusammen mit dem bulgarischen Trompeter Miroslav Petkov gibt er ein Konzert unter dem Motto "Schwarzmeer trifft auf Schwarzwald", oder eben auch "Balkanfolklore" trifft auf eine klassische deutsche Ausbildung mit Wurzeln in der Blasmusik.
actual_translation: Together with the Bulgarian trumpeter Miroslav Petkov, he is giving a concert that carries the slogan "The Black Sea meets the Black Forest", or even, "Balkan folklore" meets a classic German education with roots in brass music.

translation_text: Both solists are winners and winners of numerous international competitions and have solopositions in European top orchestras.
german_text: Beide Solisten sind Gewinner und Preisträger zahlreicher internationaler Wettbewerbe und haben Solopositionen in europäischen Spitzenorchestern inne.
actual_translation: Both soloists are winners and awardees of numerous international competitions and hold soloist positions in leading European orchestras.

translation_text: Petkov is solotrompeter at the renowned Concertgebouw Orchestra Amsterdam and Frederic Belli is soloposaunist of the SWR Symphony Orchestra.
german_text: So ist Petkov Solotrompeter beim renommierten Concertgebouw Orchester Amsterdam und Frederic Belli ist Soloposaunist des SWR Symphonieorchesters.
actual_translation: So, Petkov is solo trumpeter with the renowned Concertgebouw Orchestra in Amsterdam, and Frederic Belli is solo trombonist with the SWR Symphony Orchestra.

translation_text: Both unite the desire not only to cross the boundaries on their instruments, but also to mix the boundaries of the different genres.
german_text: Beide vereint die Lust, nicht nur die Grenzen auf ihren Instrumenten zu überschreiten, sondern auch die Grenzen der verschiedenen Genres zu verschmelzen.
actual_translation: Both have in common a passion not only for transcending the boundaries of their instruments but also for conflating the boundaries of the various genres.

translation_text: Thus, Johann Sebastian Bach tells the two as in a new dress, Daniel Schnyders "World Music" unites with Bulgarian folklore, and in the piece "Exchange Suite" of Jazze Priest Nils Wogram, classics, jazz and free play mix into a fascinating overall artwork.
german_text: So erklingt Johann Sebastian Bach bei den beiden wie in einem neuen Gewand, Daniel Schnyders "Weltmusik" vereint sich mit bulgarischer Folklore, und im Stück "Exchange Suite" des Jazzechopreisträgers Nils Wogram, vermischen sich Klassik, Jazz und das freie Spielen zu einem faszinierenden Gesamtkunstwerk.
actual_translation: So, Johann Sebastian Bach played by the two of them takes on a whole new sound, Daniel Schnyder's "Weltmusik" unites with Bulgarian folklore, and in the piece "Exchange Suits" from JazzEcho prize-winner Nils Wogram, they blend classical, jazz and free play into a fascinating complete art work.

translation_text: This core part of the program was launched only this spring with huge success in Freiburg.
german_text: Dieses Kernstück des Programms wurde erst dieses Frühjahr mit riesigem Erfolg in Freiburg uraufgeführt.
actual_translation: This centrepiece of the programme had its debut performance in Freiburg this spring, to great success.

translation_text: The renowned composer Nils Wogram has written it specifically for the two musicians and more: The Haslacher Monastery Church with its special acoustics is consciously included in the concert.
german_text: Der renommierte Komponist Nils Wogram hat es eigens für die beiden Musiker geschrieben und mehr noch: Die Haslacher Klosterkirche mit ihrer besonderen Akustik wird bewusst in das Konzert mit einbezogen.
actual_translation: The renowned composer Nils Wogram wrote it especially for the two musicians and there's more: the Haslach monastery church, with its special acoustic, was consciously incorporated into the concert.

translation_text: Kristen Stewart talks about her bisexuality
german_text: Kristen Stewart spricht über ihre Bisexualität
actual_translation: Kristen Stewart talks about her bisexuality

translation_text: Some people love grilled cheese and will eat it until the end of their lives.
german_text: "Einige Menschen lieben gegrillten Käse und werden ihn bis ans Ende ihres Lebens essen.
actual_translation: "Some people love grilled cheese and will eat it for the rest of their lives.

translation_text: But I want to try it all,” Kristen Stewart says very openly about her bisexuality.
german_text: Aber ich möchte alles ausprobieren", so Kristen Stewart ganz offen über ihre Bisexualität.
actual_translation: But I want to try everything." This is what Kristen Stewart said in total frankness on the topic of her bisexuality.

translation_text: “When I kiss in grilled cheese, I think, ‘Oh, it was cool, what’s next?’”
german_text: "Wenn ich einmal in gegrillten Käse beiße, denke ich: 'Oh das war cool, was kommt als Nächstes?'."
actual_translation: "If I bite into grilled cheese once, I think, 'Oh, that was cool, what's next?'".

translation_text: The Hollywood star's most well-known relationship was that with her "Twilight" colleague Robert Pattinson, who eventually bitterly defeated.
german_text: Die wohl bekannteste Beziehung des Hollywoodstars war die zu ihrem "Twilight"-Kollegen Robert Pattinson, die letztendlich bitter auseinanderging.
actual_translation: The Hollywood star's most famous relationship was probably that with her "Twilight" co-star Robert Pattinson, which came apart bitterly in the end.

translation_text: Despite all this, the brune actress told the Harper’s Bazaar magazine: “I was seriously in love with everyone I’ve dated.
german_text: Trotz alledem versichert die brünette Darstellerin gegenüber dem "Harper's Bazaar"-Magazin: "Ich war in jeden ernsthaft verliebt, den ich gedatet habe.
actual_translation: Despite all that, the brunette actress assures "Harper's Bazaar" magazine: "I've been deeply in love with everyone I've dated.

translation_text: Or do you think I had played it?”
german_text: Oder glaubt ihr etwa, ich hätte es gespielt?"
actual_translation: Or did you think I was faking it?"

translation_text: After her divorce, Kristen admitted that she was bisexual: "I have always lived the dualism and seriously believed in it.
german_text: Nach ihrer Trennung gab Kristen zu, dass sie bisexuell sei: "Ich habe den Dualismus schon immer gelebt und ernsthaft daran geglaubt.
actual_translation: After their split, Kristen came out as bisexual: "I've always really lived for that duality and seriously believed in it.

translation_text: So it has never confused me or hindered me.
german_text: Es hat mich also noch nie verwirrt oder behindert.
actual_translation: It has never confused me or held me back.

translation_text: I just never liked not being taken seriously."
german_text: Ich mochte es nur noch nie, nicht ernst genommen zu werden."
actual_translation: I just never liked being made fun of."

translation_text: She suffered, according to "Bang Showbiz" but in school time, when she preferred to dress like a bub: "Not all girls are typical girls.
german_text: Besonders darunter gelitten habe sie laut "Bang Showbiz" aber in der Schulzeit, als sie sich lieber wie ein Bub kleidete: "Nicht alle Mädchen sind typische Mädchen.
actual_translation: She suffered from this especially in her school days, according to "Bang Showbiz", when she preferred to dress like a boy: "Not all girls are typical girls.

translation_text: It really hurt me very much.
german_text: Das hat mich wirklich sehr verletzt.
actual_translation: That really, really hurt me.

translation_text: When I was eleven, the kids told me I would look like a bub.
german_text: Als ich elf war sagten mir die Kinder, ich würde wie ein Bub aussehen.
actual_translation: When I was eleven, kids told me I looked like a boy.

translation_text: I really felt attacked, scared and shameful.
german_text: Ich fühlte mich wirklich angegriffen, verängstigt und beschämt.
actual_translation: I felt really attacked, frightened and ashamed.

translation_text: Now I look back and think, ‘My girl, be proud of you.’”
german_text: Nun schau ich zurück und denke mir: 'Mädchen, sei stolz auf dich!'."
actual_translation: Now I look back and think: 'Girl, be proud of yourself!'".

translation_text: Especially to the public, she doesn’t like to explain her love life: “People expect you to behave in a certain way and that annoys me.
german_text: Besonders der Öffentlichkeit erkläre sie nicht gerne ihr Liebesleben: "Die Leute erwarten, dass du dich auf eine gewisse Art und Weise verhältst und das ärgert mich.
actual_translation: She particularly doesn't like explaining her love life to the public: "People expect you to behave in a certain way, and that makes me angry.

translation_text: And maybe some call me unacceptable, but I don’t like to have to justify myself before the whole public.”
german_text: Und vielleicht bezeichnen mich einige als undankbar, aber ich mag es nicht, mich vor der ganzen Öffentlichkeit rechtfertigen zu müssen."
actual_translation: And maybe some people call me ungrateful, but I don't like having to justify myself to the entire public."

translation_text: Governor of West Virginia announces he's changing the party
german_text: Der Gouverneur von West Virginia kündigt an, dass er die Partei wechselt
actual_translation: West Virginia governor announces he's switching parties

translation_text: The Democratic Governor of West Virginia, Jim Justice, announced on Thursday night in a protest with President Trump that he would change the party.
german_text: . Der demokratische Gouverneur von West Virginia, Jim Justice, kündigte Donnerstagabend bei einer Kundgebung mit Präsident Trump an, dass er die Partei wechseln werde.
actual_translation: The Democratic governor of West Virginia, Jim Justice, announced Thursday night at a rally with President Trump that he's switching parties.

translation_text: Whether you like it or not, the Democrats have gone away from me,” Governor Justice said.
german_text: Ob Sie es mögen oder nicht, die Demokraten haben sich von mir entfernt", sagte Gouverneur Justice.
actual_translation: "Like it or not like it, the Democrats walked away from me," Gov. Justice said.

translation_text: “Today I’ll tell you with many prayers and a lot of thought...Today I’ll tell you as a resident of West Virginia, I can’t help you if I’m a democratic governor.”
german_text: "Heute werde ich Ihnen mit vielen Gebeten und viel Nachdenken erzählen ... heute werde ich Ihnen als Einwohner von West Virginia sagen, ich kann Ihnen nicht mehr helfen, wenn ich ein demokratischer Gouverneur bin."
actual_translation: "Today I will tell you with lots of prayers and lots of thinking ... today I will tell you as West Virginians, I can't help you anymore being a Democratic governor."

translation_text: The discourse broke out in joy.
german_text: Die Kundgebung brach in Jubel aus.
actual_translation: The rally erupted in cheers.

translation_text: “I’m going to change my registration to the Republicans tomorrow,” Justice added.
german_text: "Morgen werde ich meine Registrierung zu den Republikanern ändern", fügte Justice hinzu.
actual_translation: "So tomorrow, I will be changing my registration to Republican," Justice added.

translation_text: “As a coach, I would say it’s time to play another game.”
german_text: "Als Trainer würde ich sagen, dass es an der Zeit ist, ein anderes Spiel zu spielen."
actual_translation: "As a coach, I would tell you it's time to run another play."

translation_text: Mr. Trump previously promised a big announcement at the West Virginia Rally.
german_text: Mr. Trump versprach vorher eine große Ankündigung bei der West Virginia Rallye.
actual_translation: Mr. Trump promised earlier a big announcement at the West Virginia rally.

translation_text: Mr. Trump won West Virginia with 42 points, and Justice won not the Democratic candidate Hillary Clinton.
german_text: Mr. Trump gewann West Virginia mit 42 Punkten, und Justice billigte nicht die demokratische Kandidatin Hillary Clinton.
actual_translation: Mr. Trump won West Virginia by 42 points, and Justice did not endorse the Democratic nominee, Hillary Clinton.

translation_text: Justice, who according to Forbes is the only billionaire in the state, was elected in 2016.
german_text: Justice, der laut Forbes der einzige Milliardär im Staat ist, wurde 2016 gewählt.
actual_translation: Justice, who is the only billionaire in the state, according to Forbes, was elected in 2016.

translation_text: Forbes finds that he owns coal in five states and has inherited a coal business from his father.
german_text: Forbes stellt fest, dass er Kohleminen in fünf Staaten besitzt, und von seinem Vater ein Kohlengeschäft geerbt habe.
actual_translation: Forbes notes that he owns coal mines in five states, having inherited a coal business from his father.

translation_text: It is worth about $1.59 billion.
german_text: Er ist ungefähr 1,59 Milliarden Dollar wert.
actual_translation: He's worth about $1.59 billion.

translation_text: Meanwhile, the Republican National Committee issued a statement on Thursday evening in which it said: "The change of party to Governor Justice is another blow to a democratic party that would rather hinder us than work to make our country great again."
german_text: In der Zwischenzeit gab das Republikanische Nationalkomitee am Donnerstagabend eine Erklärung ab, in der es sagte: "Der Parteiwechsel von Gouverneur Justice ist ein weiterer Schlag für eine Demokratische Partei, die uns eher hindern als daran arbeiten würde, um unser Land wieder großartig zu machen."
actual_translation: Meanwhile, the Republican National Committee released a statement Thursday night saying "Governor Justice's party switch is another blow to a Democratic Party that would rather obstruct than work to make our country great again."

translation_text: "With only 15 governments and the control of the least legislative bodies in history, the announcement of Governor Justice is only the last rejection of a party that is from up to down without leadership and is unable to find a positive, unanimous message," RNC chairman Ronna McDaniel said in a statement to CBS News.
german_text: "Mit nur 15 Gouvernements und der Kontrolle der wenigsten gesetzgebenden Körperschaften in der Geschichte ist die Ankündigung von Gouverneur Justice nur die letzte Ablehnung einer Partei, die von oben bis unten ohne Führung ist und nicht imstande ist, eine positive, einigende Botschaft zu finden", sagte die RNC-Vorsitzende Ronna McDaniel in einer Erklärung den CBS News.
actual_translation: "With only 15 governorships and control of the fewest state legislatures in history, Governor Justice's announcement is just the latest rejection of a party that is leaderless from top to bottom and unable to find a positive, unifying message," RNC chairwoman Ronna McDaniel said in a statement to CBS News.

translation_text: Coe praises "righteous" Russian apology for doping scandal
german_text: Coe lobt "ehrliche" russische Entschuldigung für Doping-Skandal
actual_translation: Coe praises 'candid' Russian apology for doping scandal

translation_text: The worldwide head of light athletics, Sebastian Coe, praised on Thursday what he described as an obvious apology from Russia for a doping scandal, but he repeated that it was not the time for the country to be reintroduced into the sport.
german_text: Der weltweite Chef der Leichtathletik, Sebastian Coe, lobte am Donnerstag, was er als offenkundige Entschuldigung aus Russland zu einem Doping-Skandal beschrieb, aber er wiederholte, es sei nicht der Moment für das Land, wieder in den Sport aufgenommen zu werden.
actual_translation: Global athletics boss Sebastian Coe praised what he described as a candid apology from Russia over a doping scandal on Thursday but reiterated it was not the moment for the country to be readmitted to the sport.

translation_text: Russia's Leight Athletics Chief Dmitry Shylakhtin said during the IAAF Congress in the evening of the World Leight Athletics Championships that the exclusion of his country from sport was correct and that he was determined to fight doping.
german_text: Russlands Leichtathletik-Chef Dmitry Shylakhtin sagte während des IAAF-Kongresses am Vorabend der Leichtathletik-Weltmeisterschaften, dass die Verbannung seines Landes aus dem Sport korrekt war und dass er entschlossen sei, das Doping zu bekämpfen.
actual_translation: Russia's athletics boss Dmitry Shylakhtin told an IAAF Congress, held on the eve of the World Athletics Championships, that his country's ban from the sport was correct and that he was determined to fight doping.

translation_text: He said he's sorry for "all athletes who were stolen with gold and silver medals in competitions."
german_text: Er sagte, es tue ihm leid für "alle Athleten, denen bei Wettbewerben Gold- und Silbermedaillen weggeschnappt wurden".
actual_translation: He said he was sorry to "all athletes who have had gold and silver medals snatched from them at competitions."

translation_text: Despite his comments, the IAAF Congress voted for the preservation of the ban imposed in November 2015 after a report by the World Anti-Doping Agency (WADA) found evidence of state-funded doping in Russia.
german_text: Trotz seiner Kommentare stimmte der IAAF-Kongress für die Aufrechterhaltung des Verbots, das im November 2015 verhängt wurde, nachdem ein Bericht der Welt-Anti-Doping-Agentur (WADA) Hinweise auf staatlich gefördertes Doping in Russland gefunden hatte.
actual_translation: Despite his comments, the IAAF Congress voted in favor of maintaining the ban, imposed in November 2015 after a World Anti-Doping Agency (WADA) report found evidence of state-sponsored doping in Russia.

translation_text: “I thought it was a very open answer today, a very honest presentation,” IAAF President Coe told reporters.
german_text: "Ich dachte, es war heute eine sehr offene Antwort, eine sehr ehrliche Präsentation", sagte IAAF-Präsident Coe den Reportern.
actual_translation: "I thought it was a very candid response today, a very candid presentation," IAAF president Coe told reporters.

translation_text: "The entire Council and the entire Congress were pleased that the Russian Federation has acknowledged in itself that it has experienced some quite hot times and will do everything possible to ensure that the Federation is rebuilt."
german_text: "Der gesamte Rat und der gesamte Kongress waren darüber erfreut dass die Russische Föderation bei sich selbst erkannt hat, dass sie einige ziemlich heiße Zeiten erlebt hat und alles Mögliche tun wird, um sicherzustellen, dass die Föderation neu gestaltet wird."
actual_translation: "The whole Council and the whole Congress was pleased ... that the Russian federation recognized themselves that they have been through some pretty torrid times and are doing everything possible to make sure the federation is reengineered."

translation_text: Coe said he was also "rejoiced" that Russia accepted the criteria for its reintroduction.
german_text: Coe sagte, er sei auch "erfreut" darüber, dass Russland die Kriterien für seine Wiedereinführung akzeptiere.
actual_translation: Coe said he was also "pleased" that Russia accepted the criteria for its reintroduction.

translation_text: “I think it was a very constructive day, and I think progress has been made, but the Congress supports the Task Force’s recommendations that this is not the time to reset Russia,” Coe said.
german_text: "Ich denke, es war ein sehr konstruktiver Tag, und ich denke, dass Fortschritte erzielt wurden, aber der Kongress unterstützt die Empfehlungen der Task Force, dass dies nicht der Moment sei, Russland wieder einzusetzen", sagte Coe.
actual_translation: "I think it was a very constructive day and I think progress is being made, but the Congress supports the recommendations of the task force that this was not the moment to reinstate Russia," said Coe.

translation_text: “We have to do everything in the coming months to normalize this situation.
german_text: "Wir müssen in den nächsten Monaten alles tun, um diese Situation zu normalisieren.
actual_translation: "We need to do everything over the next few months to normalize this situation.

translation_text: The main principle has always been that we wanted to separate the clean athletes from the damaged system,” he added.
german_text: Das Leitprinzip war immer, dass wir die sauberen Athleten von dem verdorbenen System trennen wollten", fügte er hinzu
actual_translation: The guiding principle has always been that we wanted to separate the clean athletes from the tainted system," he added

translation_text: Nine Russian athletes will play as neutral athletes at the Light Athletics World Championships, which starts on Friday in London, according to the strict IAAF criteria.
german_text: Neunzehn russische Athleten werden bei den Leichtathletik-Weltmeisterschaften, die am Freitag in London beginnen, nach den strengen IAAF-Kriterien als neutrale Akteure antreten.
actual_translation: Nineteen Russian athletes will be competing as neutrals at the World Athletics Championships which start in London on Friday, having met strict IAAF criteria.

translation_text: The head of the IAAF task force, Rune Andersen, said on Monday that Russia still has to meet some of the criteria for a resignation.
german_text: Der Leiter der IAAF-Task Force, Rune Andersen, sagte am Montag, dass Russland noch einige der Kriterien für eine Wiedereinstellung erfüllen müsse.
actual_translation: The head of the IAAF's Task Force, Rune Andersen, said on Monday that Russia had yet to meet several of the criteria for reinstatement.

translation_text: Drug tests are still insufficient and banned trainers are still working freely, he told reporters in London after a speech at the IAAF Council.
german_text: Drogentests seien immer noch unzureichend und verbotene Trainer seien immer noch frei tätig, sagte er Reportern in London nach einem Vortrag beim IAAF Council.
actual_translation: Drug-testing was still insufficient and banned coaches were still operating freely, he told reporters in London after a presentation to the IAAF Council.

translation_text: Treasure Act for Fallen Soldiers in Mali
german_text: Trauerakt für in Mali abgestürzte Soldaten
actual_translation: Act of mourning for soldiers who crashed in Mali

translation_text: During a sad celebration in Fritzlar, north Texas, about 1,000 people thought of the two soldiers killed in a helicopter crash in Mali.
german_text: Bei einer Trauerfeier im nordhessischen Fritzlar haben rund 1000 Menschen der beiden bei einem Hubschrauberabsturz in Mali umgekommenen Soldaten gedacht.
actual_translation: At a memorial service in the north Hessen town of Fritzlar, around 1000 people commemorated both soldiers who lost their lives in a helicopter crash in Mali.

translation_text: The ceremony took place on Thursday in the town under high security measures.
german_text: Die Zeremonie fand am Donnerstag in der Domstadt unter hohen Sicherheitsvorkehrungen statt.
actual_translation: The ceremony took place in the cathedral city on Thursday under strict security precautions.

translation_text: About the unclear cause of the crash, Defense Minister Ursula von der Leyen (CDU) said nothing.
