german_text: Zur noch ungeklärten Absturzursache sagte Verteidigungsministerin Ursula von der Leyen (CDU) nichts.
actual_translation: German Defence Minister Ursula von der Leyen (CDU) remained silent on the as-yet-unexplained cause of the crash.

translation_text: However, she described the two killed pilots as "canners of their field."
german_text: Sie bezeichnete die beiden umgekommenen Piloten aber als "Könner ihres Fachs".
actual_translation: However, she described the two pilots who were killed as "experts in their field".

translation_text: “We deny this highest sacrifice they have made in the name of the Federal Republic of Germany,” she said.
german_text: "Wir verneigen uns vor diesem höchsten Opfer, das sie im Namen der Bundesrepublik Deutschland erbracht haben", erklärte sie.
actual_translation: "We bow before this greatest of sacrifices that they have made in the name of the Federal Republic of Germany," she explained.

translation_text: The 33-year-old Major and the 47-year-old Staff Chief from North Hessen were killed Wednesday a week ago in the West African Mali.
german_text: Der 33-jährige Major und der 47-jährige Stabshauptmann aus Nordhessen waren am Mittwoch vor einer Woche im westafrikanischen Mali ums Leben gekommen.
actual_translation: The 33-year-old Major and the 47-year-old Stabshauptmann from north Hessen lost their lives a week ago, on Wednesday, in the West African country of Mali.

translation_text: Their sears were transferred to Germany and brought to the Fritzlarer Dom of St. Peter on Thursday accompanied by a death guard of the Bundeswehr.
german_text: Ihre Särge wurden nach Deutschland überführt und am Donnerstag begleitet von einer Totenwache der Bundeswehr in den Fritzlarer Dom Sankt Peter gebracht.
actual_translation: Their coffins were transported back to Germany and on Thursday were brought to Saint Peter's cathedral in Fritzlar, accompanied by a wake from the German army.

translation_text: In the afternoon, only the relatives in the church took goodbye.
german_text: Am Mittag nahmen zunächst nur die Angehörigen in der Kirche Abschied.
actual_translation: At midday, the relatives first said their goodbyes in the church.

translation_text: After that the feast began in the circle of the family, close friends, representatives of the Bundeswehr and the politics.
german_text: Danach begann die Trauerfeier im Kreis der Familie, engster Freunde, von Vertretern der Bundeswehr sowie der Politik.
actual_translation: Then, amidst family and closest friends, the memorial service was begun by representatives of the German Army and the political world.

translation_text: Among them were Hessens Prime Minister Volker Bouffier (CDU) and the General Inspector of the Bundeswehr Volker Wieker.
german_text: Darunter waren auch Hessens Ministerpräsident Volker Bouffier (CDU) und der Generalinspekteur der Bundeswehr Volker Wieker.
actual_translation: Among these were Hesse Prime Minister Volker Bouffier (CDU) and Inspector General of the German Army, Volker Wieker.

translation_text: Sad guests put roses down, the relatives stood arm-in-arm on the shells.
german_text: Trauergäste legten Rosen nieder, die Angehörigen standen Arm in Arm an den Särgen.
actual_translation: Memorial guests laid down roses, and the relatives stood arm in arm by the coffins.

translation_text: In front of the church, Fritzlars and numerous soldiers persecuted the ceremony on a wall.
german_text: Vor der Kirche verfolgten Fritzlarer und zahlreiche Soldaten die Zeremonie auf einer Leinwand.
actual_translation: The people of Fritzlar and numerous soldier followed the ceremony in front of the church on a big screen.

translation_text: Minister of Defense von der Leyen described the killed soldiers as “high-decorated” and entering.
german_text: Verteidigungsministerin von der Leyen bezeichnete die umgekommenen Soldaten als "hoch dekoriert" und einsatzerfahren.
actual_translation: Defence minister von der Leyen described the killed soldiers as "highly decorated" and experienced in missions.

translation_text: The staff captain built the flight operation of the Tiger fighter helicopter in Fritzlar and was one of the first six trained Tiger pilots of his regiment.
german_text: Der Stabshauptmann habe den Flugbetrieb des Kampfhubschraubers Tiger in Fritzlar mit aufgebaut und sei einer der ersten sechs ausgebildeten Tiger-Piloten seines Regiments gewesen.
actual_translation: The Stabshauptmann is said to have helped set up flight operations of the combat helicopter Tiger in Fritzlar and was one of the first six qualified Tiger pilots in his regiment.

translation_text: Also, Volker Bauersachs, commander of the regiment, to which the soldiers belong, explained: "If this crew could not reverse the collapse, then no one would be able to."
german_text: Auch Volker Bauersachs, Kommandeur des Regiments, zu dem die Soldaten gehören, erklärte: "Wenn diese Besatzung den Absturz nicht abwenden konnte, dann hätte es keiner vermocht".
actual_translation: Volker Bauersachs too, commander of the regiment to which the soldiers belonged, said: "If this crew were not able to prevent the crash, then no-one could have".

translation_text: Doubts about the UN mission in Mali did not show Minister von der Leyen: The operation is dangerous.
german_text: Zweifel an der UN-Mission in Mali zeigte Ministerin von der Leyen nicht: Der Einsatz sei gefährlich.
actual_translation: Minister von der Leyen did not express any doubts about the UN mission in Mali: the mission was dangerous.

translation_text: But it is also of great importance "for a country from which we are only separated by two states," she said.
german_text: Aber er sei auch von hoher Bedeutung "für ein Land, von dem wir nur durch zwei Staaten getrennt sind", sagte sie.
actual_translation: However, it was also of great importance "for a country from which we are separated by only two nations," she said.

translation_text: After the feast, the sheep were taken out of the dome.
german_text: Nach der Trauerfeier wurden die Särge aus dem Dom gebracht.
actual_translation: After the memorial service, the coffins were brought out of the cathedral.

translation_text: When and where they will be delivered, the Bundeswehr did not provide any information.
german_text: Wann und wo sie bestattet werden, dazu machte die Bundeswehr keine Angaben.
actual_translation: The Germany Army did not wish to give any indications about when or where they are to be buried.

translation_text: Prince Henrik doesn’t want a grave next to his wife
german_text: Prinz Henrik will kein Grab neben seiner Frau
actual_translation: Prince Henrik does not want a grave next to his wife

translation_text: The man of the Danish Queen Margrethe (77), Prince Henrik (83), does not want to be entrusted next to his wife after his death.
german_text: Der Mann der dänischen Königin Margrethe (77), Prinz Henrik (83), will nach seinem Tod nicht neben seiner Frau bestattet werden.
actual_translation: The husband of the Danish Queen Margrethe (77), Prinz Henrik (83), does not want to be buried next to his wife after his death.

translation_text: This was by the Royal House on Thursday.
german_text: Das teilte das Königshaus am Donnerstag mit.
actual_translation: The royal family shared that on Thursday.

translation_text: Traditionally, the Danish royal couple are buried in the Cathedral of Roskilde.
german_text: Traditionell wird das dänische Königspaar in der Domkirche von Roskilde beigesetzt.
actual_translation: Traditionally, the Danish royal couple are interred in Roskilde Cathedral.

translation_text: The painter Bjørn Nørgaard has already prepared a sarcophag for the two.
german_text: Der Bildhauer Bjørn Nørgaard fertigte bereits einen Sarkophag für die beiden an.
actual_translation: The sculptor Bildhauer Bjørn Nørgaard is already crafting a sarcophagus for the two of them.

translation_text: The Queen agreed with her husband’s decision, the statement said.
german_text: Die Königin sei mit der Entscheidung ihres Mannes einverstanden, hieß es weiter in der Mitteilung.
actual_translation: The queen is content with her husband's decision, the announcement continued.

translation_text: Where Prince Henry will be buried is unclear.
german_text: Wo Prinz Henrik begraben werde, sei noch unklar.
actual_translation: Where Prince Henrik will be buried is still unclear.

translation_text: But he does not intend to be buried in his French homeland.
german_text: Er habe aber nicht die Absicht, in seiner französischen Heimat beigesetzt zu werden.
actual_translation: However, he does not intend to be interred in his French homeland.

translation_text: Prince Henrik had never made a heal that he was not happy with his title.
german_text: Prinz Henrik hatte nie einen Hehl daraus gemacht, dass er mit seinem Titel nicht glücklich war.
actual_translation: Prinz Henrik had never made a secret of the fact that he was not happy with his title.

translation_text: After his wife Margrethe's throne in 1972, he would like to become king.
german_text: Nach der Thronbesteigung seiner Frau Margrethe im Jahr 1972 wäre er gern König geworden.
actual_translation: After his wife Margrethe's accession to the throne in 1972, he would have liked to have become king.

translation_text: In 2016, he retired and also gave the title "Prinzgemahl".
german_text: 2016 ging er in den Ruhestand und legt dabei auch den Titel "Prinzgemahl" ab.
actual_translation: In 2016, he went into retirement and at the same time also laid aside his title of "Prince Consort".

translation_text: Since Henrik has not received in Denmark the title and the function he wanted, he does not consider himself equal to his wife, even after his death, said Lene Balleby, the spokeswoman of the Danish Royal House.
german_text: Da Henrik in Dänemark nicht den Titel und die Funktion bekommen habe, die er wollte, sehe er sich gegenüber seiner Frau nicht als gleichwertig an - auch nicht nach dem Tod, erklärte Lene Balleby, die Chefsprecherin des dänischen Königshauses.
actual_translation: Since Henrik did not get the title and function that he wanted in Denmark, he does not see himself as equal to his wife – not after death either, explains Lene Balleby, chief spokeswoman for the Danish royal family.

translation_text: Where the last residence of the 83-year-old will be, is still unclear.
german_text: Wo die letzte Ruhestätte des 83-Jährigen letztendlich sein wird, sei noch unklar.
actual_translation: Where the last place of rest will be in the end for the 83-year-old is still unclear.

translation_text: But he does not intend to be captured in his French homeland, but in Denmark.
german_text: Er habe aber nicht die Absicht, in seiner französischen Heimat beigesetzt zu werden, sondern in Dänemark.
actual_translation: However, he does not intend to be interred in his French homeland, but rather in Denmark.

translation_text: He likes the country for which he has worked over the past 50 years.
german_text: Er mag das Land, für das er in den letzten 50 Jahren gearbeitet hat.
actual_translation: He likes the country for which he has worked for the last 50 years.

translation_text: The born Henri de Laborde de Monpezat, son of a French noble race, had met Margrethe in London in 1965.
german_text: Der gebürtige Henri de Laborde de Monpezat, Sohn eines französischen Adelsgeschlechts, hatte Margrethe 1965 in London kennengelernt.
actual_translation: Born Henri de Laborde de Monpezat, the son of a noble French family, he had got to know Margrethe in 1965 in London.

translation_text: At Themse he worked in the French Embassy.
german_text: An der Themse arbeitete er in der französischen Botschaft.
actual_translation: He worked on the Thames in the French Embassy.

translation_text: While his subsequent wife always flown the people’s sympathy, Prince Henrik had a severe situation with the Danish in his 50 years of reign.
german_text: Während seiner späteren Frau die Sympathiebekundungen des Volkes stets zuflogen, hatte Prinz Henrik in seiner knapp 50-jährigen Regentschaft bei den Dänen einen schweren Stand.
actual_translation: Whereas the people's expressions of sympathy always flew to his then to be wife, Prinz Henrik had a hard time with the Danes during his almost 50-year reign.

translation_text: In an autobiography, Henrik spoke about the first years in Denmark: "A few months after my arrival, everything I did was criticized.
german_text: In einer Autobiografie äußerte Henrik über die ersten Jahre in Dänemark: "Wenige Monate nach meiner Ankunft wurde alles, was ich tat, kritisiert.
actual_translation: In an autobiography, Henrik commented on his first years in Denmark: "A few months after my arrival, everything that I did was criticised.

translation_text: My Danish was fluctuating, I prefered wine instead of beer, silk stripes instead of stripes, Citroën instead of Volvo, tennis instead of football.
german_text: Mein Dänisch war schwankend, ich bevorzugte Wein statt Bier, Seidenstrümpfe statt Stricksocken, Citroën statt Volvo, Tennis statt Fußball.
actual_translation: My Danish was faltering, I preferred wine to beer, silk socks to wool socks, Citroën to Volvo, tennis to football.

translation_text: Even for the Gauloises, which I smoked instead of the Virginia Tabac and which had the reputation of being the brand of social-critical intellectuals, I couldn’t hope for certainty.
german_text: Selbst für die Gauloises, die ich anstelle von Virginia-Tabak rauchte und die hierzulande den Ruf hatten, die Marke gesellschaftskritischer Intellektueller zu sein, konnte ich nicht auf Nachsicht hoffen.
actual_translation: Even for the Gauloises, which I smoked in place of Virginia tobacco, and which had the reputation here for being the brand of intellectuals who were critical of society, I could not hope for any leniency.

translation_text: I was different.
german_text: Ich war anders.
actual_translation: I was different.

translation_text: I seemed to be happy with this position and not to be ashamed.
german_text: Ich schien mit dieser Position zufrieden zu sein und mich nicht zu schämen.
actual_translation: It seemed I was happy with this position and not ashamed of it.

translation_text: It was just two mistakes!”
german_text: Das waren gleich zwei Fehler!"
actual_translation: Those were two errors!"

translation_text: Prime Minister Weil wants new elections
german_text: Ministerpräsident Weil will rasche Neuwahl
actual_translation: Prime Minister Weil wants a snap new election

translation_text: CDU and FDP face possible majority in Lower Saxony
german_text: CDU und FDP vor möglicher Mehrheit in Niedersachsen
actual_translation: CDU and FDP face possible majority in Lower Saxony

translation_text: Lower Saxony's Prime Minister Stephan Weil (SPD) is for a quick new election after the Red-Green Government's loss, but he does not want to resign.
german_text: Niedersachsens Ministerpräsident Stephan Weil (SPD) ist nach dem Verlust der rot-grünen Regierungsmehrheit für eine rasche Neuwahl des Landtags, zurücktreten will er aber nicht.
actual_translation: Lower Saxony's prime minister Stephan Weil (SPD) wants the State Parliament to have a snap new election after the loss of the red-green governing majority – but he doesn't want to step down.

translation_text: He spoke on Friday for the dissolution of the parliament.
german_text: Weil sprach sich am Freitag für die Auflösung des Parlaments aus.
actual_translation: Weil declared himself on Friday to be in favour of a dissolution of the Parliament.

translation_text: Earlier, the surprising withdrawal of a Greens from their council party in Lower Saxony had put the government of Prime Minister Stephan Weil (SPD) into a serious crisis.
german_text: Zuvor hatte der überraschende Austritt einer Grünen-Abgeordneten aus ihrer Landtagsfraktion in Niedersachsen die Regierung von Ministerpräsident Stephan Weil (SPD) in eine schwere Krise gestürzt.
actual_translation: Previously, the unexpected resignation of a Green party representative from her state parliamentary fraction in Lower Saxony had plunged Prime Minister Stephan Weil (SPD)'s government into a stark crisis.

translation_text: Five months before the official date of the council election, the red-green coalition in Hannover lost its weak one-vote majority in parliament to the opposition from the CDU and the FDP.
german_text: Fünf Monate vor dem offiziellen Termin der Landtagswahl verlor die rot-grüne Koalition in Hannover damit ihre knappe Ein-Stimmen-Mehrheit im Parlament an die Opposition aus CDU und FDP.
actual_translation: Five months before the official date of the state elections, the red-green coalition lost in Hanover, and with that, their scant one-vote majority in Parliament over the opposition of CDU and FDP.

translation_text: The previous Greens deputy Elke Twesten justified her step with the non-nomination for the 2018 election in her electoral district in Rotenburg (Wümme).
german_text: Die bisherige Grünen-Abgeordnete Elke Twesten begründete ihren Schritt mit der Nicht-Nominierung für die Wahl 2018 in ihrem Wahlkreis in Rotenburg (Wümme).
actual_translation: Elke Twesten, up until that point a Green Party representative, justified her move with the fact that she had not been nominated for the 2018 election in her constituency in Rotenburg (Wümme).

translation_text: “I see my political future in the CDU,” she said on Friday in Hannover.
german_text: "Ich sehe meine politische Zukunft in der CDU", erklärte sie am Freitag in Hannover.
actual_translation: "I see my political future in the CDU," she stated on Friday in Hanover.

translation_text: CDU group chief Björn Thümler wants to recommend his group to accept them.
german_text: CDU-Fraktionschef Björn Thümler will seiner Fraktion empfehlen, sie aufzunehmen.
actual_translation: CDU parliamentary group leader Björn Thümler wants to advise his party to take her in.

translation_text: CDU and FDP have 69 seats in the Lower Saxony Landtag, SPD and Green 68 seats.
german_text: Damit hätten CDU und FDP zusammen 69 Sitze im niedersächsischen Landtag, SPD und Grüne 68 Sitze.
actual_translation: Then the CDU and the FDP would together have 69 seats in the Lower Saxony State Parliament, and the Greens, 68 seats.

translation_text: So far the relationship was the opposite.
german_text: Bislang war das Verhältnis umgekehrt.
actual_translation: Up until now, that ratio was the other way around.

translation_text: The new country day will be regularly elected on 14 January of the next year.
german_text: Der neue Landtag wird regulär am 14. Januar kommenden Jahres gewählt.
actual_translation: The new State Parliament will be elected as normal on the 14th January next year.

translation_text: Thümler said the red-green state government must now decide whether it can continue to rule in this situation without a majority.
german_text: Thümler sagte, die rot-grüne Landesregierung müsse jetzt entscheiden, ob sie in dieser Situation ohne Mehrheit weiter regieren könne.
actual_translation: Thümler says that the red-green State Government now has to decide whether it can continue to govern in these circumstances without a majority.

translation_text: Stephan Weil, however, considers it indispensable that the Landtag decide its self-release as soon as possible.
german_text: Stephan Weil hält es allerdings für unabdingbar, dass der Landtag möglichst rasch seine Selbstauflösung beschließt.
actual_translation: However, Stephan Weil considers it imperative that the State Parliament vote to dissolve itself as swiftly as possible.

translation_text: The CDU group is expected to decide on its further action on Tuesday.
german_text: Die CDU-Fraktion wird voraussichtlich am Dienstag über ihr weiteres Vorgehen entscheiden.
actual_translation: The CDU parliamentary group is expected to decide on Tuesday about how they will proceed.

translation_text: The National Constitution also provides for the possibility that the National Day will take away the confidence of the Prime Minister and elect a successor.
german_text: Die Landesverfassung sieht auch die Möglichkeit vor, dass der Landtag dem Ministerpräsidenten das Vertrauen entzieht und einen Nachfolger wählt.
actual_translation: The state constitution also allows for the possibility that the State Parliament declares no confidence in the Prime Minister and elects a successor.

translation_text: “Our constitution offers several options.
german_text: "Unsere Verfassung bietet mehrere Optionen.
actual_translation: "Our constitution offers various options.

translation_text: These possibilities need to be examined legally clean,” Thümler said.
german_text: Diese Möglichkeiten müssen rechtlich sauber geprüft werden", sagte Thümler.
actual_translation: The possibilities have to be examined in a proper legal way," said Thümler.

translation_text: "Any question will be discussed in peace if it is legally reasonably examined."
german_text: "Man wird in Ruhe alle Fragen erörtern, wenn sie rechtlich vernünftig geprüft sind."
actual_translation: "All aspects will be debated in good time, if they are examined in a sound legal way."

translation_text: Thümler called Twesten’s step “but somewhat Curios.”
german_text: Thümler nannte Twestens Schritt "doch etwas kurios".
actual_translation: Thümler called Twesten's move "somewhat curious though".

translation_text: She said, “I’m not a traitor.
german_text: Die Politikerin selbst betonte: "Ich bin keine Verräterin.
actual_translation: The politician herself stressed: "I am not a traitor.

translation_text: I feel very good.”
german_text: Ich fühle mich sehr gut".
actual_translation: I feel very good."

translation_text: She described herself as a supporter of Black-Green.
german_text: Sie bezeichnete sich als Anhängerin von Schwarz-Grün.
actual_translation: She described herself as a supporter of Black-Green.

translation_text: The Greens called for the abolished members to return their council mandate.
german_text: Die Grünen forderten die abtrünnige Abgeordnete zur Rückgabe ihres Landtagsmandats auf.
actual_translation: The Greens called on the defecting representative to give up her seat in Parliament.

translation_text: “We naturally assume that she will with immediate effect return her country mandate, which she has received through the Green List of Countries,” state presidents Meta Janssen-Kucz and Stefan Körner said.
german_text: "Wir gehen selbstverständlich davon aus, dass sie ihr Landtagsmandat, das sie über die grüne Landesliste erhalten hat, mit sofortiger Wirkung zurückgibt", teilten die Landesvorsitzenden Meta Janssen-Kucz und Stefan Körner mit.
actual_translation: "We naturally assume that she will give up her seat in Parliament, which she won on a Green party ticket, with immediate effect," communicated state chairpersons Meta Janssen-Kucz and Stefan Körner.

translation_text: The party chairman of the Greens, Anja Piel, said: "We regret the decision of Elke Twesten extremely."
german_text: Die Fraktionsvorsitzende der Grünen Anja Piel sagte: "Wir bedauern die Entscheidung von Elke Twesten außerordentlich".
actual_translation: The Green Party chairwoman Anja Piel said: "We exceedingly regret Elke Twesten's decision".

translation_text: She consciously decided not to hold a discussion in the group.
german_text: Sie habe sich bewusst entschieden, keine Aussprache in der Fraktion zu führen.
actual_translation: She consciously decided not to give any statement in the parliamentary group.

translation_text: Even in the background that there were no content differences, we can’t understand this step.”
german_text: "Auch vor dem Hintergrund, dass es keine inhaltlichen Differenzen gab, können wir diesen Schritt nicht nachvollziehen."
actual_translation: "Especially given the background, that there were no essential differences – we can't understand this move."

translation_text: SPD chancellor Martin Schulz condemns the breach of the lower-Saxon Greens member Elke Twesten to the CDU as a betrayal.
german_text: SPD-Kanzlerkandidat Martin Schulz verurteilt den Übertritt der niedersächsischen Grünen-Abgeordneten Elke Twesten zur CDU als Verrat.
actual_translation: SPD candidate for Chancellor Martin Schulz denounced the crossing over of Lower Saxony Green representative Elke Twesten to the CDU as betrayal.

translation_text: “The behavior of the former Greens in Lower Saxony is not only a betrayal to the voters, but also a betrayal to the Red-Green,” the Federal Council of Social Democrats wrote on Facebook on Friday.
german_text: "Das Verhalten der ehemaligen Grünen-Abgeordneten in Niedersachsen ist nicht nur Verrat an den Wählerinnen und Wählern, sondern auch Verrat an Rot-Grün", schrieb der Bundeschef der Sozialdemokraten am Freitag auf Facebook.
actual_translation: "The behaviour of the former Green representative in Lower Saxony is not only a betrayal of voters, but also a betrayal to red-green," wrote the Social Democratic federal leader on Friday on Facebook.

translation_text: He supports the decision of Prime Minister Stephan Weil (SPD) to quickly re-elect the council.
german_text: Er unterstütze die Entscheidung von Ministerpräsident Stephan Weil (SPD), den Landtag schnell neu wählen zu lassen.
actual_translation: He supports Prime Minister Stephan Weil (SPD)'s decision to let the State Parliament have new elections soon.

translation_text: The departure of Twests costs red-green in Lower Saxony the majority.
german_text: Der Austritt Twestens kostet Rot-Grün in Niedersachsen die Mehrheit.
actual_translation: Twesten's resignation costs Red-Green the majority in Lower Saxony.

translation_text: “In her wounded jealousy and frustration, she puts her personal interests in front of the country’s good,” SPD Secretary-General Hubertus Heil criticised.
german_text: Die Politikerin stelle "in ihrer verletzten Eitelkeit und in ihrem Frust ihre persönlichen Interessen vor das Wohl des Landes", kritisierte SPD-Generalsekretär Hubertus Heil.
actual_translation: The politician "in her wounded vanity and in her frustration" put "her personal interests above the wellbeing of the state," critisised SPD General Secretary Hubertus Heil.

translation_text: “It’s a scandal that the CDU in Lower Saxony is taking part in this dirty intrigue game and trying to hit political capital from it.”
german_text: "Es ist ein Skandal, dass die CDU in Niedersachsen dieses schmutzige Intrigenspiel mitmacht und versucht, daraus politisches Kapital zu schlagen".
actual_translation: "It is a scandal that the CDU in Lower Saxony plays along in this dirty scheming and attempts to score political points from it."

translation_text: Niedersachsen's CDU group chief Björn Thümler wants to recommend his members to take Elke Twesten into the CDU.
german_text: Niedersachsens CDU-Fraktionschef Björn Thümler will seinen Abgeordneten empfehlen, Elke Twesten in die CDU aufzunehmen.
actual_translation: Lower Saxony CDU parliamentary group leader Björn Thümler wants to advise his representatives to take Elke Twesten into the CDU.

translation_text: The party leader of the SPD in the Bundestag, Thomas Oppermann, called on Twesten to falsify the result of the 2013 council election with personal careers.
german_text: Der Fraktionschef der SPD im Bundestag, Thomas Oppermann, warf Twesten vor, mit persönlichem Karrieredenken das Ergebnis der Landtagswahl 2013 zu verfälschen.
actual_translation: The parliamentary group leader of the SPD in the Bundestag, Thomas Opperman, accused Twesten of distorting the result of the State election in 2013 with her personal career notions.

translation_text: The CDU was then the strongest force before the SPD, but the SPD and the Greens had a sharp-thin majority of one vote.
german_text: Die CDU war damals vor der SPD stärkste Kraft, SPD und Grüne hatten im Landtag aber eine hauchdünne Mehrheit von einer Stimme.
actual_translation: The CDU was then the strongest power ahead of the SPD, but SPD and Greens had a wafer-thin majority of one vote in the State Parliament.

translation_text: Minister of Agriculture in the interview - How do we protect ourselves from poisoning, Mr. Schmidt?
german_text: Landwirtschaftsminister im Interview - Wie schützen wir uns vor Gifteiern, Herr Schmidt?
actual_translation: Minister of Agriculture in interview – How do we protect ourselves against poisoned eggs, Mr Schmidt?

translation_text: Germany is discussing the empty eggs.
german_text: Deutschland diskutiert über verseuchte Eier.
actual_translation: Germany is discussing contaminated eggs.

translation_text: How did the scandal happen?
german_text: Wie konnte der Skandal passieren?
actual_translation: How was it possible for the scandal to happen?

translation_text: How can consumers protect themselves?
german_text: Wie können sich die Verbraucher schützen.
actual_translation: How can consumers protect themselves?

translation_text: Agriculture Minister Christian Schmidt (CSU) is speaking and answering in an interview with the RedactionsNetwork Germany (RND).
german_text: Landwirtschaftsminister Christian Schmidt (CSU) steht im Interview mit dem RedaktionsNetzwerk Deutschland (RND) Rede und Antwort.
actual_translation: Minister of Food and Agriculture Christian Schmidt (CSU) answers our questions in interview with RedaktionsNetzwerk Deutschland (RND).

translation_text: Mr. Schmidt, How can the consumer protect himself from poisoned eggs?
german_text: Herr Schmidt, Wie kann sich der Verbraucher vor vergifteten Eiern schützen?
actual_translation: Mr Schmidt, how can consumers protect themselves against poisoned eggs?

translation_text: I can only encourage all consumers to carefully look at the eggs in your refrigerator and check the stamp.
german_text: Ich kann nur alle Verbraucherinnen und Verbraucher ermutigen, die Eier in Ihrem Kühlschrank genau anzusehen und den Stempelaufdruck zu überprüfen.
actual_translation: I can only encourage all consumers to look very carefully at the eggs in their fridge and check the stamps printed on them.

translation_text: On the consumer protection portal www.Lebensmittelwarnung.de the federal states submit the latest information on the affected egg charges.
german_text: Auf dem Verbraucherschutzportal www.Lebensmittelwarnung.de stellen die Bundesländer die jeweils neuesten Informationen über die betroffenen Eier-Chargen ein.
actual_translation: The federal states are each supplying their most up-to-date information on the affected egg batches on the consumer protection portal www.Lebensmittelwarnung.de.

translation_text: The affected eggs should be destroyed or returned.
german_text: Betroffene Eier sollten vernichtet oder zurückgegeben werden.
actual_translation: Affected eggs should be destroyed or returned.

translation_text: Even if, after everything we are currently knowing, a health danger is practically excluded.
german_text: Auch, wenn nach allem was wir derzeit wissen, eine gesundheitliche Gefährdung praktisch ausgeschlossen ist.
actual_translation: Even if, according to everything we know at this point in time, a health risk is all but ruled out.

translation_text: Does Aldi now take over the best possible crisis response – all the eggs out of the offer – because the central role of the investigator is not truly perceived by the Federal Minister of Agriculture?
german_text: Übernimmt jetzt Aldi die bestmögliche Krisenreaktion - alle Eier raus aus dem Angebot -, weil die zentrale Rolle des Aufklärers vom Bundeslandwirtschaftsminister nicht wirklich wahrgenommen wird?
actual_translation: Is Aldi now adopting the best possible reaction to the crisis – removing all eggs from their offering – because the Federal Minister of Food and Agriculture is not really playing the central role of providing clear information?

translation_text: Food surveillance is the task of the federal states.
german_text: Die Lebensmittelüberwachung ist Aufgabe der Bundesländer.
actual_translation: Monitoring foodstuffs is a task for the federal states.

translation_text: Nevertheless, my house has immediately turned off and has been in close exchange with the authorities of the countries since it became known about Germany’s affairs.
german_text: Trotzdem hat sich mein Haus unverzüglich aufgeschaltet und befindet sich seit Bekanntwerden der Betroffenheit Deutschlands im engen Austausch mit den Behörden der Länder.
actual_translation: Despite that, the ministry immediately connected and has been liaising closely with the state authorities ever since it became known that Germany was affected.

translation_text: All information and risk assessment are accessible to consumers.
german_text: Alle Informationen und die Risikobewertung sind für die Verbraucher abrufbar.
actual_translation: All information and the risk assessment are accessible to consumers.

translation_text: The trade, just like the manufacturers, must ensure that the products sold are trafficable and health-free.
german_text: Der Handel hat genauso wie die Hersteller dafür Sorge zu tragen, dass die verkauften Produkte verkehrsfähig und gesundheitlich unbedenklich sind.
actual_translation: It is up to the trade just as much as it is the manufacturers to ensure that the products sold meet trading requirements and do not present any health risks.

translation_text: If the remaining maximum content is exceeded by 0.005 mg/kg in eggs, they are not transmissible.
german_text: Wenn bei Eiern der Rückstandshöchstgehalt von 0,005mg/kg überschritten ist, sind diese nicht verkehrsfähig.
actual_translation: For eggs, if the maximum residue level of 0.005mg/kg is exceeded, then they do not meet trading requirements.

translation_text: Unbelasted eggs can be sold and consumed.
german_text: Unbelastete Eier können jedoch verkauft und verzehrt werden.
actual_translation: Uncontaminated eggs, however, can be sold and consumed.

translation_text: This time, the companies are not guilty.
german_text: Dieses Mal sind nicht die Betriebe schuld.
actual_translation: This time the businesses are not at fault.

translation_text: Are manufacturers and consumers sitting on the same boat?
german_text: Sitzen Produktionsbetriebe und Verbraucher im gleichen Boot?
actual_translation: Are production facilities and consumers in the same boat?

translation_text: According to the timely knowledge, the manufacturing enterprises are not directly guilty.
german_text: Nach derzeitigem Kenntnisstand trifft die Produktionsbetriebe keine unmittelbare Schuld.
actual_translation: According to what we currently know, the production facilities are not in any way directly to blame.

translation_text: Instead, they must expect economic damage due to allegedly illegal practices by service companies.
german_text: Vielmehr müssen sie aufgrund mutmaßlich illegaler Praktiken von Dienstleistungsunternehmen mit wirtschaftlichen Schäden rechnen.
actual_translation: In fact, due to suspected illegal practices by service companies, they have to deal with commercial claims.

translation_text: As always, there are too few controllers in serious cases.
german_text: Wie immer gibt es im Ernstfall zu wenig Kontrolleure.
actual_translation: As always in emergencies, there are too few inspectors.

translation_text: Does it just lack the staff or the key responsibility?
german_text: Fehlt es nur am Personal oder auch an der schlüssigen Zuständigkeit?
actual_translation: Is it just the number of staff that is lacking, or the key competence as well?

translation_text: It was the official controls that revealed the process.
german_text: Es waren doch gerade die amtlichen Kontrollen, die den Vorgang aufgedeckt haben.
actual_translation: It was actually the official controls themselves that exposed what was going on.

translation_text: But the truth is that food fraud and criminal energy can never be 100% excluded.
german_text: Zur Wahrheit gehört jedoch auch, dass Lebensmittelbetrug und kriminelle Energie nie zu 100 Prozent ausgeschlossen werden können.
actual_translation: However, we must also remember that food fraud and criminal activity can never be 100% eliminated.

translation_text: This is why a consistent investigation of such events and the transfer to the prosecutors in cases where crimes may occur are of crucial importance.
german_text: Gerade deswegen sind eine konsequente Aufklärung solcher Geschehen und die Übergabe an die Staatsanwaltschaften in den Fällen, in denen Straftaten vorliegen können, von entscheidender Bedeutung.
actual_translation: It is for precisely this reason that it is so crucially important to have such occurrences thoroughly cleared up and passed over to public prosecutors in cases where crimes could have committed.

translation_text: I have repeatedly made it clear that I expect the responsible authorities to be informed.
german_text: Ich habe bereits mehrfach deutlich gemacht, dass ich von den verantwortlichen Behörden eine lückenlose Aufklärung erwarte.
actual_translation: I have already made it clear many times that I am expecting a complete resolution from the authorities in charge.

translation_text: Is regular alarming in food scandals really necessary?
german_text: Ist der regelmäßige Alarmismus bei Lebensmittelskandalen wirklich notwendig?
actual_translation: Is the alarmism that regularly arises with food scandals really necessary?

translation_text: Consumers have the right to obtain only safe and accessible foods.
german_text: Die Verbraucherinnen und Verbraucher haben das Recht, ausschließlich sichere und verkehrsfähige Lebensmittel zu bekommen.
actual_translation: Consumers have the right to get only safe food that is approved for market.

translation_text: If an unauthorized insecticide is used in the food industry, consumers are fairly annoyed.
german_text: Wenn ein nicht zugelassenes Insektizid in der Lebensmittelwirtschaft eingesetzt wird, sind Verbraucherinnen und Verbraucher zu Recht empört.
actual_translation: If a prohibited insecticide is used in the food industry, consumers are quite right to be indignant.

translation_text: Through the packed means, manufacturers, merchants and consumers have come into a situation that is absolutely unnecessary.
german_text: Durch das gepanschte Mittel sind Hersteller, Händler und Verbraucher in eine Situation geraten, die absolut nicht notwendig ist.
actual_translation: Thanks to these adulterated products, manufacturers, retailers and consumers get into a situation that is entirely unnecessary.

translation_text: In principle, it must be clear: the illegal use of insecticide Fipronil in the behavior of livestock animals is unacceptable and must be immediately terminated.
german_text: Grundsätzlich muss klar sein: Der rechtswidrige Einsatz des Insektizids Fipronil bei der Haltung lebensmittelliefernder Tiere ist nicht hinnehmbar und muss unverzüglich beendet werden.
actual_translation: Fundamentally the following has to be clear: the unlawful use of the insecticide Fipronil in the farming of food-producing animals is not acceptable and must be ended immediately.

translation_text: This must be done consistently and with high pressure at all levels.
german_text: Daran muss auf allen Ebenen konsequent und mit Hochdruck gearbeitet werden.
actual_translation: Work must be done on this consistently and urgently at all levels.

translation_text: I expect all competent authorities to clarify the situation quickly and without fault.
german_text: Ich erwarte von allen zuständigen Behörden, dass der Sachverhalt zügig und lückenlos aufgeklärt wird.
actual_translation: I expect all responsible authorities to clear up the matter swiftly and completely.

translation_text: How Football's Financial Rules Affect Neymar's Migration to Paris
german_text: Wie sich die Finanzregeln des Fußballs auf Neymars Umzug nach Paris auswirken
actual_translation: How soccer's financial rules impact Neymar's move to Paris

translation_text: The rules aimed at preventing unhindered spending of European football teams will not disturb Neymar's world record transfer from Spanish Barcelona to French Paris-Saint Germain.
german_text: Die Regeln, die darauf abzielen, ungehinderte Ausgaben der europäischen Fußballvereine zu verhindern, werden Neymars Weltrekord-Transfer vom spanischen Barcelona zum französischen Paris-Saint Germain nicht stören.
actual_translation: Rules aimed at preventing unfettered spending by European soccer clubs will not disrupt Neymar's world-record transfer from Spain's Barcelona to France's Paris-Saint Germain.

translation_text: Any consequences will still come from the UEFA for Paris Saint-Germain, as the leading organization that oversees the European game has the power to ban teams from accessing the prestigious Champions League tournament.
german_text: Irgendwelche Konsequenzen werden für Paris Saint-Germain von der UEFA noch kommen, denn die leitende Organisation, die das europäische Spiel überwacht hat die Macht, Mannschaften von den Zugang zu dem prestigeträchtigen Champions-League-Turnier zu verbieten.
actual_translation: Any consequences will come further down the line for Paris Saint-Germain from UEFA, the governing body overseeing the European game which has the power to ban teams from the prestigious Champions League tournament.

translation_text: Financial fair play rules introduced by UEFA in 2011 mean that PSG must prove at some point that Neymar's transfer was funded without great losses.
german_text: Finanzielle Fair-Play-Regeln, die 2011 von der UEFA ins Leben gerufen wurden, bedeuten, dass PSG irgendwann nachweisen muss, dass der Transfer von Neymar ohne große Verluste finanziert wurde.
actual_translation: Financial Fair Play rules launched by UEFA in 2011 mean that PSG will eventually have to show that Neymar's transfer was funded without incurring huge losses.

translation_text: Barcelona has paid 222 million euros (262 million dollars) to buy the Brazilian out of his contract, and Neymar will receive a salary of several ten million dollars a year.
german_text: Barcelona hat 222 Millionen Euro (262 Millionen $) gezahlt, um den Brasilianer aus seinem Vertrag herauszukaufen, und Neymar wird ein Gehalt empfangen, das mehrere zehn Millionen Dollar pro Jahr betragen wird.
actual_translation: Barcelona has been paid 222 million euros ($262 million) just to buy the Brazilian out of his contract and Neymar will command a salary that will run to tens of millions of dollars a year.

translation_text: Here are some of the financial aspects of Neymar's move to France.
german_text: Hier sind einige der finanziellen Aspekte von Neymars Umzug nach Frankreich.
actual_translation: Here are some of the financial aspects of Neymar's move to France.

translation_text: PSG can make the money easier for Neymar to sign and bring him into a galaxy of other stars, given the financing of the team by the energy-rich ruling family of Qatar.
german_text: PSG kann mit Sicherheit das Geld locker machen, damit Neymar unterschreibt und ihn in eine Galaxie anderer Stars bringen, angesichts der Finanzierung des Teams durch die durch die Energie reiche Herrscherfamilie von Katar.
actual_translation: PSG can certainly stump up the cash to sign Neymar and add him to a galaxy of other stars, given the team's funding from the energy-rich ruling family of Qatar.

translation_text: The teams are allowed to spend a lot of money on the acquisition of players, but they have to defend with legitimate sources of income that allow them the break-even point in their football-related business.
german_text: Vereine dürfen für den Erwerb von Spielern viel Geld aufwenden, müssen aber mit legitimen Einnahmequellen gegensteuern, die ihnen den Break-Even Punkt in ihrem auf den Fußball bezogenen Geschäft ermöglichen.
actual_translation: Clubs are allowed to spend heavily on acquiring players but they have to counterbalance that with legitimate sources of income, allowing them to approach break-even on their football-related business.

translation_text: FFP was designed by Michel Platini after he was elected UEFA President in 2007.
german_text: FFP wurde von Michel Platini nach seiner Wahl zum UEFA-Präsidenten im Jahr 2007 konzipiert.
actual_translation: FFP was conceived by Michel Platini after his election as UEFA president in 2007.

translation_text: The former French player believed that clubs that had taken over huge debts in their pursuit of success effectively deceive and risked to ruin themselves when banks or owners withdrew their support.
german_text: Der ehemalige französische Spieler glaubte, dass Vereine, die in ihrem Streben nach Erfolg enorme Schulden auf sich genommen hatten, effektiv betrügen und riskierten, sich zu ruinieren, wenn Banken oder Eigentümer ihre Unterstützung zurückzogen.
actual_translation: The former France player believed that clubs who ran up huge debts in their pursuit of success were effectively cheating and risking ruin if banks or owners withdrew their support.

translation_text: In 2011, FFP moved from focusing on clubs’ debt to monitoring their losses.
german_text: Im Jahr 2011 verlagerte sich FFP von der Konzentration auf die Schulden der Klubs auf die Überwachung ihrer Verluste.
actual_translation: In 2011, FFP shifted from focusing on clubs' debts to monitoring their losses instead.

translation_text: The change meant that the business model that Roman Abramovich originally used in 2003 in Chelsea - bought a club with potential and then strongly invested to improve the team and build a global brand - should become a harder matter.
german_text: Die Änderung bedeutete, dass das Geschäftsmodell, das Roman Abramovich ursprünglich 2003 in Chelsea benutzte - einen Club mit Potenzial kaufte und dann kräftig investierte, um die Mannschaft zu verbessern und eine globale Marke aufzubauen - zu einer härteren Angelegenheit werden sollte.
actual_translation: The change meant that the business model Roman Abramovich initially used at Chelsea in 2003 - buy a club with potential, and then spend heavily to improve the squad and build a global brand - become a tougher proposition.

translation_text: During the current three-year FFP implementation period, which lasts until 2018, clubs can bear losses of EUR 30 million.
german_text: Während der aktuellen dreijährigen FFP-Veranlagungsperiode, die bis 2018 läuft, können Clubs Verluste in Höhe von 30 Millionen Euro hinnehmen.
actual_translation: During the current three-year FFP assessment period that runs through 2018, clubs can incur losses of 30 million euros.

translation_text: And despite Platini’s 2015 presidency falling unhappy, his UEFA successor, Aleksander Ceferin, continues to engage in fear of excessive spending.
german_text: Und obwohl Platini 2015 von der Präsidentschaft in Ungnade gefallen ist, setzt sich sein UEFA-Nachfolger Aleksander Ceferin weiterhin dafür ein, von übermäßigen Ausgaben abzuschrecken.
actual_translation: And despite Platini being ousted in disgrace from the presidency in 2015, his UEFA successor Aleksander Ceferin is still committed to deterring excessive spending.

translation_text: “Surely FFP is not dead and we’re going to strengthen the rules for the future,” Andrea Traverso, who is responsible for FFP at UEFA, told The Associated Press last week.
german_text: "Sicherlich ist FFP nicht tot und wir werden die Regeln für die Zukunft bestimmt noch verstärken", sagte Andrea Traverso, der bei der UEFA für FFP verantwortlich ist, gegenüber The Associated Press in der vergangenen Woche.
actual_translation: "Certainly FFP is not dead and we will, for sure, reinforce the rules going forward," Andrea Traverso, who oversees FFP at UEFA, told The Associated Press last week.

translation_text: Although the PSG has paid Neymar’s Buy-out clause in a fixed fee, it can distribute the amount for the accounting over the duration of his contract.
german_text: Obwohl die PSG die Buy-out-Klausel von Neymar in einer Pauschale bezahlt hat, kann sie den Betrag für die Rechnungslegung über die Dauer seines Vertrags verteilen.
actual_translation: Although PSG will have paid Neymar's buyout clause in one lump sum, it can spread the amount for accounting purposes over the length of his contract.

translation_text: Neymar has signed a five-year contract so that the discharge amount for the next five years is estimated at €44.4 million in annual accounts.
german_text: Neymar hat einen Fünfjahresvertrag unterzeichnet, so dass die Ablösesumme für die nächsten fünf Jahre in Höhe von 44,4 Millionen Euro im Jahresabschluss ausgewiesen werden kann.
actual_translation: Neymar has signed a five-year deal, so the transfer fee could be shown as a 44.4 million-euro cost in the annual accounts for the next five years.

translation_text: The first wave of FFP sanctions in 2014, the PSG, along with Abu Dhabi, which is owned by Manchester City, met with the heavest sanctions.
german_text: Die erste Welle von FFP-Sanktionen im Jahr 2014 hat die PSG zusammen mit Abu Dhabi, das sich im Besitz von Manchester City befindet, mit den schwersten Sanktionen getroffen.
actual_translation: The first wave of FFP sanctions in 2014 saw PSG, along with Abu Dhabi-owned Manchester City, hit with the heaviest sanctions.

translation_text: The PSG received a fine of €60 million (at that time $82 million), which was later reduced to €20 million - and it was ordered that the team members for the Champions League season 2014/15 remain limited to 21 players instead of the otherwise normal 25 players.
german_text: Die PSG erhielt eine Geldstrafe von 60 Millionen Euro (damals 82 Millionen Dollar), die später auf 20 Millionen Euro gesenkt wurde - und es wurde angeordnet, dass die Mannschafts-Mitglieder für die Champions-League der Saison 2014/15 auf 21 Spieler statt der sonst normalen 25 Spieler begrenzt bleibt.
actual_translation: PSG was handed a fine of 60 million euros (then $82 million) - that was later reduced to 20 million euros - and ordered to limit its Champions League squads to 21 players for the 2014-15 season instead of the normal 25.

translation_text: UEFA is looking for clubs that could try to overlist their financial supervision by flourishing their revenue by companies linked to the club owners.
german_text: Die UEFA ist auf der Suche nach Klubs, die versuchen könnten, ihre Finanzaufsicht zu überlisten, indem sie ihre Einnahmen durch Unternehmen, die mit den Eigentümern eines Clubs verbunden sind, aufblähen.
actual_translation: UEFA is on the lookout for clubs who might try to outwit its financial regulators by inflating their income through companies linked to a club's owners.

translation_text: While a Qatar company could sponsore the PSG if the value of the sponsorship should exceed the standard markets, the UEFA would not allow it to be considered a legitimate income.
german_text: Während ein katarisches Unternehmen die PSG sponsern könnte, wenn der Wert des Sponsorings die Standard-Marktsätze überschreiten sollte, würde die UEFA dies nicht als legitimes Einkommen gelten lassen.
actual_translation: While a Qatari company could sponsor PSG, if the value of the sponsorship was deemed to exceed standard market rates UEFA would not allow it to count as legitimate income.

translation_text: This was exactly what happened in 2014, when the UEFA decided that the value of the PSA sponsorship was deposited by the Qatar Tourism Authority.
german_text: Genau das geschah 2014, als die UEFA entschied, dass der Wert des Sponsorings der PSA von der Qatar Tourism Authority aufgebläht wurde.
actual_translation: That is what happened in 2014 when UEFA ruled that the value of the Qatar Tourism Authority sponsorship of PSG was inflated.

translation_text: It was that part of PSG’s payments to Neymar could come through payments from the organizing committee of the 2022 World Cup in Qatar.
german_text: Es wurde berichtet, dass ein Teil der PSG-Zahlungen an Neymar über Zahlungen des Organisationskomitees der WM 2022 in Katar kommen könnte.
actual_translation: It has been reported that part of Neymar's PSG earnings could come via payments from the 2022 World Cup organizing committee in Qatar.

translation_text: But PSG and Qatar in 2022 have disputed that Neymar will become World Cup ambassador and such a maneuver could be easy to find out for the UEFA regulatory authorities.
german_text: Aber PSG und Katar 2022 haben bestritten, dass Neymar WM-Botschafter werden wird und ein derartiges Manöver für die UEFA-Regulierungsbehörden einfach herauszufinden sein könnte.
actual_translation: But PSG and Qatar 2022 have denied that Neymar will become a World Cup ambassador and such a maneuver would be easy for UEFA's regulators to expose.

translation_text: The previous sanctions against PSG mean that the UEFA will be even more careful to observe any attempt to overcome the rules.
german_text: Die bisherigen Sanktionen gegen PSG bedeuten, dass die UEFA noch aufmerksamer sein wird, jeden Versuch zu beachten, die Regeln zu umgehen.
actual_translation: Past sanctions slapped on PSG means that UEFA will be even more watchful of any attempt to circumvent the rules.

translation_text: The UEFA had no preparatory talks with PSG about Neymar's transfer, the people who are familiar with the situation said on Thursday.
german_text: Die UEFA hatte keine vorbereitenden Gespräche mit PSG über Neymars Transfer, sagtem am Donnerstag die Leute, die mit der Situation vertraut sind.
actual_translation: UEFA has not been in pre-emptive discussions with PSG about Neymar's transfer, people familiar with the situation said Thursday.

translation_text: They spoke under the condition of anonymity with The Associated Press as they were not authorized to discuss the PSG situation.
german_text: Sie sprachen unter der Bedingung der Anonymität mit The Associated Press, da sie nicht befugt waren, die PSG-Situation zu diskutieren.
actual_translation: They spoke to The Associated Press on condition of anonymity as they were not authorized to discuss the PSG situation.

translation_text: The latest published reports show that PSG 2015/16 has achieved a profit of more than 10 million euros with a turnover of 542.4 million euros.
german_text: Die letzten veröffentlichten Berichte zeigen, dass PSG 2015/16 mit einem Umsatz von 542,4 Millionen Euro einen Gewinn von mehr als 10 Millionen Euro erzielt hat.
actual_translation: The last published accounts show that PSG made a profit of more than 10 million euros in 2015-16 on a turnover of 542.4 million euros.

translation_text: The accounts for the last financial year must still be published.
german_text: Die Konten für das letzte Geschäftsjahr müssen noch veröffentlicht werden.
actual_translation: Accounts for the last financial year are yet to be published.

translation_text: PSG expects Neymar’s arrival to be a blessing for sponsorship deals, merchandising and trick sales.
german_text: PSG erwartet, dass Neymars Ankunft ein Segen für Sponsoring-Deals, Merchandising und Trikotverkäufe ist.
actual_translation: PSG expects Neymar's arrival to be a boon for sponsorship deals, merchandising and jersey sales.

translation_text: The association expects that sales will increase by at least 30 percent after the signature.
german_text: Der Verein geht davon aus, dass der Umsatz nach der Unterzeichnung um mindestens 30 Prozent steigen wird.
actual_translation: The club expects turnover would grow by at least 30 percent on the back of the signing.

translation_text: The Spanish league was clearly irritated to see one of the best football players go, and she tried to prevent Neymar's departure by claiming that PSG would hurt the FFP.
german_text: Die spanische Liga war eindeutig irritiert, einen der besten Fußballspieler gehen zu sehen, und sie versuchte, Neymars Wegzug zu verhindern, indem sie behauptete, dass PSG die FFP verletzen würde.
actual_translation: Clearly irritated to see one of soccer's biggest players leaving, the Spanish league tried to stymie Neymar's move, claiming that PSG will be breaching FFP.

translation_text: "It's a clear case of 'financial doping' with the club and the state," La Liga president Javier Tebas told the Spanish newspaper AS regarding Qatar's final ownership of PSG.
german_text: "Es ist ein klarer Fall von" finanziellem Doping" mit dem Klub und dem Staat", sagte der Präsident der La Liga, Javier Tebas, der spanischen Tageszeitung AS in Bezug auf Katars letztliche Eigentümerschaft an PSG.
actual_translation: "It is a clear case of 'financial doping', with the club and the state," La Liga President Javier Tebas told Spanish newspaper AS, referring to Qatar's ultimate ownership of PSG.

translation_text: Arsenal manager Arsene Wenger, whose club is in possession of an American sports tycoon, shares the reserves of La Liga against a state that funds a club.
german_text: Arsenal-Manager Arsene Wenger, dessen Verein im Besitz eines amerikanischen Sport-Tycoons ist, teilt die Vorbehalte von La Liga gegen einen Staat, der einen Verein finanziert.
actual_translation: Arsenal manager Arsene Wenger, whose club is owned by an American sports tycoon, shares La Liga's reservations about a state funding a club.

translation_text: “It’s the consequence of ownership and that has completely changed the whole landscape of football over the last 15 years,” Wenger said on Thursday.
german_text: "Es ist die Konsequenz der Eigentümerschaft und das hat die gesamte Landschaft des Fußballs in den letzten 15 Jahren komplett verändert", sagte Wenger am Donnerstag.
actual_translation: "It is the consequence of the ownerships and that has completely changed the whole landscape of football in the last 15 years," Wenger said Thursday.

translation_text: Once a country has an association, everything is possible.
german_text: "Sobald ein Land einen Verein besitzt, ist alles möglich.
actual_translation: "Once a country owns a club, everything is possible.

translation_text: It will be very difficult to respect the financial fairplay because you can go different paths or have different interests when a country has such a big player to represent a country.”
german_text: Es wird sehr schwierig, das Finanzielle Fairplay zu respektieren, weil man unterschiedliche Wege geht oder unterschiedliche Interessen haben kann, wenn ein Land einen so großen Akteur hat, um ein Land zu repräsentieren."
actual_translation: It becomes very difficult to respect the Financial Fair Play because you can have different ways or different interests for a country to have such a big player to represent a country."

translation_text: Swiss is looking for a new shipping supplier
german_text: Swiss ist auf der Suche nach einem neuen Schoggilieferanten
actual_translation: Swiss is on the look out for a new choccy supplier

translation_text: In recent years, Chocolat has produced free board chocolate for the Swiss.
german_text: In den vergangenen Jahren hat Chocolat Frey Bord-Schokolade für die Swiss hergestellt.
actual_translation: In the last few years, Chocolat Frey has made on-board chocolates for Swiss.

translation_text: Now the delightful cooperation is ahead of a possible end: the airline is re-writing the order.
german_text: Nun steht die süsse Zusammenarbeit vor einem möglichen Ende: Die Fluggesellschaft schreibt den Auftrag neu aus.
actual_translation: Now the sweet collaboration faces a possible end: the airline is inviting new calls for tenders.

translation_text: Swiss spokesman Meike Fuhlrott confirmed on request from the news agency sda a corresponding report to the newspaper "Northwest Switzerland" on Friday.
german_text: Swiss-Sprecherin Meike Fuhlrott bestätigte auf Anfrage der Nachrichtenagentur sda einen entsprechenden Bericht der Zeitung "Nordwestschweiz" vom Freitag.
actual_translation: Swiss spokeswoman Meike Fuhlrott, in response to a query from news agency sda, confirmed a corresponding report from the newspaper "Nordwestschweiz" on Friday.

translation_text: According to the current plan, the airline will conclude a new contract in the first half of 2018.
german_text: Gemäss aktueller Planung werde die Airline im ersten Halbjahr 2018 einen neuen Vertrag abschliessen.
actual_translation: According to current plans, the airline will conclude a new contract in the first half year of 2018.

translation_text: The products will be reviewed every two to three years and subject to quality control.
german_text: Die Produkte würden alle zwei bis drei Jahre überprüft und einer Qualitätskontrolle unterzogen.
actual_translation: The products would be reviewed and undergo a quality control every two to three years.

translation_text: “We are very happy with the current supplier Chocolat Frey,” the spokeswoman said.
german_text: "Mit dem aktuellen Lieferanten Chocolat Frey sind wir sehr zufrieden", sagte die Sprecherin.
actual_translation: "We are very satisfied with the current supplier Chocolat Frey," said the spokeswoman.

translation_text: Approximately 17 million small red-white packed 14 gram ski tables each year are distributed by companions before landing to passengers.
german_text: Rund 17 Millionen kleine rotweiss verpackte Schoggitafeln zu 14 Gramm verteilen pro Jahr die Flugbegleiter vor der Landung an die Passagiere.
actual_translation: Every year, around 17 million small 14-gram chocolate bars packaged in red and white are handed out by the flight attendants to passengers before landing.

translation_text: The Swiss does not want to provide any information about the costs.
german_text: Über die Kosten wollte die Swiss keine Angaben machen.
actual_translation: Swiss did not wish to make any statements on the costs.

translation_text: Industry insiders estimate the order volume according to "Northwest Switzerland" to 1.5 to 2 million francs - the Migros daughter achieves an annual turnover of about one billion francs.
german_text: Brancheninsider schätzen das Auftragsvolumen gemäss "Nordwestschweiz" auf 1,5 bis 2 Millionen Franken - die Migros-Tochter erzielt einen Jahresumsatz von rund einer Milliarde Franken.
actual_translation: According to "Nordwestschweiz", industry insiders estimate the order volumes to be 1.5 to 2 million francs – the Migros subsidiary generates an annual turnover of around a billion francs.

translation_text: But the most important is the advertising effect: for a shogging manufacturer, it is a prestigious task.
german_text: Doch wichtiger ist allemal der Werbeeffekt: Für einen Schoggihersteller ist es ein prestigeträchtiger Auftrag.
actual_translation: However, more important is always the advertising effect: for a chocolate producer, it is a prestigious contract.

translation_text: How many candidates there are in the new tender, the Swiss does not want to betray.
german_text: Wie viele Bewerber es bei der neuen Ausschreibung gibt, will die Swiss nicht verraten.
actual_translation: Swiss will not disclose how many bidders there are for the new call for tenders.

translation_text: Only Swiss manufacturers are concerned.
german_text: In Frage kommen aber nur Schweizer Hersteller.
actual_translation: However, only Swiss producers are eligible.

translation_text: According to the newspaper’s report, Chocolat Frey will endeavour to renew the contract beyond the spring 2018.
german_text: Laut dem Zeitungsbericht will sich Chocolat Frey um eine Erneuerung des Vertrags über den Frühling 2018 hinaus bemühen.
actual_translation: According to the newspaper report, Chocolat Frey wants to strive to renew the contract beyond Spring 2018.

translation_text: For the SDA, the largest Swiss chocolate manufacturer was not accessible for a comment.
german_text: Für die sda war der grösste Schweizer Schokoladenhersteller nicht für eine Stellungnahme erreichbar.
actual_translation: The biggest Swiss chocolate producer was not available to the sda for a statement.

translation_text: The Swiss has distributed chocolate tables on board its flights since 2006.
german_text: Schokoladen-Tafeln verteilt die Swiss seit 2006 an Bord ihrer Flüge.
actual_translation: Swiss has been handing out chocolate bars on board their flights since 2006.

translation_text: Before the Swiss signed a contract with the Migros daughter, Barry Callebaut had delivered the chocolate tablets in collaboration with Hug.
german_text: Bevor die Swiss einen Vertrag mit der Migros Tochter abschloss, hatte Barry Callebaut in Zusammenarbeit mit Hug die Schokolade-Tablets geliefert.
actual_translation: Before Swiss concluded a contract with the Migros subsidiary, Barry Callebaut had supplied the chocolate bars, in collaboration with Hug.

translation_text: The possibility of placing the logo was introduced by Swiss two and a half years ago with the start of cooperation with Chocolat Frey.
german_text: Die Möglichkeit, das Logo zu platzieren, führte Swiss vor zweieinhalb Jahren mit dem Start der Zusammenarbeit mit Chocolat Frey ein.
actual_translation: Swiss introduced the possibility of inserting a logo two and a half years ago, at the start of the collaboration with Chocolat Frey.

translation_text: The airline works with various Swiss chocolate producers.
german_text: Die Fluggesellschaft arbeitet mit unterschiedlichen Schweizer Schokoladeproduzenten zusammen.
actual_translation: The airline collaborates with various Swiss chocolate manufacturers.

translation_text: On long-range flights, First Class customers are swept with flavours by the Confiserie Sprüngli, in the Business Class passengers shoggy from Lindt and in the Economy Class shoggy from Chocolat Frey.
german_text: Auf Langstreckenflügen werden die Kunden der First Class mit Leckereien von der Confiserie Sprüngli verwöhnt, in der Business Class naschen Passagiere Schoggi von Lindt und in der Economy Class Schoggi von Chocolat Frey.
actual_translation: On long-haul flights, the first class customers are spoiled with treats from confectioner Sprüngli; in business class, passengers nibble on chocolate from Lindt, and in economy class, chocolate from Chocolat Frey.

translation_text: Also on the short track Swiss Schoggi distributes Chocolat Frey, both in the business and in the Economy Class.
german_text: Auch auf der Kurzstrecke verteilt Swiss Schoggi von Chocolat Frey, sowohl in der Business als auch in der Economy Class.
actual_translation: On short-haul routes too, Swiss hands out chocolate from Chocolate Frey, both in business and in economy class.

translation_text: Light Athletics - Diskus Olympic winner Robert Harting reaches World Cup final
german_text: Leichtathletik - Diskus-Olympiasieger Robert Harting erreicht WM-Finale
actual_translation: Track-and-field discus Olympic champion Robert Harting reaches the World Championship finals

translation_text: The three-time world champion will struggle for a medal in the final on Saturday.
german_text: Der dreimalige Weltmeister kämpft am Samstag im Finale um eine Medaille.
actual_translation: The three-time world champion is fighting for a medal in the finals on Saturday.

translation_text: His brother Christoph, the 2016 Olympic winner, had failed in the national World Cup election and was able to watch the discussion struggle only from the tribune.
german_text: Sein Bruder Christoph, Olympiasieger von 2016, war in der nationalen WM-Ausscheidung gescheitert und konnte sich den Diskus-Wettkampf nur von der Tribüne anschauen.
actual_translation: His brother Christoph, Olympic champion in 2016, had been unsuccessful in the national World Championship qualifier and could only watch the discus contest from the stands.

translation_text: Also with the first attempt, the Polish title defense Piotr Malachowski, who threw 65.13 meters away, qualified for the final battle.
german_text: Ebenfalls mit dem ersten Versuch qualifizierte sich der polnische Titelverteidiger Piotr Malachowski, der 65,13 Meter weit warf, für den Endkampf.
actual_translation: Polish title defender Piotr Malachowski also qualified for the final showdown with his first attempt, throwing 65.13 metres.

translation_text: Nostalgie goes into the niche in "Wet Hot American Summer" and "Comrade Detective"
german_text: Nostalgie geht in "Wet Hot American Summer" und "Comrade Detective" in die Nische
actual_translation: Nostalgia Goes Niche in "Wet Hot American Summer" and "Comrade Detective"

translation_text: This repeat of the story is at the same time nostalgic because of the glorious days of the characters of the 80s, for the 90s-grunge era (as the predecessors David Wain and Michael Showalter directed the sketch comedy "The State" for MTV), and for themselves - that is, for 2001, before their stars, such as Elizabeth Banks, Amy Poehler and Paul Rudd went to bigger things.
german_text: Diese Wiederholung der Geschichte ist gleichzeitig nostalgisch wegen der glorreichen Tage der Charaktere der 80-er Jahre, für die 90-er-Jahre-Grunge-Ära (als die Vordenker David Wain und Michael Showalter die Sketch-Komödie "The State" für MTV drehten), und für sich selbst - das heißt, für 2001, bevor ihre Stars, wie Elizabeth Banks, Amy Poehler und Paul Rudd zu größeren Dingen gingen.
actual_translation: So this iteration of the story is simultaneously nostalgic for the characters' '80s glory days; for the '90s grunge era (around when the masterminds David Wain and Michael Showalter made the sketch comedy "The State" for MTV); and for itself - that is, for 2001, before its stars, like Elizabeth Banks, Amy Poehler and Paul Rudd, went on to bigger things.

translation_text: As a cultural artefact, it is equally a parody and a corporation of our Facebook-capable era of permanent memories.
german_text: Als kulturelles Artefakt ist es gleichermaßen eine Parodie und eine Verkörperung unserer Facebook-fähigen Ära permanenter Erinnerungen.
actual_translation: As a cultural artifact, it's both a sendup and embodiment of our Facebook-enabled era of permanent reminiscence.

translation_text: But as a franchise it feels like the time is short.
german_text: Aber als Franchise fühlt es sich an, als würde die Zeit knapp.
actual_translation: But as a franchise, it feels like it's running out of time.

translation_text: "First Day of Camp" worked surprisingly well, not just because of its absurd humor (it contained an original story for a speaking dose of vegetables that was spoken by H. Jon Benjamin).
german_text: "First Day of Camp" funktionierte überraschend gut, nicht nur wegen seines absurden Humors (es enthielt eine ursprüngliche Geschichte für eine sprechende Dose Gemüse, die von H. Jon Benjamin gesprochen wurde).
actual_translation: "First Day of Camp" worked surprisingly well, not just because of its absurdist humor (it included an origin story for a talking can of vegetables, voiced by H. Jon Benjamin).

translation_text: By hiding themselves on the core of the gags - middle-aged actors play ugly children who will grow up - they still created the impossibility to win the last part of the joke back.
german_text: Indem sie sich auf den Kern des Gags versteiften - Schauspieler mittleren Alters spielen geile Kinder, die erwachsen werden - schafften sie dennoch die Unmöglichkeit, den letzten Teil des Witzes zurück zu gewinnen.
actual_translation: By doubling down on the core gag - middle-age actors playing horny kids coming of age - it made the impossibility of recapturing the past part of the joke.

translation_text: "Ten Years Later", with his adults now playing adults, is less emotional rooted and his parody goes more according to the gathering principle, including a riff on the Stalker films of the 1990s such as "The Hand That Rocks the Cradle" ("The Hand That Rocks the Cradle").
german_text: "Ten Years Later", mit seinen Erwachsenen, die jetzt Erwachsene spielen, ist weniger emotional verwurzelt und seine Parodie geht mehr nach dem Gießkannenprinzip, darunter ein Riff auf die Stalker-Filme der 90-er Jahre wie "The Hand That Rocks the Cradle" ("Die Hand, die die Wiege schaukelt").
actual_translation: "Ten Years Later," with its adults now playing adults, is less emotionally rooted and its parody more scattershot, including a riff on '90s stalker flicks like "The Hand That Rocks the Cradle."

translation_text: At one point, a character stumbles through an Apple Powerbook, some inline sketches, and “a series of other things from the year 1991.”
german_text: An einem Punkt stöbert ein Charakter durch ein Apple-Powerbook, einige Inline-Skates und "eine Reihe anderer Dinge aus dem Jahr 1991".
actual_translation: At one point a character rummages through an Apple Powerbook, some in-line skates and "a bunch of other things from 1991."

translation_text: Many of the central stories are the same.
german_text: Viele der zentralen Geschichten sind die gleichen.
actual_translation: Many of the core stories are the same.

translation_text: The beloved Coop (Mr. Showalter), now the novel author, has not yet forgotten Katie (Marguerite Moreau).
german_text: Der liebenswürdige Coop (Mr. Showalter), jetzt Romanautor, hat Katie (Marguerite Moreau) immer noch nicht vergessen.
actual_translation: Sweet-hearted Coop (Mr. Showalter), now a novelist, still hasn't gotten over Katie (Marguerite Moreau).

translation_text: Victor (Ken Marino) has not yet lost his virginity.
german_text: Victor (Ken Marino) hat seine Jungfräulichkeit immer noch nicht verloren.
actual_translation: Victor (Ken Marino) still hasn't lost his virginity.

translation_text: And there’s another crazy-bad plot, which includes Ronald Reagan (also Mr. Showalter), now supported by George H. W. Bush (a well-successful impression by Michael Ian Black).
german_text: Und es gibt noch einen weiteren verrückt-bösartigen Plot, in den Ronald Reagan (auch Mr. Showalter) einbezogen ist, der jetzt von George H. W. Bush (ein gut gelungener Eindruck von Michael Ian Black) unterstützt wird.
actual_translation: And there's another battily villainous plot involving Ronald Reagan (also Mr. Showalter), now abetted by George H. W. Bush (a well-inhabited impression by Michael Ian Black).

translation_text: As always, the excursions are the best part of the franchise.
german_text: Wie immer sind die Exkurse der beste Teil der Franchise.
actual_translation: As always, the best part of the franchise is the digressions.

translation_text: It’s fun to see the eternally young Mr. Rudd showing Matt Dillon’s underlippenbart of “Singles” whose former Big-Man-on-Camp Andy now feels like an old cracker.
german_text: Es macht besonders viel Spaß, den ewig jungen Mr. Rudd zu sehen, der Matt Dillons Unterlippenbart von "Singles" zeigt, dessen ehemaliger Big-Man-on-Camp Andy sich nun wie ein alter Knacker fühlt.
actual_translation: It's especially fun to see the forever-young Mr. Rudd, sporting Matt Dillon's soul patch from "Singles," whose former big-man-on-camp Andy now feels like a geezer.

translation_text: It’s the moments of random madness that could raise this franchise like a kind of repeating “Seven Up!” series until he reaches what I assume as his logical conclusion: “Wet Hot American Summer: Twenty Years Later”, whose final scene will show the band how they will visit the film premiere of “Wet Hot American Summer”.
german_text: Es sind die Momente zufälligen Wahnsinns, die dieses Franchise anheizen könnten wie eine Art sich wiederholende "Seven Up!" Serie, bis er das erreicht, was ich als seine logische Schlussfolgerung annehme: "Wet Hot American Summer: Twenty Years Later", dessen letzte Szene die Bande zeigen wird, wie sie die Filmpremiere von "Wet Hot American Summer" besuchen wird.
actual_translation: It's the moments of random lunacy that might power this franchise on, like a kind of recursive "Seven Up!" series, until it reaches what I assume will be its logical conclusion: "Wet Hot American Summer: Twenty Years Later," whose last scene will have the gang going to see the movie premiere of "Wet Hot American Summer."

translation_text: "Comrade Detective" on Amazon now reminds of another kind of nostalgia: the revival of the Cold War of "The Americans", the film "Atomic Blonde" and even "GLOW" with its East-to-West Ring Fight iconography.
german_text: "Comrade Detective" auf Amazon erinnert inzwischen an eine andere Art von Nostalgie: an die Wiederbelebung des Kalten Krieges von "The Americans", an den Film "Atomic Blonde" und sogar an "GLOW" mit seiner Ost-gegen-West Ringkampf-Ikonographie.
actual_translation: "Comrade Detective" on Amazon, meanwhile, appeals to a different brand of nostalgia: the Cold War revivalism of "The Americans," the film "Atomic Blonde" and even "GLOW," with its East versus West wrestling iconography.

translation_text: The comedy created by Brian Gatewood and Alessandro Tanaka with Rhys Thomas as a director tells to be a found TV series: a Romanian drama of the 1980s with the two police officers as friends, two officers from Bucharest fighting for truth, atheism and the way of Marxism-Leninism.
german_text: Die von Brian Gatewood und Alessandro Tanaka geschaffene Komödie mit Rhys Thomas als Regisseur gibt an, eine gefundene TV-Serie zu sein: ein rumänisches Drama der achtziger Jahre mit den beiden Polizisten als Freunde, zwei Offiziere aus Bukarest, die für Wahrheit, Atheismus und den Weg des Marxismus-Leninismus kämpfen.
actual_translation: The comedy, created by Brian Gatewood and Alessandro Tanaka, with Rhys Thomas directing, purports to be found TV: a Romanian 1980s buddy-cop drama about two Bucharest officers fighting for truth, atheism and the Marxist-Leninist way.

translation_text: The main roles - a hard-sotted Gregor and an idealist Joseph - are played by Florin Piersic Jr. and Corneliu Ulici, whose dialogues are synchronized by Channing Tatum (also an executive producer) and Joseph Gordon-Levitt in English.
german_text: Die Hauptrollen - ein hart gesottener Gregor und ein idealistischer Iosef - werden von Florin Piersic Jr. und Corneliu Ulici gespielt, deren Dialoge von Channing Tatum (ebenfalls ein ausführender Produzent) und Joseph Gordon-Levitt auf Englisch synchronisiert werden.
actual_translation: The lead roles - hard-boiled Gregor and idealistic Iosef - are played by Florin Piersic Jr. and Corneliu Ulici, their dialogue dubbed in English by Channing Tatum (also an executive producer) and Joseph Gordon-Levitt.

translation_text: It is a genius idea.
german_text: Es ist eine geniale Idee.
actual_translation: It's a brilliant idea.

translation_text: But it is not much more than an idea.
german_text: Aber es ist nicht viel mehr als eine Idee.
actual_translation: But it's not much more than an idea.

translation_text: There are some beautiful gags to watch (the police spend time watching chess on television, how Americans may do it with football).
german_text: Es gibt einige schöne Gags zum Ansehen (die Polizei verbringt die Zeit damit, sich Schach im Fernsehen anzusehen, wie Amerikaner es vielleicht mit Fußball tun).
actual_translation: There are some fine sight gags (the police pass the time watching chess on TV as Americans might football).

translation_text: And the list of famous speakers - including Jenny Slate, Nick Offerman, Mahershala Ali and Chloë Sevigny - provides a decent game 'Find the Voice Out'.
german_text: Und die Liste der berühmten Sprecher - darunter Jenny Slate, Nick Offerman, Mahershala Ali und Chloë Sevigny - sorgt für ein anständiges Spiel 'Finde die Stimme heraus'.
actual_translation: And the roster of famous voice-over actors - among them Jenny Slate, Nick Offerman, Mahershala Ali and Chloë Sevigny - makes for a decent game of spot-the-voice.

translation_text: But "Comrade Detective" is so committed to the truth of a desperate propaganda drama - a murderer wearing a Reagan mask is involved - that it often plays like a single one.
german_text: Aber "Comrade Detective" engagiert sich so sehr für die Wahrhaftigkeit eines verzweifelten Propaganda-Dramas - ein Mörder, der eine Reagan-Maske trägt, wird einbezogen - dass es oft wie ein einziges spielt.
