actual_translation: But "Comrade Detective" is so committed to the verisimilitude of a hamfisted propaganda drama - a killer wearing a Reagan mask is involved - that it often plays like one.

translation_text: With six long episodes it gets there, and the comedy is not fast or frequent enough.
german_text: Bei sechs langen Episoden zieht es sich dahin, und die Komödie ist nicht schnell oder häufig genug.
actual_translation: At six long episodes, it drags, and the comedy isn't fast or frequent enough.

translation_text: "Comrade Detective", which was edited for a smaller length, could deliver his agitprop satire better as Gregor and Joseph repeatedly visit the U.S. embassy, whose lobby is always occupied by two thick men who sweat a crowd of hamburgers.
german_text: "Comrade Detective", der auf eine geringere Länge redigiert wurde, könnte seine Agitprop-Satire besser liefern, da Gregor und Iosef immer wieder die amerikanische Botschaft besuchen, deren Lobby immer von zwei dicken Männern besetzt ist, die einen Haufen Hamburger verschlingen.
actual_translation: Edited to a tighter length, "Comrade Detective" might deliver better on its agitprop satire, as when Gregor and Iosef repeatedly visit the American Embassy, whose lobby is always occupied by two fat men wolfing down a pile of hamburgers.

translation_text: The message for the imaginary communist audience is that the western culture can make everything food for a pleasure.
german_text: Die Botschaft für das imaginierte kommunistische Publikum ist, dass die westliche Kultur alles zum Futter für ein Gelage machen kann.
actual_translation: The message, for the imagined communist audience, is that Western culture can turn anything into fodder to binge.

translation_text: The fictional Romanian creators were not wrong: we do it even with our own younger history and their own.
german_text: Die fiktiven rumänischen Schöpfer lagen nicht falsch: Wir machen es sogar mit unserer eigenen jüngeren Geschichte und mit der ihrigen.
actual_translation: The fictional Romanian creators were not wrong: We even do it with our own recent history, and theirs.

translation_text: Attacks against drug mafia in the country
german_text: Schlag gegen Drogen-Mafia im Land
actual_translation: Blow dealt to drug mafia in the country

translation_text: Police have succeeded in a strike against the Italian mafia in Baden-Württemberg.
german_text: Der Polizei ist ein Schlag gegen die italienische Mafia in Baden-Württemberg gelungen.
actual_translation: The police have delivered a successful blow against the Italian Mafia in Baden Württemberg.

translation_text: On Wednesday morning, numerous objects were searched in the Black Forest-Baar Circle, in Rottweil, Konstanz, Esslingen and Stuttgart, according to the Prosecutor's Office Konstanz on Friday.
german_text: Am Mittwochmorgen wurden im Schwarzwald-Baar-Kreis, in Rottweil, Konstanz, Esslingen und Stuttgart zahlreiche Objekte durchsucht, wie die Staatsanwaltschaft Konstanz am Freitag mitteilte.
actual_translation: On Wednesday morning, in the Black Forest-Baar district, numerous properties were searched in Rottweil, Konstanz, Esslingen and Stuttgart, said the Konstanz public prosecutor's office on Friday.

translation_text: 15 accused men between the ages of 25 and 77 have been arrested and arrested.
german_text: Dabei wurden 15 Beschuldigte im Alter zwischen 25 Jahren und 77 Jahren festgenommen und bereits Haftbefehle gegen diese erlassen.
actual_translation: In the course of this, 15 accused, aged between 25 and 77, were detained and already had arrest warrants issued against them.

translation_text: In addition, the officials saved larger amounts of marijuana and cocaine, firearms and several hundred thousand euros.
german_text: Außerdem stellten die Beamten größere Mengen Marihuana und Kokain, Schusswaffen sowie mehrere hunderttausend Euro sicher.
actual_translation: In addition, officials seized large quantities of marijuana and cocaine, firearms and several hundred thousand euros.

translation_text: In Italy, two people were arrested.
german_text: Bei zeitgleichen Razzien in Italien wurden zwei Personen festgenommen.
actual_translation: At simultaneous raids in Italy, two people were detained.

translation_text: The two suspects were arrested by Germany.
german_text: Gegen die beiden Verdächtigen Italiener gab es deutsche Haftbefehle.
actual_translation: German arrest warrants were issued against the two suspected Italians.

translation_text: The two are likely to be delivered to Germany.
german_text: Die beiden werden deshalb vermutlich nach Deutschland ausgeliefert.
actual_translation: Both of them were therefore presumably extradited to Germany.

translation_text: Italian and Bavarian investigators were involved.
german_text: An der Aktion waren italienische und bayerische Ermittler beteiligt.
actual_translation: Italian and Bavarian investigators were involved in the operation.

translation_text: Over 300 police officers were involved.
german_text: Insgesamt waren über 300 Polizisten im Einsatz.
actual_translation: In total, over 300 policemen were deployed.

translation_text: Members of the mafia are accused of organized drug crime, severe violence, attempted murder, and theft and persecution.
german_text: Den Mitgliedern der Mafia wird organisierte Drogenkriminalität, schwere Gewalttaten, versuchter Mord sowie Raub und Erpressung vorgeworfen.
actual_translation: The mafia members were charged with organised drug-related crime, serious acts of violence, attempted murder, and robbery and extortion.

translation_text: Since the summer of 2016, the Prosecutor’s Office has been investigating Konstanz against the organized drug trafficking in the southern German area.
german_text: Schon seit Sommer 2016 ermittelt die Staatsanwaltschaft Konstanz gegen den organisierten Drogenhandel im süddeutschen Raum.
actual_translation: Konstanz public prosecutor's office has been investigating the drug trade in southern Germany since the summer of 2016 already.

translation_text: There was a rough exchange between the prosecutors in Constantinople and Palermo, and the Kripo Rottweil investigators had almost daily contacts with their colleagues in Sicily.
german_text: Zwischen den Staatsanwaltschaften in Konstanz und Palermo bestand ein reger Austausch und die Ermittler der Kripo Rottweil hatten nahezu täglichen Kontakt mit ihren Kollegen auf Sizilien.
actual_translation: There was an active exchange between the public prosecutor's offices in Konstanz and Palermo, and the investigators from Rottweil CID had almost daily contact with their colleagues in Sicily.

translation_text: Therefore, the Great Operation was accompanied by four officials from Palermo on Wednesday morning.
german_text: Daher wurde der Großeinsatz am Mittwochmorgen auch von vier Beamten aus Palermo begleitet.
actual_translation: The major operation on Wednesday morning was thus attended by four officials from Palermo.

translation_text: In the vision of the investigations were mainly Italian citizens with close reference to the Italian mafia.
german_text: Ins Visier der Untersuchungen rückten dabei vor allem italienische Staatsangehörige mit engem Bezug zur italienischen Mafia.
actual_translation: The investigations then turned their sights above all to Italian nationals with close ties to the Italian mafia.

translation_text: Also an incident on May 27 in Hüfingen, where several shootings were shot in a hostel early in the morning, is likely to go to the band’s account.
german_text: Auch ein Vorfall am 27. Mai in Hüfingen, bei dem früh morgens mehrere Schüsse in eine Gaststätte abgefeuert wurden, dürfte auf das Konto der Bande gehen.
actual_translation: An incident on 27th May in Hüfingen, during which several shots were fired into a restaurant in the early morning, is also likely to have been caused by the gang.

translation_text: How to complain about large gap in the Foreign Registry
german_text: Weise beklagt große Lücken im Ausländer-Register
actual_translation: Weise complains of big holes in the Register of Foreign Nationals

translation_text: "Data of citizens who should not appear there": According to a report, the Foreign Registry in Germany shows significant shortcomings.
german_text: "Daten von Bürgern, die da nicht auftauchen sollten": Einem Bericht zufolge weist das Ausländer-Register in Deutschland erhebliche Mängel auf.
actual_translation: "Data for citizens that ought not to be showing up there": according to a report, the Register of Foreigner Nationals in Germany is exhibiting significant defects.

translation_text: This leads to some serious errors in asylum proceedings.
german_text: Das führe zu teils gravierenden Fehlentscheidungen bei Asylverfahren.
actual_translation: This is leading to some grave mistakes in decisions within asylum procedures.

translation_text: According to a media report, the Federal Government’s refugee management commissioner, Frank-Jürgen Weise, has pointed attention to large gap in the Foreign Central Register.
german_text: Der Beauftragte für das Flüchtlingsmanagement der Bundesregierung, Frank-Jürgen Weise, hat einem Medienbericht zufolge auf große Lücken im Ausländerzentralregister aufmerksam gemacht.
actual_translation: Frank-Jürgen Weise, the official appointee of the German Government for the management of refugees, has brought attention to big holes in the Central Register of Foreign Nationals, according to one media report.

translation_text: Failures in the data registered there could lead to "particularly serious errors" in asylum proceedings and deportations, warned in an analysis presented by the "Süddeutsche Zeitung".
german_text: Mängel bei den dort registrierten Daten könnten bei Asylverfahren und Abschiebungen "zu teils gravierenden Fehlentscheidungen" führen, warnte Weise in einer Analyse, die der "Süddeutschen Zeitung" vorliegt.
actual_translation: Defects in the data registered there could lead to "some grave mistakes in decisions" when it comes to asylum procedures and deportations, warned Weise in an analysis received by the Süddeutsche Zeitung.

translation_text: The register contains 10 million people with foreign citizenship, including approximately 5.7 million from non-EU countries.
german_text: In dem Register sind den Angaben zufolge zehn Millionen Menschen mit ausländischer Staatsangehörigkeit erfasst, darunter etwa 5,7 Millionen aus Nicht-EU-Staaten.
actual_translation: According to that information, ten million people with foreign nationality are recorded in the register, among whom around 5.7 million from non-EU states.

translation_text: The data is managed by about 600 foreign authorities in Germany.
german_text: Die Daten werden demnach von etwa 600 Ausländerbehörden in Deutschland verwaltet.
actual_translation: The data are managed by around 600 Foreigners' Registration Offices in Germany.

translation_text: Because the data has not been kept adequately, the data quality in parts has not been good so far.
german_text: Weil die Daten nicht ausreichend gepflegt worden seien, sei die Datenqualität in Teilen bislang nicht gut gewesen.
actual_translation: Because the data have not been sufficiently maintained, it said, the quality of the data has in part not been good to date.

translation_text: In individual cases, data from 1921 were found, “of people who have long not been alive, or of citizens who have become German citizens and should not actually appear in the register anymore.”
german_text: In Einzelfällen seien Daten von 1921 gefunden worden, "von Menschen, die längst nicht mehr am Leben sind, oder von Bürgern, die deutsche Staatsbürger geworden sind und in dem Register eigentlich nicht mehr auftauchen sollten".
actual_translation: In some cases, data from 1921 was found, "from people who have long been dead, or from citizens who became German nationals and actually should no longer be showing up in the register."

translation_text: "False data input can significantly slow down the return process," the report continues.
german_text: "Fehlerhafte Dateneingaben können Rückkehrprozesse erheblich verlangsamen", heißt es dem Bericht nach weiter.
actual_translation: "Erroneous data entries can significantly slow down return processes," the report continues.

translation_text: In the statistics on persons obliged to leave, there are also EU citizens who shouldn’t have to leave at all.
german_text: In der Statistik über ausreisepflichtige Menschen seien überdies EU-Bürger erfasst, die gar nicht ausreisen müssten.
actual_translation: Moreover, within the statistics on those people who are obliged to leave the country are recorded EU citizens, who do not at all have to leave.

translation_text: Such false assignments, however, led to “a distorted debate on how to deal with expatriates,” according to the analysis.
german_text: Solche falschen Zuordnungen führten aber "zu einer verzerrten Debatte über den Umgang mit Ausreisepflichtigen", heißt es demnach in der Analyse.
actual_translation: Such false categorisations, however, led to "a biased debate about how to deal with those who are obliged to leave the country," it says accordingly in the analysis.

translation_text: Meanwhile, the federal government has apparently started sending refugees with children under the age of 16 back to Italy when they have arrived from there.
german_text: Unterdessen hat die Bundesregierung offenbar damit begonnen, Flüchtlingsfamilien mit unter 16-jährigen Kindern wieder nach Italien zurückzuschicken, wenn sie von dort eingereist sind.
actual_translation: Meanwhile, the German Government has apparently begun to send back to Italy refugee families with children under 16 years of age, if this is where they entered the country from.

translation_text: This is stated from an internal paper of the Federal Office for Migration and Refugees (BAMF), reports the "New Osnabrücker Zeitung".
german_text: Das gehe aus einem internen Papier des Bundesamts für Migration und Flüchtlinge (BAMF) hervor, berichtet die "Neue Osnabrücker Zeitung".
actual_translation: This is emerging from an internal paper from the Federal Office for Migration and Refugees (BAMF), reports the "Neue Osnabrücker Zeitung".

translation_text: According to the paper, the BAMF is carrying out such procedures “with regard to families with children – with the exception of infants and infants – to Italy since 1 June 2017”.
german_text: In dem Papier heißt es demnach, das BAMF führe solche Verfahren "betreffend Familien mit Kindern - mit Ausnahme von Säuglingen und Kleinstkindern - nach Italien seit dem 1. Juni 2017 wieder durch".
actual_translation: In the paper, it says that the BAMF has been once more transacting such procedures "that concern families with children – with the exception of infants and very small children – to Italy since 1st June 2017."

translation_text: Since the end of 2014 it was practically no longer possible, according to the newspaper referring to the difficult situation on the site.
german_text: Seit Ende 2014 war das praktisch nicht mehr möglich, so die Zeitung unter Verweis auf die schwierige Situation vor Ort.
actual_translation: Since the end of 2014, that had practically no longer been possible, says the newspaper, pointing to the difficult situation on the ground.

translation_text: According to the Dublin Agreement, refugees are responsible for the EU state they first reach.
german_text: Nach dem Dublin-Abkommen ist für Flüchtlinge der EU-Staat zuständig, den sie zuerst erreichen.
actual_translation: According to the Dublin Regulation, it is the EU state the refugee first reaches that is responsible for them.

translation_text: If a migrant travels to another EU country, that country may send him back to the country of entry.
german_text: Wenn ein Migrant in ein anderes EU-Land weiterreist, kann dieser Staat ihn in das Einreiseland zurückschicken.
actual_translation: If a migrant travels further into another EU country, this state can send him back to the country he entered from.

translation_text: According to the statement, “the capacity of accommodation for families with minor children in Italy has increased significantly.”
german_text: Zur Begründung schreibe das Amt nun: "Inzwischen hat sich die Aufnahmekapazität für Familien mit minderjährigen Kindern in Italien wesentlich erhöht".
actual_translation: As a means of justification, the office writes: "By now, the intake capacity for families with children who are minors has significantly increased in Italy."

translation_text: Italy has issued guarantees for the reception and accommodation of families.
german_text: Italien habe für die Aufnahme und Unterkunft von Familien Garantien abgegeben.
actual_translation: Italy has provided guarantees for the intake and accommodation of families.

translation_text: Even the European Court of Human Rights (ECHR) considers these promises sufficient.
german_text: Selbst der Europäische Gerichtshof für Menschenrechte (EGMR) halte diese Zusagen für ausreichend.
actual_translation: The European Court of Human Rights (ECHR) itself considers these pledges to be sufficient.

translation_text: Other EU countries would also send refugees back there under the Dublin Agreement.
german_text: Auch andere EU-Staaten würden Flüchtlinge im Rahmen des Dublin-Abkommens dorthin zurückschicken.
actual_translation: Other EU states too would send back refugees there using the scope of the Dublin Agreement.

translation_text: Internal policy spokeswoman of the left party in the Bundestag, Ulla Jelpke, criticized this decision: "Families with children are threatened because of the defects in the Italian asylum system, uninhuman reception conditions and a danger to the child's well-being."
german_text: Die innenpolitische Sprecherin der Linksfraktion im Bundestag, Ulla Jelpke, kritisierte diese Entscheidung: "Familien mit Kindern drohen wegen der Mängel im italienischen Asylsystem menschenrechtswidrige Aufnahmebedingungen und eine Gefährdung des Kindeswohls".
actual_translation: The Linke party's spokeswoman for domestic poicy, Ulla Elpke, criticised this decision: "Due to shortcomings in the Italian asylum system, families with children are threatened with conditions of admission that contravene human rights and with risk to the child's welfare"

translation_text: The second best result
german_text: Zweitbestes Ergebnis erzielt
actual_translation: Second-best result achieved

translation_text: A total of 220 liters of blood from people living in Oberreichenbach, the blood donation service has already made available to other people.
german_text: Insgesamt 220 Liter Blut von in Oberreichenbach lebenden Personen stellte der Blutspendedienst bereits für andere Menschen zur Verfügung.
actual_translation: Altogether, the blood donor service made 220 litres of blood from people living in Oberreichenbach available for others.

translation_text: At least of the twelve citizens who were awarded on Friday.
german_text: Zumindest von den zwölf Bürgern, die am Freitag ausgezeichnet wurden.
actual_translation: At least, from the twelve citizens who were honoured on Friday.

translation_text: Jürgen Greule, who shared 50 liters of blood with his 100 donations.
german_text: Allen voran Jürgen Greule, der mit seinen inzwischen 100 Spenden inzwischen 50 Liter Blut teilte.
actual_translation: Ahead of everyone is Jürgen Greule, who has by now shared 50 litres of blood with his 100 donations.

translation_text: Traditionally, the municipality in the council meeting honors the multiple willingness to donate blood.
german_text: Traditionell würdigt die Gemeinde in der Sitzung des Gemeinderats die mehrfache Bereitschaft, Blut zu spenden.
actual_translation: The community traditionally acknowledges the repeated willingness to give blood in the meeting of its municipal council.

translation_text: “It’s great how our bodies are designed for it, and we must give respect to the donors that give their blood to strangers, even unprofitable,” said mayor Karlheinz Kistner.
german_text: "Es ist genial, wie unser Körper dafür angelegt ist und wir zollen den Spendern Respekt, die ihr Blut für Fremde zur Verfügung stellen, noch dazu uneigennützig", unterstrich Bürgermeister Karlheinz Kistner.
actual_translation: "It is ingenious how our bodies are designed for this and we show respect to the donors who make their blood available for strangers, and so selflessly," stressed mayor Karlheinz Kistner.

translation_text: "A single blood donation helps several people," said Holger Maisenbacher, the head of the German Red Cross, as the conservances are broken down into their components.
german_text: "Eine einzige Blutspende hilft mehreren Menschen", erläuterte der Kreisbereitschaftsleiter des Deutschen Roten Kreuzes (DRK), Holger Maisenbacher, denn die Konserven werden in ihre Bestandteile zersetzt.
actual_translation: "One single blood donation helps multiple people," explained the district head of the on-call service of the German Red Cross (DRK), Holger Maisenbacher, for the reserves are broken down into their components.

translation_text: Three people could benefit from a blood donation.
german_text: So könnten schon mal drei Personen von einer Blutspende profitieren.
actual_translation: So, as many as three people could benefit from a single blood donation.

translation_text: At the same time, Maisenbacher the actions that will be carried out in the spring in Oberreichenbach.
german_text: Gleichzeitig berichtete Maisenbacher von den Aktionen, die im Frühjahr in Oberreichenbach durchgeführt werden.
actual_translation: At the same time, Maisenbacher reported on the campaigns that are to be carried out in Oberreichenbach in the spring.

translation_text: "This year we achieved the second best result with 114 donors," the DRK Circle Preparation Leader said.
german_text: "In diesem Jahr erzielten wir mit 114 Spendern das zweitbeste Ergebnis", sagte der DRK-Kreisbereitschaftsleiter.
actual_translation: "This year, we achieved our second best result ever, with 114 donors," said the DRK on-call district head.

translation_text: Obviously, the change to the theater house led to higher participants numbers a few years ago.
german_text: Offensichtlich habe der Wechsel ins Theaterhaus vor wenigen Jahren zu höheren Teilnehmerzahlen geführt.
actual_translation: Obviously the move into the theatre venue a few years ago led to a higher number of participants.

translation_text: Before that, Thomas Bockstadt, Susanne Reichle, Sandra Schöck, Thomas Reichle and Meta Umbeer were among the multiple donors and were awarded for 50 blood donations each.
german_text: Schon davor zählten Thomas Bockstadt, Susanne Reichle, Sandra Schöck, Thomas Reichle und Meta Umbeer zu den Mehrfachspendern und wurden für jeweils 50 geleistete Blutspenden ausgezeichnet.
actual_translation: Already before then, Thomas Bockstadt, Susanne Reichle, Sandra Schöck, Thomas Reichle and Meta Umbeer were numbered amongst the repeat donors and honoured for having made 50 donations each.

translation_text: Half so many recorded Herbert Mair and Dorothee Riexinger, while Tamara Pfrommer, Petra Schleeh, Stefanie Stoll and Uwe Vetter gave ten times each 500 milliliter of their life juice.
german_text: Halb so viele verbuchen Herbert Mair und Dorothee Riexinger, während Tamara Pfrommer, Petra Schleeh, Stefanie Stoll und Uwe Vetter zehn Mal je 500 Milliliter von ihrem Lebenssaft abgaben.
actual_translation: Half as many were clocked up by Herbert Mair and Dorothee Reixinger, while Tamara Pfrommer, Petra Schleeh, Stefanie Stoll and Uwe Vetter each gave 500 millilitres of their lifeblood.

translation_text: Bank of England will keep interest rates at 0.25%
german_text: Die Bank of England wird die Zinssätze bei 0,25 % halten
actual_translation: Bank of England to keep interest rates at 0.25%

translation_text: The Bank of England is expected to announce later that the interest rates will remain unchanged after weak economic growth and inflation decline have suppressed the speculation about a rise.
german_text: Die Bank of England wird voraussichtlich später bekanntgeben, dass die Zinssätze unverändert bleiben werden, nachdem das schwache Wirtschaftswachstum und die Abschwächung der Inflation die Spekulationen über einen Anstieg gedämpft haben.
actual_translation: The Bank of England is expected to announce later that interest rates will remain unchanged after lacklustre economic growth and easing inflation dampened speculation over a hike.

translation_text: The Bank of England has warned that economic growth will remain “drained” as itins interest rates on family income in the middle of an increasing pressure.
german_text: Die Bank of England hat gewarnt, dass das Wirtschaftswachstum "träge" bleiben wird, als sie die Zinssätze auf Familieneinkommen mitten in einem sich verstärkenden Druck beibehielt.
actual_translation: The Bank of England has warned economic growth will remain "sluggish" as it kept interest rates on hold amid a tightening squeeze on family incomes.

translation_text: The policy makers of the Bank’s Monetary Committee (MPC) voted 6 to 2 to keep the interest rates to 0.25%, with fewer members seeking a rise this month as weak economic growth has weakened the support for a rise.
german_text: Die politischen Entscheidungsträger des Monetary Committee (MPC) der Bank stimmten mit 6 zu 2 dafür, die Zinssätze auf 0,25 % zu halten, wobei in diesem Monat weniger Mitglieder einen Anstieg anstrebten, da das schwache Wirtschaftswachstum die Unterstützung für eine Erhöhung geschwächt hat.
actual_translation: Policymakers on the Bank's Monetary Policy Committee (MPC) voted 6-2 to keep rates at 0.25%, with fewer members this month calling for a rise as lacklustre economic growth has weakened support for a hike.

translation_text: In its quarterly inflation report, the bank reduced its growth forecast for 2017 to 1.7% and for 2018 to 1.6% and warned that pressure on budget revenues would continue, with inflation expected to rise to close to 3% in autumn.
german_text: In ihrem vierteljährlichen Inflationsbericht reduzierte die Bank ihre Wachstumsprognosen für 2017 auf 1,7 % und für 2018 auf 1,6 % und warnte davor, dass sich der Druck auf die Haushaltseinkommen fortsetzen würde, wobei die Inflation im Herbst voraussichtlich noch auf knapp 3 % steigen dürfte.
actual_translation: In its quarterly inflation report, the Bank cut its forecasts for growth to 1.7% in 2017 and 1.6% in 2018 and cautioned the squeeze on household incomes would continue, with inflation still expected to surge close to 3% in the autumn.

translation_text: But she pointed out that interest increases would be needed in the coming years to boost the inflation heated by Brexit and she said the credit costs might need to rise more than expected on the financial markets.
german_text: Aber sie signalisierte, dass in den nächsten Jahren Zinserhöhungen notwendig werden würden, um die vom Brexit angeheizte Inflation zu zügeln und sie sagte, dass die Kreditkosten möglicherweise mehr als erwartet an den Finanzmärkten steigen müssten.
actual_translation: But it signalled rate hikes will be needed over the next few years to rein in Brexit-fuelled inflation and said borrowing costs may need to rise by more than expected in financial markets.

translation_text: The members also voted to withdraw a part of the Mammut Conjuncture Package, which was issued a year after Brexit.
german_text: Die Mitglieder stimmten auch dafür, einen Teil des Mammut-Konjunkturpakets zurückzuziehen, das vor einem Jahr nach dem Brexit herausgegeben wurde.
actual_translation: Members also voted to withdraw part of the mammoth economy-boosting package unleashed a year ago in the aftermath of Brexit.

translation_text: It will require time for the financing plan to provide cheaper funds for banks from February next, although it has been said that now it is expected to provide 15 billion pounds more within the framework of this system - with 115 billion pounds sterling.
german_text: Sie wird Zeit für den Finanzierungsplan fordern, um ab dem kommenden Februar billigere Finanzmittel für Banken bereitzustellen, obwohl gesagt wurde, dass jetzt erwartet wird, dass sie 15 Milliarden Pfund mehr im Rahmen dieses Systems zur Verfügung stellen wird - mit 115 Milliarden Pfund Sterling.
actual_translation: It will call time on the Term Funding Scheme to offer cheap-finance to banks from next February, although it said it was now expected to offer £15 billion more under the scheme - at £115 billion.

translation_text: Minutes after the decision on the interest rate, the bank said: "In the central forecast of the MPC, the GDP remains weak in the short term, as the pressure on the real income of households continues to burden consumption."
german_text: Minuten nach der Entscheidung über den Zinssatz sagte die Bank: "In der zentralen Prognose der MPC bleibt das Bruttoinlandsprodukt (BIP) kurzfristig schwach, da der Druck auf die Realeinkommen der Haushalte weiterhin den Konsum belastet."
actual_translation: In minutes of the rates decision, the Bank said: "In the MPC's central forecast, gross domestic product (GDP) remains sluggish in the near-term as the squeeze on households' real incomes continues to weigh on consumption."

translation_text: At the interest rates, she repeated that "a certain strain of monetary policy" would be required to cool the inflation and a "slightly greater" scale than the markets expected.
german_text: Zu den Zinssätzen wiederholte sie, dass "eine gewisse Straffung der Geldpolitik" zur Abkühlung der Inflation und ein "etwas größeres" Ausmaß erforderlich wäre, als die Märkte erwarten.
actual_translation: On rates, it reiterated that "some tightening of monetary policy" would be needed to cool inflation and by a "somewhat greater" extent than markets expect.

translation_text: The markets are currently predicting the first growth in the third quarter of the next year and another in 2020.
german_text: Die Märkte prognostizieren derzeit den ersten Anstieg im dritten Quartal des nächsten Jahres und einen weiteren im Jahr 2020.
actual_translation: Markets are currently forecasting the first rise in the third quarter of next year and another in 2020.

translation_text: However, the bank emphasized that the increases would be made “progressively” and “limited”.
german_text: Die Bank betonte jedoch, dass Erhöhungen "schrittweise" und "begrenzt" erfolgen würden.
actual_translation: But the Bank stressed that any hikes would be "gradual" and "limited."

translation_text: The bank’s growth forecasts for this and the next year, corrected below, are 1.9% and 1.7% compared to the forecasts for May.
german_text: Die nach unten korrigierten Wachstumsprognosen der Bank für dieses und nächstes Jahr stehen im Vergleich zu den im Mai prognostizierten 1,9 % und 1,7 %.
actual_translation: The Bank's downgraded growth forecasts for this year and next compare with the 1.9% and 1.7% predicted in May.

translation_text: It hasined its growth forecast to 1.8% in 2018.
german_text: Sie hat ihre Wachstumsprognose auf 1,8 % im Jahr 2018 beibehalten.
actual_translation: It maintained its forecast for growth of 1.8% in 2018.

translation_text: The pound fell after these news against the dollar and the euro.
german_text: Das Pfund fiel nach diesen Nachrichten gegenüber dem Dollar und dem Euro.
actual_translation: Sterling fell against the dollar and the euro following the news.

translation_text: The pound fell 0.5% to $1.31 and fell 0.4% to $1.11.
german_text: Das Pfund fiel um 0,5 % auf 1,31 US-Dollar und fiel um 0,4 % auf 1,11 Euro.
actual_translation: The pound was 0.5% down at 1.31 US dollars and fell 0.4% to 1.11 euros.

translation_text: The decision will not be changed after the recent disappointing growth figures have suppressed the rising expectations of interest rise and the GDP in the second quarter has risen from 0.2% in the previous three months to 0.3%.
german_text: Die Entscheidung zu keiner Änderung kommt, nachdem die jüngsten enttäuschenden Wachstumszahlen die steigenden Erwartungen auf eine Zinserhöhung gedämpft haben und das BIP im zweiten Quartal von 0,2 % in den vorhergehenden drei Monaten auf 0,3 % gestiegen ist.
actual_translation: The no-change decision comes after recent disappointing growth figures have dampened mounting expectations of a hike, with GDP edging up to 0.3% in the second quarter from 0.2% in the previous three months.

translation_text: Growth is expected to be 0.3% in the third quarter, although it will slowly recover by the end of the year.
german_text: Das Wachstum wird im dritten Quartal voraussichtlich bei 0,3 % liegen, obwohl es sich nach der Bank gegen Ende des Jahres leicht erholen wird.
actual_translation: Growth is likely to remain at 0.3% in the third quarter, although it will start to pick up slightly at the end of the year, according to the Bank.

translation_text: The latest inflation report offered little enthusiasm for households affected by an increasing inflation and low salary increases, as the exacerbation first becomes even worse before it then improves.
german_text: Der jüngste Inflationsbericht bot wenig Begeisterung für Haushalte, die von einer steigenden Inflation und geringfügigen Gehaltserhöhungen betroffen werden, da die Verschärfung zuerst noch schlimmer wird, bevor sie sich dann bessern wird.
actual_translation: Its latest inflation report offered little cheer for households being hit by soaring inflation and paltry pay rises as it said the squeeze will get worse before it gets better.

translation_text: She added that monetary policy can’t “hinder the income decline” in the coming years, but she added that the wages will “definitely” recover at the end of their three-year forecast.
german_text: Sie fügte hinzu, dass die Geldpolitik in den nächsten Jahren den Einkommenseinbruch nicht "verhindern kann", aber sie fügte hinzu, dass sich die Löhne zum Ende ihrer Dreijahresprognose "deutlich" erholen werden.
actual_translation: It added that monetary policy "cannot prevent" the hit to incomes over the next few years, but expects wages will recover "significantly" towards the end of its three-year forecast.

translation_text: The economy is also strengthened by the growing demand for British goods, which is due to the weak pound, which will compensate for some of the lower consumption spending.
german_text: Die Wirtschaft wird auch durch die steigende Nachfrage nach britischen Gütern gestärkt, was auf das schwache Pfund zurückzuführen ist, was einen Teil der niedrigeren Konsumausgaben kompensieren wird.
actual_translation: The economy is also set for a boost from surging demand for British goods thanks to the weak pound, which will offset some of the lower consumer spending.

translation_text: The decision comes a year after the interest rates dropped to 0.25 percent last August after the shocking EU voting that caused the pound to fall.
german_text: Die Entscheidung kommt ein Jahr nach der Senkung der Zinssätze auf 0,25 % im letzten August nach der schockierenden EU-Abstimmung, die das Sinken des Pfundes verursachte.
actual_translation: The decision comes a year after rates were cut to 0.25% last August following the shock EU referendum vote, which sent the pound slumping.

translation_text: The bank estimates that it will likely take four years to fully reach the prices and the economy.
german_text: Die Bank schätzt, dass es wahrscheinlich vier Jahre dauern wird, bis dies die Preise und die Wirtschaft vollständig erreichen wird.
actual_translation: The Bank estimates it will likely take four years to fully feed through to prices and the economy.

translation_text: Before the bank’s last ruling on the interest rates, the reputation for a rise of interest was increased, as inflation increased pressure on hard-depressed households, with three policy makers calling for a rise to 0.5% in July.
german_text: Vor dem letzten Urteil der Bank zu den Zinsraten war der Ruf nach einer Zinserhöhung gestiegen, da die Inflation den Druck auf hart bedrängte Haushalte steigerte, wobei drei politische Entscheidungsträger im Juli einen Anstieg auf 0,5 % forderten.
actual_translation: Prior to the Bank's latest rates verdict, there had been growing clamour for a rate rise as inflation ramped up pressure on hard-pressed households, with three policymakers calling for an increase to 0.5% in July.

translation_text: Inflation decreased from 2.9% in June to 2.6% last month, although the bank said it was expected and will pull it back in the coming months.
german_text: Die Inflation ist im vergangenen Monat von 2,9 % im Juni auf 2,6 % gesunken, obwohl die Bank sagte, dass dies erwartet wurde und sie in den kommenden Monaten wieder anziehen werde.
actual_translation: Inflation eased back to 2.6% last month from 2.9% in June, although the Bank said this was expected and will pick up once again over the coming months.

translation_text: The bank said that the excess in relation to its 2% target is "completely" to allocate to the weak pound.
german_text: Die Bank sagte, die Überschreitung im Verhältnis zu ihrem Ziel von 2 % sei "ganz" dem schwachen Pfund zuzuschreiben.
actual_translation: The Bank said the overshoot relative to its 2% target was "entirely" down to the weak pound.

translation_text: Andrew Montlake, Director of Coreco Mortgage Brokers, said: “Given the recent decline in the swap rates, the mortgage market is likely to become more competitive again, as creditors are loudly looking for and want to end the year in a positive way.
german_text: Andrew Montlake, Direktor bei Coreco Mortgage Brokers, sagte: "Angesichts des kürzlichen Rückgangs der Swap-Raten dürfte der Hypothekenmarkt wieder stärker wettbewerbsfähig werden, da die Kreditgeber lautstark nach Geschäften suchen und das Jahr in positiver Weise beenden möchten.
actual_translation: Andrew Montlake, director at Coreco Mortgage Brokers, said: "Given the recent fall in swap rates, the mortgage market looks set to become ever more competitive once more as lenders clamour for business and look to end the year in positive fashion.

translation_text: The market looks good for those with which the existing deals run out and the new mortgages conclude, and many with free options and low rates are becoming more and more popular.”
german_text: Der Markt sieht besonders gut aus für diejenigen, bei denen die bestehenden Deals auslaufen und die neue Hypotheken abschließen, und viele mit gebührenfreien Optionen und niedrigen Raten werden immer beliebter."
actual_translation: The market looks particularly good for those who may be coming to the end of their existing deals as re-mortgages, many with fee-free options as well as low rates, become ever more popular."

translation_text: NHS (National Health Service) plans to prescribe controversial HIV drugs to 10,000 people
german_text: NHS (Der Nationale Gesundheitsdienst) soll umstrittene HIV-Droge 10.000 Menschen verschreiben
actual_translation: NHS to prescribe controversial HIV drug to 10,000

translation_text: From September after a struggle before the High Court against the funding of the drug in NHS, patients will be given access to a "transformative" HIV preventive treatment.
german_text: Patienten werden ab September nach einem Kampf vor dem High Court gegen die Finanzierung des Medikaments im NHS Zugang zu einer "transformativen" HIV-Präventionsbehandlung erhalten.
actual_translation: Patients will be able to access a 'transformative' HIV prevention treatment from September following a High Court battle over funding the drug on the NHS.

translation_text: NHS England announced that a pre-exposure prevention (PrEP) taken before gender, which can reduce the risk of infection in high-risk patients by about 86 percent, is now delivered by the health service over a first three-year study for an estimated 10,000 people.
german_text: NHS England gab bekannt, dass eine vor dem Geschlechtsverkehr eingenommene Präexpositionsprophylaxe (PrEP), die das Infektionsrisiko bei Hochrisikopatienten um rund 86 Prozent verringern kann, nun vom Gesundheitsdienst über eine erste Drei-Jahresstudie für geschätzt 10.000 Menschen geliefert wird.
actual_translation: NHS England announced that pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP), a pill taken before sex which has been shown to reduce the risk of infection in high-risk individuals by around 86 per cent, will now be provided by the health service through an initial three-year trial to an estimated 10,000 people.

translation_text: He declared himself willing to fund the trial after the Court of Appeal confirmed a judgment of the Supreme Court last year, according to which the NHS had the authority to pay for the PrEP despite the claim that the local authorities should fund it.
german_text: Er erklärte sich bereit, den Prozess zu finanzieren, nachdem das Berufungsgericht im vergangenen Jahr ein Urteil des Obersten Gerichtshofs bestätigt hatte, wonach der NHS die Befugnis hatte, für die PrEP trotz der Behauptung zu zahlen, dass die lokalen Behörden ihn finanzieren sollten.
actual_translation: It agreed to fund the trial after the Court of Appeal upheld a High Court ruling last year, which said the NHS had the power to pay for PrEP despite its claims that local authorities should fund it.

translation_text: The chess announced on Thursday was welcomed by NHS England chief Simon Stevens as a "important new intervention" while the National AIDS Trust (NAT) called it a "defining moment".
german_text: Der am Donnerstag angekündigte Schachzug wurde von NHS England-Chef Simon Stevens als "wichtige neue Intervention" begrüßt, während der National Aids Trust (NAT) dies als "entscheidenden Moment" bezeichnete.
actual_translation: The move announced on Thursday was hailed as a 'major new intervention' by NHS England chief executive Simon Stevens while the National Aids Trust (NAT) described it as a 'pivotal moment'.

translation_text: Sexual health clinics in London, Brighton, Manchester, Liverpool and Sheffield will be among the first to enable people to register, and more clinics will follow in October before it will be introduced throughout England in April 2018.
german_text: Sexuelle Gesundheitskliniken in London, Brighton, Manchester, Liverpool und Sheffield werden zu den Ersten gehören, die die Anmeldung von Menschen ermöglichen werden, und weitere Kliniken werden im Oktober folgen, bevor es im April 2018 in ganz England eingeführt sein wird.
actual_translation: Sexual health clinics in London, Brighton, Manchester, Liverpool and Sheffield will be among the first to start enrolling people, with more clinics joining in October before full implementation across England by April 2018.

translation_text: Pre-exposure prevention (PrEP) is a result of HIV preparations that are taken before sex to reduce the risk of HIV infection.
german_text: Präexpositionsprophylaxe (PrEP) ist eine Folge von HIV-Präparaten, die vor dem Sex eingenommen werden, um das Risiko einer HIV-Infektion zu reduzieren.
actual_translation: Pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) is a course of HIV drugs taken before sex to reduce the risk of getting HIV.

translation_text: Studies have shown that PrEP significantly reduces HIV transmission in people at risk of infection.
german_text: Studien haben gezeigt, dass PrEP die HIV-Übertragung bei Infektionsgefährdeten signifikant reduziert.
actual_translation: Trials have shown PrEP significantly reduces HIV transmission among those at-risk of infection.

translation_text: Taking PrEP before sexual intercourse means that just enough drugs are present in the body of a person to prevent a HIV infection.
german_text: PrEP vor dem Geschlechtsverkehr zu nehmen bedeutet, dass gerade genug Medikamente im Körper einer Person vorhanden sind, um eine HIV-Infektion zu verhindern.
actual_translation: Taking PrEP before sex means there is just enough of certain drugs in a person's body to prevent an HIV infection taking hold.

translation_text: These medications can be taken every day or two hours before the sex.
german_text: Solche Medikamente können jeden Tag oder so schon zwei Stunden vor dem Geschlechtsverkehr eingenommen werden.
actual_translation: Such drugs can be taken every day or as soon as two hours before having sex.

translation_text: Those who are questioned for treatment include gay or bisexual men, transgender and people with HIV-positive partners who have not been successfully treated.
german_text: Zu denjenigen, die für die Behandlung in Frage kommen, gehören schwule oder bisexuelle Männer, Transsexuelle und Personen mit HIV-positiven Partnern, die nicht erfolgreich behandelt wurden.
actual_translation: Those eligible for the treatment include gay or bisexual men, transgender people and those with HIV-positive partners who are not successfully receiving treatment.

translation_text: In clinics, appropriate participants are identified who agree to the study, including men, women, transgender and individuals who have a partner whose HIV status is unknownly controlled by antiretroviral treatment.
german_text: In Kliniken werden geeignete Teilnehmer identifiziert, die der Studie zustimmen, einschließlich Männern, Frauen, Transgendern und Einzelpersonen, die einen Partner haben, dessen HIV-Status nicht bekanntermaßen durch antiretrovirale Behandlung kontrolliert wird.
actual_translation: Clinics will identify eligible participants who consent to the trial, including men, women, transgender people, and individuals who have a partner whose HIV status is not known to be controlled by anti-retroviral treatment.

translation_text: People who live in England and are registered with a home doctor can also sign up for a possible participation in their local participating sexual clinic.
german_text: Menschen, die in England leben und bei einem Hausarzt registriert sind, können sich auch für eine mögliche Teilnahme an ihrer lokalen teilnehmenden Sexualklinik anmelden.
actual_translation: People living and registered with a GP in England will also be able to enrol for potential participation at their local participating sexual health clinic.

translation_text: The program will be £10 million and NHS England signed a contract to supply the drugs this week after an international competitive acquisition.
german_text: Das Programm wird £ 10 Millionen und NHS England unterzeichnete einen Vertrag zur Lieferung der Medikamente in dieser Woche nach einer internationalen wettbewerbsfähigen Beschaffung.
actual_translation: The programme will cost £10 million and NHS England signed a contract to source the drugs this week following an international competitive procurement.

translation_text: The study aims to evaluate the entire potential of PrEP by collecting clinical evidence of how it is targeted, absorbed and implemented on a large scale.
german_text: Die Studie soll das gesamte Potenzial von PrEP beurteilen, indem klinische Belege gesammelt werden, wie es in großem Maßstab gezielt eingesetzt, aufgenommen und umgesetzt wird.
actual_translation: The trial is designed to assess the full potential of PrEP by gathering clinical evidence on how it is targeted, taken up, and implemented on a large scale.

translation_text: Stevens said: “This big new intervention should complement and overcome the extensive and increasingly successful efforts to prevent HIV.
german_text: Stevens sagte: "Diese große neue Intervention sollte die weitreichenden und zunehmend erfolgreichen Bemühungen zur Verhütung von HIV ergänzen und überholen.
actual_translation: Mr Stevens said: 'This major new intervention should complement and supercharge the wide-ranging and increasingly successful effort to prevent HIV.

translation_text: It is another milestone in the more than three decades of progress in addressing one of the greatest health challenges of mankind.”
german_text: Es ist ein weiterer Meilenstein in dem mehr als drei Jahrzehnte anhaltenden Fortschritt bei der Bewältigung einer der größten gesundheitlichen Herausforderungen der Menschheit."
actual_translation: It's another milestone in more than three decades' worth of progress in tackling one of humanity's major health challenges.'

translation_text: Deborah Gold, Chief Executive at NAT (National Aids Trust), said: “This is a crucial moment in the fight against HIV.
german_text: Deborah Gold, Chief Executive bei NAT (National Aids Trust), sagte: "Dies ist ein entscheidender Moment im Kampf gegen HIV.
actual_translation: Deborah Gold, chief executive at NAT (National Aids Trust), said: 'This is a pivotal moment in the fight against HIV.

translation_text: PrEP, when aimed at people in need and in danger, offers the opportunity to change the English HIV epidemic.
german_text: PrEP, wenn es gezielt auf bedürftige und gefährdete Menschen ausgerichtet ist, bietet die Möglichkeit, die englische HIV-Epidemie zu verändern.
actual_translation: PrEP, if targeted properly at those in need and at risk, offers the possibility of transforming the English HIV epidemic.

translation_text: From September, people with high HIV risk will have access to this NHS-financed attempt in England to develop a new instrument that is truly individually controlled and not subject to a negotiation with a partner, which leads to the improvement of many, many lives.
german_text: Von September an werden Menschen mit hohem HIV-Risiko Zugang zu diesem NHS-finanzierten Versuch in England haben, um ein neues Instrument zu entwickeln, das wirklich individuell kontrolliert wird und nicht mit einer Verhandlung mit einem Partner unterliegt, was zur Verbesserung vieler, vieler Leben führt.
actual_translation: From September, people at high risk of HIV will have access via this NHS-funded trial in England to an empowering new tool that is truly individually controlled and not subject to negotiation with a partner, leading to the improvement of many, many lives.

translation_text: We are very pleased with this announcement.”
german_text: Wir begrüßen ganz herzlich diese Ankündigung."
actual_translation: We warmly welcome this announcement.'

translation_text: Ian Green, Chairman of the Terrence Higgins Trust, said: “The priority must now be that the study is carried out quickly throughout the country and that no one who has a risk of HIV will be left behind.
german_text: Ian Green, Vorstandsvorsitzender des Terrence Higgins Trust, sagte: "Die Priorität muss nun darauf liegen, dass die Studie schnell im ganzen Land durchgeführt wird und dass niemand, der ein Risiko für HIV hat, zurückgelassen wird.
actual_translation: Ian Green, chief executive of the Terrence Higgins Trust, said: 'The priority must now be to make sure that the trial is rolled out speedily across the country, and that no-one at risk of HIV is left behind.

translation_text: Now that the PrEP test medicine has been achieved, we are on the best way to protect more than 10,000 people infected with HIV.”
german_text: Jetzt, da die PrEP-Testmedizin beschafft wurde, sind wir auf dem besten Weg, mehr als 10.000 HIV-infizierte Menschen zu schützen."
actual_translation: Now that the PrEP trial drug has been procured, we're well on the way to protecting over 10,000 people at risk of HIV.'

translation_text: Sharon Hodgson, Secretary of Shadow Health, said: “The beginning of the PrEP process is welcome and overwhelming after months of delay and urgent implementation by the government.
german_text: Sharon Hodgson, Schatten-Gesundheitsministerin, sagte: "Der Beginn des PrEP-Prozesses ist nach monatelangen Verspätungen und zögerlicher Umsetzung durch die Regierung willkommen und überfällig.
actual_translation: Shadow public health minister Sharon Hodgson said: 'The start of the PrEP trial is welcome and long overdue after months of delays and heel-dragging by the Government.

translation_text: The evidence shows how transformative this drug can be as part of our approach to HIV prevention and can stop the transmission of this life-changing infection.
german_text: Die Beweise zeigen, wie transformativ diese Droge als Teil unseres Ansatzes zur HIV-Prävention sein kann und die Übertragung dieser lebensverändernden Infektion beenden kann.
actual_translation: The evidence shows just how transformative this drug can be as part of our approach to HIV prevention and ending the transmission of this life-changing infection.

translation_text: This attempt brings us a step closer to understanding the benefits of PrEP.
german_text: Dieser Versuch bringt uns einen Schritt näher zum Verständnis der Vorteile von PrEP.
actual_translation: This trial will take us one step closer to fully understanding the benefits of PrEP.

translation_text: Now it is important that this study is carried out as quickly as possible throughout the country to protect people infected with HIV and that it will help us get a step closer to ending the spread of HIV in society.”
german_text: Jetzt ist es wichtig, dass diese Studie so schnell wie möglich im ganzen Land durchgeführt wird, um Personen zu schützen, die HIV-infiziert sind, und dass sie dazu beizutragen wird, dass wir der Beendigung der Verbreitung von HIV in der Gesellschaft einen Schritt näher kommen'.
actual_translation: Now it is important that this trial is rolled out as quickly as possible across the country to protect individuals who are exposed to HIV and help take us one step closer to ending the spread of HIV in society.'

translation_text: Living the great life: middle floor and smart designer tricks have transformed this small Earls Court apartment into a generous home
german_text: Das große Leben leben: Zwischengeschoss und clevere Designer-Tricks haben diese kleine Earls Court Wohnung in ein großzügiges Zuhause verwandelt
actual_translation: Living the high life: mezzanine floor and clever design tricks have transformed this small Earls Court flat into a spacious home

translation_text: Joanne Leigh, an ex-banker with a passion for real estate, decreased in 2014 from a large house in Knightsbridge to an Earls Court Apartment.
german_text: Joanne Leigh, eine ehemalige Bankerin mit einer Leidenschaft für Immobilien, verkleinerte sich 2014 von einem großen Haus in Knightsbridge zu einem Earls Court Apartment.
actual_translation: Joanne Leigh, a former banker with a passion for doing up property, downsized from a large home in Knightsbridge to an Earls Court apartment in 2014.

translation_text: It is located on the first floor of an elegant Queen Anne terrace - and it is a proof of the new design that Joanne has not packed and sold her pockets.
german_text: Es liegt im ersten Stock einer eleganten Queen Anne Terrasse - und es ist ein Beweis für das neue Design, dass Joanne ihre Taschen nicht gepackt und verkauft hat.
actual_translation: It is on the first floor of a smart Queen Anne terrace - and it is a testament to the new design that Joanne hasn't packed her bags and sold on.

translation_text: "Davor I lived with my ex in Knightsbridge in a much larger room," says Joanne.
german_text: "Davor lebte ich mit meinem Ex in Knightsbridge in einem viel größeren Raum", sagt Joanne.
actual_translation: "Before this, I was living with my ex in Knightsbridge in a much bigger space," Joanne says.

translation_text: "I was looking for something that was comparable to my price.
german_text: "Ich suchte nach etwas, das meinem Preis vergleichbar war.
actual_translation: "I was looking for something that was comparable for my price.

translation_text: I was shown this apartment in Earls Court, and she had the same high roofs.
german_text: Mir wurde diese Wohnung in Earls Court gezeigt, und sie hatte die gleichen hohen Decken.
actual_translation: I was shown this apartment in Earls Court and it had the same high ceilings.

translation_text: I fell in love with them and made an offer on that day."
german_text: Ich habe mich in sie verliebt und an diesem Tag ein Angebot gemacht."
actual_translation: I fell in love with it and put an offer in that day."

translation_text: Since the first visit, the 1,000 square feet large apartment has been completely overwhelmed.
german_text: Seit der ersten Besichtigung wurde die 1.000 Quadratfuß große Wohnung komplett überholt.
actual_translation: Since the first viewing, the 1,000sq ft flat has had a complete overhaul.

translation_text: Originally, a one-room property with a decorated layout - you had to go through the kitchen to get into the bedroom - Joanne wanted to add a staircase and a middle floor to make the generous roof height optimal.
german_text: Ursprünglich ein Ein-Zimmer-Anwesen mit einem verschachtelten Layout - man musste durch die Küche gehen, um ins Schlafzimmer zu gelangen - wollte Joanne Stauraum und ein Zwischengeschoss hinzufügen, um die großzügige Deckenhöhe optimal zu nutzen.
actual_translation: Originally a one-bedroom property with a convoluted layout - you had to walk through the kitchen to get to the bedroom - Joanne wanted to add storage space and a mezzanine to make the most of the generous ceiling height.

translation_text: “I wanted high roofs, large windows, a lot of light.
german_text: "Ich wollte hohe Decken, große Fenster, viel Licht.
actual_translation: "I wanted high ceilings, big windows, lots of light.

translation_text: That was my request,” she says.
german_text: Das war meine Anforderung", sagt sie.
actual_translation: That was my requirement," she says.

translation_text: For this purpose, she commissioned the architecture and design studio Duck & Shed by Erfan Azadi from Notting Hill to use the 12.5 feet high roofs and create a house that was not only a development but also a place to live for Joanne.
german_text: Zu diesem Zweck beauftragte sie das Architektur- und Designstudio Duck & Shed von Erfan Azadi aus Notting Hill, die 12,5 Fuß hohen Decken zu nutzen und ein Zuhause zu schaffen, das nicht nur eine Entwicklung, sondern auch ein Ort zum Leben für Joanne war.
actual_translation: To this end, she employed Erfan Azadi of Notting Hill-based architecture and design studio Duck & Shed to exploit the 12.5ft ceilings and create a home that wasn't only a development but a place for Joanne to live.

translation_text: The roof was not large enough to place two rooms together, so the architectural challenge consisted in creating a middle floor in which one could stand.
german_text: Die Decke war nicht groß genug, um zwei Räume übereinander zu platzieren, so dass die architektonische Herausforderung darin bestand, ein Zwischengeschoss zu schaffen, in dem man stehen konnte.
actual_translation: The ceiling wasn't quite tall enough to add two spaces on top of each other so the architectural challenge was to create a mezzanine that you could stand up in.

translation_text: Erfan had to think creatively to solve the proposal.
german_text: Erfan musste kreativ denken, um die Vorgabe zu lösen.
actual_translation: Erfan had to think creatively to resolve the brief.

translation_text: “The steel is quite complicated,” he explains.
german_text: "Das Stahlwerk ist ziemlich kompliziert", erklärt er.
actual_translation: "The steelwork is quite complicated," he explains.

translation_text: “We had to arrange the rooms in such a way that they were stacked around each other, without having to break.
german_text: "Wir mussten die Räume so arrangieren, dass sie übereinander gestapelt waren, ohne dass wir uns bücken mussten.
actual_translation: "We had to arrange the spaces so that they stacked on top of each other without needing to hunch down.

translation_text: It was not only about building a simple platform, but also to attach the steel so that it had the right height for the function up or down.”
german_text: Es ging nicht nur darum, eine einfache Plattform zu bauen, sondern den Stahl so anzulegen, dass er für die Funktion oben oder unten die richtige Höhe hatte."
actual_translation: It wasn't just building a simple platform, but cranking the steels so that they were at the right height for the function above or below."

translation_text: This arrangement enabled Erfan to place two rooms in full height over each other - with a lot of extra drama.
german_text: Diese Anordnung ermöglichte es Erfan, zwei Räume in voller Höhe übereinander zu platzieren - mit viel zusätzlichem Drama.
actual_translation: This arrangement allowed Erfan to get two full-height rooms on top of each other in the space - with lots of added drama.

translation_text: For the middle floor, a classic copper light window from Retrouvius looks down over the glamorous living area.
german_text: Für das Zwischengeschoss blickt ein klassisches Kupferlichtfenster von Retrouvius über den glamourösen Wohnbereich hinunter.
actual_translation: For the mezzanine, a vintage copper light window from Retrouvius looks down over the glamorous living area below.

translation_text: Reflective gold furniture, silver accents and vintage Serge Mouille lighting put the style for the program.
german_text: Gespiegelte Goldmöbel, silberne Akzente und Vintage Serge Mouille Beleuchtung setzen den Stil für das Programm.
actual_translation: Mirrored gold furniture, silver accents and vintage Serge Mouille lighting all set the style for the scheme.

translation_text: The use of mirrors plays a role in adding theatre, space and light.
german_text: Die Verwendung von Spiegeln spielt eine Rolle beim Hinzufügen von Theater, Raum und Licht.
actual_translation: The use of mirrors plays a part in adding theatre, space and light.

translation_text: On both ends a short corridore is sealed to allow it to work longer.
german_text: An beiden Enden ist ein kurzer Korridor gespiegelt, um ihn länger wirken zu lassen.
actual_translation: A short corridor is mirrored at both ends to make it appear longer.

translation_text: In the kitchen, the mirror feels like a window into another room.
german_text: In der Küche fühlt sich die Spiegelung wie ein Fenster in ein anderes Zimmer an.
actual_translation: In the kitchen, the mirrored splashback feels like a window to another room.

translation_text: At the entrance, mirrored units provide room for all the coats and glasses of Joanne.
german_text: Am Eingang bieten gespiegelte Einheiten Platz für alle Bestecke und Gläser von Joanne.
actual_translation: At the entrance, mirrored units provide storage for all Joanne's cutlery and glassware.

translation_text: Through the perception of a more glamorous room, the beauty of the living room can close the kitchen if it is not used.
german_text: Durch die Wahrnehmung eines glamouröseren Raums kann die Schönheit des Wohnzimmers die Küche verschließen, wenn sie nicht benutzt wird.
actual_translation: Giving the perception of a more glamorous space, the beauty of the living room is being able to close off the kitchen when it's not in use.

translation_text: Compatible cuisine is nothing new.
german_text: Zusammenklappbare Küchen sind nichts Neues.
actual_translation: Foldaway kitchens are nothing new.

translation_text: The special thing about this is that it is a garage door.
german_text: Das Besondere an dieser ist, dass es sich um eine Garagentür handelt.
actual_translation: What's unique about this one is that it's a garage-style lift-up door.

translation_text: “A little engineering art went into there,” Erfan explains from the steel-fortified, fornified MDF door.
german_text: "Ein bisschen Ingenieurkunst ging da hinein", erklärt Erfan von der stahlverstärkten, furnierten MDF-Tür.
actual_translation: "A bit of engineering went into that," explains Erfan of the steel-reinforced, veneered MDF door.

translation_text: "It's balanced so that when you push the door, it slides very easily."
german_text: "Es ist gegengewichtig, so dass es, wenn Sie die Tür hochschieben, sehr leicht gleitet."
actual_translation: "It's counter-weighted so that when you push the door up, it glides really easily."

translation_text: Thanks to the smart use of room and storage room, Joanne was able to win additional 16 m2, an additional bedroom and an improved layout.
german_text: Dank der cleveren Nutzung von Raum und Stauraum konnte Joanne zusätzliche 16 m² gewinnen, ein zusätzliches Schlafzimmer und ein verbessertes Layout.
actual_translation: Thanks to clever use of space and storage, Joanne gained an additional 16sq m, an extra bedroom and an improved layout.

translation_text: "At the end of the day you will sell the ground floor - or how your property is valued," says Erfan.
german_text: "Am Ende des Tages werden Sie die Grundfläche verkaufen - oder wie Ihre Immobilie geschätzt wird", sagt Erfan.
actual_translation: "At the end of the day, floor space is what you are going to sell - or how your property is valued," Erfan says.

translation_text: "In a rudimentary form a real estate broker will enter and make a calculation based on the soil size."
german_text: "In einer rudimentären Form wird ein Immobilienmakler eintreten und eine Berechnung basierend auf der Bodengröße durchführen."
actual_translation: "In a rudimentary form, a real estate agent will walk in and do a calculation based on floor size."

translation_text: Here they have managed to enlarge the floor surface and at the same time use high-quality materials that give the room its luxurious advantage.
german_text: Hier haben sie es geschafft, die Bodenfläche zu vergrößern und gleichzeitig hochwertige Materialien zu verwenden, die dem Raum seinen luxuriösen Vorteil verschaffen.
actual_translation: Here they have managed to increase the floor space while using quality materials that give the space its luxurious edge.

translation_text: “The materials are the things you touch and that therefore help to create an emotional bond in a home,” says Erfan.
german_text: "Die Materialien sind die Dinge, die Sie berühren und die daher helfen, eine emotionale Bindung in einem Zuhause zu schaffen", sagt Erfan.
actual_translation: "The materials are the things that you touch and therefore help to create an emotional bond in a home," says Erfan.

translation_text: “You don’t fall in love with the electric stickers in the walls.
german_text: "Du verliebst dich nicht in die elektrischen Steckdosen in den Wänden.
actual_translation: "You don't fall in love with the electrical feeds in the walls.

translation_text: These are important, but they don’t play with your heart.”
german_text: Diese sind wichtig, aber sie spielen nicht mit deinem Herzen."
actual_translation: These are important but they don't pull the heart strings."

translation_text: It shows that a apartment can be transformed from something standard to something quite amazing by good design and increased square meter.
german_text: Es zeigt, dass eine Wohnung sich durch gutes Design und erhöhte Quadratmeterzahl von etwas standardmäßigem in etwas ganz Erstaunliches verwandeln kann.
actual_translation: It goes to show that through good design and increased square metreage, a flat can turn from something standard into something quite amazing.

translation_text: In fact, like Joanne, you might decide not to leave these.
german_text: In der Tat, wie Joanne, könnten Sie sich entscheiden, diese nicht zu verlassen.
actual_translation: In fact, like Joanne, you may choose not to leave.

translation_text: Brothers fight for $500 million real estate imperium
german_text: Brüder kämpfen wegen eines 500 Millionen US-Dollar Immobilienimperiums
actual_translation: Brothers fight over $500 million property empire

translation_text: Two brothers, four decades after their Italian family founded the dynasty, are in a dispute for one of Victoria's largest real estate empires worth over $500 million.
german_text: Zwei Brüder befinden sich vier Jahrzehnte, nachdem ihre italienische Familie die Dynastie gründete, in einer Auseinandersetzung wegen eines der größten Immobilienimperien Victorias im Wert von über 500 Millionen Dollar.
actual_translation: Two brothers are at war over one of Victoria's biggest real estate empires, worth more than $500 million, four decades after their Italian family founded the dynasty.

translation_text: The former director of the 'Carlton Football Club' and developer Colin De Lutis lives in a villa in Toorak, just three doors away from his younger brother Paul.
german_text: Der ehemalige Direktor des 'Carlton-Football-Club' und Entwickler Colin De Lutis lebt in einer Villa in Toorak, nur drei Türen von seinem jüngerem Bruder Paul entfernt. Dieser hat ihn zum Obersten Gerichtshof gebracht, um klären zu lassen, wie ihr Eigentum und ihr Geschäftsvermögen aufgeteilt werden soll.
actual_translation: Former Carlton Football Club director and developer Colin De Lutis lives in a Toorak mansion three doors from younger brother Paul, who has taken him to the Supreme Court over how their property and business assets will be sliced up.

translation_text: Paul wanted to withdraw from family business since 2014, but a sharp dispute about the separation is ongoing at the Supreme Court.
german_text: Paul wollte sich schon seit 2014 aus dem Familienbetrieb zurückziehen, aber eine scharfe Auseinandersetzung über die Trennung findet im Obersten Gerichtshof statt.
actual_translation: Paul has wanted out of the family business since 2014 but an acrimonious argument is playing out in the Supreme Court over the break-up.

translation_text: Together with their mother Anna, the brothers own 38 properties worth more than a half billion dollars, accumulated since the family in 1973 bought a business in Smith Street, Collingwood.
german_text: Zusammen mit ihrer Mutter Anna besitzen die Brüder 38 Immobilien im Wert von mehr als einer halben Milliarde Dollar, angesammelt, seitdem die Familie 1973 ein Geschäft in der Smith Street, Collingwood, kaufte.
actual_translation: Together with their mother Anna the brothers own 38 properties worth more than half a billion dollars, amassed since the family bought a Smith Street, Collingwood, shop in 1973.

translation_text: There the Westco Jeans family founded and grew into a chain of 160 retail stores.
german_text: Dort gründete die Familie Westco Jeans und wuchs zu einer Kette von 160 Einzelhandelsgeschäften.
actual_translation: There, the family founded Westco Jeans and grew it into a chain of 160 retail outlets.

translation_text: It was sold in 1999 for $85 million.
german_text: Es wurde 1999 für 85 Millionen US-Dollar verkauft.
actual_translation: It sold in 1999 for $85 million.

translation_text: This money was invested in real estate, and the portfolio of De Lutis now includes offices in the city scene, the development areas of Brunswick and Sorrento, the apartments in Gold Coast and Mt Buller as well as shopping centers in the suburb.
german_text: Dieses Geld wurde in Immobilien investiert, und das Portfolio von De Lutis umfasst jetzt Büros im Stadtzenrum, die Entwicklungsgebiete von Brunswick und Sorrento, die Apartments in Gold Coast und Mt Buller sowie Einkaufszentren in der Vorstadt.
actual_translation: That money was sunk into property and the De Lutis portfolio now includes city offices, Brunswick and Sorrento development sites, Gold Coast and Mt Buller apartments, and suburban shopping centres.

translation_text: After an agreement with her deceased father, Colin - described by Paul as "the main operator and the dominant personality" in the De Lutis family - owns about two-thirds of the corporate assets and Paul about a third.
german_text: Nach einer Vereinbarung mit ihrem verstorbenen Vater besitzt Colin - von Paul als "Hauptbetreiber und die dominierende Persönlichkeit" in der Familie De Lutis beschrieben - etwa zwei Drittel des Unternehmensvermögens und Paul etwa ein Drittel.
actual_translation: Under an agreement with their late father, Colin - described by Paul as "the major driving force and the dominant personality" in the De Lutis family - owns about two-thirds of the company assets and Paul about one-third.

translation_text: A court act states that this means that Colin owns property worth $316 million and Paul worth $176 million.
german_text: Eine Gerichtsakte besagt, dass dies bedeutet, dass Colin Eigentum im Wert von 316 Millionen Dollar und Paul im Wert von 176 Millionen Dollar besitzt.
actual_translation: A court filing says this translates to Colin owning property worth $316 million and Paul $176 million.

translation_text: The division of real estate and cash has proved to be a problem for Paul.
german_text: Die Aufteilung von Immobilien und Bargeld hat sich für Paul als Problempunkt erwiesen.
actual_translation: Dividing the properties and cash has proved the sticking point for Paul.

translation_text: “The distribution proposed by Colin left him with what I thought was the best objects,” he wrote in a first affidavit in 2015.
german_text: "Die von Colin vorgeschlagenen Aufteilungen haben ihn mit dem hinterlassen, was ich für die besten Objekte hielt", schrieb er 2015 in einem ersten Affidavit.
actual_translation: "The splits proposed by Colin left him with what I considered to be the best properties," he wrote in an initial court affidavit in 2015.

translation_text: Last Friday, after several failed interrogations, the first hearing of the Supreme Court was held.
german_text: Am vergangenen Freitag fand nach mehreren gescheiterten Vermittlungen die erste Anhörung des Obersten Gerichtshofs statt.
actual_translation: Last Friday, after several failed mediations, the first Supreme Court hearing was held.

translation_text: The brothers are now also struggling for the control of the existing business – from which Colin, as Paul claims, has excluded him.
german_text: Die Brüder kämpfen jetzt auch um die Kontrolle über das bestehende Geschäft - wovon Colin, wie Paul behauptet, ihn ausgeschlossen habe.
actual_translation: The brothers are also now fighting over who controls the existing business - which Paul alleges Colin has locked him out of.

translation_text: Colin argues that this is not true, but claims Paul to manage some possessions incompetently.
german_text: Colin argumentiert, dies sei nicht wahr, sondern wirft Paul vor, einige Besitzungen inkompetent zu verwalten.
actual_translation: Colin argues this is not true, but accuses Paul of incompetently managing some properties.

translation_text: In a early affidavit submitted by Colin, he says he hopes to resolve the dispute.
german_text: In einem frühen Affidavit, das von Colin eingereicht wurde, sagt er, er hoffe, den Streit beizulegen.
actual_translation: In an early affidavit filed by Colin, he says he hopes to resolve the dispute.

translation_text: “My Italian inheritance writes that the family is the most important priority,” he wrote.
german_text: "Mein italienisches Erbe schreibt vor, dass die Familie die wichtigste Priorität ist", schrieb er.
actual_translation: "My Italian heritage dictates that family is the most important priority," he wrote.

translation_text: The costs increase in the case, with hundreds of pages with affidavits, e-mails and reports from companies, including Deloitte, Pitcher Partners and Charter Keck Cramer, and with leading lawyers, including Allan Myers, QC, and by both sides held lawyers.
german_text: Die Kosten steigen in dem Fall, mit Hunderten von Seiten mit Affidavits, E-Mails und Berichten von Unternehmen, darunter Deloitte, Pitcher Partners und Charter Keck Cramer, und mit führenden Rechtsanwälten, darunter Allan Myers, QC, und von beiden Seiten gehaltenen Anwaltskanzleien.
actual_translation: Costs are mounting in the case, with hundreds of pages of affidavits, emails and reports by companies including Deloitte, Pitcher Partners and Charter Keck Cramer filed and top barristers including Allan Myers, QC, and senior solicitors retained by both sides.

translation_text: Mrs. De Lutis and her deceased husband Luigi were Italian immigrants who operated milk bars and delicious dishes from the late 1950s and in the early 1970s bought a business in Brunswick.
german_text: Frau De Lutis und ihr verstorbener Ehemann Luigi waren italienische Einwanderer, die Milchbars und Delikatessengeschäfte aus den späten 1950-er Jahren betrieben und in den frühen siebziger Jahren ein Geschäft in Brunswick kauften.
actual_translation: Ms De Lutis and her late husband Luigi were Italian immigrants who ran milk bars and delicatessens from the late 1950s and in the early 1970s bought a shop in Brunswick.

translation_text: They used the security to buy the Collingwood legacy in which Colin opened the family’s first jeans store.
german_text: Sie nutzten die Sicherheit, um die Collingwood-Liegenschaft zu kaufen, in der Colin den ersten Jeansladen der Familie eröffnete.
actual_translation: They used the collateral to buy the Collingwood property where Colin opened the family's first jeans store.

translation_text: Colin says he started Westco there when he was "in my last years of high school when Paul was still a little child (about 10 years old)."
german_text: Colin sagt, dass er Westco dort begann, als er "in meinen letzten Jahren der High School war, als Paul noch ein kleines Kind war (ungefähr 10 Jahre alt)."
actual_translation: Colin says he started Westco there when he was "in my final years of high school, when Paul was a young child (around 10 years old)."

translation_text: Anna De Lutis says that she and Luigi, who died in 2012, hoped to deliver their property gently to their sons.
german_text: Anna De Lutis sagt, dass sie und Luigi, der im Jahr 2012 starb, hofften, ihr Eigentum gütlich an ihre Söhne weiterzugeben.
actual_translation: Anna De Lutis says she and Luigi, who died in 2012, hoped to pass down their properties to their sons amicably.

translation_text: "Luigi often told me that he never wanted the brothers to fall before the court," she wrote.
german_text: "Luigi sagte oft zu mir, dass er nie wollte, dass die Brüder vor Gericht landen", schrieb sie.
actual_translation: "Luigi often said to me that he never wanted the brothers to end up in court," she wrote.

translation_text: Two other brothers, Mark and Luke, are no longer part of the De Lutis Group, with Colin claiming that Mark had paid $10 million when leaving the company and Luke $26 million.
german_text: Zwei andere Brüder, Mark und Luke, sind nicht mehr Teil der De Lutis-Unternehmensgruppe, wobei Colin behauptet, dass Mark beim Verlassen des Unternehmens 10 Millionen Dollar und Luke 26 Millionen Dollar gezahlt wurden.
actual_translation: Two other brothers, Mark and Luke, are no longer part of the De Lutis group of companies, with Colin saying that Mark was paid $10 million when he left the business, and Luke $26 million.

translation_text: Both Lukas and Mark are, Paul says, “will be disappointed by the conditions of their financial separation.”
german_text: Sowohl Lukas als auch Mark seien, so sagt Paul "über die Bedingungen ihrer finanziellen Trennung verbittert geworden".
actual_translation: Both Luke and Mark had become, Paul says, "bitter about the terms of their financial separation."

translation_text: Colin stayed very back, though he was a former AFL board member and after a 2015 biography by Eddie McGuire the best friend of the television star.
german_text: Colin hat sich sehr zurückgehalten, obwohl er ein ehemaliges AFL-Vorstandsmitglied war und nach einer Biografie aus dem Jahr 2015 von Eddie McGuire der beste Freund des Fernsehstars.
actual_translation: Colin has kept a low profile despite being a former AFL club board member and, according to a 2015 biography of Eddie McGuire, the television star's best friend.

translation_text: Fairfax Media contacted Colin and Paul De Lutis and their lawyers.
german_text: Fairfax Media nahm mit Colin und Paul De Lutis und deren Anwälten Kontakt auf.
actual_translation: Fairfax Media contacted Colin and Paul De Lutis on Friday, and their lawyers.

translation_text: Only Colin answered by SMS to say "I can't really say a lot" because the case was before the courts.
