german_text: Nur Colin antwortete per SMS, um zu sagen "Ich kann wirklich nicht viel sagen", weil der Fall vor den Gerichten sei.
actual_translation: Only Colin replied, by text message, to say that because the case was before the courts "I really cannot say much."

translation_text: “It’s very, very sad that my brother Paul has decided to prosecute me and pull our family names through the courts,” he wrote.
german_text: "Es ist sehr, sehr traurig, dass mein Bruder Paul entschieden hat, mich zu verklagen und unseren Familiennamen durch die Gerichte zu ziehen", schrieb er.
actual_translation: "It's very, very sad that my brother Paul has chosen to sue me and drag our family name through the courts," he wrote.

translation_text: In the middle of 2016, Colin wrote in a letter to the court that he tried to meet the demands of his brother.
german_text: Mitte 2016 schrieb Colin in einem Schreiben an das Gericht, dass er versucht habe, die Forderungen seines Bruders zu erfüllen.
actual_translation: In mid-2016, Colin wrote in one court filing that he had tried to accommodate his brother's requests.

translation_text: “Our father would not want Paul and I to end our current dispute,” he said, adding that he “has always hoped for a solution.”
german_text: "Unser Vater hätte nicht gewollt, dass Paul und ich in unserem aktuellen Streit enden würden", sagte er und fügte hinzu, dass er "immer noch auf eine Lösung hoffe".
actual_translation: "Our father would not have wanted to see Paul and I end up in our current dispute," he said, adding that he was "still hopeful of resolution."

translation_text: On Friday, that hope seemed to have passed.
german_text: Am Freitag schien diese Hoffnung vorbei zu sein.
actual_translation: On Friday, that hope appeared gone.

translation_text: “Our matter will be resolved by the courts in the near future,” Colin wrote.
german_text: "Unsere Angelegenheit wird in naher Zukunft von den Gerichten gelöst werden", schrieb Colin.
actual_translation: "Our matter will be resolved by the courts in the near future," Colin wrote.

translation_text: Trump’s new head of state plans to restrict the president’s media authenticity.
german_text: Trumps neuer Stabschef plant, die Medien-Abstinenz des Präsidenten einzuschränken.
actual_translation: Trump's new chief of staff plans to restrict the president's media diet.

translation_text: Others tried it and failed.
german_text: Andere haben es versucht und sind gescheitert.
actual_translation: Others have tried and failed.

translation_text: Maybe John F. Kelly can really do it.
german_text: Vielleicht kann John F. Kelly es tatsächlich tun.
actual_translation: Maybe John F. Kelly can actually do it.

translation_text: If so, he will be the first.
german_text: Wenn ja, wird er der Erste sein.
actual_translation: If so, he will be the first.

translation_text: Politico reports that the new White House staff chief plans to limit the information flow to President Trump - including news media reports - in the hope of keeping the chief on a more equal course.
german_text: Politico berichtet, dass der neue Stabschef des Weißen Hauses plant, den Informationsfluss auf Präsident Trump einzuschränken - einschließlich der Berichte der Nachrichtenmedien - in der Hoffnung, den Chef auf einem gleichmäßigerem Kurs zu halten.
actual_translation: Politico reports that the new White House chief of staff plans to restrict the flow of information to President Trump - including news media reports - in the hope of keeping the boss on a more even keel.

translation_text: Here is a piece of Reporter Josh Dawsey:
german_text: Hier ist ein Stück von Reporter Josh Dawsey:
actual_translation: Here's a bit from reporter Josh Dawsey:

translation_text: “When John F. Kelly, the White House’s new head of staff, met with senior staff on his first working day, he presented a major problem in President Donald Trump’s White House that he wanted to repair: bad information that came into the president’s hands.
german_text: "Als John F. Kelly, der neue Stabschef des Weißen Hauses, an seinem ersten Arbeitstag mit leitenden Angestellten zusammentraf, stellte er ein Hauptproblem in Präsident Donald Trumps Weißem Haus dar, das er reparieren wolle: schlechte Informationen, die in die Hände des Präsidenten geraten.
actual_translation: "When new White House Chief of Staff John F. Kelly huddled with senior staff on his first day at work, he outlined a key problem in President Donald Trump's White House that he planned to fix: bad information getting into the president's hands.

translation_text: Kelly told staff that information about him should flow - whether on paper or in briefings - because the president would make better decisions if he received good information."
german_text: Kelly sagte den Mitarbeitern, dass Informationen über ihn fließen sollten - ob auf Papier oder in Briefings - weil der Präsident bessere Entscheidungen treffen würde, wenn er gute Informationen erhalten würde."
actual_translation: Kelly told the staff that information needed to flow through him - whether on paper or in briefings - because the president would make better decisions if given good information."

translation_text: Kelly’s diagnosis makes sense, but others have tried to tighten Trump by monitoring his media diety.
german_text: Kellys Diagnose macht Sinn, aber andere haben versucht, Trump zu zähmen, indem sie seine Mediendiät überwachen.
actual_translation: Kelly's diagnosis makes perfect sense, but others have tried and failed to tame Trump by monitoring his media diet.

translation_text: President Trump’s relationship with television goes back for decades – and now, where he is in the White House, his television advertising is still strong.
german_text: Präsident Trumps Beziehung zum Fernsehen reicht Jahrzehnte zurück - und jetzt, wo er im Weißen Haus ist, ist seine Fernsehwerbung immer noch stark.
actual_translation: President Trump's relationship with television goes back decades - and now that he's in the White House, his TV-watching habit is still going strong.

translation_text: “When Trump’s candidate was angry because of an unfair reporting, it was productive to show him that he received a fair reporting from points to be convinced,” former election counselor Sam Nunberg told Politico in February.
german_text: "Wenn Kandidat Trump wegen einer unfairen Berichterstattung verärgert war, war es produktiv, ihm zu zeigen, dass er eine faire Berichterstattung von Stellen erhielt, die zu überzeugen waren", sagte der ehemalige Wahlkampfberater Sam Nunberg im Februar gegenüber Politico.
actual_translation: "If candidate Trump was upset about unfair coverage, it was productive to show him that he was getting fair coverage from outlets that were persuadable," Sam Nunberg, a former campaign adviser, told Politico in February.

translation_text: Politicos Tara Palmeri wrote at the time that “the key to keeping Trump’s Twitter habit under control, according to six former campaign officials, is to ensure that his personal media consumption includes a constant praise.”
german_text: Politicos Tara Palmeri schrieb zu der Zeit, dass "der Schlüssel, Trumps Twitter-Gewohnheit unter Kontrolle zu halten, laut sechs ehemaliger Wahlkampf-Beamten darin besteht, dafür zu sorgen, dass sein persönlicher Medienkonsum einen stetigen Lobpreis beinhaltet."
actual_translation: Politico's Tara Palmeri wrote at the time that "the key to keeping Trump's Twitter habit under control, according to six former campaign officials, is to ensure that his personal media consumption includes a steady stream of praise."

translation_text: Okay .
german_text: Okay.
actual_translation: Okay.

translation_text: But the idea that Trump’s Twitter habit was ever “under control” is ridiculous.
german_text: Aber die Idee, dass Trumps Twitter-Gewohnheit jemals "unter Kontrolle" war, ist lächerlich.
actual_translation: But the idea that Trump's Twitter habit has ever been "under control" is laughable.

translation_text: Per these campaign officials know something that we others don’t know – that Trump’s tweets would have contained even more pollutant without their interventions.
german_text: Vielleicht wissen diese Kampagnenbeamten etwas, was wir anderen nicht wissen - dass Trumps Tweets ohne ihre Interventionen noch mehr Zündstoff enthalten hätten.
actual_translation: Maybe these campaign officials know something the rest of us don't - that Trump's tweets would have been even more inflammatory if not for their interventions.

translation_text: We will probably never know anything about the tweets that Trump has not sent.
german_text: Wir werden wahrscheinlich nie etwas über die Tweets erfahren, die Trump nicht gesendet hat.
actual_translation: We'll probably never know about tweets that Trump didn't send.

translation_text: If his employees have managed to keep his trouble away from him a few times, then his efforts are worth it.
german_text: Wenn ihn seine Mitarbeiter es schon einige Male schafften, Ärger von ihm fernzuhalten, dann haben sich ihre Bemühungen gelohnt.
actual_translation: If his staffers managed to him out of trouble even a few times, then their efforts were worthwhile.

translation_text: But no one has been able to consistently prevent Trump from raising controversy.
german_text: Aber niemand hat es konsequent verhindern können, dass Trump Kontroversen hervorruft.
actual_translation: But no one has been able to consistently prevent Trump from stirring up controversy.

translation_text: Part of the problem is that the people in a White House, which consists of competing parties, repeatedly try to advance their own agenda by presenting Trump material that may promote their views of the world.
german_text: Ein Teil des Problems besteht darin, dass die Menschen in einem Weißen Haus, das sich aus konkurrierenden Parteien zusammensetzt, immer wieder versuchen, ihre eigene Agenda voranzubringen, indem sie Trump Material präsentieren, das möglicherweise ihre Ansichten von der Welt fördert.
actual_translation: Part of the problem is that in a White House composed of competing factions, people invariably try to advance their agendas by presenting Trump with material - which may or may not be reliable - that promotes their worldviews.

translation_text: Politico - fully engaged with this story - in May about the preference of consultants to provide the president with doubtful information for strategic reasons.
german_text: Politico - ganz mit dieser Geschichte beschäftigt - berichtete im Mai über die Vorliebe der Berater, dem Präsidenten aus strategischen Gründen zweifelhafte Informationen zuzuführen.
actual_translation: Politico - all over this story - reported in May on advisers' penchants for strategically feeding dubious information to the president.

translation_text: This was an example described by Reporter Shane Goldmacher:
german_text: Dies war ein Beispiel, das von Reporter Shane Goldmacher beschrieben wurde:
actual_translation: This was one example, described by reporter Shane Goldmacher:

translation_text: “Actual and former Trump officials say that Trump can react like a volcano to negative press releases, especially those with damaging leaks, and that he’s hoping to find out where they come from.
german_text: "Aktuelle und ehemalige Trump-Beamte sagen, dass Trump wie ein Vulkan auf negative Presseausschnitte reagieren kann, vor allem solche mit beschädigenden Lecks, und dass er sich darauf versteift herauszufinden, woher diese stammen.
actual_translation: "Current and former Trump officials say Trump can react volcanically to negative press clips, especially those with damaging leaks, becoming engrossed in finding out where they originated.

translation_text: It was exactly what happened at the end of February when someone maliciously gave the president a printed copy of an article from GotNews.com, the website of the Internet provokator Charles C. Johnson, who accused Deputy Head of Staff Katie Walsh of being "the source behind a crowd of Lecks" in the White House.
german_text: Genau das geschah Ende Februar, als jemand dem Präsidenten böswillig eine gedruckte Kopie eines Artikels von GotNews.com, der Website des Internet-Provokateurs Charles C. Johnson, gab, der die stellvertretende Stabschefin Katie Walsh beschuldigte, "die Quelle hinter einem Haufen zu sein von Lecks" im Weißen Haus zu sein.
actual_translation: That is what happened in late February when someone mischievously gave the president a printed copy of an article from GotNews.com, the website of Internet provocateur Charles C. Johnson, which accused deputy chief of staff Katie Walsh of being 'the source behind a bunch of leaks' in the White House.

translation_text: Although Johnson has been permanently banned from Twitter because of scams or that he has not offered any concrete evidence or that he has expressed false accusations in the past and rejected them.
german_text: Obwohl Johnson wegen Schikanen dauerhaft aus Twitter verbannt wurde oder dass er keine konkreten Beweise angeboten hat oder dass er in der Vergangenheit falsche Vorwürfe geäußert und sie widerrufen hat.
actual_translation: No matter that Johnson had been permanently banned from Twitter for harassment or that he offered no concrete evidence or that he had lobbed false accusations in the past and recanted them.

translation_text: Trump read the article and began to question employees about Walsh.”
german_text: Trump las den Artikel und fing an, Mitarbeiter über Walsh zu befragen."
actual_translation: Trump read the article and began asking staff about Walsh."

translation_text: Goldmacher added that the then Staff Chief Reince Priebus and White House Secretary-General Rob Porter “has tried to implement a system to manage and document the paper cram that Trump receives.”
german_text: Goldmacher fügte hinzu, dass der damalige Stabschef Reince Priebus und der Generalsekretär des Weißen Hauses, Rob Porter, "versucht haben, ein System zu implementieren, um den Papierkram zu verwalten und zu dokumentieren, den Trump erhält".
actual_translation: Goldmacher added that then-chief of staff Reince Priebus and White House staff secretary Rob Porter "have tried to implement a system to manage and document the paperwork Trump receives."

translation_text: How did it work?
german_text: Wie hat das geklappt?
actual_translation: How'd that work out?

translation_text: Kelly tries three months later to do the same.
german_text: Kelly versucht drei Monate später, dasselbe zu tun.
actual_translation: Kelly is trying to do the same thing, three months later.

translation_text: Per he will prove himself as a more efficient manager as a priebus, but Trump is still his impulsive self, and his consultants are still seeking influence.
german_text: Vielleicht wird er sich als effektiverer Manager als Priebus beweisen, aber Trump ist immer noch sein impulsives Selbst, und seine Berater streben immer noch nach Einfluss.
actual_translation: Perhaps he will prove a more effective manager than Priebus, but Trump is still his impulsive self, and his aides are still vying for influence.

translation_text: These unchanging factors make Kelly’s mission very difficult.
german_text: Diese unveränderlichen Faktoren machen Kellys Mission sehr schwierig.
actual_translation: Those immutable factors will make Kelly's mission very difficult.

translation_text: Most-seeked criminals receive post from Europol
german_text: Meistgesuchte Verbrecher bekommen Post von Europol
actual_translation: Most-wanted criminals receive post from Europol

translation_text: Since the address is unknown, the help of the population will be asked and hoped.
german_text: Da die Adresse unbekannt ist, wird die Mithilfe der Bevölkerung erbeten und erhofft.
actual_translation: As the address is unknown, the assistance of the population is being requested and hoped for.

translation_text: Police across Europe send this summer (virtual) postal cards to dangerous criminals on the flight.
german_text: Die Polizei in ganz Europa verschickt in diesem Sommer (virtuelle) Postkarten an gefährliche Kriminelle auf der Flucht.
actual_translation: Police across all of Europe are sending (virtual) postcards this summer to dangerous criminals on the run.

translation_text: Since the addresses of the searched serious criminals are naturally unknown, evidence from the population is hoped and requested.
german_text: Da die Adressen der gesuchten Schwerverbrecher naturgemäß nicht bekannt sind, werden Hinweise aus der Bevölkerung erhofft und erbeten.
actual_translation: Since the addresses of the sought-after serious criminals are not known, they are hoping and asking for tips from the population.

translation_text: Europol on Friday the action, which follows the "EU Most Wanted" winter advent calendar.
german_text: Europol berichtete am Freitag von der Aktion, die auf den "EU Most Wanted"-Adventkalender vom Winter folgt.
actual_translation: Europol reported on Friday about the campaign, which follows on from the "EU Most Wanted" advent calendar from the winter.

translation_text: The experience has shown that many flyers are hiding to vacation destinations, Europol said.
german_text: Die Erfahrungen hätten gezeigt, dass sich viele Flüchtige an Urlaubsdestinationen verstecken, hieß es seitens Europol.
actual_translation: Experience has shown that many fugitives hide out in holiday destinations, was the word from Europol.

translation_text: 21 postcards were collected for searched criminals from 21 EU countries.
german_text: Man habe 21 Postkarten für gesuchte Verbrecher aus 21 EU-Ländern zusammengestellt.
actual_translation: 21 postcards for sought-after criminals from 21 EU countries have been assembled.

translation_text: Since 2016, the website www.eumostwanted has been viewed more than 2.5 million times.
german_text: Seit 2016 gibt es die Webseite www.eumostwanted, mehr als 2,5 Millionen Mal wurde diese angesehen.
actual_translation: The website www.eumostwanted has existed since 2016, and has been visited more than 2.5 million times.

translation_text: 36 of the online searches have been arrested so far, at least eleven of them due to indications after the publication on the website.
german_text: 36 der Online-Gesuchten konnten bisher festgenommen werden, zumindest elf davon aufgrund von Hinweisen nach der Veröffentlichung auf der Internetseite.
actual_translation: It has so far been possible to arrest 36 of those being sought online; at least 11 of these are due to tips following publication on the internet site.

translation_text: Travelers Negotiate a Grave and Return to 'Millionaire Series'
german_text: Reisende verhandeln über einen Graben und kehren zurück zur 'Millionärs-Reihe'
actual_translation: Travellers negotiate trench, return to 'Millionaire's row'

translation_text: Some of the wealthiest household owners of the West Midlands stand again with some determined travelers on the foot of war, who negotiated one of the tombs taken by the municipality to demand a field in front of their masters.
german_text: Einige der wohlhabendsten Hausbesitzer der West Midlands stehen wieder mit einigen entschlossenen Reisenden auf Kriegsfuß, die einen von der Gemeinde gezogenen Graben ausgehandelt haben, um ein Feld vor ihren Herrenhäusern zurückzufordern.
actual_translation: Some of the West Midlands' wealthiest homeowners are again at loggerheads with determined travellers who have negotiated a council-dug trench to reclaim a field outside their mansions.

translation_text: The travellers parked their 20 residential cars on a field outside a wealthy street in Solihull, which is called the "Millionaire Series".
german_text: Die Reisenden haben ihre 20 Wohnwagen auf einem Feld außerhalb einer wohlhabenden Straße von Solihull geparkt, die die "Millionärs-Reihe" genannt wird.
actual_translation: The travellers have parked their 20 caravans in a field outside a prosperous street of Solihull dubbed 'millionaire's row'.

translation_text: They brought horses, babies, and an army of carriers after they were thrown out only in May, without being scared by a council-trapped grave to prevent their crashes.
german_text: Sie haben Pferde, Babys und eine Armee von Transportern mitgebracht, nachdem sie erst im Mai herausgeworfen wurden, ohne jedoch von einem vom Rat ausgegrabenen Graben abgeschreckt worden zu sein, um ihre Einfälle zu verhindern.
actual_translation: Bringing horses, babies and an army of vans, they have returned after being kicked out only in May, undeterred by a moat dug by the council to prevent their incursions.

translation_text: The tactical group found a gap in the defense facilities and pushed their vehicles through a section that remained unblocked to find a way.
german_text: Die taktvolle Gruppe fand eine Lücke in den Verteidigungsanlagen und drückte ihre Fahrzeuge durch einen Abschnitt, der unbehindert blieb, um einen Weg zu finden.
actual_translation: The tactful group found a gap in the defences, squeezing their vehicles though a section left unbarricaded to accommodate a pathway.

translation_text: Angry inhabitants have pressed Solihull’s council, who said it’s “useless to deal with the problem.”
german_text: Wütende Bewohner haben den Rat von Solihull bedrängt, der sagte, dass es "nutzlos sei, sich mit dem Problem zu befassen".
actual_translation: Furious residents have savaged Solihull Council saying it was 'useless at dealing with the problem'.

translation_text: One anonymous resident said, “They’ve been taken there on Monday night after they’ve been sent by Bentley Heath, where they’ve thrown stones on the passants.
german_text: Ein anonymer Bewohner sagte: "Sie sind am Montagabend dorthin gezogen, nachdem sie von Bentley Heath weitergeschickt wurden, wo sie Steine auf die Passanten geworfen haben.
actual_translation: One anonymous resident said: 'They moved there on Monday night after being moved on from Bentley Heath where they were throwing rocks at passers by.

translation_text: The Council must be forced to be implemented by shame, as it was useless in dealing with the problem.
german_text: Der Rat muss durch Scham zur Umsetzung in die Tat gezwungen werden, da er beim Umgang mit dem Problem nutzlos war.
actual_translation: The council needs to be shamed into action as they are useless at dealing with the problem.

translation_text: The travellers were there in May, were moved and are now back.
german_text: Die Reisenden waren im Mai dort, wurden weiterbewegt und sind jetzt wieder zurück.
actual_translation: The travellers were there in May, were moved on and now they are back again.

translation_text: More came yesterday night, probably more today.”
german_text: Mehr kamen gestern Abend an, wahrscheinlich heute noch mehr."
actual_translation: More arrived last night, probably even more today.'

translation_text: She added: “Birmingham’s council knows how to deal with it by keeping long teachings to protect their parks.
german_text: Sie fügte hinzu: "Der Rat von Birmingham weiß, wie man damit umgeht, indem man lange Unterweisungen hält, um ihre Parks zu schützen.
actual_translation: She added: 'Birmingham council knows how to deal with this by getting long injunctions to protect their parks.

translation_text: I live on the Streetsbrook Road and I’m not happy to continue paying my municipal tax if the Council can’t even stop it.”
german_text: Ich wohne auf der Streetsbrook Road und ich bin nicht glücklich, weiterhin meine Gemeindesteuer zu bezahlen, wenn der Rat das nicht einmal stoppen kann."
actual_translation: I live on Streetsbrook road and I'm not happy to continue paying my council tax when the council can't even stop this.'

translation_text: A resident who didn’t want to be named said, “It’s ridiculous, we just saw the last round of these travellers, just to be planned by another round.
german_text: Ein Anwohner, der nicht genannt werden wollte, sagte: "Es ist lächerlich, wir haben gerade erst die letzte Runde dieser Reisenden gesehen, nur um von einer anderen Runde geplündert zu werden.
actual_translation: One local resident who did not wish to be named said: 'It is ridiculous, we have only just seen the last round of these travellers leaving, only to be blighted by another round.

translation_text: The numbers have increased this time and you’ve even seen a horse in the parking area.”
german_text: Die Zahlen haben sich diesmal erhöht und man hat sogar ein Pferd im Parkbereich gesehen."
actual_translation: The numbers have increased this time and a horse has even been seen grazing on the parkland.'

translation_text: A spokesman for the Council of Solihull said: "We are aware of an unauthorized camp on the ground beyond the Streetsbrook Road and work with the police of Solihulls.
german_text: Eine Sprecherin des Rates von Solihull sagte: "Wir sind uns eines unbefugten Lagers auf dem Land jenseits der Streetsbrook Road bewusst und arbeiten mit der Polizei von Solihulls zusammen. Wir ergreifen die notwendigen rechtlichen Schritte, damit sie so schnell wie möglich weiterziehen.
actual_translation: A spokeswoman for Solihull Council said: 'We are aware of an unauthorised encampment on land off Streetsbrook Road and working alongside Solihull Police, we are undertaking the necessary legal actions to move them on as quickly as possible.

translation_text: To support our proof collection, it is very important that as many residents as possible report an anti-social or criminal behavior to the police by calling 101 .
german_text: Um unsere Beweissammlung zu unterstützen, ist es sehr wichtig, dass möglichst viele Anwohner ein anti-soziales oder kriminelles Verhalten bei der Polizei melden, indem sie 101 anrufen.
actual_translation: To support our evidence gathering it is very important that as many local residents as possible report any anti-social or criminal behaviour to the police by calling 101.

translation_text: This contributes to creating an image of the situation in which the court must examine when we submit our case.”
german_text: Dies trägt dazu bei, ein Bild von der Situation zu schaffen, in der das Gericht prüfen muss, wann wir unseren Fall vorlegen."
actual_translation: This helps build a picture of the situation for the court to consider when we present our case to them.'

translation_text: From Birkenhof to Waldhotel Luise
german_text: Aus Birkenhof wird Waldhotel Luise
actual_translation: Birkenhof becomes Waldhotel Luise

translation_text: From the former Hotel Birkenhof to the Waldhotel Luise.
german_text: Aus dem ehemaligen Hotel Birkenhof wird das Waldhotel Luise.
actual_translation: The former Hotel Birkenhof is being turned into the Waldhotel Luise.

translation_text: The house in front of the gates of Freudenstadts is currently renovated and is scheduled to be reopened on 1 March next year.
german_text: Das Haus vor den Toren von Freudenstadts wird derzeit renoviert und soll am 1. März nächsten Jahres wieder eröffnet werden.
actual_translation: The house just outside Freudenstadt is currently being renovated and should be opened again on 1st March next year.

translation_text: This is good news for the city.
german_text: Das sind gute Nachrichten für die Stadt.
actual_translation: That is good news for the city.

translation_text: Because with the closure of the Hotel Birkenhof by the then Ambiente operating company mbH on 13 April 2014, at that time, about 30,000 nights per year were lost and also revenue due to the currency tax.
german_text: Denn mit der Schließung des Hotels Birkenhof durch die damalige Ambiente Betriebsgesellschaft mbH zum 13. April 2014 gingen seinerzeit rund 30 000 Übernachtungen pro Jahr verloren und auch Einnahmen durch die Kurtaxe.
actual_translation: For when the Hotel Birkenhof was closed by former operating company Ambiente Betriebsgesellschaft mbH on 13th April 2014, at the time around 30,000 overnight stays per year were lost, and with that, the income from the visitors' taxes.

translation_text: In the autumn of 2014, due to the dramatic increase in the number of refugees arriving in the countryside, the hotel building was offered to the council office as a collection accommodation, leading to controversial discussions.
german_text: Im Herbst 2014 wurde angesichts dramatisch steigender Zahlen von Flüchtlingen, die in den Landkreis kamen, das Hotelgebäude dem Landratsamt als Sammelunterkunft angeboten, was für kontroverse Diskussionen sorgte.
actual_translation: In the autumn of 2014, in the face of dramatically increasing numbers of refugees who were coming into the rural district, the hotel building was offered to the district administration as collective housing, which sparked controversial discussions.

translation_text: The city prevented the accommodation of asylum seekers by drawing up a building plan to secure the area as a hotel location.
german_text: Die Stadt verhinderte die Unterbringung von Asylbewerbern durch die Aufstellung eines Bebauungsplans, um das Gebiet als Hotelstandort zu sichern.
actual_translation: The city prevented the accommodation of asylum seekers by preparing development plans to secure the area as a hotel location.

translation_text: The decision was not uncontroversial in the council.
german_text: Die Entscheidung war damals im Gemeinderat nicht unumstritten.
actual_translation: The decision passed in the municipal council back then without controversy.

translation_text: But above all, Freudenstad’s mayor Julian Osswald defended the hotel location and talked about serious stakeholders at the house.
german_text: Doch vor allem Freudenstadts Oberbürgermeister Julian Osswald verteidigte den Hotelstandort und sprach schon damals von ernstzunehmenden Interessenten an dem Haus.
actual_translation: Yet Freudenstadt's lord mayor, Julian Osswald, in particular, defended the hotel location and already back then spoke of serious interested parties in the establishment.

translation_text: He should be right.
german_text: Er sollte Recht behalten.
actual_translation: And he was right.

translation_text: The Group of Luisenhotels with Managing Director Birgit Scherer based in Bad Bergzabern has acquired the former Hotel Birkenhof in a voluntary sale in Berlin and wants to make it again a house of the Three-Star-Plus category under the name Waldhotel Luise.
german_text: Die Gruppe Luisenhotels mit Geschäftsführerin Birgit Scherer mit Sitz in Bad Bergzabern hat das ehemalige Hotel Birkenhof bei einer freiwilligen Versteigerung in Berlin erworben und will es wieder zu einem Haus der Drei-Sterne-Plus-Kategorie unter dem Namen Waldhotel Luise machen.
actual_translation: The Luisenhotels Group, with Managing Director Birgit Scherer, based in Bad Bergzabern, acquired the former Hotel Birkenhof at a voluntary auction in Berlin and wants to return it to being an establishment in the three-stars-or-more category, under the name Waldhotel Luise.

translation_text: The group has four houses with the pleasant town object.
german_text: Die Gruppe hat mit dem Freudenstädter Objekt vier Häuser.
actual_translation: The group has four establishments including the Freudenstadt property.

translation_text: Two of them in Bad Bergzabern and one in Bad Herrenalb.
german_text: Zwei davon in Bad Bergzabern und eins in Bad Herrenalb.
actual_translation: Two of them are in Bad Bergzabern, and one is in Bad Herrenalb.

translation_text: They are called Hotel Luise, Luisenpark, Parkhotel Luise and now Waldhotel Luise.
german_text: Sie heißen Hotel Luise, Luisenpark, Parkhotel Luise und jetzt Waldhotel Luise.
actual_translation: They are called Hotel Luise, Luisenpark, Parkhotel Luise and, now, Waldhotel Luise.

translation_text: In the former Hotel Birkenhof, construction containers have been in front of the entrance for a long time, and when you enter the house, it will be clear how extensive renovations are being done.
german_text: Am früheren Hotel Birkenhof stehen schon seit längerer Zeit Bauschuttcontainer vor dem Eingang, und wenn man das Haus betritt, wird deutlich, welch umfangreiche Renovierungsarbeiten vorgenommen werden.
actual_translation: There has been a skip standing in front of the entrance to the former Hotel Birkenhof for a long time now, and when you enter the building, it becomes clear just how extensive the refurbishment works are that are being undertaken.

translation_text: The soils were cut out, roofs partially destroyed, old bathrooms removed from the rooms.
german_text: Die Böden wurden herausgerissen, Decken zum Teil abgebaut, alte Badewannen aus den Zimmern entfernt.
actual_translation: The floors have been ripped out, ceilings partly dismantled, old bath tubs taken out of the rooms.

translation_text: The entire hotel building is a single building.
german_text: Das gesamte Hotelgebäude ist eine einzige Baustelle.
actual_translation: The entire hotel building is one big construction site.

translation_text: There is still a lot to do until March.
german_text: Bis März gibt es noch viel zu tun.
actual_translation: There is still a lot to do before March.

translation_text: “It’s really a nice hotel,” says Thomas Scherer in a conversation with our newspaper.
german_text: "Es ist eigentlich ein schönes Hotel", sagt Thomas Scherer im Gespräch mit unserer Zeitung.
actual_translation: "It is truly a beautiful hotel," says Thomas Scherer in conversation with our paper.

translation_text: Everything is to be renovated in the black forest style.
german_text: Alles soll im Schwarzwaldstil erneuert werden.
actual_translation: Everything is to be redone in the Black Forest style.

translation_text: The rooms are equipped with large accessible douches, the entrance area is re-designed, new windows are built.
german_text: Die Zimmer werden mit großen begehbaren Duschen ausgestattet, der Eingangsbereich wird umgestaltet, es werden neue Fenster eingebaut.
actual_translation: The rooms are being kitted out with large, walk-in showers, the entrance foyer is being revamped, new windows are being installed.

translation_text: Everything should later become a "beautiful bourgeoisie", as Thomas Scherer expresses himself.
german_text: Alles solle später "schön bürgernah" werden, wie sich Thomas Scherer ausdrückt.
actual_translation: Everything should later become "beautifully in touch with the people", is how Thomas Scherer expressed it.

translation_text: “We want to make a jewelry out.”
german_text: "Wir wollen ein Schmuckstück draus machen."
actual_translation: "We want to make a gem of it."

translation_text: Swimming pool, wellness area and a meeting room belong to the equipment.
german_text: Schwimmbad, Wellnessbereich und ein Tagungsraum gehören zu der Ausstattung.
actual_translation: Swimming pool, wellness area and a meeting room are part of the facilities.

translation_text: We do not want to position ourselves at the high level of the hotels in Lauterbad, but already at an elevated level of the city centre, Scherer emphasizes.
german_text: Man wolle sich nicht auf dem hohen Niveau der Hotels in Lauterbad positionieren, doch schon auf einem gehobenen Innenstadt-Niveau, betont Scherer.
actual_translation: One doesn't want to position oneself at the high level of the hotels in Lauterbad, but still at an elevated downtown level, stressed Scherer.

translation_text: The Waldhotel Luise with its approximately 60 rooms wants to be widespread, Scherer explains further.
german_text: Das Waldhotel Luise mit seinen etwa 60 Zimmern wolle sich breit aufstellen, erläutert Scherer weiter.
actual_translation: The Waldhotel Luise, with its roughly 60 rooms, wants to set itself up for a broad audience, explains Scherer further.

translation_text: Both individual tourists, groups or business people should feel comfortable at the hotel.
german_text: Sowohl einzelne Urlauber, Gruppen oder Geschäftsleute sollen sich in dem Hotel wohlfühlen.
actual_translation: Individual holiday-makers, groups, and business people, should all feel at home in the hotel.

translation_text: Talks with OB Julian Osswald and tourism director Michael Krause he has already conducted, Scherer said.
german_text: Gespräche mit OB Julian Osswald und Tourismusdirektor Michael Krause habe er schon geführt, so Scherer.
actual_translation: Scherer said that he had already had conversations with Lord Mayor Julian Osswald and Director of Tourism Michael Krause.

translation_text: The views of the city are equal to those of the hotel group.
german_text: Die Vorstellungen der Stadt seien deckungsgleich mit denen der Hotel-Gruppe.
actual_translation: The city's expectations are said to be in line with those of the hotel group.

translation_text: “We are on the same line.”
german_text: "Wir sind auf der gleichen Linie."
actual_translation: "We're on the same page."

translation_text: Asked about the amount of investments, Thomas Scherer does not want to determine exactly.
german_text: Nach der Höhe der Investitionen gefragt, will sich Thomas Scherer nicht genau festlegen.
actual_translation: Asked about the level of investments, Thomas Scherer doesn't want to commit himself precisely.

translation_text: It is less than a million euros, he expects.
german_text: Knapp unter einer Million Euro, rechnet er.
actual_translation: A little under a million euros, he reckons.

translation_text: The outer facilities are also brought to the frontman, which is already clearly visible.
german_text: Auch die Außenanlagen werden auf Vordermann gebracht, das ist bereits deutlich sichtbar.
actual_translation: The outside facilities are also being revamped – that can already be seen.

translation_text: In an interior courtyard is a large terrace that will be accessible from the restaurant that is public.
german_text: In einem Innenhof entsteht eine große Terrasse, die vom Restaurant, das öffentlich ist, zugänglich sein wird.
actual_translation: In an inner courtyard, a large terrace is taking shape, which will be accessible from the restaurant, which is public.

translation_text: Thomas Scherer is optimistic: “Freudenstadt is a good market.”
german_text: Thomas Scherer ist optimistisch: "Freudenstadt ist ein guter Markt".
actual_translation: Thomas Scherer is optimistic: "Freudenstadt is a good market."

translation_text: Russian case: U.S. special broker calls on the Grand Jury
german_text: Russland-Affäre: US-Sonderermittler setzt Grand Jury ein
actual_translation: Russia affair: US Special Counsel convenes grand jury

translation_text: In the Russian case about U.S. President Donald Trump, the special mediator Robert Mueller said to have employed a so-called Grand Jury.
german_text: In der Russland-Affäre um US-Präsident Donald Trump soll Sonderermittler Robert Mueller nach einem Bericht eine sogenannte Grand Jury eingesetzt haben.
actual_translation: In the Russia affair surrounding US President Donald Trump, Special Counsel Robert Mueller is said to have convened a so-called grand jury, according to one report.

translation_text: The group has started the work over the past few weeks, the Wall Street Journal wrote with reference to people familiar with the matter.
german_text: Das Gremium habe in den vergangenen Wochen die Arbeit aufgenommen, schrieb das "Wall Street Journal" unter Berufung auf mit der Sache vertraute Personen.
actual_translation: The panel started work in recent weeks, wrote the "Wall Street Journal", relying on sources intimately acquainted with the matter.

translation_text: The newspaper appreciated the step as a sign that Mueller expanded and intensified his investigations.
german_text: Die Zeitung wertete den Schritt als Zeichen, dass Mueller seine Ermittlungen ausgeweitet und intensiviert habe.
actual_translation: The newspaper judged the step to be a sign that Mueller has broadened and intensified his investigations.

translation_text: CNN that there are already the first invitations of the group in connection with a meeting between Trump’s oldest son and a Russian lawyer.
german_text: Der Sender CNN berichtete, es gebe bereits erste Vorladungen des Gremiums im Zusammenhang mit einem Treffen zwischen Trumps ältestem Sohn und einer russischen Anwältin.
actual_translation: The broadcaster CNN reported that the panel has already issued its first subpoenas in connection with a meeting between Trump's oldest son and a Russian lawyer.

translation_text: U.S. intelligence services have long accused the Kremlin of targeted interference in the 2016 presidential election campaign.
german_text: US-Geheimdienste beschuldigen den Kreml seit längerem, sich gezielt in den Präsidentschaftswahlkampf 2016 eingemischt zu haben.
actual_translation: US secret service has long been accusing the Kremlin of purposefully interfering in the 2016 presidential election campaign.

translation_text: Mueller is investigating whether there were agreements between Trump’s election team and Moscow.
german_text: Mueller untersucht, ob es dabei Absprachen zwischen Trumps Wahlkampfteam und Moskau gab.
actual_translation: Mueller is investigating whether there was any collusion between Trump's campaign team and Moscow.

translation_text: The focus of the investigations is to be several men who acted as the Republican’s counselor in the election campaign.
german_text: Im Fokus der Ermittlungen sollen mehrere Männer stehen, die im Wahlkampf als Berater des Republikaners agierten.
actual_translation: Several men who acted as Republican advisers during the election campaign are said to stand at the centre of the investigations.

translation_text: According to reports, Mueller has also taken more and more Trump’s private and business environment under the lobby.
german_text: Berichten zufolge nahm Mueller auch mehr und mehr Trumps privates und geschäftliches Umfeld unter die Lupe.
actual_translation: According to reports, Mueller has been subjecting Trump's private and business circles to more and more scrutiny.

translation_text: The Washington Post wrote a few weeks ago that the special mediator Trump personally brought the center and is investigating the accusation whether the president may have hindered the justice in the course of the case.
german_text: Die "Washington Post" schrieb vor einigen Wochen, dass der Sonderermittler Trump persönlich ins Zentrum gerückt habe und den Vorwurf untersuche, ob der Präsident im Zuge der Affäre möglicherweise die Justiz behindert habe.
actual_translation: The "Washington Post" wrote a few weeks ago that the Special Counsel has personally shifted the centre of focus onto Trump and is investigating the charge of whether or not the President could have obstructed the course of justice during the affair.

translation_text: The main task of the Grand Jury is to examine the present evidence in possible crimes and to decide whether to appeal.
german_text: Die Hauptaufgabe von Grand Jurys ist es, vorliegende Beweise in möglichen Verbrechensfällen zu prüfen und zu entscheiden, ob Anklage erhoben werden soll.
actual_translation: It is the main task of the grand jury to review the available evidence in cases of possible felonies and to decide whether charges should be brought.

translation_text: The Grand Jurys are also called the Prosecutor's Chambers.
german_text: Grand Jurys werden daher auch Anklagekammern genannt.
actual_translation: Grand juries are for this reason also called prosecution chambers.

translation_text: Most of them are enabled when it comes to larger and controversial cases.
german_text: Zumeist werden sie eingeschaltet, wenn es sich um größere und kontroverse Fälle handelt.
actual_translation: They are usually engaged for major and controversial cases.

translation_text: The procedure is always done behind closed doors.
german_text: Das Verfahren erfolgt stets hinter verschlossenen Türen.
actual_translation: The procedure always takes place behind closed doors.

translation_text: The body may also be connected by the Prosecutor's Office to invite persons to the hearing.
german_text: Das Gremium kann zudem von der Staatsanwaltschaft eingeschaltet werden, um Personen zur Vernehmung unter Eid vorzuladen.
actual_translation: The panel may also be engaged by the public prosecutor's office to subpoena people for questioning under oath.

translation_text: According to CNN, pre-callings have already been issued about the meeting between Donald Trump Jr. and a Russian lawyer.
german_text: Laut dem Sender CNN wurden bereits Vorladungen ausgestellt, die sich um die Begegnung zwischen Donald Trump Jr. und einer russischen Anwältin drehen.
actual_translation: According to the broadcaster CNN, subpoenas have already been issued in relation to a meeting between Donald Trump Jr. and a Russian lawyer.

translation_text: The people who participated in the meeting were invited to make a statement, the report said.
german_text: Personen, die an dem Treffen beteiligt waren, seien zu einer Aussage aufgefordert worden, hieß es in dem Bericht.
actual_translation: People who had been involved in this meeting had been summoned to give evidence, the report said.

translation_text: They should also provide documents.
german_text: Zudem sollten sie Dokumente bereitstellen.
actual_translation: They were also supposed to make documents available.

translation_text: Besides Trump Jr., Trump's adviser and son Jared Kushner and his then election campaign leader Paul Manafort were also present at the conversation.
german_text: Neben Trump Jr. waren auch Trumps Berater und Schwiegersohn Jared Kushner sowie sein damaliger Wahlkampfchef Paul Manafort bei dem Gespräch dabei.
actual_translation: In addition to Trump Jr., Trump's adviser and son-in-law Jared Kushner and his former campaign manager Paul Manafort were also present at the meeting.

translation_text: Legal experts told U.S. television on Thursday night that the introduction shows that Mueller will not be scared in his work and that he would want to act quickly if necessary.
german_text: Rechtsexperten sagten am Donnerstagabend im US-Fernsehen, dass die Einsetzung zeige, dass Mueller sich in seiner Arbeit nicht einschüchtern lasse und dass er, wenn es nötig sein sollte, schnell handeln wolle.
actual_translation: Legal experts said on US television on Thursday evening that the convening shows that Mueller will not let himself be intimidated in his work and that he is willing to act quickly, should that be necessary.

translation_text: However, it is not necessarily to say that the Grand Jury will be closed in the end to decide on the processing of an accusation.
german_text: Es müsse aber nicht zwangsläufig heißen, dass die Grand Jury am Ende eingeschaltet werde, um über die Erhebung einer Anklage zu entscheiden.
actual_translation: However, this does not necessarily mean that the grand jury is ultimately being engaged in order to decide whether to bring charges.

translation_text: However, the establishment of the group is the beginning of a new phase in the investigations and a new reason for concern for President Trump.
german_text: Dennoch sei die Einsetzung des Gremiums der Beginn einer neuen Phase in den Untersuchungen und ein neuer Grund zur Besorgnis für Präsident Trump.
actual_translation: Nevertheless, the convening of the panel signals the beginning of a new phase in the investigations and gives President Trump a new cause for concern.
